text2: Cuando xtaw Kakaj Jesús laj richoch man jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel xril chi wiˈtakchak mak ajokˈsaltak suˈ y cristian tijin tijcamsaj ribˈak chi okˈej .

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Elantakbˈi neri , man ra anm taˈ camnak , warajke tran , xcheˈ rechak . Mak cristian xtzeˈjtak jwich Kakaj Jesús .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Pero re xresajtakbˈi mak cristian chuchja , ajrucˈreˈ xoc lamas wiˈ man ra anm , xchap chi jkˈabˈ y man ra anm xwaˈrc .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Lak juntir luwar ri wiˈ chirij man luwar li xelwiˈ jtaquil nen xan Kakaj Jesús .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Cuando xelbˈi Kakaj Jesús claˈ xambˈertakbˈi quibˈ moy chirij , cow tichˈejejtak , tijbˈijtak : ¡ Il cˈur kawch at Jcˈajol David ! xcheˈtak re .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Cuando xoc Kakaj Jesús la ja xpetak yak moy xjutuntak chijcˈulel , xpe Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Ton acojaˈtakaˈ chi incwiniˈ chi atzibˈsajcak ? xcheˈ rechak . Rechak xijtak : Ticubˈariˈ kachˈol , Kajawl , xcheˈtak re .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xchap bˈakˈ jwichak y xij rechak : Jilon tibˈansaj chapcaˈ jcubˈarbˈ achˈolak chwij , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Jilonli xnaˈtuntak yak moy . Xpe Kakaj Jesús , subˈlaj cow jchˈabˈejcak xan , xij rechak : Ma yolowtak pire maˈquiˈ nen jonok tieteman re , xcheˈ rechak .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Ajriˈke xeltakbˈi riqˈui Kakaj Jesús laj or xoctak chi jyolic rechak cristian lak juntir mak luwar li , ri xan Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Cuando xeltakbˈi yak moy ri xtzibˈsaj bˈakˈ jwichak , xpetak nicˈj cristian chic xcˈamtakbˈi jun mem riqˈui Kakaj Jesús . Y sicˈ mem li wiˈ etzl laj ranm .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús xresaj man etzl laj ranm sicˈ mem , ajrucˈreˈ xoc chi yoloj . Mak cristian subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak , xijtak chiribˈil ribˈak : Ni jun bˈwelt ilan kawiˈl neri Israel jilonli , xcheˈtak .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Pero mak fariseo xijtak : Man winak li tresajiˈ mak etzl ri wiˈ laj ranmak cristian laˈke jcwinel man jbˈabˈal etzl , xcheˈtak .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xwoˈcot lak juntir tilmit y lak tra luwar . Xoc lak jsinagogak yak rijajl Israel y xij tzilaj jtaquil rechak cristian chirij jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian y xtzibˈsaj juntir cristian ri yajtak .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús xril jwichak subˈlaj qˈui cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ , xril cˈur jwichak jwiˈl tijin tijtijtak cˈax y taˈ nen tiilbˈen rechak chapcaˈ jun kˈat carner cuando taˈ ajyukˈ rechak .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Subˈlaj nim man ticoˈn toquem raj jwich , pero quibˈ uxibˈke mocom .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Atak tzˈonajtak tokˈobˈ re Rajw ticoˈn chi tijtakch mocom chi jtoquic jwichak mak ticoˈn , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xmulbˈaˈ yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij . Xyeˈ cwinel rechak chi resaj mak etzl ri wiˈ laj ranmak cristian y chi jtzibˈsaj cristian re juntir jaljojtak yajel .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Riˈ ri jbˈijak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) takoˈn , nabˈe rechak riˈ Simón ri tibˈijsaj Pedro re pach jkˈun ri jbˈij Andrés , Santiago pach jkˈun ri jbˈij Juan ri yak jcˈajol Zebedeo ,

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Felipe , Bartolomé , Tomás , Mateo ri ajtzˈonal alcabar , Santiago ri jcˈajol Alfeo , Tadeo ,

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Simón ri tibˈijsaj Zelote re y Judas Iscariote ri xjachow re Kakaj Jesús pi camic .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtakbˈi yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij ri xchaˈw y xij rechak nen rajwax trantak : Mat bˈetak riqˈuilak yak maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel y mat octak laj jtilmitak yak aj Samaria .

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Riˈ mas tzi , atbˈetak riqˈuilak yak rijajl Israel ri chapcaˈ mak carner ri sacheˈltak .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Juntir luwar lamas attawtak , bˈijtak rechak : Raquitzchak raj tijchol takon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian , atcheˈtak rechak .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Tzibˈsajtak yak cristian ri yajtak , cˈastasajtak jwichak yak camnakibˈ laj jcamnaklak , tzibˈsajtak yak ri wiˈ yajel chirijak ri jbˈij lepra y esajtak mak etzl ri wiˈ laj ranmak cristian . Atak xacochajtake acwinelak chi jbˈanic juntir li , taˈ luwar tatzˈonaj atojbˈlak cuando tatzibˈsajtak cristian .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: Taˈ tacˈamtakbˈi oro , ni plata , ni pwak bˈanal laˈ cobre ,

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: ni chim pire tichocon awiˈlak laj abˈeak , ni taˈ cˈamtakbˈi jun túnica chic , ni carot y taˈ xajabˈ tacˈamtakbˈic , jwiˈl jun mocom pi jcholajliˈ tiyeˈsaj kelen re .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: Cuando attawtak li jono tilmit o li jono luwar , toctak jono cristian ri ticˈular pire attawtak riqˈuil . Waˈxentak laj richoch ajriˈ ateltakbˈi claˈ cuando ateltakbˈi li man tilmit o li man luwar li .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Cuando atoctak la ja cˈamtak rutzil jwichak yak ri wiˈtak la ja y bˈijtak rechak : Atak juntir ri watak la ja neri , waˈxok utzil laj awanmak , atcheˈtak rechak .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Wi yak rajw ja lamas attawtakwiˈ ticˈulariˈ pi rechak atwaˈxtak riqˈuilak , ticaniˈ utzil riqˈuilak ri chawajak tiyeˈsaj rechak y wi mitaˈ ticˈular pi rechak atwaˈxtak riqˈuilak taˈ tican utzil riqˈuilak ri chawajak tiyeˈsaj rechak , tikˈaj chiquiˈch aacˈlak .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Y wi wiˈ jonok taˈ atjcˈultak y wi taˈ rajak tijtatak ayoljak , elantakbˈi li man ja li o li man tilmit li , can totojtak man pok ri wiˈ laˈ awakanak .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak cuando titaw kˈij tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian wich ulew , mak cristian li masna cˈax kˈatbˈitzij tibˈansaj chibˈak chiwch ri xaan chibˈak mak cristian aj Sodoma y aj Gomorra , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : In atintaktakbˈi lak jaljojtak luwar , tambˈan chawechak chapcaˈ jtakic carner chijxoˈlak mak utiw . Jwiˈliˈli coj anoˈjak chi jchajaj aybˈak chapcaˈ trantak mak cumatz y bˈantak chapcaˈ trantak mak tra ut ri taˈ trantak cˈax .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Tike acwentij aybˈak chiwchak mak cristian jwiˈl atna jachsajtakna laj jkˈabˈak mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel y atna secˈsajtakna lak sinagog .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Y inwiˈlke in atna jachsajtakna laj jkˈabˈak mak jbˈabˈaltak kˈatbˈitzij y mak rey jilonli tijnaˈ tabˈijtak rechak y rechak yak maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel chi tzˈetiˈ ri ilan y tal awiˈlak chwij .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: Pero cuando atjachsajtak laj jkˈabˈak mak jbˈabˈaltak kˈatbˈitzij li , mat octak il chi jchomorsaj nen tabˈijtak o nen tabˈantak chi yoloj jwiˈl cuando titaw or atchˈaˈwtak , Kakaj Diosiˈ tiyeˈw yoloj chawechak nen tabˈijtak .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Maˈ atak taˈ ri atchˈaˈwtak , riˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Akajak Dios ri wiˈ laj awanmak tichˈaˈwc .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: Jun cristian tina jachna jkˈun ratzak pi camic y jun chuchkajw tina jachna ralcˈwalak pi camic y yak alcˈwalixelbˈ tina jbˈitna ribˈak chirij jkaj jchuchak y tina jachtakna pi camic .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Juntir cristian ri bˈesal ranmak chirijak mak etzltak noˈj atna retzelbˈejtakna y atna jcontrijtakna inwiˈlke in , pero nen taˈ tijquibˈaj ranm chwij asta ticamc , ticolmajiˈ laj jkˈabˈ jmac .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Cuando tibˈansaj cˈax chawechak li jun tilmit elmajentak , jattak chic li jun jalan tilmit chic . Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi atak ajquiˈ chatcwintak chi jbˈij Jyolj Kakaj Dios rechak cristian lak juntir jtilmitak yak rijajl Israel cuando tipe chic Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: Ni jono ajtijol ribˈ mas jnoˈj chiwch ajtijol re y taˈ ni jono mocom mas jnoˈj chiwch jpatron .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Jun ajtijol ribˈ tranaˈ pi re xike tran lawiˈ ri tran ajtijol re y man mocom tranaˈ pi re xike tran lawiˈ tran jpatron . Wi man rajw ja tibˈijsajiˈ chi jbˈabˈal etzliˈn , ¿ nen chiquiˈ tibˈijsaj rechak yak ralcˈwal ? xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Atak mi tzaak achˈolak chiwchak yak ri tibˈanowtak cˈax chawechak , jwiˈl taˈ ni jono kelen ri tibˈansaj chi mukukil miti tina elna chi sakil .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Lawiˈ ri tambˈij chawechak chi mukukil , bˈijtak chi sakil y lawiˈ ri tambˈij chawechak pi jasjail , chˈejejentak chi jbˈij bˈak ja .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Mi tzaak achˈolak chiwchak mak cristian ri ticamsan atioˈjlak , jwiˈl rechak taˈ ticwintak chi jcamsaj awanmak . Riˈ tzaak achˈolak chiwch jun ri ticwin tijtˈoj atioˈjlak pach awanmak li man luwar re tijbˈi cˈax .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: Quibˈ chi nuchˈ tzˈiquin ticˈayajiˈ chi quibˈ centaw , pero taˈ ni jono rechak titzaak lak ulew wi taˈ tijyeˈ luwar Kakaj Dios

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: y jilon rusumal ábˈak ajlaliˈ jwiˈl .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli mi tzaak achˈolak , atak masna atlokˈajtak chiwchak subˈlaj qˈui tzˈiquin , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Nen jonok tibˈin chiwchak cristian chi tijchˈobˈaˈ inwch , in tambˈijiˈ re Inkaj ri wiˈ lecj chi tzˈetiˈ tanchˈobˈaˈ jwich .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Pero nen jonok taˈ raj tijbˈij chiwchak cristian chi tijchˈobˈaˈ inwch , in taˈ tambˈij re Inkaj ri wiˈ lecj chi tanchˈobˈaˈ jwich , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Ma bˈij atak chi inwiˈlke in tiwaˈx utzil chijxoˈlak cristian . Jwiˈl inwiˈlke in tipe chˈoˈj chijxoˈlak cristian .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Y inwiˈlke in jun winak tijcontrij jkaj y jun anm tijcontrij jchuch y jun alibˈxel tijcontrij ralbˈ .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Jilonli yak ri ticontrin rechak cristian , riˈ yak rechˈelxicak .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: Nen mas tijlokˈaj jkaj o jchuch chinwch in , taˈ ticˈular tioc pi we . Nen mas tijlokˈaj jcˈajol o jrabˈin chinwch in , taˈ ticˈular tioc pi we .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Nen jono cristian taˈ raj tijtij cˈax laj jcˈaslemal y tixambˈer chwij , taˈ ticˈular tioc pi we .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Nen jono cristian taˈ raj tijyeˈ ribˈ pi camic jwiˈlke tran lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tran , tisaachiˈ jwich , pero nen tijyeˈ ribˈ pi camic inwiˈl in , ticolmajiˈn .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Nen atcˈuluwtak , iniˈ injcˈultak y nen incˈuluw in , riˈ tijcˈul ri intakowinakch .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Y nen ticˈuluw re jun ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios tijcˈulaˈ re chapcaˈ jqˈuixel ri tiyeˈsaj re jun ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios chirij ri bˈanal jwiˈl y nen ticˈuluw re jun cristian ri sucˈul ranm chiwch Kakaj Dios , tijcˈulaˈ re chapcaˈ jqˈuixel ri tiyeˈsaj re jun cristian ri sucˈul ranm chiwch Kakaj Dios chirij ri bˈanal jwiˈl .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Nen jonok tijyeˈ jun vas joron re jun cristian jwiˈlke ajtijol ribˈiˈ chwij onque taˈ nim jkˈij , kes tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi tijcˈulaˈ jqˈuixel , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús xqˈuis jyeˈic jnoˈjak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xelbˈi claˈ y xeˈ chi jtijojcak cristian re Jyolj Kakaj Dios li mak tilmit re Galilea .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox wiˈ li cars , cuando xta jtaquil juntir ri tijin tran Kakaj Jesús , xtakbˈi yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij chi jtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús jilonri :

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: ¿ Atniˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew o tina kulbˈejna jun chic ? xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Jattak , bˈijtatak re Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox juntir ri tijin tawiltak y ri tijin tatatak .

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: Bˈijtatak re chi yak moy tichak naˈtuntak , yak coˈx tichak woˈcottak , yak ri wiˈ yajel chirijak ri jbˈij lepra xtzibˈtakaˈn , yak tac tichak tontak , yak camnak xcˈastasajiˈ jwichak laj jcamnaklak y yak powrtak xijsajiˈ tzilaj jtaquil rechak nen mo ticolmajtak laj jkˈabˈ jmacak .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Y tzi re jun cristian ri taˈ tijquibˈaj ranm chwij , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Cuando xkˈajtakbˈi yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , Kakaj Jesús xoc chi yoloj riqˈuilak cristian chirij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox y xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nen xeˈ awileˈtak li man luwar lamas taˈ cristian ? ¿ Roniˈ xeˈ awileˈtak jun aaj ri tiitzˈbˈej jwiˈl tew ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Wi maˈ jiˈtaˈlonli , ¿ nencˈu xeˈ awileˈtak ? ¿ Roniˈ xeˈ awileˈtak jun winak ri cojol kustaklaj itzˈik jwiˈl ? Maˈ jiˈtaˈlonli . Atak awetamakiˈ chi yak cristian ri ticojowtak kustaklaj itzˈik , jiˈ wiˈtak laj richochak mak rey .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: ¿ Nencˈu xeˈ awileˈtak ? ¿ Roniˈ xeˈ awileˈtak jun ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ? Jiloniˈn . Y in tambˈij chawechak chi re masna nim jkˈij chiwch jun ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Jwiˈl riˈ re quiek chirij ri tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri : Tina intaknabˈi intakoˈn nabˈe chawch pire tibˈe jbˈij rechak cristian chi rajwaxiˈ tijqˈuex jnoˈjak y tijcˈam jkˈabˈal jmacak chinwch nicˈ riqˈuil tran jwaˈx jun abˈe chawch , ticheˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi taˈ ni jono cristian waˈsal xoˈlak juntir cristian ri mas nim jkˈij chiwch Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox . Pero chiwch Kakaj Dios riˈ mas nim jkˈij chiwch Juan jun cristian ri taˈ mas nim jkˈij chijxoˈlak yak ri titakon Kakaj Dios laj ranm .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Laˈ mak kˈij cuando Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xtijoj cristian re Jyolj Kakaj Dios asta lajori , subˈlaj cristian tijin tioctak laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈak , pero xike yak ri wiˈ jcowil ranmak tioctak laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈak .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Juntir yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios ojr pach Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios xijtakaˈ chirij jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian asta xyuk Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Wi tacojtak o taˈn , Elías ri bˈilch ojr chi tina pena wich ulew , riˈ Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox ri xyuk .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Nen titonc , jteˈ jcholajl ri tambˈij , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak cristian .

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nen quiek laˈ tanniqˈuibˈsaj yak cristian ri wiˈtak re mak junabˈ lajori ? Jilon jbˈanicak chapcaˈ mak tral acˈl ri ticubˈartak chi itzˈ lak cˈaybˈl y tichˈejejtak chi jchˈabˈej yak jpachak y tijbˈijtak :

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: Xkokˈsajiˈ suˈ chi axicnak , pero taˈ xatxojowtak y xkabˈixajiˈ bˈix ri kes bˈis jtaic , pero taˈ xatokˈtak , ticheˈtak .

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Jwiˈl cuando xyuk Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox taˈ tijtij wa ni taˈ tijtij vin , atak tabˈijtak chi re wiˈ jun etzl laj ranm .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Y cuando xyuk Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , re tijtijaˈ wa y tijtijaˈ vin , atak tabˈijtak : Man winak li subˈlaj tiwiˈnc , subˈlaj tikˈabˈarc , richcˈulchiˈyiˈ mak ajtzˈonaltak alcabar pach mak ajmacbˈ , atcheˈtak . Pero in tambˈij chawechak chi jnoˈj Kakaj Dios ticˈutuniˈ chirij tzitaklaj noˈj ri tibˈanc , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak cristian .

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xoc chi jyajicak mak cristian ri wiˈtak li mak tilmit lamas xan mas cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios , jwiˈl taˈ xqˈuex jnoˈjak .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Y xij rechak : ¡ Cˈur awchak atak aj Corazín ! ¡ Cˈur awchak atak aj Betsaida ! Jwiˈl witi jiˈ xansaj mak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios riqˈuilak yak cristian aj Tiro pach Sidón ri xansaj aacˈlak , ojrteneˈreˈ xqˈuex jnoˈjak y xcojaˈtakteneˈreˈ kˈektaklaj itzˈik y roj xtilaˈtakteneˈreˈ chaaj laj jbˈaak pire cˈutbˈire chi tibˈisontakaˈ jwiˈl jmacak .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Pero in tambˈij chawechak cuando tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian wich ulew , atak masna cˈax kˈatbˈitzij tibˈan chabˈak chiwchak mak cristian aj Tiro pach Sidón .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Y atak aj Capernaúm , riˈ chachˈolak chi atcˈamsajtakaˈbˈi riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj , pero jiˈcˈuneˈ atbˈetak li man luwar lamas ticˈolsaj jsantilak camnakibˈ . Witi mak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ri xansaj aacˈlak jiˈteneˈ xansaj riqˈuilak yak cristian aj Sodoma , roj xqˈuexaˈteneˈ jnoˈjakreˈ y ajwiˈteneˈ man tilmit li lajori .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Pero in tambˈij chawechak cuando titaw kˈij tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian wich ulew , atak masna cˈax kˈatbˈitzij tibˈan chabˈak chiwch ri xaan chibˈak yak cristian aj Sodoma , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Laˈ mak kˈij li Kakaj Jesús xij jilonri : Tannimirsaj akˈij at Inkaj , ri Rajawl caj pach ulew jwiˈl at taˈ xayeˈ luwar rechak yak ri wiˈ jnoˈjak chi tretemajtak jcholajl nen xabˈij . Pero xayaˈ luwar xretemajtak yak cristian ri jilon jnoˈjak chapcaˈ mak tral acˈl .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Jiloniˈ Kaj , jwiˈl jilon chawaj , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: Y xij chic rechak cristian : Inkaj xjachaˈ juntir laj inkˈbˈ . Taˈ ni jonok retam nen tran Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , xike Kakaj Dios y taˈ ni jonok retam nen tran Kakaj Dios , xike Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios pach yak cristian ri lawiˈ raj Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios tijyeˈ retemaj rechak .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: Tzajtak wiqˈuil atak ri cosolcatak li chac y ralaj awikaˈnak y in atinyaˈtakaˈ chi uxlan .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Cojtak incˈutuˈn chapcaˈ jun yug tacoj rij akulak y tijoj aybˈak chwij , in tambˈanaˈ nim re wanm chi awilicak , taˈ tancoj inkˈij y wi jilon tabˈantak li , tiuxlaniˈ awanmak .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Jwiˈl incˈutuˈn jilon chapcaˈ jun yug taˈ cˈax jcˈamic , taˈ nicˈ chapcaˈ jun ikaˈn al , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Jorok kˈaxiˈ quibˈ uxibˈ kˈij jbˈij jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús jilonli cuando xkˈaxtak lak ticoˈn pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij li jun kˈij re uxlan y yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij subˈlaj xcˈoktak wiˈjal . Xtoctak jujun jwich trig y xtijtak .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Mak fariseo cuando xriltak chi jilonli xantak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xijtak re : Il impuch , yak ajtijol ribˈak chawij tijin trantak ri taˈ yeˈl luwar tibˈansaj lak kˈij re uxlan , xcheˈtak re .

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Taˈcˈu ilan awiˈlak li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri xan David ojr pach yak jpach cuando xcˈoktak wiˈjal ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Re xoc li nimlaj chinam ri richoch Kakaj Dios pach yak jpach xtijtak mak cuxlanwa ri sujul re Kakaj Dios y taˈ yeˈl luwar jwiˈl Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios chi titijsaj , xike rechak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios yeˈl luwar rechak tijtijtak .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Y , ¿ taˈcˈu ilan awiˈlak ri tijbˈij Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios chi yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios taˈ timacuntak chiwch Kakaj Dios cuando tichacuntak li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios laˈ mak kˈij re uxlan ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Pero in tambˈij chawechak chi neri wiˈ jun masna nim jkˈij chiwch nimi richoch Kakaj Dios .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Atak taˈ awetamak nen jcholajl tielwiˈ Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri : In riˈ chwaj tawiltak cˈur jwich jun cristian chiwch tasujtak sipan chwe , ticheˈ .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Witi awetamak jcholajl taˈ roj tacoj aybˈak pi kˈatbˈitzij chirijak yak ri taˈ jmacak , jwiˈl Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil wiˈ laj jkˈabˈ nen raj tran laˈ man kˈij re uxlan , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak mak fariseo .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús xmay yoloj riqˈuilak mak fariseo , xeˈ octak li sinagog .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Y claˈ wiˈ jun winak ri siquirnak jun jkˈabˈ , pero jwiˈl rechak tijin tijtoctak nen jono kelen ri taˈ tzi tran Kakaj Jesús pire tijcojtak tzij chirij y xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Tijbˈijniˈ laj Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios titzibˈsaj jun cristian laˈ kˈij re uxlan ? xcheˈtak re .

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Wi wiˈ jono chawechak wiˈ jun jcarner y wi xtzaak li jun jul laˈ kˈij re uxlan , ¿ taˈcˈu tresaj li jul laˈ kˈij li ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Jun cristian masna lokˈ jcˈaslemal chiwch jun carner , jwiˈliˈli Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios tijyaˈ luwar tibˈan utzil laˈ kˈij re uxlan ri rajwax tibˈanc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Y xij re sicˈ winak ri siquirnak jkˈabˈ : Yuk akˈbˈ , xcheˈ re . Y sicˈ winak xyuk jkˈabˈ y xtzibˈc , xcan chapcaˈ man jun jkˈabˈ chic .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Pero xeltakbˈi mak fariseo y xoctak chi jchomorsaj nen trantak chi jcamsaj Kakaj Jesús .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús cuando xretemaj nen xchomorsajtak chirij , xelbˈi claˈ y subˈlaj cristian xeˈtak chirij y xtzibˈsaj juntir cristian ri yajtak

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: y xij rechak chi mi jbˈijtak chi re Jcˈajoliˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Jilonli xan pire xtaw chiwch ri xij Isaías ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios cuando Kakaj Dios xij jilonri :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: Coˈ ri , wajchac ri chaˈl inwiˈl , ri subˈlaj tanlokˈaj y subˈlaj inquiˈcot chirij . Tanyaˈ Lokˈlaj Insantil laj ranm pire tijbˈij rechak yak maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel nen rajwax trantak pire tran sucˈul ranmak chinwch .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Taˈ tichˈoˈjin y taˈ tichˈejejc . Taˈ ni jonok titaˈw re chi cow tichˈaˈw xoˈlak bˈe .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Taˈ tran rechak cristian chapcaˈ jqˈuisic jkˈipic jun aaj ri cojol jyaj , ni taˈ tran rechak cristian chapcaˈ jqˈuisic jchupic jun mech re candil ri raquitzchak sibˈ tiel laˈ , taˈ ni jun cristian tijsach jwich asta tina ranna re cristian chi tran sucˈul ranmak chinwch pire tichˈecon chibˈak mak etzltak noˈj .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Y juntir cristian ri maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel ticubˈariˈ jchˈolak chi rulbˈej titaw man kˈij li , xcheˈ .

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Xcˈamtakch jun winak moy y mem riqˈui Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl wiˈ etzl laj ranm y Kakaj Jesús xtzibˈsaj sicˈ winak , jilonli taˈ chiquiˈ etzl laj ranm , tichak chˈaˈw y tichak naˈtunc .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Juntir cristian subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak xtzˈonajtak chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Maˈ rontaˈ ri Jcˈajol David ? xcheˈtak .

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Mak fariseo cuando xtatak chi jilonli tijbˈijtak yak cristian chirij Kakaj Jesús , xijtak : Man winak li tresajiˈ mak etzl laj ranmak cristian laˈ jcwinel Beelzebú ri man jbˈabˈal etzl , xcheˈtak .

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús retamiˈ nen tijin tijchomorsajtak , xij rechak : Juntir kˈatbˈitzij , wi tijtos ribˈak y tioctak chi chˈoˈj chiribˈil ribˈak , tisaachiˈ jwichak . Y jun tilmit o yak echˈelxic li jun ja , wi tijtos ribˈak y tioctak chi chˈoˈj chiribˈil ribˈak , taˈ naj tijcuytak jilonli .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Y jiˈcˈulonli witi man jbˈabˈal etzl tijin chi resaj man jbˈabˈal etzl , tijiniˈ tran cˈax ribˈ ricˈan . Wi jilonli tran man jbˈabˈal etzl tisaachiˈ jwich jkˈatbˈitzij .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Wi in laˈyiˈ jcwinel Beelzebú twesaj mak etzl laj ranmak cristian , ¿ nencˈu yeˈwinak jcwinelak yak ajtijol ribˈak chawijak pire tresajtak mak etzl laj ranmak cristian ? Riˈ rechak li tibˈintak chawechak chi atak sachalcatakaˈn .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Pero wi in twesaj mak etzl laj ranmak cristian laˈ jcwinel Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios , riˈ li ticˈutuw chi jtakon Kakaj Dios chabˈak xyukiˈ aacˈlak .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Jun cristian ri wiˈ mas jchokˈbˈ taˈ ni jonok ticwin tioc laj richoch chi resaj kelen re . Nabˈe tina jximna , ajrucˈreˈ tijnaˈ tresaj kelen re , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: Y xij chic rechak : Nen taˈ tzi tril ri tambˈan , riˈ li incontrinc . Nen taˈ injtˈoˈ chi jmulbˈaj jwichak cristian , riˈ re tiuktambˈi rechak .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli in tambˈij chawechak chi Kakaj Dios tijcuyaˈ juntir jmacak cristian ri bˈanal jwiˈlak y juntir mak yokˈon ri tijbˈijtak chirij Kakaj Dios . Pero nen jono cristian tiyokˈon chirij Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios , taˈ ni jun bˈwelt ticuysaj jmac jwiˈl Kakaj Dios .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Kakaj Dios tijcuyaˈ jmacak yak ri tiyokˈontak chirij Jcˈajol ri xwux pi cristianil , pero nen jonok tiyokˈon chirij Lokˈlaj Jsantil , taˈ ticuysaj jmac lajori y nen or riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak mak fariseo : Wi tzilaj cheˈ titicsaj , tziyiˈ jwich tijyeˈw , pero wi maˈ tzilaj cheˈ taˈ titicsaj , taˈ tzi jwich tijyeˈw . Jun cheˈ chirijke jwich tichˈobˈsaj nen chi cheˈ lal .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: Y atak pur atak cumatz ri ticamsanc . Atak taˈ tabˈijtak tzitaklaj yoloj jwiˈl atakaˈ etzltak cristian . Jwiˈl laj ranmiˈ jun cristian tipeˈw ri tijbˈij laˈ jchiˈ .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Jun tzilaj cristian tijbˈijiˈ tzitaklaj yoloj jwiˈl wiˈ tzitaklaj noˈj laj ranm y jun etzl cristian tijbˈijiˈ etzltak tzij jwiˈl wiˈ etzltak noˈj laj ranm .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: In tambˈij chawechak cuando titaw kˈij tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian , juntir cristian tina jbˈijtakna re Kakaj Dios nen chac xijtak mak yoloj ri taˈ nen tichacuj .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Jwiˈl chirijiˈ ayolj ticˈutun wi taˈ amac y chirijiˈ ayolj ticˈutun wi wiˈ amac , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak mak fariseo .

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Xpetak nicˈj fariseo pachak nicˈj ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios , xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Ajtijonl , chikaj tikil tabˈan jono cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios chikawch , xcheˈtak re .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Yak cristian ri wiˈtak wich ulew laˈ mak junabˈ lajori mas etzl jnoˈjak y taˈ sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios tijtzˈonajtak tibˈan jono cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios chiwchak , pero chiwchak mak cristian li taˈ chiquiˈ tibˈansaj jono cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios , xike ri xansaj chirij Jonás ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Chapcaˈ Jonás xwaˈxiˈ uxibˈ kˈij pach uxibˈ akˈabˈ laj jchˈol jun nimlaj car , jilon Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tina waˈxna uxibˈ kˈij pach uxibˈ akˈabˈ ralaj ulew .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Cuando titaw kˈij tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian ri wiˈtak lajori , tina jbˈitna ribˈak yak cristian aj Nínive pire tijtzˈonajtak kˈatbˈitzij chibˈak mak cristian ri wiˈtak lajori , jwiˈl rechak xqˈuexaˈ jnoˈjak cuando xijsaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios rechak jwiˈl Jonás y lajori neri chaxoˈlak wiˈ jun ri masna nim jkˈij chiwch Jonás .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Y man anm ri xwaˈx pire reina re man luwar ri wiˈ li sur , re tipetiˈ cuando tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian ri wiˈtak lajori . Re tina yuk jtzˈonajna kˈatbˈitzij chibˈak juntir mak cristian li , jwiˈl subˈlaj najiˈ xpeˈw pire xyuk chi jtaic jnoˈj Salomón . Lajori neri chaxoˈlak wiˈ jun masna jnoˈj chiwch Salomón , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak mak fariseo y rechak yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak jilonri : Cuando jun etzl tiel laj ranm jun cristian , tibˈe lak chekej luwar , tijtoc lamas tiuxlanwiˈ , pero cuando taˈ tijtaˈ jono luwar lamas tiuxlanwiˈ , tijbˈij :

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: Inkˈaj chic laj wichoch lamas xinelwiˈch , ticheˈ . Y cuando tikˈaj chic man etzl li , tiyuk jteˈ man cristian ri lamas xelbˈi chapcaˈ rilic jun ja jamal jpam , tzi jmesic jpam y tzi jbˈanic jwaˈxc .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Tipe man etzl li , tibˈe jcameˈch wukubˈ ( 7 ) jpach chic ri masna etzl jnoˈjak chiwch re y juntir ribˈilak tioctak laj ranm man cristian li . Y man cristian li tran chic mas etzl jnoˈj chiwch ojr . Jilon tibˈansaj rechak mak etzltak cristian ri wiˈtak lajori , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak mak fariseo y yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Aj tijiniˈ Kakaj Jesús chi yoloj riqˈuilak cristian cuando xtawtak jchuch pach yak jkˈun , rechak riˈ raj roj xchˈabˈejtak Kakaj Jesús , pero jiˈke xcantak chuchja .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Xpe jun rechak yak ri wiˈtak claˈ , xij re : Achuch pach yak akˈun wiˈtak chuchja y rajak atjchˈabˈejtak , xcheˈ re .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús xij re man ri xin re jilonli : ¿ Nencˈu inchuch y nencˈu inkˈun ? xcheˈ re .

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xcˈut yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij y xij : Riˈtakaˈ rechak ri inchuch pach inkˈun .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Juntir yak ri tibˈanowtak lawiˈ raj Inkaj Dios ri wiˈ lecj , riˈtakaˈ li inkˈun , wanabˈ y inchuch , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús re .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Laˈ man kˈij li xelbˈi Kakaj Jesús la ja , xeˈ cubˈarok chiˈ nimlaj alagun .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Y jwiˈl subˈlaj cristian xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak riqˈuil , xjaw li jun barc , xcubˈarch claˈ y juntir cristian xcantak chiˈ nimlaj alagun .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús xoc chi jtijojcak re subˈlaj kelen laˈ esbˈitak noˈj . Xij jun esbˈi noˈj rechak jilonri : Wiˈ jun ajticonl xeˈ ticonanok .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Cuando tijin chi ticonanc , nicˈj íjaj xkejtak li bˈe y xpetak mak tzˈiquin xtijtak .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Nicˈj íjaj chic xkejtak xoˈlak abˈaj lamas taˈ pim ulew . Mak íjaj li , laj or xeltakch jwiˈl taˈ mas naj jpam man ulew lamas xkejtakwiˈ .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Pero jwiˈl taˈ lamas xeˈ raˈak cuando xel sakˈj , xchekejtak y xcamtak .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Y nicˈj íjaj chic xkejtak lak qˈuix , xeltakaˈch , pero mak qˈuix xqˈuiytak laj or chiwchak , xcamtak mak ticoˈn ralaj mak qˈuix .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Nicˈj íjaj chic xkejtak li tzilaj ulew . Mak íjaj li jor kus xwichintak . Jujun íjaj xyaˈtakaˈ jujun cient ( 100 ) jwichak y nicˈj chic xyaˈtakaˈ oxcˈal ( 60 ) jwichak y nicˈj chic xyaˈtakaˈ junwinak lajuj ( 30 ) jwichak .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Nen titonc , jteˈ jcholajl ri tambˈij , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak cristian .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xjutuntak riqˈui Kakaj Jesús y xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Nen chac laˈ esbˈitak noˈj tachˈabˈej mak cristian ? xcheˈtak re .

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Atak , Kakaj Dios xyaˈ retemaj chawechak jcholajl jtakon ri taˈ etemal , pero rechak taˈ xyeˈ luwar rechak tretemajtak .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Nen wiˈ mas riqˈuil , tiyeˈsaj chiquiˈ mas re pire tiniman re , pero nen taˈ re , asta raquitz ri wiˈ riqˈuil , timajsajiˈ re .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli laˈ esbˈitak noˈj tanchˈabˈejtak jwiˈl rechak onque tinaˈtuntakaˈn , pero taˈ tijmajtak jcholajl nen tijin triltak . Tijtaˈtakaˈ nen tibˈijsaj rechak , pero taˈ tijtatak jcholajl nen tijin tijtatak .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Chirijak mak cristian li titaw chiwch Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri xcan jbˈij Isaías ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ojr cuando xij jilonri : Tijtaˈtakaˈ ri tibˈijsaj rechak , pero taˈ tijtatak jcholajl y tinaˈtuntakaˈn , pero taˈ tijmajtak jcholajl ri nen tijin triltak .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Jwiˈl mak cristian li pur abˈaj ranmak , nic riqˈuil tzˈapiliˈ jxicnak y nicˈ riquil tzˈapiliˈ bˈakˈ jwichak , taˈ tinaˈtuntak y taˈ tijtatak jcholajl ri ximbˈij pire taˈ tijqˈuex jnoˈjak y taˈ tikˈajtak wiqˈuil pire tancunajtak , xcheˈ .

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: Pero atak tzi awechak jwiˈl atnaˈtuntakaˈn y attontakaˈn .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi subˈlaj ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios y subˈlaj cristian ri sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios rajak roj xrileˈtak ri tijin tawiltak lajori , pero taˈ xriltak . Rajak roj xtatak lawiˈ ri tijin tatatak lajori , pero taˈ xtatak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Tatak jcholajl ri tielwiˈ man esbˈi noˈj ri ximbˈij chirij man ajticonl .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Jun cristian ri tijta jtaquil chirij jtakon Kakaj Dios y taˈ tijta jcholajl , jilon chapcaˈ man bˈe ri lamas xkejwiˈ mak íjaj , tijcˈulaˈ Jyolj Kakaj Dios laj ranm , pero laj or tipe man jbˈabˈal etzl tresaj chic laj ranm .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Y jun cristian chic jilon chapcaˈ man ulew lak abˈaj lamas xkejtakwiˈ mak íjaj , re tijtaˈ Jyolj Kakaj Dios y laj or tijcˈul pi quiˈcotemal laj ranm ,

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: pero taˈ tibˈe raˈ laj ranm jwiˈl taˈ tijcubˈaˈ mas jchˈol chirij . Quibˈ uxibˈ kˈijke tijcoj , pero cuando titakchiˈj chi macunc y cuando tibˈansaj cˈax re jwiˈl tijcoj Jyolj Kakaj Dios , laj or tijquibˈaj ranm .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Y man luwar lak qˈuix ri lamas xkejtakwiˈ mak íjaj , riˈ jun cristian ri tijcoj Jyolj Kakaj Dios laj ranm quibˈ uxibˈ kˈij , pero riˈ tibˈe mas ranm chirijak mak kelen re wich ulew y tisubˈsaj jwiˈl jbˈiomil , riˈ li tikˈatow jwich Jyolj Kakaj Dios pire taˈ tiwichin laj ranm .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Y man tzilaj ulew lamas xkejtakwiˈ mak íjaj , riˈ jun cristian ri tijcˈul Jyolj Kakaj Dios laj ranm y tijtaˈ jcholajl , nicˈ riqˈuil tiwichiniˈ Jyolj Kakaj Dios laj ranm . Re jilon chapcaˈ mak íjaj ri tijyeˈtak jujun cient ( 100 ) jwichak , chapcaˈ mak íjaj ri tijyeˈtak oxcˈal ( 60 ) jwichak y chapcaˈ mak íjaj ri tijyeˈtak junwinak lajuj ( 30 ) jwichak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic jun esbˈi noˈj rechak cristian jilonri : Jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian jilon chapcaˈ xan jun winak ri xtic tzilaj íjaj laj rulew .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Pero lakˈabˈ cuando tiwartak juntir , xtaw jun jcontre winak li , xeˈ jtiqueˈ etzl woron chijxoˈlak mak trig y xecˈ .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Pero cuando xqˈuiytak mak trig , xcholtak wichinc , jilon mak etzl woron tijin tiqˈuiytak chijxoˈlak mak trig .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Xpetak mak mocom , xeˈ jbˈijtak re man rajw ticoˈn : Kaj , awíjaj ri xatic tzilaj íjajiˈn y , ¿ lacˈumas xpeˈtak mak etzl woron ? xcheˈtak re man rajw ticoˈn .

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Man rajw ticoˈn xij rechak : Jono incontre xeˈ tiquiw mak etzl woron chijxoˈl inticoˈn , xcheˈ . Y mak mocom xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Chawajniˈ tibˈe kabˈukeˈ mak etzl woron ? xcheˈtak re .

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: Y man rajw ticoˈn xij chic re mak mocom : Ma bˈukˈtak jwiˈl pent jbˈukˈic mak etzl woron tabˈantak tibˈukˈmajbˈi jujun trig chijxoˈl .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Riˈ mas tzi qˈuiyna xoˈlak trig asta titaw kˈij tikamol mak trig ajrucˈreˈ nabˈe tantak immocom , chi jmolic juntir mak etzl woron y tijximtak pi kˈaluˈn y tijtostak pire ticˈatsaj y juntir mak trig ri tijmoltak , tijcˈoltak laj incˈújaj , xcheˈ re mak mocom , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak cristian .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic jun esbˈi noˈj rechak cristian jilonri : Jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian jilon chapcaˈ jun ra íjaj re mostas ri xtic jun winak laj rulew .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Man ra íjaj re mostas masna nuchˈ chiwch juntir íjaj , pero cuando tiqˈuiy riˈ mas nim titaw chiwch juntir ichj , tranaˈ chapcaˈ jun nuchˈ cheˈ y mak tzˈiquin tipetak tran jsocak lak jkˈabˈ , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak cristian .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic jun esbˈi noˈj rechak cristian jilonri : Jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian jilon chapcaˈ chˈamkˈor ri tijcˈam jun anm , tijyuj pach uxibˈ pajbˈl cˈaj pire tijchˈamabˈsaj juntir man kˈor , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak cristian .

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Laˈ esbˈitak noˈj xtijojwiˈ cristian Kakaj Jesús re Jyolj Kakaj Dios pire tijtatak jcholajl .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Jilonli xan pire xtaw chiwch ri xij jun ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ojr cuando Kakaj Dios xij jilonri : Inna yolowna laˈ esbˈitak noˈj , tina imbˈijna kelen ri taˈ etemalch asta cuando ajquiˈ caj pach ulew , xcheˈ .

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xmay yoloj riqˈuilak cristian y xoc la ja . Xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Bˈij chike nen jcholajl tielwiˈ man esbˈi noˈj ri xabˈij chirijak mak etzl woron ri xeltakch lak trig , xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Ri xtiquiw tzilaj íjaj riˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Y ri ulew lamas xticonan riˈ juntir wich ulew y ri tzitaklaj íjaj riˈtakaˈ yak cristian ri tioctak laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon laj ranmak . Y mak etzl woron riˈtakaˈ yak cristian ri wiˈtak laj jkˈabˈ man jbˈabˈal etzl .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Y man contre ri xtiquiw mak etzl woron riˈ man jbˈabˈal etzl y kˈij re cuando timolsajtak mak trig riˈ man kˈij re qˈuisbˈi jwich kˈijsak y yak ri xmolowtak re mak trig riˈtakaˈ yak anjl .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Chapcaˈ jmolic mak etzl woron tibˈansaj pire titˈojsaj li kˈakˈ pire ticˈatc , jilonli tibˈan laˈ qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tina jtaknach yak anjl chi jchaˈic chijxoˈlak yak cristian ri titakon Kakaj Dios laj ranmak , juntir yak cristian ri tibˈanow rechak cristian chi timacuntak pach yak ri tibˈanowtak mak etzltak noˈj ,

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: titˈojsajtak li jun jorn ri wiˈ subˈlaj jkˈakˈal . Claˈ tibˈe rokˈbˈej ribˈak y tijkuchˈuchˈuj reeak .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Y yak ri sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios , tina jululuntaknach chapcaˈ rilic kˈij , tiwaˈxtakch lamas titakonwiˈ Kakaj Dios . Nen titonc , jteˈ jcholajl ri tambˈij , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian jilon chapcaˈ jun kelen ri pakal rijil ri mukul li jun luwar . Y jun winak tijtaˈw y xike tril tican jmukeˈ chic claˈ , subˈlaj tichak quiˈcotc , tibˈe jcˈayaj juntir kelen re y tijlokˈ man ulew li , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian jilon chapcaˈ tran jun ajyecomanl ri tijin tijtoc mak kustaklaj perla ri pakal rijil .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Cuando tibˈe jteˈ jun ri subˈlaj pakal rijil , laj or tibˈe jcˈayaj juntir kelen re y tijlokˈ man kuslaj perla li ri subˈlaj pakal rijil , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian jilon chapcaˈ jun cˈaat re chapbˈi car . Man cˈaat re chapbˈi car cuando titˈojsaj li mar tijmolaˈ juntir jwich car .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Cuando tinoj man cˈaat chi car tipetak mak ajchapaltak car tresajtakbˈi chiˈ jaˈ , tibˈe cubˈartak chi jchaˈic . Mak tzitaklaj car tijcˈoltak lak chicach y mak car ri taˈ tzi tijtˈojtakbˈic .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Y jilonli tibˈan laˈ qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak . Tipetak yak anjl , tijchaˈtak mak cristian ri pur etzl jnoˈjak chijxoˈlak yak ri sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios .

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Y mak cristian li ri pur etzl jnoˈjak titˈojsajtak li jun jorn ri wiˈ subˈlaj jkˈakˈal . Claˈ tibˈe rokˈbˈej ribˈak y tijkuchˈuchˈuj reeak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Xataˈtakniˈ jcholajl nen mo tielwiˈ juntir ri ximbˈij ? xcheˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij . Rechak xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Xkataˈn , Kajawl , xcheˈtak .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Jun ajtijol cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios cuando tijtijoj ribˈ re nen mo jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian jilon chapcaˈ jun rajw ja ri wiˈ kelen re cˈolan jwiˈl y cuando raj tresajch aacˈ kelen , tresajiˈn y cuando raj tresajch tzay kelen , tresajiˈn , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Kakaj Jesús cuando xmay jbˈij juntir mak esbˈitak noˈj li , xelbˈi claˈ .

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: Xtaw laj jtilmit xchol jtijoj cristian li sinagog . Mak cristian subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak chi jtaic y xtzˈonajtak chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Laˈcumas xpe jnoˈj jilon tran li , ri tijin tijbˈij ? Y , ¿ nen chiquiˈ mo ticwin chi jbˈanic mak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Re riˈ jcˈajol man ajcˈox y jchuch riˈ María . Riˈ ratzak Santiago , José , Simón pach Judas .

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Y wiˈtakaˈ yak ranabˈ neri chikaxoˈl . Y , ¿ lacˈumas xpe jnoˈj jilon tran li ? xcheˈtak mak cristian chirij .

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli taˈ rajak tijcojtak lawiˈ ri tijbˈij Kakaj Jesús . Xpe re , xij rechak : Lak juntir luwar ticojsajiˈ jkˈij jun ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios , pero laj jtilmit taˈ ticojsaj jkˈij , ni laj richoch , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Y taˈ xan qˈuilaj cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios claˈ jwiˈl mak cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ taˈ ticubˈar jchˈolak chirij .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Laˈ mak kˈij li man rey Herodes Antipas xta jtaquil juntir ri tran Kakaj Jesús .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Xij rechak mak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak pi jpach : Winak li riˈ Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xcˈastasaj jwich laj jcamnakl xoˈlak camnakibˈ , jwiˈliˈli ticwiniˈ chi jbˈanic cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ rechak .

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Herodes xij jilonli jwiˈl riˈ re xtakow jchapic Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox y xtakow jximic laˈ caden y xtak jcojic li cars jwiˈl Herodías ri xwaˈx pi rixokl Herodes Felipe ri jkˈun

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: y Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xij re Herodes : Taˈ tzi xabˈan xatcˈuliˈy riqˈui rixokl akˈun , xcheˈ re .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Herodes rajti ranm tijcamsaj Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , pero tike tzaak jchˈol chiwchak juntir cristian jwiˈl retamakiˈ chi Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , ajkˈasal Jyoljiˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Pero cuando xan jnimakˈj Herodes re xcˈul jkˈij , xpe jun kˈapoj anm ricˈlal Herodías xyuk xojow chiwchak juntir mak ri wiˈtak la ja ri xsiqˈuijtak li man nimakˈij li y Herodes subˈlaj kus xril .

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Xij re chiwchak juntir cristian chi tzˈetel tzˈet tijyaˈ re nen chi kelen raj tijtzˈonaj .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Y man kˈapoj anm li xtakchiˈj jwiˈl jchuch chi tijtzˈonaj jbˈa Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox re Herodes , xij re : Chwaj chi tayeˈ chwe li jun nimlaj plat jbˈa Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , xcheˈ re .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Man rey li subˈlaj xbˈison cuando xta chi jilonli xijsaj re , pero jwiˈl chiwchiˈ juntir mak ri wiˈtak li man nimakˈij li xij chi tijyaˈ re nen raj tijtzˈonaj , jwiˈliˈli xtak jyeˈic re man kˈapoj anm lawiˈ raj .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Jilonli xtak resaj jbˈa Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox li cars .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Xyeˈsajch li jun nimlaj plat y xyeˈsaj re man kˈapoj anm y man kˈapoj anm xeˈ jyeˈ re jchuch .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , xeˈ jcˈameˈtakch jcamnakl Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox . Xmuktak , ajrucˈreˈ xeˈ jbˈijtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Kakaj Jesús , cuando xta jtaquil chi xcamsajiˈ Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , xelbˈi claˈ , xjawbˈi li jun barc y xeˈ li jun luwar lamas taˈ cristian chˈakap re nimlaj alagun . Y cuando subˈlaj qˈui cristian re mak tilmit xtatak jtaquil lamas xeˈ Kakaj Jesús , xeˈtak chi rakanak asta xtawtak lamas wiˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Cuando xelch Kakaj Jesús li barc xril subˈlaj qˈui cristian mulantak claˈ , xril cˈur jwichak y xtzibˈsaj yak cristian ri yajtak ri cˈamalbˈi jwiˈlak .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Cuando xeˈ kˈij xpe yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xjutuntak chijcˈulel y xijtak re : Lajori xiˈ kˈij y laˈ man luwar ri taˈ cristian , qˈuis ayolj riqˈuilak cristian y bˈij rechak chi tibˈetak lak tilmit pire tibˈe jlokˈeˈ jwaak re tijtijtak , xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Taˈ rajwax tina bˈetakna chi jlokˈic jwaak . Yeˈtak jwaak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Rechak xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Pero taˈ qˈui cuxlanwa wiˈ kiqˈuil , xike jobˈ chi cuxlanwa wiˈ kiqˈuil pach quibˈ chi car , xcheˈtak re .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Cˈamtakch mak cuxlanwa pach mak car neri , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Y xij rechak juntir cristian chi ticubˈartak bˈak qˈuim . Y xpe Kakaj Jesús xcˈam mak jobˈ cuxlanwa laj jkˈabˈ pach mak quibˈ car , xnaˈtun lecj , xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios , xqˈuer y xyeˈ mak cuxlanwa rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij y rechak xjachtak chiwchak juntir cristian .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Juntir cristian xwiˈntak asta xnojtak y cuando xcolajtak , xnojsajtakna cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) chicach chi qˈuertak cuxlanwa y car ri taˈ xqˈuisc .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Yak ri xwiˈntak raj wiˈ jobˈ mil ( 5 , 000 ) xike winak , taˈ xajlaj anm ni mak tral acˈl .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Cuando xantaj li jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij chi tijawtakbˈi li barc y tinabˈertakbˈi pire tikˈaxtakbˈi nabˈe chˈakap re nimlaj alagun . Re xcanna jchˈabˈej juntir cristian .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xjaw bˈa jun witz ricˈan chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Cuando xoc akˈabˈ , re ajwiˈ bˈa witz .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Y man barc lamas xeˈtak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xjutuniˈbˈi naj bˈa nimlaj alagun y mak retumb re man nimlaj alagun subˈlaj tijkˈosaj ribˈak chiwch man barc , jwiˈl man tew jiˈ tijin jpetic laj jsucˈlal lamas bˈesal man barc .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Cuando sakarem re , Kakaj Jesús xeˈ chi rilicak , bˈe tran bˈa nimlaj alagun xjutumbˈi riqˈuilak .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Cuando yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xriltak chi bˈe tran Kakaj Jesús bˈesal bˈa nimlaj alagun , rechak subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak y subˈlaj cow xchˈejejtak y xijtak : ¡ Jun ajtzakal chˈoliˈn ! xcheˈtak .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , laj or xchˈabˈejtakbˈic , xijbˈi rechak : Cowirsaj awanmak , iniˈn , mi tzaak achˈolak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Xpe Pedro , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Wajawl , wi kes tzˈet atiˈn , bˈij chwe chi imbˈembˈi bˈa jaˈ intaw aacˈl , xcheˈ re .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij : Tzaj , xcheˈ re . Ajrucˈreˈ xpe Pedro , xkejbˈi li barc xeˈ chi rakan bˈa jaˈ laj jsucˈlal lamas petzalwiˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Pero xril chi wiˈ mas jchokˈbˈ tew bˈa jaˈ , subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈol y cuando tijinchak jkejic ralaj jaˈ xchˈejejc , xij : ¡ Wajawl , quinacoleˈ ! xcheˈ .

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , laj or xchap chi jkˈabˈ y xij re : ¡ At taˈ mas cubˈul achˈol chwij ! ¿ Nen chac xaquibˈaj awanm ? xcheˈ re .

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Cuando xjawtakch li barc , xtanar man quiekˈekˈ tew .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Y juntir yak ri wiˈtak li man barc xxucartak chiwch Kakaj Jesús y xijtak re : Tzˈetel tzˈet atiˈcaˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , xcheˈtak re .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Cuando rechak xkˈaxtakbˈi chˈakap re nimlaj alagun , xtawtak li jun luwar ri jbˈij Genesaret .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Y yak cristian claˈ xchˈobˈtak jwich Kakaj Jesús , xeˈ jyeˈtak jtaquil li juntir man luwar li y juntir cristian ri wiˈ jyowbˈak xcˈamtakbˈi riqˈui Kakaj Jesús .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Y xtzˈonajtak tokˈobˈ re chi tijyeˈ luwar rechak tijchaptak raquitz chakˈchiˈ ritzˈik . Juntir yak ri xchapowtak re xcaniˈ tzibˈtak re jyajak .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Xpetak nicˈj fariseo pach nicˈj ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios ri tipetak Jerusalén xtawtak riqˈui Kakaj Jesús xijtak re :

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: Yak ajtijol ribˈak chawij taˈ tijcojtak jcˈutuˈnak kamam katitˈ . Rechak taˈ tijchˈaj jkˈabˈak nabˈe , ajrucˈreˈ tijtij kelen rechak , xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Atak jwiˈlke tatakejtak mak jcˈutuˈn amam atitˈak , taˈ tacojtak Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios ,

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: jwiˈl Kakaj Dios xijiˈ jilonri : Coj jkˈij akaj achuch , xcheˈ . Y xij chic : Nen tijyokˈ jkaj jchuch , tina camsajna , xcheˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Pero atak tabˈijtak : Jun cristian tijnaˈ tijbˈij re jkaj o jchuch , taˈ tijnaˈ atintˈoˈw riqˈui nen rajwax chawe jwiˈl juntir kelen we ri wiˈ bˈiliˈ inwiˈl chi pirechiˈ tansuj re Kakaj Dios , atcheˈtak .

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: Y atak tabˈijtak chi jilonli taˈ rajwax tijcoj jkˈij jkaj o jchuch jun cristian . Jilonli tasachtak jwich Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios jwiˈl riˈ chiquiˈ tatakejtak acˈutuˈnak .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Atak ajsolcopil acaybˈalak , tzˈetiˈcaˈ xcan jtzˈibˈaj Isaías ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios chawijak ojr cuando Kakaj Dios xij jilonri :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: Yak cristian ri , jchiˈake tibˈin chi tijnimirsajtakaˈ inkˈij , pero laj ranmak taˈ tzˈet trantak jilonli .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Taˈ nen tichacuj tijnimirsajtak inkˈij . Rechak tijtijojtak cristian re mak cˈutuˈn ri queneysalke jwiˈlak , trantak chapcaˈ riˈ Impixbˈ tijbˈijtak , xcheˈ Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak nicˈj fariseo pach nicˈj ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús xsiqˈuij cristian , xij rechak : Tatak ri tambˈij y tatak jcholajl .

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Maˈ riˈ taˈ ri tioc laj jchiˈ jun cristian ri tibˈanow re timacunc . Riˈ ri tielch laj jchiˈ jun cristian ri tibˈanow re timacunc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xjutuntak chijcˈulel y xijtak re : Mak fariseo taˈ tzi xtatak ri xabˈij , xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Juntir ticoˈn ri maˈ jticonoj taˈ Inkaj Dios ri wiˈ lecj , tina bˈukˈsajnabˈic .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Rechak waˈxtakna claˈ nicˈ riqˈuil moytakaˈ tijin tijcˈamtak jbˈeak nicˈj moy chic . Wi wiˈ jun moy tijcˈam jbˈe jun moy chic , chi quibˈ ribˈilak tibˈe tzaaktakaˈ li jono jul , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Xpe Pedro , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Bˈij chike nen jcholajl tielwiˈ man esbˈi noˈj ri xabˈij , xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij : Y jilon atak ajquiˈ chatatak jcholajl .

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: Juntir kelen ri tioc laj jchiˈ jun cristian , jiˈ tibˈe laj jchˈol , ajrucˈreˈ tresajbˈic .

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Pero ri tijbˈij jun cristian , laj ranmiˈ tipeˈw y riˈ li ri tibˈanow re jun cristian timacunc .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Jwiˈl laj ranmiˈ jun cristian tipeˈw mak etzltak chomorsaˈn , ticamsanc , tran tzˈiˈal , trechbˈej jun jalan cristian chic ri maˈ jcˈulajl taˈn , tialkˈanc , tijmol tzij y tiyokˈonc .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Riˈ juntir mak noˈj li ri titzˈilibˈsan re ranm jun cristian chiwch Kakaj Dios . Pero jun cristian ri tijtij kelen y taˈ tijchˈaj jkˈabˈ , maˈ riˈ taˈ li titzˈilibˈsan re ranm chiwch Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xelbˈi claˈ , xeˈ lak luwar chijcˈulel Tiro pach Sidón .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Y claˈ wiˈ jun anm aj Canaán . Xpe man anm li , xjutun chijcˈulel Kakaj Jesús xchˈejej , xij : ¡ Wajawl , Jcˈajol David , il cˈur inwch , wicˈlal subˈlaj cˈax tijin tijtij jwiˈl wiˈ jun etzl laj ranm ! xcheˈ re .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Kakaj Jesús taˈ xchˈabˈej man anm li . Xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xjutuntak chijcˈulel Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonajtak tokˈobˈ re y xijtak : Bˈij re man anm li tibˈec , jwiˈl mas tichˈejej petzal chikij , xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij : In xintaksajch jwiˈl Kakaj Dios pirechiˈ tiyuk intoqueˈ jujun rechak yak rijajl Israel ri chapcaˈ mak carner ri sacheˈltak , xcheˈ .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Pero xpe man anm xxucar chiwch Kakaj Jesús y xij re : Wajawl , quinatˈoweˈ , xcheˈ re .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re man anm : Taˈ tzi timajsaj jwaak yak alcˈwalixelbˈ y tiyeˈsaj rechak mak tzˈiˈ , xcheˈ re .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Man anm xij chic re Kakaj Jesús : Tzˈetiˈ tabˈij Wajawl . Pero mak tzˈiˈ tijtijaˈtakaˈ mak tra jxercˈ wa ri titzaakch bˈa mex riqˈui rajwak , xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re man anm li : At anm , subˈlaj cubˈul achˈol chwij . Bˈanok chapcaˈ chawaj at tibˈansaj chawe , xcheˈ re . Y laj or xtzibˈ ricˈlal sicˈ anm .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xel chicbˈi claˈ xeˈ chic chiˈ nimlaj alagun ri jbˈij Galilea . Cuando xtaw claˈ xjaw wich jun witz y xcubˈar claˈ .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Subˈlaj cristian xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak lamas wiˈ Kakaj Jesús y cˈamalch cristian jwiˈlak ri coˈxtak , ri moytak , ri taˈ tzˈakatnak rakan jkˈabˈak , ri memtak y nicˈj cristian chic ri wiˈ jaljojtak yajel rechak . Juntir li xeˈ jyeˈtak chiwch Kakaj Jesús y re juntir xtzibˈsajtak .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Juntir cristian subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak cuando xriltak chi yak mem tichak chˈaˈwtak , yak ri taˈ tzˈakatnak rakan jkˈabˈak xtzˈakatiˈ rakan jkˈabˈak , yak coˈxtak tichak woˈcottak y yak moytak tichak naˈtuntak . Y xoctak chi jnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Dios ri jDiosak yak rijajl Israel .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
