text2: Yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios pach mak fariseo tiesantak chi sakil Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli cojontak chiwchak , bˈantak juntir ri tijbˈijtak chawechak . Pero ma bˈan awechak chapcaˈ trantak rechak . Rechak tijbˈijtak lawiˈ rajwax tibˈansajc , pero jalan trantak chiwch ri tijbˈijtak .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Rechak tijtijojtak cristian re nicˈj pixabˈ subˈlaj cˈax jbˈanic , pero rechak taˈ titˈoˈontak chi jbˈanic ri nen tijbˈij , nicˈ riqˈuil tijyeˈtak jun al laj ikaˈn chirij cristian ri mitaˈ nen ticuyuw ralal , pero rechak ni laˈ jun bˈa jkˈabˈak titˈoˈontak chi jcˈamicbˈic .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Juntir ri trantak riˈke rajak tzi tiilsajtak jwiˈl cristian . Tijcˈamtak mak cˈolbˈitak wuj ri lamas tijcˈoltak mak qˈuer wuj ri tzˈibˈal Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios chiwch y tijximtakbˈi chiˈ jwichak o wichak jtelbˈak y tijcojtak itzˈik ri nimak rakan ritzˈabˈl .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Y cuando tibˈetak li jono nimakˈij mas kus triltak ticubˈartak laˈ mak tem ri lamas ticubˈartak yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak lak sinagog .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Riˈ rajak ticˈamsaj rutzil jwichak lak cˈaybˈl pi cˈutbˈire chi nimiˈ jkˈijak y riˈ rajak tibˈijsaj ajtijonl rechak .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: Pero atak ma yeˈtak luwar tibˈijsaj ajtijonl chawechak jwiˈlak cristian , jwiˈl xike wiˈ jun Ajtijonl y atak juntir awechˈelxiquiˈ aybˈak .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Y ma cojtak jun cristian pi akajak , jwiˈl xike jun Akajak y re jiˈ wiˈ lecj .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Y ma yeˈtak luwar tibˈijsaj jbˈabˈal chawechak jwiˈl xike jun bˈabˈal wiˈ , riˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Ri mas nim jkˈij chaxoˈlak , rajwaxiˈ raneˈ lawiˈ ri rajwax jbˈanic pire nicˈj chic .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Jwiˈl nen tijcoj jkˈij ricˈan , taˈ ticojsaj jkˈij y nen taˈ tijcoj jkˈij , riˈ li ticojsaj jkˈij .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y atak fariseo , ajsolcopil acaybˈalak ! Atak taˈ tayeˈtak luwar tioc cristian laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈak , pero ni atak atoctak .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y atak fariseo , ajsolcopil acaybˈalak ! Atak tawesajtak kelen awechak chirijak yak anm ri camnak richjilak y pire bˈambˈi awchak chiwchak cristian , subˈlaj naj tabˈantak chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Jwiˈliˈli masna cˈax kˈatbˈitzij tibˈansaj chabˈak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awch atak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y atak fariseo , ajsolcopil acaybˈalak ! Atak atwoˈcottak juntir luwar chi jtoquic jun ajtijol ribˈ chawijak . Cuando tataˈtak , tatijojtak re acˈutuˈnak y re masna etzl jnoˈj tiel chic chawchak . Jwiˈliˈli re quibˈ chi jilon cˈaxcˈol tijtij chapcaˈ ri tatij atak li man luwar re tijbˈi cˈax .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak ajcˈamaltak bˈe ri pur atak moy ! Atak tabˈijtak : Nen jonok tijbˈij chi tranaˈ jun kelen y wi tijcoj nimi richoch Kakaj Dios laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tzˈetiˈ tran ri tijbˈij , nicˈ riqˈuil taˈ ni jun kelen bˈil jwiˈl . Pero nen tijcoj mak oro re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tzˈetiˈ tran ri tijbˈij , rajwaxiˈ tran , atcheˈtak .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: ¡ Atak pur atak sons y pur atak moy ! ¿ Nencˈu mas nim jkˈij , roniˈ man oro o riˈ nimi richoch Kakaj Dios ri quiek jwiˈl nim jkˈij man oro ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Y tabˈijtak : Nen jonok tijbˈij chi tranaˈ jun kelen y wi tijcoj altar laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tzˈetiˈ tran ri tijbˈij , nicˈ riqˈuil taˈ nen bˈil jwiˈl . Pero nen tijcoj mak kelen ri sipal re Kakaj Dios ri wiˈ chibˈ man altar laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tzˈetiˈ tran ri tijbˈij , rajwaxiˈ tran , atcheˈtak .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: ¡ Atak pur atak moy ! ¿ Nencˈu mas nim jkˈij , roniˈ mak kelen ri sipal re Kakaj Dios o man altar ri quiek jwiˈl nim jkˈij mak kelen ri sipal re Kakaj Dios ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Nen tijcoj man altar laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tzˈetiˈ tran ri tijbˈij , maˈ xitaˈke man altar tijcoj laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tranaˈn , tijcojaˈ juntir ri wiˈ chibˈ .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Y nen tijcoj nimi richoch Kakaj Dios laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tzˈetiˈ tran ri tijbˈij , maˈ xitaˈke nimi richoch Kakaj Dios tijcoj laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tranaˈn , tijcojaˈ jbˈij Kakaj Dios ri wiˈ li nimi richoch .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Nen tijcoj man luwar lecj lamas wiˈ Kakaj Dios laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tzˈetiˈ tran ri tijbˈij , maˈ xitaˈke man luwar lecj lamas wiˈ Kakaj Dios tijcoj laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tzˈetiˈ tran ri tijbˈij , tijcojaˈ jbˈij jcubˈarbˈ Kakaj Dios laj jyolj chi jbˈij chi tzˈetiˈ tran y tijcojaˈ jbˈij Kakaj Dios ri ticubˈar laˈ man cubˈarbˈ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y atak fariseo , ajsolcopil acaybˈalak ! Atak tayaˈtakaˈ jlájuj kelen awechak re Kakaj Dios tayaˈtakaˈ jlájuj mak woron ri jbˈij menta , anis y comino . Pero taˈ tijin tabˈantak lawiˈ ri mas rajwax jbˈanic ri tijbˈij Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios . Ri rajwax jbˈanic riˈ bˈantak juntir pi jcholajl chiwch Kakaj Dios , iltak cˈur jwich jun cristian y bˈantak laj acˈaslemalak lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tabˈantak . Riˈ li rajwax tabˈantak y mi can ayeˈtak jbˈanic .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Atak ajcˈamaltak bˈe , pur atak moy . Atak jor tacwentij aybˈak pire maˈ tabˈikˈtak jun usum , pero taˈ tawicˈajtak tabˈikˈaˈtakaˈbˈi jun camello .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y atak fariseo , ajsolcopil acaybˈalak ! Atakaˈ nicˈ riqˈuil man vas pach man lak ri chˈajal rij , pero tzˈil jpam jwiˈl alkˈanc y mak etzltak raybˈl ri tabˈantak .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: ¡ Atak fariseo , pur atak moy ! Chˈajtak nabˈe jpam man vas pach man lak y jilonli tisakabˈiˈ rij .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y atak fariseo , ajsolcopil acaybˈalak ! Atak pur atak mak mukbˈi camnak ri tzˈajal rij laˈ chun , subˈlaj kus rilic rij , pero jpamak nojsaliˈ chi jbˈakeltak camnak y chi jtioˈjlak cristian ri kˈaˈysal .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Y jilon atak , rilic chapcaˈ sucˈuliˈ awanmak chiwch Kakaj Dios , pero awanmak nojsaliˈ chi solcopiltak yoloj y etzltak noˈj .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y atak fariseo , ajsolcopil acaybˈalak ! Tabˈantak jwaˈx mak mukbˈi camnak ri lamas mukultak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios y tacojtak ritzˈabˈl mak mukbˈi camnak ri lamas mukultak yak cristian ri sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Y tabˈijtak : Witi wojchak wich ulew laˈ mak junabˈ cuando xwaˈxtak kamam katitˈ wich ulew taˈ roj xojtˈoˈon chi jcamsajcak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios , atcheˈtak .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Jilonli chirijke ayoljak ticˈutun chi atak , atakaˈ rijajl mak ri xcamsantak rechak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: ¡ Qˈuistak jbˈanic lawiˈ ri cholanch jbˈanic jwiˈlak amam atitˈak ojr !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: ¡ Pur atak cumatz y rijajl cumatz ri ticamsanc ! Taˈ ni jono chawechak ticolmaj laj jkˈabˈ man cˈaxlaj jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios ri petzal chabˈak jwiˈl jiˈ atbˈetak li man luwar re tijbˈi cˈax .

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Jwiˈliˈli in tantakch ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios chaxoˈlak pach cristian ri wiˈ mas jnoˈjak jwiˈl Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios pachak ajtijonl , pero atak tacamsajtak y tatzˈonajtak chi ticamsaj jujun rechak wich curs . Y jujun chic tasecˈtak lak sinagog y tatakejtak jbˈanic cˈax rechak lak juntir tilmit .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Atakaˈ attojowtak re jcamicak juntir tzitaklaj cristian ri xcamsajtak , ticholmajch rajlaj riqˈui jcamic Abel ri sucˈul ranm chiwch Kakaj Dios asta jcamic Zacarías ri jcˈajol Berequías ri xcamsaj jwiˈl amamak laj xoˈlak man luwar ri tosol re Kakaj Dios pach man altar re cˈatbˈi awaj .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi yak cristian ri wiˈtak wich ulew lajori riˈ rechak ticˈuluwtak subˈlaj cˈax chirij juntir mak mac li , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y mak fariseo .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: ¡ Atak aj Jerusalén , atak aj Jerusalén , ri tacamsajtak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios y tacamsajtak chi abˈaj yak jtakoˈn Kakaj Dios ri takaltakch aacˈlak ! ¡ Qˈuilaj bˈwelt chwaj roj ximmulbˈaˈ awchak chapcaˈ tran jun chuch acˈ tijmulbˈaˈ tra jkˈun ralaj jxicˈ , pero atak taˈ chawajak !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Tatak jcholajl , awichochak tina canna pi caneˈl ja .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Y tambˈij chawechak chi lajori taˈ chiquiˈ tawiltak inwch , ajriˈ tawiltak chic inwch cuando tabˈijtak : ¡ Nim jkˈij ri petzal laj jbˈij Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl ! atcheˈtak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xelbˈi li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , bˈenamchak re cuando xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xjutuntak chijcˈulel , xoctak chi jcˈutic chiwch nen mo rilic nimi richoch Kakaj Dios .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Xawilaˈtakaˈ nen mo rilic juntir li , pero kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi tina tawna jun kˈij chi taˈ chiquiˈ ni jono abˈaj tican chibˈ jun chic . Juntir li tina yojmajna , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús cubˈul bˈa witz ri jbˈij Olivos , xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xjutuntak chijcˈulel , xtzˈonajtak re Kakaj Jesús pi ricˈanak : Chikaj tabˈij chike nen or titaw chiwch ri xabˈij . ¿ Nencˈu retal ri tiilsaj pire cˈutbˈire cuando atpe chic y cuando titaw qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak ? xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Tike acwentij aybˈak pire maˈ atsubˈsajtak ,

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: jwiˈl subˈlaj qˈui tina petakna y tijcoj ribˈak chapcaˈ in , tijbˈijtak : Iniˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , tina cheˈtakna y subˈlaj cristian tina jsubˈtakna .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Atak tina atatakna jtaquil chi tijiniˈ nimaktak chˈoˈj li jono luwar , pero mi tzaak achˈolak , jwiˈl ajquiˈ chi taw kˈij re qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Jun nimlaj tilmit tina chˈoˈjinna riqˈui jun tilmit chic y jun rey tina chˈoˈjinna riqˈui jun rey chic . Tina pena subˈlaj wiˈjal y tina ranna nimaktak cabˈrakn lak jaljojtak luwar .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Pero juntir li ajriˈ cholbˈire cˈax ri tina pena chibˈak cristian .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: Y ajrucˈreˈ atak , atna jachsajtakna laj jkˈabˈak mak etzltak cristian pire tibˈansaj cˈax chawechak y atna camsajtakna . Y juntir tilmit wich ulew atna retzelbˈejtakna y atna jcontrijtakna inwiˈlke in .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Cuando titaw mak kˈij li subˈlaj cristian tijquibˈaj ranmak chwij y tijcontrij ribˈak chiribˈil ribˈak y tijjach jpachak li cˈax .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Y subˈlaj cristian tijcoj ribˈak chapcaˈ ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios , pero taˈ tzˈet , ajsubˈunltake y subˈlaj cristian tijsubˈtak .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Tina waˈxna mas etzltak noˈj laj ranmak cristian y subˈlaj cristian taˈ chiquiˈ tijlokˈaj ribˈak chiribˈil ribˈak .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Pero nen taˈ tijquibˈaj ranm chwij asta ticamc , ticolmajiˈ laj jkˈabˈ jmac .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Y tzilaj jtaquil ri re nen mo oquem laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈak cristian tina bˈijsajna rechak juntir cristian wich ulew pire tretemajtak , ajrucˈreˈ titaw kˈij re qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: Tina awiltakna li man luwar ri tosol pire Kakaj Dios jun ri ajbˈanal cˈax ri xutul jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chapcaˈ xcan jtzˈibˈaj Daniel ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios . Nen tril jwich wuj ri , jteˈ jcholajl .

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: Cuando tawiltak jilonli yak cristian ri wiˈtak Judea rajwaxiˈ laj or tielmajtakbˈi bˈak witz .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Y nen wiˈ bˈa ja , mi oc chic chi resaj kelen re la ja .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Y nen wiˈ lak chac , mi kˈaj chic laj richoch chi jcˈamic ritzˈik ri tijkˈuˈj .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Cˈur jwichak yak yaj anm laˈ mak kˈij li pach yak ri wiˈ jneˈak tijtuˈtzajtak , jwiˈl rechak taˈ tijnaˈ tielmajtak laj or .

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Atak tzˈonajtak re Kakaj Dios chi miti lak kˈij re riqˈuil jabˈ , ni lak kˈij re uxlan cuando atelmajtakbˈic ,

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: jwiˈl tina pena jun nimlaj cˈax ri taˈ ni jun bˈwelt bˈanal cuando xticarch jwich kˈijsak asta lajori y ni jun bˈwelt tran chic .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Miti xchomorsaj Kakaj Dios chi taˈ qˈuilaj kˈij tran man cˈax li , taˈ ni jono cristian roj ticolmajc . Kakaj Dios xchomorsaj jilonli jwiˈlke tril cˈur jwichak yak ri chaˈl jwiˈl .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: Wi wiˈ nen tibˈin chawechak : Iltak impuch , ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew wiˈ neri o wiˈ jili , ticheˈtak , ma cojtak ,

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: jwiˈl wiˈ cristian tijcoj ribˈak chapcaˈ riˈtakaˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew y wiˈ tijcoj ribˈak pi ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios , pero taˈ tzˈet . Rechak tranaˈtakaˈ cˈutbˈi jcwinelak ri sachom chˈolal rilic , pero pireke tijsubˈtak cristian asta yak ri chaˈltak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios rajak tijsubˈtak .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Cojtak retal , in ximbˈijiˈ juntir ri chawechak onque ajquiˈ chi taw chiwch .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Wi wiˈ nen tibˈin chawechak : Iltak impuch , ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew wiˈ li jun luwar lamas taˈ cristian , wi ticheˈ , mat bˈetak chi rilic o wi wiˈ nen tibˈin chawechak : Iltak impuch , wiˈ li jun ja , wi ticheˈ , ma cojtak ,

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: jwiˈl Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil jilon jpetic chapcaˈ jun coyop tijkopajch ribˈ jkˈakˈal laj jsucˈlal lamas tielch kˈij y tibˈe jsakabˈsaj asta laj jsucˈlal lamas tikej kˈij .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Lamas wiˈ jun camnak awaj , claˈ tijmulbˈaˈ ribˈak mak cˈuch , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Cuando jorok kˈaxiˈ juntir mak cˈax li ri ximbˈij , ajrucˈreˈ tran ukuˈm jwich kˈij , icˈ taˈ chiquiˈ tijyeˈ jkˈakˈal , mak chˈumil titzaaktakch lecj y juntir ri wiˈ lecj tina yucxijna laj jluwrak .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ ticˈutunch lecj retal jpetic Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil . Juntir cristian wich ulew tijcamsaj ribˈak chi okˈej jwiˈl subˈlaj cˈax ri petzal chibˈak . Juntir ribˈilak tina riltakna Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tikejch lecj li sutzˈ subˈlaj tikopopon jkˈakˈal jnimal jkˈij y wiˈ jcwinel .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Cuando tiokˈsaj trompet , Kakaj Dios tijtakch yak ranjl chi jmolic jwichak juntir cristian ri chaˈltak jwiˈl ri wiˈtak lak juntir tilmit re wich ulew .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: Esaj anoˈjak chirij man jcheˈl higo . Cuando tawiltak tiel chicch jxakak acˈal , atak awetamakchak chi petemchak re riqˈuil sakˈj .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Y jilonli , cuando tawiltak chi tichak tijin titaw chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawechak , etemajtak chi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil petemchak re , chiˈ pwertchak wiˈ .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi ajquiˈ chi camtak juntir cristian ri wiˈtak wich ulew re mak junabˈ ri cuando titaw chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawechak .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Caj pach ulew tisaachiˈ jwichak , pero tina tawna chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawechak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Pero ni jonok etemawinak nen chi kˈij lal o nen chi or lal tran ri ximbˈij chawechak , ni yak anjl ri wiˈtak lecj retamak , ni Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , xike Kakaj Dios retam .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Chapcaˈ xantak yak cristian laˈ mak junabˈ cuando xwaˈx Noé wich ulew , jilon tina rantakna chic yak cristian laˈ mak junabˈ cuando tipe chic Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Laˈ mak junabˈ li cuando ajquiˈ chi ran man nimlaj kˈalaj , yak cristian tiwiˈntak , tikˈabˈartak , ticˈuliˈytak y tijcˈulbˈaˈ ralcˈwalak asta cuando xtaw kˈij xjaw Noé li arc .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Rechak taˈ ricˈabˈak cuando xpe man nimlaj kˈalaj , xcˈambˈi juntir cristian . Y jilon cuando titaw kˈij tipe chic Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , taˈ ricˈabˈak tiyuk .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Cuando titaw man kˈij li , wiˈ quibˈ winak , nicˈ tijintak li chac , jun ticˈamsajbˈic y jun tican yeˈsajok .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Y wiˈ quibˈ anm , nicˈ tijintak chi queˈm , jun ticˈamsajbˈic y jun tican yeˈsajok .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Atak chajintake jwiˈl taˈ awetamak nen or tipe Awajawlak .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Pero atak tatak jcholajl , witi man rajw ja retam nen or titaw man alkˈom laj richoch , taˈ tiwar chi jchajajc y taˈ tijyeˈ luwar tioc man alkˈom laj richoch chi ralkˈaj kelen re .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Y jiˈcˈulon atak , ulbˈentake , jwiˈl taˈ etemal nen or tipe chic Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: Jun mocom ri tzi tran laj jchac y tzi jnoˈj ticojsajiˈ pire jbˈabˈalak mak nicˈj mocom chic jwiˈl jpatron y riˈ re titzukuw rechak lak or re wicˈ .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Tzi re man mocom li ri tiyuk taˈsajok jwiˈl jpatron tijin chi jbˈanic chapcaˈ xcan bˈijsaj re .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi man patron tijcojaˈ man mocom li chi jchajaj juntir kelen re ri wiˈ .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Pero wi man mocom li tran etzltak jnoˈj y tijbˈij laj ranm chi taˈ tikˈajch jpatron laj or ,

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: tioc chi jseqˈuicak yak nicˈj mocom chic , tioc chi wicˈ y tioc chi kˈabˈric xoˈlak mak kˈabˈreltak cristian ,

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: pero titaw jun kˈij y titaw jun or ri taˈ ricˈabˈ cuando tiyuk jpatron .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Tipe man jpatron tijcˈur laj nicˈajl man mocom li y tijtˈojbˈi li tijbˈi cˈax laj xoˈlak mak ajsolcopil jcaybˈalak . Claˈ tibˈe rokˈbˈej ribˈ y tijkuchˈuchˈuj ree , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic jun esbˈi noˈj rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij jilonri : Jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian jilon chapcaˈ lajuj ( 10 ) kˈapojtak anm ri xcˈamtakbˈi jcandilak , xeˈtak chi jcˈulic man cˈojol winak ri ticˈuliˈyc .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Jobˈ rechak taˈ jchˈabˈejcak y jobˈ chic wiˈ jnoˈjak .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Yak ri taˈ jchˈabˈejcak xcˈamtakbˈi jcandilak , pero taˈ xcˈamtakbˈi raceitak pire tijnojsajtak chic jcandilak wi tiqˈuis jpam .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Pero yak ri wiˈ jnoˈjak xnojsajiˈbˈi jcandilak y xcˈamtak chicbˈi jnejbˈak re raceitak pire tijnojsajtak chic jcandilak wi tiqˈuis jpam .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Pero xnajtin mas akˈabˈ , taˈ jtawic man cˈojol winak ri ticˈuliˈyc , xpe subˈlaj jwarjak y juntir ribˈilak xwartak .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Raj tawem tran nicˈaj akˈabˈ cuando riˈchak xtatak xaan jun chˈaˈwem , tijbˈij : ¡ Xpetiˈ man cˈojol winak ri ticˈuliˈyc ! ¡ Elantak jol chi jcˈulic ! xcheˈ .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Juntir yak kˈapojtak anm li xbˈiittak xoctak chi jyeˈic jpam jcandilak .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Xpetak yak jobˈ ri taˈ jchˈabˈejcak , xijtak rechak yak ri wiˈ jnoˈjak : Yeˈtak junquitz kaceit jwiˈl chupem tran kacandil , xcheˈtak .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Xpetak yak ri wiˈ jnoˈjak , xijtak : Taˈ tijnaˈ tikayeˈ awechak jwiˈl taˈ naˈl wi tran ke oj . Riˈ mas tzi lokˈta awechak lamas ticˈayajwiˈ , xcheˈtak rechak .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Xeˈtak yak jobˈ ri taˈ jchˈabˈejcak chi jlokˈic raceitak , pero cuando bˈesaltak chi jlokˈic raceitak , xtaw man cˈojol winak ri ticˈuliˈyc . Yak kˈapojtak anm ri bˈanal jwaˈx jcandilak jwiˈlak xoctak li man nimakˈij re cˈulniquil nicˈ pach man cˈojol winak ri ticˈuliˈyc y xtzˈapij man pwert .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xtawtak yak jobˈ kˈapojtak anm chic , xriltak chi tzˈapilchak man pwert , xijtak : ¡ Kaj , kaj ! ¡ Tebˈaˈ man pwert chikawch ! xcheˈtak .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Pero man cˈojol winak ri ticˈuliˈy xij rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi taˈ tanchˈobˈ awchak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli atak tike acwentij aybˈak , jwiˈl taˈ awetamak nen or tipe Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic jun esbˈi noˈj rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij jilonri : Ri jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian jilon chapcaˈ xan jun patron , xchomorsaj chi tibˈe chinaj li jun jalan tilmit chic . Xsiqˈuij yak jmocom y xcan jyeˈ jpwaak laj jkˈabˈak pire tijyectak jwich asta cuando tikˈaj chicch .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Re jun xcan jyeˈ jobˈ chi talento y re jun chic xcan jyeˈ quibˈ chi talento , re jun chic xcan jyeˈ jun chi talento . Chi jujunalak xcaniˈ yeˈsaj rechak nen jnimakl ticwintak chi jyequic jwich y xeˈ man patron chinaj .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Man mocom ri xcan yeˈsaj jobˈ chi talento re , xoc chi jyequic jwich y xchˈecaˈ jobˈ chi talento chic chirij mak talento li .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Y man ri xcan yeˈsaj quibˈ chi talento re , xoc chi jyequic jwich y xchˈecaˈ quibˈ chi talento chic chirij mak talento li .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Pero man ri xyeˈsaj jun chi talento re , taˈ xyec jwich . Re xcˈot jun jul li ulew y xmuk man jpwaak jpatron claˈ .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: Man patron li subˈlaj naj xeˈ sacharok y cuando xyuk , xsiqˈuij yak jmocom ri quiek riqˈuil xcan jyeˈ jpwaak , jwiˈl riˈ raj tretemaj nen xantak re man pwak .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Nabˈe xtaw man mocom ri xcan yeˈsaj jobˈ chi talento re , xeˈ jacheˈ mak talento ri xcan yeˈsaj re y xij re jpatron : Kaj , at xcan ayeˈ jobˈ chi talento chwe cuando xatbˈec y coˈ jobˈ talento chic ri , ri xinchˈec chirij apwaak , xcheˈ re .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Man patron xij re : Tziyiˈ xabˈan , atiˈ jun tzilaj mocom y pi jcholajliˈ xabˈan . Jwiˈl tziyiˈ xabˈan re jun raquitz , lajori tanjach mas laj akˈbˈ . Oquen li quiˈcotemal wiqˈuil ri in apatron , xcheˈ re .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xtaw man jun ri xcan yeˈsaj quibˈ talento re , xij re man patron : Kaj , at xcan ayeˈ quibˈ talento chwe cuando xatbˈec y coˈ quibˈ talento chic ri , ri xinchˈec chirij apwaak , xcheˈ re .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Man patron xij re : Tziyiˈ xabˈan , atiˈ jun tzilaj mocom y pi jcholajliˈ xabˈan . Jwiˈl tziyiˈ xabˈan re jun raquitz , lajori tanjach mas laj akˈbˈ . Oquen li quiˈcotemal wiqˈuil ri in apatron , xcheˈ re .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xtaw man jun mocom ri xcan yeˈsaj jun talento re , xij re man patron : Kaj , in wetamiˈ chi mas at cˈaˈn y atochˈon lamas taˈ nen tiquil awiˈl .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli xtzaak inchˈol chawch , xincˈambˈi atalento ximmuk li ulew . Coˈ atalento ri , ri xcan ayeˈ chwe , xcheˈ re .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Man patron xij re : ¡ Pur at etzl mocom y pur atsakˈor ! Wi awetamiˈ chi in , chwaj inochˈon lamas taˈ tiquil inwiˈl ,

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: xacˈamteneˈbˈi impwaak xeˈteneˈ ayeˈ pi kejom re jonok y cuando xinyuk wiˈteneˈchak ral impwaak roj xincˈuleˈ , xcheˈ re .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Y xij rechak mak ri wiˈtak claˈ : Majtak man jun talento re y yeˈtak re man ri wiˈ lajuj ( 10 ) talento riqˈuil .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Nen wiˈ mas riqˈuil , tiyeˈsaj chiquiˈ mas re pire tiniman re , pero nen taˈ re , asta raquitz ri wiˈ riqˈuil , timajsajiˈ re .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Man mocom ri , taˈ nen tichacuj esajtakbˈi ri ja , tˈojtakbˈi lak ukuˈm chinaj . Claˈ tibˈe rokˈbˈej ribˈ y tijkuchˈuchˈuj ree , xcheˈ man patron , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Cuando tipe chic Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil subˈlaj nim jkˈij tipet pach juntir yak ranjl y tiyuk cubˈar laj jcubˈarbˈ ri nim jkˈij lamas tranwiˈ jkˈatbˈitzij .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Y juntir cristian re juntir tilmit wich ulew tiyuk jmulbˈaˈ ribˈak chiwch . Y re tijtos yak ri sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios y tijtos yak ri taˈ sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios chapcaˈ tran jun ajyukˈ cuando tijtos mak carner y tijtos mak qˈuisicˈ .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Tijyeˈ mak carner laj jpaach y mak qˈuisicˈ tijyeˈ laj jmax .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Tipe man rey li tijbˈij rechak mak cristian ri wiˈtak laj jpaach : Tzaj atak ri wiˈ jkˈabˈ Inkaj chabˈak . Oquentak lamas titakonwiˈ Inkaj ri tosolch jwiˈl pi awechak ojr cuando ajquiˈ chi ran caj pach ulew ,

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: jwiˈl cuando xincˈok jwiˈl wiˈjal , atak xayaˈtakaˈ inw , cuando xchekej ínchiˈ , atak xayaˈtakaˈ wucˈaˈ , cuando taˈ lamas inwaˈx , atak xinacˈamaˈtakaˈbˈi laj awichochak ,

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: cuando rajwax witzˈik inwiˈl , atak xayaˈtakaˈ witzˈik , cuando xinyajarc , atak xinawilbˈejtakaˈn y cuando xinwaˈx li cars , atak ximbˈe asolajtakaˈn , ticheˈ rechak .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Tipetak yak ri sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios , tijtzˈonajtak re man rey : Kaj , ¿ nen or xatkil xatcˈok jwiˈl wiˈjal y oj xkayeˈ aw ? Y , ¿ nen or xatkil xatcam jwiˈl chekej chiˈ y oj xkayeˈ awucˈaˈ ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Y , ¿ nen or xatkil chi taˈ lamas atwaˈx y xatkacˈamaˈbˈi laj kichoch ? Y , ¿ nen or xatkil chi taˈ awitzˈik y oj xkayaˈ awitzˈik ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Y , ¿ nen or xatkil xatyajarc o xatwaˈx li cars y oj xatbˈe kasolaj ? ticheˈtak .

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Man rey li tijbˈij rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi juntir ri xabˈantak re jono yak wechˈelxic ri taˈ mas nim jkˈijak , chweyiˈ in xabˈantak , ticheˈ rechak .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ man rey li tijbˈij chic rechak yak cristian ri wiˈtak laj jmax : Elantakbˈi chinwch , atak etzltak cristian , jattak li man kˈakˈ ri taˈ jchupic , ri tosol pi re man jbˈabˈal etzl pach mak ranjl ri xambˈertak chirij ,

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: jwiˈl cuando subˈlaj xincˈok jwiˈl wiˈjal , atak taˈ xayeˈtak inw y cuando subˈlaj xincam jwiˈl chekej chiˈ , atak taˈ xayeˈtak wucˈaˈ .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Y cuando taˈ lamas xinwaˈx , taˈ xinacˈamtakbˈi laj awichochak . Y cuando rajwax witzˈik inwiˈl , atak taˈ xayeˈtak witzˈik . Y cuando xinyajarc o cuando xinwaˈx li cars taˈ ximbˈe asolajtak , ticheˈ rechak .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Y rechak tijtzˈonajtak re man rey : Kaj , ¿ nen or xatkil xatcˈok jwiˈl wiˈjal o xatcam jwiˈl chekej chiˈ o taˈ nen xatcˈamowbˈi laj richoch o taˈ awitzˈik o atyaj o xatkil wat li cars y taˈ xatkatˈoˈw ? ticheˈtak re .

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Y man rey li tijbˈij rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak , juntir ri taˈ xabˈantak rechak yak wechˈelxic ri taˈ mas nim jkˈijak , chweyiˈ in taˈ xabˈantak , ticheˈ rechak .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Yak ri taˈ xantak utzil neri wich ulew jiˈ tibˈetak li man luwar re tijbˈi cˈax ri taˈ jqˈuisic y yak ri sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios jiˈ tibˈetak li tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Cuando xijmaj juntir li jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús , xij chic rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: Atak awetamakiˈ chi pi quibˈ kˈijchak raj man nimakˈij Pascua y laˈ kˈij li tijachsaj pi camic wich curs Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Laˈ mak kˈij li xpetak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel , xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak chuchja riqˈui Caifás ri man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Xchomorsajtak nen mo trantak chi jchapic Kakaj Jesús chi mukukil pire tijjachtak pi camic .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Pero xijtak chiribˈil ribˈak : Taˈ tikachap laˈ man nimakˈij ri , pire maˈ tijbˈit ribˈak cristian chikij , xcheˈtak .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Kakaj Jesús wiˈ Betania laj richoch Simón ri xwaˈx yajel chirij ojr ri jbˈij lepra .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Xtaw jun anm riqˈuil , cˈamalbˈi jun nejbˈ jwiˈl ri bˈanal laˈ abˈaj ri jbˈij alabastro , nojsal chi jun perjum ri subˈlaj pakal rijil . Cuando cubˈul Kakaj Jesús chiˈ mex , xpe man anm li , xoc chi jtzˈajic perjum laj jbˈa Kakaj Jesús .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Y yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo cuando xriltak chi jilonli , xpe retzalak , xijtak chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Nen chac xan cˈax re man perjum li ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Riˈ mas tzi xcˈayajteneˈ pi subˈlaj pakal rijil man perjum li pire titˈoˈsaj yak powr laˈ man pwak , xcheˈtak .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Xta Kakaj Jesús nen tijin tijbˈijtak xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nen chac tijin tayajtak man anm ri ? Re utziliˈ xan chwe .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Yak powr tiwaˈxtakaˈ chaxoˈlak nojel kˈij , pero in taˈ naj inwaˈx chaxoˈlak .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Ri xan anm ri , xtzˈaj perjum laj imbˈ pi rechak mukbˈi we xan .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi lak juntir luwar wich ulew lamas tibˈijsajwiˈ tzilaj jtaquil chwij ri , tibˈijsajiˈ nen xan anm ri chwe y jilonli jcuxtaj tibˈanc , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Jun rechak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo ri jbˈij Judas Iscariote , re xeˈ riqˈuilak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: y xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Jurubˈ inatojtak tanjach Jesús laj akˈbˈak ? xcheˈ rechak . Y mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios xijtak chi tijyaˈtakaˈ junwinak lajuj ( 30 ) pwak ri bˈanal laˈ plata re .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Laj or xoc Judas Iscariote chi jtoquic nen mo tran chi jjachic Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈak .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Li nabˈe kˈij re mak kˈij re man nimakˈij ri titijsaj cuxlanwa ri taˈ chˈamkˈor laˈ , xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xjutuntak chijcˈulel Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Lamas chawaj tibˈe kabˈaneˈ jwaˈx asinar re Pascua ? xchˈetak re .

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Jattak Jerusalén laj richoch jun winak , bˈijtak re : Tijbˈij Kajtijonl : Tawem tran chiwch ri tibˈan chwe , chwaj imbˈe laj awichoch , tibˈe imbˈaneˈ insinar re Pascua pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chwij , ticheˈ , atcheˈtak re , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xantak chapcaˈ ri xijsaj rechak jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús . Xantak jwaˈx sinar re Pascua claˈ .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Cuando xoc akˈabˈ , xtaw Kakaj Jesús , xcubˈar chiˈ mex pach yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Cuando tijintak chi wicˈ xij rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi wiˈ jun chawechak injachow pi camic , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Rechak xpe subˈlaj bˈis laj ranmak chi jtaic y xoctak chi jtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús chi jujunalak : Wajawl , ¿ maˈ iniˈn taˈn ? xcheˈtak re .

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Jun ri xmuˈ jcuxlanwa wiqˈuil li lak , riˈ li injachow pi camic .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil jilon tibˈan re chapcaˈ tzˈibˈal chirij li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios , pero riˈ mas cˈur jwich man ri tijachow re pi camic . Riˈ mas tzi pire re mitneˈ xqˈuisiˈyc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Xpe Judas ri tijachow re Kakaj Jesús pi camic , xtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús : Kajtijonl , ¿ maˈ iniˈn taˈn ? xcheˈ re . Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Atiˈn , xcheˈ re .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xcˈam jun cuxlanwa , xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios y xqˈuer . Xyeˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xij : Tij awechak , riˈ ri intioˈjl , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Y xcˈam man nejbˈ , xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios . Xyeˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xij : Tij awechak atak juntir ri wiˈ xilj man nejbˈ ri .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Man ri wiˈ li nejbˈ riˈ inquiqˈuel ri quiek laˈ xaan man aacˈ chomorsaˈn y tina tzˈutuwna chi jtojic jmacak subˈlaj cristian .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Tambˈij chawechak chi in taˈ tantij vin re uva aacˈlak asta ajriˈ chiquiˈ tantij aacˈ vin re uva aacˈlak lamas titakonwiˈ Inkaj , xcheˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Cuando xantaj jbˈixaj jun bˈix jwiˈlak pire jnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Dios , xeˈtak wich witz ri jbˈij Olivos .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij chic rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Lakˈabˈ wica atak juntir tatil aybˈak chwij jwiˈl taˈ chiquiˈ ticubˈar achˈolak chwij , jwiˈl tzˈibˈaliˈ li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri : Tancamsaj man ajyukˈ y juntir mak carner tijtil ribˈak , ticheˈ .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Pero cuando ticˈastasaj inwch laj incamnakl , innabˈerbˈi chawchak ojbˈetak Galilea , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Xpe Pedro , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Onque juntir tijtil ribˈak chawij , pero in taˈ imbˈec , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re Pedro : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawe chi lakˈabˈ wica jorok abˈijiˈ oxmul chi taˈ tachˈobˈ inwch cuando tiokˈ man puy , xcheˈ re .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Pedro xij chic re Kakaj Jesús : Onque incamsaj chawij , pero in taˈ tambˈij chi taˈ tanchˈobˈ awch , xcheˈ . Y juntir ribˈilak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij jilon xijtak .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Kakaj Jesús pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xeˈtak li jun luwar ri jbˈij Getsemaní y cuando xtawtak claˈ , xij re yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Cubˈrentak neri , inna bˈena jili chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Y xcˈambˈi Pedro chirij pach yak quibˈ jcˈajol Zebedeo . Kakaj Jesús xpe jun cˈax laj ranm jwiˈl bˈis .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Wiˈ jun nimlaj bˈis laj wanm , twicˈaj in riˈ incamsanc . Canentak atak neri , pero yoˈrentak wiqˈuil , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xjutumbˈi junquitz , xxucar asta xtaw chiˈ jwich lak ulew , xoc chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xij : At Inkaj , wi tijnaˈ inacol laj jkˈabˈ juntir cˈax , pero maˈ riˈ taˈ tabˈan lawiˈ chwaj in , riˈ bˈan lawiˈ chawaj at , xcheˈ re Kakaj Dios .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xkˈajch lamas xcantak yak uxibˈ ajtijol ribˈak chirij y cuando xtaw riqˈuilak , rechak tijintak chi waraj , xij re Pedro : Ni jun or xacuytak xatyoˈrtak wiqˈuil .

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Yoˈrentak y chˈaˈwentak riqˈui Kakaj Dios pire maˈ tayeˈ aybˈak attakchiˈjtak chi macunc . Asantilak rajiˈ atyoˈrtak , pero riˈ atioˈjlak taˈ raj , xcheˈ rechak .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Xeˈ chic Kakaj Jesús jcaˈmul chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xij jilonri : At Inkaj , wi taˈ tijnaˈ inacol pire maˈ incamc , riˈ bˈan lawiˈ chawaj at tabˈan , xcheˈ re Kakaj Dios .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Cuando xkˈaj chicch lamas wiˈtak yak uxibˈ ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xeˈ jteˈtak tijintak chi waraj jwiˈl subˈlaj cˈax waraj rechak .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Xcan jyeˈtak claˈ y xeˈ chic roxmul chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Xeˈ jbˈij chic chapcaˈ ri xij laj jcaˈmul .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xkˈaj chicch lamas wiˈtak uxibˈ yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij y xij rechak : Ajwichiˈ attijintak chi waraj y ajwichiˈ attijintak chi uxlan . Xtawiˈ chiwch tijachsaj Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil laj jkˈabˈak yak ajmacbˈ .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: ¡ Bˈiitentak ! ¡ Joˈtak ! Xpetiˈ man ri injachow pi camic , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Aj tijiniˈ Kakaj Jesús chi yoloj riqˈuilak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij cuando xtaw Judas ri jun rechak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo pach subˈlaj qˈui cristian cˈamalbˈi espad y cheˈ jwiˈlak , ri takaltakbˈi jwiˈlak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios y jwiˈlak yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Judas ri tijachow re Kakaj Jesús pi camic xijiˈ rechak nen tran chi jcˈutic Kakaj Jesús chiwchak , xij rechak jilonri : Nen ri tantzˈubˈaj jkˈotzˈ , riˈ li Jesús , chaptak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Cuando xtawtak xpe Judas xjutun chijcˈulel Kakaj Jesús xij re : Xoc akˈabˈ Kajtijonl , xcheˈ re . Y xtzˈubˈaj jkˈotzˈ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re Judas : At impach , bˈan ri petzalcat chi jbˈanic , xcheˈ re . Ajrucˈreˈ xpetak mak cristian ri xamtak chirij Judas xjutuntak chijcˈulel Kakaj Jesús , xchaptakbˈic .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Xpe jun rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xresajch respad y xcˈurbˈi jun jxicn man jmocom man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Cˈol awespad laj jluwr jwiˈl juntir ri tichˈoˈjintak chi espad , chi espad ticamsajtak .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: ¿ Taˈcˈu awetam chi in tijnaˈ roj tambˈij re Inkaj chi injtˈoˈw y re laj or tijtakch oxcˈal cabˈlajuj mil ( 72 , 000 ) ranjl chi intˈoˈic ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Pero witi tambˈan jilonli , taˈ titaw chiwch ri tijbˈij li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios chi tina bˈanna jilonli , xcheˈ re .

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xtzˈonaj rechak mak cristian : ¿ Nen chac xacˈamtakch espad y cheˈ chi inchapic ? ¿ In incˈu jun alkˈom tawiltak ? Nojel kˈij xintijoj cristian li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y taˈ xinachaptak .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Pero juntir ri tijin tibˈan pirechiˈ titaw chiwch ri xcan jtzˈibˈajtak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak . Cuando xij jilonli juntir yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xelmajtak y xcan jyeˈtak Kakaj Jesús ricˈan .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Mak ri xchapowtakbˈi re Kakaj Jesús xcˈamtakbˈi riqˈui Caifás man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios y claˈ xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios pach yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Pedro xtakejiˈbˈi Kakaj Jesús , pero chinajchak bˈesal asta xtaw chuchja re richoch man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Xcubˈar chijxoˈlak mak ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , re riˈ raj tril nen tibˈan re Kakaj Jesús .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach juntir mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel tijin tijtoctak jono cristian pire tijbˈij jun molbˈi tzij chirij Kakaj Jesús pire ticamsaj .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Pero taˈ xtaˈtak ni jono jmac , onque wiˈ subˈlaj qˈui xtawtak chi jcojic tzij chirij Kakaj Jesús , pero taˈ tzˈet ri xijtak . Pi qˈuisbˈire xtaw chic quibˈ chi jcojic tzij chirij y

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: xijtak : Oj xkataˈ cuando xij man winak ri jilonri : In incwiniˈ chi jyojic nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y li uxibˈ kˈij tambˈan jun chic , xcheˈ , xcheˈtak .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Xpe man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xwaˈrc , xtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Nen chac taˈ tacˈululaj mak cristian li , ri ticojowtak tzij chawij ? ¿ Nen chac taˈ nen tabˈij chirij amac ri tijin tijbˈijtak chawij ? xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús .

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús taˈ xcˈululaj . Xpe man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xij re Kakaj Jesús : In tambˈij chawe chi tabˈij chwe laj jbˈij Kakaj Dios ri yoˈl , wi tzˈetel tzˈet atiˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri bˈil jwiˈl chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Iniˈn , jilon chapcaˈ ri xabˈij y in tambˈij chawechak , atak juntir tina awiltakna jwich Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tibˈe cubˈarch laj jpaach Kakaj Dios ri wiˈ jcwinel y tipe chic li sutzˈ lecj nen or , xcheˈ re .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Xpe man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xrechˈbˈi ritzˈik chirij jwiˈl retzal y xij : ¡ Man winak ri tijin tijcoj ribˈ pi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ! Taˈ chiquiˈ tichocon mas ajcojoltak tzij chirij kawiˈl . Atak xataˈtakaˈ chi man winak ri tijin tijcoj ribˈ pi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: ¿ Nen tabˈijtak atak chirij ? xcheˈ rechak mak cristian . Mak cristian xijtak : Pi jmaquiˈ ticamsajc , xcheˈtak .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Xpetak , xoctak chi jchubˈaj jcaybˈal y xsecˈtak chi kˈabˈ y nicˈj chic xpakˈtak jcaybˈal chi kˈabˈ .

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: Y xijtak re : At ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , bˈijnecaˈ chike , ¿ nen xatsecˈowc ? xcheˈtak re .

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Pedro cubˈul chuchja , xpe jun anm ajicˈ xjutun chijcˈulel y xij re : At , atiˈ jpach Jesús ri aj Galilea , xcheˈ re .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Pero Pedro xij chiwchak juntir cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ chi taˈ tijchˈobˈ jwich Kakaj Jesús , xij : Taˈ wetam nen quiek chirij tabˈij jilonli , xcheˈ re man ajicˈ .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Pedro xelbˈi claˈ , xeˈ chiˈ oquebˈ re chuchja y xilsaj chicbˈi claˈ jwiˈl jun ajicˈ chic y xij rechak cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ : Man winak ri jpachiˈ Jesús aj Nazaret , xcheˈ man ajicˈ .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Y Pedro xij chic chi taˈ tijchˈobˈ jwich Kakaj Jesús , xij : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chi taˈ tanchˈobˈ jwich man winak li , xcheˈ re man ajicˈ .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Ajriˈke jun rat jbˈij jwiˈl Pedro jilonli xpetak nicˈj cristian chic ri wiˈtak claˈ , xjutuntak chijcˈulel Pedro y xijtak re : Tzˈetel tzˈet , at , atiˈ jun rechak mak jpach Jesús , naˈliˈ atyolowc , xcheˈtak re .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Pedro xij chic chi tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ ri tijbˈij y wi mitaˈ tzˈet tijbˈij , tibˈaniˈ kˈatbˈitzij chibˈ jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , xij : Taˈ tanchˈobˈ jwich man winak li , xcheˈ . Cuando xijmaj jilonli jwiˈl Pedro , xokˈ jun puy .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xcuxtaj jwiˈl Pedro ri xijsaj re jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús : Lakˈabˈ wica cuando ajquiˈ chi okˈ man puy , at jorok abˈijiˈ oxmul chi taˈ tachˈobˈ inwch , xcheˈ re . Jwiˈliˈli Pedro tikˈutut ranm , xelbˈi claˈ , xeˈ jcamsaj ribˈ chi okˈej .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Cuando xsakarsanc , juntir mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel xchomorsajtak jcamsaj Kakaj Jesús .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Ximtakbˈi Kakaj Jesús y xcˈamtakbˈic . Xeˈ jacheˈtak laj jkˈabˈ Pilato ri man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij re Judea .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Judas ri xjachow re Kakaj Jesús pi camic , cuando xril chi xansajiˈ kˈatbˈitzij chirij Kakaj Jesús pire ticamsaj , xkˈutut ranm jwiˈl xan jilonli , xeˈ jkˈasaj mak junwinak lajuj ( 30 ) chi pwak ri bˈanal laˈ plata rechak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel .

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: Xij rechak : Xintocaˈ immac chiwch Kakaj Dios jwiˈl xinjach Jesús pi camic chi maˈquiˈ jmac , xcheˈ rechak . Rechak xijtak re Judas : Taˈ nen kacwent oj re li . Atiˈ xatchomorsan xabˈan jilonli , xcheˈtak re .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Xpe Judas , xcan jtˈojeˈ man pwak li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , xelbˈic , xeˈ jitzˈaj ribˈ .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Xpetak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xbˈittak man pwak li y xijtak : Taˈ tijnaˈ tikayeˈ li cax re cˈulbˈi pwak ri tisipaj re Kakaj Dios jwiˈl man pwak li xchoconiˈ pire tojbˈire jun camsanc , xcheˈtak .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Xchomorsajtak chiribˈil ribˈak xlokˈtak jun ulew laˈ man pwak li ri tibˈijsaj re , rulew man ajbˈanal kelen laˈ xokˈol . Y xcan jyeˈtak pire mukbˈi rechak yak maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli lajori man ulew li aj tibˈijsajiˈ man ulew re tojbˈire jun camsan re .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Jilonli xtaw chiwch ri xij Jeremías ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ojrtaktzij cuando xij : Laˈ mak junwinak lajuj ( 30 ) chi pwak ri bˈanal laˈ plata ri rijil winak ri xlokˈtak yak rijajl Israel ,

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: laˈ man pwak li xlokˈtak jun ulew ri tibˈijsaj re , rulew man ajbˈanal kelen laˈ xokˈol chapcaˈ xijsaj chwe jwiˈl Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl , xcheˈ .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xcˈamsajbˈi chiwch Pilato ri man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij . Pilato xtzˈonaj re : ¿ Atniˈ jreyak yak rijajl Israel ? xcheˈ re . Kakaj Jesús xij re : Iniˈn , jilon chapcaˈ ri xabˈij , xcheˈ re .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Xpetak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pachak yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel xcojtak tzij chirij Kakaj Jesús , pero Kakaj Jesús taˈ xcˈululanc .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Xril Pilato chi Kakaj Jesús taˈ tichˈaˈwc , xtzˈonaj re : ¿ Taˈ tata juntir li ri tijbˈijtak chawij ? xcheˈ re .

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús taˈ xcˈululaj ni jun yoloj ri tijbˈijtak chirij , jwiˈliˈli man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij subˈlaj xsaach jchˈol chi rilic Kakaj Jesús .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij re Judea nakˈtaliˈ nojel junabˈ re man nimakˈij tijtak jun prex lawiˈ rajak cristian titaksajc .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Laˈ mak kˈij li wiˈ jun winak li cars ri jbˈij Barrabás . Man winak li etemaliˈ chi subˈlaj etzl jnoˈj .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Cuando mulantak juntir cristian xpe Pilato xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nen chi prex lal chawajak tantakbˈic ? ¿ Roniˈ tantakbˈi Barrabás o riˈ tantakbˈi Jesús ri tibˈijsaj re chi riˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew ? xcheˈ rechak .

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Jilonli xij rechak jwiˈl re retamiˈ chi xjachtak Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈ jwiˈlke tijtiˈtijtak .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Aj cubˈuliˈ Pilato lamas tran jkˈatbˈitzij , xpe rixokl xtakbˈi jbˈij re : Ma coj aybˈ chi jbˈanic cˈax re winak li ri taˈ ni jun jmac , jwiˈl lakˈabˈ mir wiˈ jun ichicˈ ximbˈan chirij y subˈlaj sachal inchˈol jwiˈl , xcheˈbˈi re .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Pero xpetak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel xcwintakaˈ chi jtakchiˈj cristian pire tijbˈijtak re Pilato chi tijtakbˈi Barrabás y tijtak jcamsaj Kakaj Jesús .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Xpe man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij , xtzˈonaj chic rechak : ¿ Nencˈu rechak chi quibˈ chawajak tantakbˈic ? xcheˈ rechak . Rechak cow xchˈejejtak , xijtak : ¡ Takbˈi Barrabás ! xcheˈtak .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Pilato xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nencˈu tambˈan re Jesús ri tibˈijsaj re chi riˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew ? xcheˈ rechak . Juntir rechak cow xchˈejejtak , xijtak : ¡ Camsaj wich curs ! xcheˈtak .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Pilato xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nencˈu kes cˈax bˈanal jwiˈl ? xcheˈ rechak . Pero rechak subˈlaj cow xchˈejejtak , xijtak chic : ¡ Camsaj wich curs ! xcheˈtak chic .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Cuando Pilato xril chi taˈ ticwin chi jcolic Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl mak cristian cow xchˈejejtak y xpe mas retzalak , xtak jcˈamic jaˈ , xchˈaj jkˈabˈ chiwchak juntir cristian y xij rechak : In taˈ tantoj jcamic winak li riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Atak , atiliwtak nen tabˈantak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Y juntir ribˈilak xijtak : Oj pachak juntir kalcˈwal ojtojow re jcamic riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xcheˈtak .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Xpe Pilato , xtak resaj Barrabás li cars y xtak jseqˈuic Kakaj Jesús . Ajrucˈreˈ xjachbˈi pire tibˈe jcamsajtak wich curs .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Xpetak mak jsoldad man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij , xcˈamtakbˈi Kakaj Jesús li nimlaj richoch man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij y xmulbˈaˈtak juntir mak soldad ri wiˈtak claˈ chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Xresajtak ritzˈik Kakaj Jesús chirij y ximtak jun nimlaj quiek itzˈik chirij .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Xpachˈujtak jun coron laˈ qˈuix y xcojtak laj jbˈa y xyeˈtak jun cheˈ laj jpaach jkˈabˈ . Xxucartak chiwch y xoctak chi ritzˈbˈej jwich , xijtak re : ¡ Nim akˈij , at jreyak yak rijajl Israel ! xcheˈtak re .

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Xoctak chi jchubˈaj jwich y xcˈamtak man cheˈ laj jkˈabˈ , xoctak chi jseqˈuic laj jbˈa laˈ .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Cuando xantaj juntir li jwiˈlak re Kakaj Jesús , xresajtak chic man nimlaj itzˈik chirij y xcojtak chic ritzˈik chirij y xcˈamtakbˈi pire tibˈe jcamsajtak wich curs .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Cuando bˈesaltak lak bˈe xcˈultak jun winak aj Cirene ri jbˈij Simón , xchaptak y xijtak re chi trikajbˈi jcurs Kakaj Jesús .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Cuando xtawtak li jun luwar ri jbˈij Gólgota , ri jcholajl tielwiˈ , jbˈakel jbˈa camnak ,

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: xyeˈtak vin re Kakaj Jesús chi tijem ri yujul pach cˈalaj woron , pero Kakaj Jesús xike xricˈaj laˈ raakˈ y taˈ raj xtij .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Cuando jorok tzˈocmajiˈ Kakaj Jesús wich curs , xpetak mak soldad xantak suert chirij ritzˈik nen chi itzˈik lal tijchˈectak chi jujunalak .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xcubˈartak claˈ chi jchajaj Kakaj Jesús .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Y wich curs chibˈ Kakaj Jesús xcojsaj jun kelen tzˈibˈal jwich ri lamas tijbˈij nen chac xcamsajtak wich curs ri tijbˈij : RIˈ RI JESÚS JREYAK YAK RIJAJL ISRAEL , ticheˈ .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Y xtzˈocsaj quibˈ alkˈom wich curs pi jpach Kakaj Jesús , jun laj jpaach y jun chic laj jmax .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Mak cristian ri tikˈaxtak chijcˈulel Kakaj Jesús tritzˈbˈejtak jwich , tijsutaj jbˈaak chi jbˈij re :

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: ¡ At ri tabˈij chi tayoj nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y li uxibˈ kˈij tabˈan chic jun , col aybˈ awicˈan ! ¡ Wi tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ at Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , kejench wich curs ! xcheˈtak re .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Y jilon mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios pach yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel xoctak chi ritzˈbˈej jwich Kakaj Jesús , xijtak :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: Xcwiniˈ chi jcolic cristian , pero re taˈ ticwin chi jcolic ribˈ ricˈan . Wi riˈ jreyak yak rijajl Israel , kejokch wich curs ricˈan , ajrucˈreˈ tikacoj ri tijbˈij .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Cubˈuliˈ jchˈol chirij Kakaj Dios , lajori colsajok jwiˈl Kakaj Dios wi kes tzˈet jor tilokˈaj jwiˈl Kakaj Dios jwiˈl re xijiˈn : Iniˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ , xcheˈtak .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Y jilon mak alkˈom ri xtzˈocsajtak wich curs pi jpach Kakaj Jesús xritzˈbˈejtakaˈ jwich Kakaj Jesús .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Raj tiqˈuil kˈij re cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) xoc ukuˈm juntir wich ulew asta laj jrox or re bˈesal kˈij .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Raj laj jrox or re bˈesal kˈij cow xchˈejej Kakaj Jesús , xij : Elí , Elí , ¿ lama sabactani ? xcheˈ .

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Ri jcholajl tielwiˈ tijbˈij : ¡ At Inkaj Dios ! ¡ At Inkaj Dios ! ¿ Nen chac xincan ayeˈ wicˈan ? ticheˈ . Jujun rechak mak ri wiˈtak claˈ , cuando xtatak nen xij Kakaj Jesús , xijtak : Man winak ri , tijin tijsiqˈuij Elías ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios , xcheˈtak .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Laj or xpe jun rechak mak ri wiˈtak claˈ , xeˈ jol chi jtoquic jun esponj y xmuˈbˈi li vinagre . Ximbˈi chi jtzam jun cheˈ y xyeˈ laj jchiˈ Kakaj Jesús pire tijtij .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Xpetak mak nicˈj , xijtak : Waˈxna claˈ , kileˈna wi tipe Elías chi jcolic , xcheˈtak .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Kakaj Jesús cow xchˈejejc , xjach jsantil laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios y xcamc .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Cuando xcam Kakaj Jesús , xrechˈmaj laj nicˈj man itzˈik re tosbˈi jpam nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , quibˈ xelwiˈ , xrechˈmajch pi ajsic asta iquim . Y xpe jun cabˈrakn y mak abˈaj xpaxtak .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Mak mukbˈi camnak xtertak . Y subˈlaj cristian camnaktak ri tosoltak pire Kakaj Dios xcˈastasajiˈ jwichak laj jcamnaklak .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Xeltakch lamas mukultakwiˈ . Cuando jorok cˈastasajiˈ jwich Kakaj Jesús laj jcamnakl , ajrucˈreˈ xoctak li lokˈlaj tilmit Jerusalén y subˈlaj cristian xiliwtak jwichak .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Y man jbˈabˈalak mak soldad pach mak jpach ri wiˈtak chi jchajaj Kakaj Jesús cuando xricˈajtak man nimlaj cabˈrakn y xriltak juntir ri xaanc , subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak , xijtak : ¡ Kes tzˈetel tzˈet winak ri Jcˈajoliˈ Kakaj Dios ! xcheˈtak .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Subˈlaj anm wiˈtakbˈi chinaj chi naˈtunc . Y riˈtakaˈ yak anm li xpetak chirij Kakaj Jesús chi jtˈoˈic cuando xelch Galilea .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Chijxoˈlak yak anm li , wiˈtakaˈ María Magdalena pach María ri jchuchak Santiago pach José pach jchuchak yak jcˈajol Zebedeo .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Cuando oquem tran akˈabˈ xpe jun winak bˈiom aj Arimatea ri jbˈij José , re ajtijol ribˈiˈ chirij Kakaj Jesucristo .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Xpe José , xeˈ riqˈui Pilato chi jtzˈonaj jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús . Pilato xij chi tiyeˈsaj jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús re .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
