text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xsiqˈuij yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xij rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi sicˈ anm powr ri camnak richjil riˈ xyeˈw mas chiwchak juntir ri tijyeˈtak pwak li cax re cˈolbˈi pwak ri tisipaj re Kakaj Dios .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Juntir mak bˈiom li , riˈ tijyeˈtak ri mitaˈ tijqˈuistak chi sachem . Rucˈ sicˈ anm powr ri camnak richjil xyaˈ juntir ri wiˈ riqˈuil re tzukbˈi ribˈ , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús xelbˈi li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , xpe jun re yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xij re : Kajtijonl , il impuch mak nimaktak abˈaj ri cojol re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y subˈlaj nimi ja , xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re man ajtijol ribˈ chirij : Xawilaˈ jkusil nimi richoch Kakaj Dios ri , pero tina tawna jun kˈij chi taˈ chiquiˈ ni jono abˈaj tican chibˈ jun chic . Juntir li tina yojmajna , xcheˈ re .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús cubˈulchak bˈa witz ri jbˈij Olivos ri wiˈbˈi chiwch nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , xpetak Pedro , Santiago , Juan y Andrés , xijtak re Kakaj Jesús pi ricˈanak :

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: Chikaj tabˈij chike nen or titaw chiwch ri xabˈij . ¿ Nencˈu retal ri tiilsaj pire cˈutbˈire chikawch chi tawem tran chiwch ri xabˈij chike ? xcheˈtak re .

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Tike cwentij aybˈak pire maˈ atsubˈsajtak ,

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: jwiˈl subˈlaj qˈui tina petakna y tijcoj ribˈak chapcaˈ in , tijbˈijtak : Iniˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , tina cheˈtakna y subˈlaj cristian tijsubˈtak .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Atak cuando tatatak jtaquil chi tijiniˈ nimaktak chˈoˈj li jono luwar , mi tzaak achˈolak jwiˈl jilonli tina bˈanna , pero ajquiˈ chi taw kˈij re qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: jwiˈl jun nimlaj tilmit tina chˈoˈjintakna riqˈui jun tilmit chic y jun rey tina chˈoˈjinna riqˈui jun rey chic . Tina ranna nimaktak cabˈrakn lak jaljojtak luwar y tina pena subˈlaj wiˈjal . Pero juntir li ajriˈ cholbˈire cˈax ri tina pena chibˈak cristian .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: Tike acwentij aybˈak , jwiˈl inwiˈlke in atna jachsajtakna laj jkˈabˈak mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel . Atna secˈsajtakna lak sinagog y atna cˈamsajtaknabˈi chiwchak mak jbˈabˈaltak kˈatbˈitzij y chiwchak mak rey . Y jilonli tijnaˈ tabˈijtak rechak chi tzˈetiˈ ri ilan y tal awiˈlak chwij .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Rajwaxiˈ nabˈe tina bˈijsajna tzilaj jtaquil chwij rechak juntir cristian wich ulew .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Cuando atcˈamsajtakbˈic y atjachsajtak laj jkˈabˈak mak jbˈabˈaltak kˈatbˈitzij , mat octak il chi jchomorsaj nen tabˈijtak . Cuando titaw kˈij li , xike tabˈijtak nen ri tibˈijsaj chawechak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , jwiˈl maˈ atak taˈ atchˈaˈwtak , riˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios ri wiˈ laj awanmak tichˈaˈwc .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Jun cristian tina jachna jkˈun o ratz pi camic y jun chuchkajw tina jachna ralcˈwal pi camic y yak alcˈwalixelbˈ tina jbˈitna ribˈak chirij jkaj jchuchak y tina jachtakna pi camic .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Juntir cristian ri taˈ ticojontak chiwch Kakaj Dios atna retzelbˈejtakna y atna jcontrijtakna inwiˈlke in , pero nen taˈ tijquibˈaj ranm chwij asta ticamc , ticolmajiˈ laj jkˈabˈ jmac , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Tina awiltakna li man luwar ri tosol pire Kakaj Dios jun ri ajbˈanal cˈax ri xutul jwiˈl Kakaj Dios . Ajrucˈreˈ yak cristian ri wiˈtak Judea rajwaxiˈ laj or tielmajtakbˈi bˈak witz . Nen tril jwich man wuj ri , jteˈ jcholajl .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Y nen wiˈ bˈa ja , mi oc chic chi resaj kelen re la ja .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Y nen wiˈ lak chac mi kˈaj chic laj richoch chi jcˈamic ritzˈik ri tijkˈuˈj .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Cˈur jwichak yak yaj anm laˈ mak kˈij li pach yak ri wiˈ jneˈak tijtuˈtzajtak jwiˈl rechak taˈ tijnaˈ tielmajtak laj or !

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Atak tzˈonajtak re Kakaj Dios chi miti lak kˈij re riqˈuil jabˈ cuando atelmajtakbˈic ,

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: jwiˈl tina pena jun nimlaj cˈax ri taˈ ni jun bˈwelt bˈanal cuando xticarch jwich kˈijsak asta lajori y ni jun bˈwelt tran chic .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Miti xij Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl chi taˈ qˈuilaj kˈij tran man cˈax li , taˈ ni jono cristian roj ticolmajc . Re xij jilonli jwiˈlke yak ri chaˈl jwiˈl .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Wi wiˈ nen tibˈin chawechak : Iltak impuch , ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew wiˈ neri o wiˈ jili , ticheˈ , ma cojtak ,

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: jwiˈl wiˈ cristian tijcoj ribˈak chapcaˈ riˈtakaˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew y wiˈ tijcoj ribˈak pi ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios , pero taˈ tzˈet . Rechak tranaˈtakaˈ cˈutbˈi jcwinelak ri sachom chˈolal rilic , pero pireke tijsubˈtak cristian y asta yak ri chaˈltak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios rajak tijsubˈtak .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Cwentij aybˈak , in ximbˈijiˈ juntir ri chawechak onque ajquiˈ chi taw chiwch , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak Pedro , Santiago , Juan y Andrés .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Cuando jorok kˈaxiˈ juntir mak cˈax li ri ximbˈij , ajrucˈreˈ tran ukuˈm jwich kˈij , icˈ taˈ chiquiˈ tijyeˈ jkˈakˈal ,

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: mak chˈumil titzaaktakch lecj y juntir ri wiˈ lecj tina yucxijna laj jluwrak .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ triltak Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tikejch lecj li sutzˈ subˈlaj tikopopon jkˈakˈal jnimal jkˈij y wiˈ subˈlaj jcwinel .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ tijtakch yak anjl chi jmolic jwich juntir cristian ri chaˈltak jwiˈl lak juntir luwar re wich ulew .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: Esaj anoˈjak chirijak mak jcheˈl higo . Cuando tawiltak tiel chicch jxakak acˈal , atak awetamakchak chi petemchak re riqˈuil sakˈj .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Y jiˈcˈulonli , cuando tawiltak chi tichak tijin titaw chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawechak , etemajtak chi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil petemchak re , chiˈ pwertchak wiˈ .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi ajquiˈ chi camtak juntir cristian ri wiˈtak wich ulew re mak junabˈ ri , cuando titaw chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawechak .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Caj pach ulew tisaachiˈ jwichak , pero tina tawna chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawechak .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Pero ni jonok etemawinak nen chi kˈij lal o nen chi or lal tran ri ximbˈij chawechak , ni yak anjl ri wiˈtak lecj retamak , ni Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , xike Kakaj Dios retam .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Tacwentij aybˈak y chajintake . Chˈaˈwentak riqˈui Kakaj Dios jwiˈl taˈ awetamak nen or titaw man kˈij li .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Jilon chapcaˈ jun winak bˈenam re chinaj . Nabˈe tijbˈij rechak yak jmocom chi tijchajajtak richoch y tijyeˈ jchacak chi jujunalak y tijbˈij re man ajtebˈal pwert chi tike chajinc .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Jwiˈliˈli tike acwentij aybˈak jwiˈl taˈ awetamak nen or tiyuk man rajw ja . Pent tiyuk pi oquem re akˈabˈ o nicˈaj akˈabˈ o subˈlaj akˈabˈ o sakchak .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli tike acwentij aybˈak wi etke tipetc , atyuk jteˈtak kus awarjak .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Ri tambˈij chawechak jilon tambˈij rechak juntir cristian : Tacwentij aybˈak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Quibˈ kˈijchak raj titaw man nimakˈij Pascua y man nimakˈij ri titijsaj cuxlanwa ri taˈ chˈamkˈor laˈ . Mak quibˈ nimakˈij li , li jun xumanke tikˈax . Mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios tijintak chi jtoquic nen trantak chi jchapic Kakaj Jesús chi mukukil pire tijjachtak pi camic .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Pero xijtak chiribˈil ribˈak : Taˈ tikachap laˈ man nimakˈij ri , pire maˈ tijbˈit ribˈak cristian chikij , xcheˈtak .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Kakaj Jesús wiˈ Betania laj richoch Simón ri xwaˈx yajel chirij ojr ri jbˈij lepra . Cuando cubˈul Kakaj Jesús chiˈ mex , xtaw jun anm cˈamalbˈi jun nejbˈ jwiˈl ri bˈanal laˈ abˈaj ri jbˈij alabastro , nojsal chi jun perjum ri jbˈij nardo subˈlaj pakal rijil . Xpe man anm li , xkˈip man nejbˈ y xtzˈaj perjum laj jbˈa Kakaj Jesús .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Nicˈj cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ xpe retzalak chi rilic man anm y xijtak chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Nen chac xan cˈax re man perjum li ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Quibˈ cientiˈ denario rijil . Riˈ mas tzi xcˈayajteneˈ man perjum pire titˈoˈsaj yak powr laˈ man pwak , xcheˈtak . Poc xyajtak man anm li .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús xij : Can yeˈtak anm ri . ¿ Nen chac tijin tayajtak ? Re utziliˈ xan chwe .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Yak powr tiwaˈxtakaˈ chaxoˈlak nojel kˈij . Atak tijnaˈ tabˈantak utzil rechak cuando chawajak , pero in taˈ naj inwaˈx chaxoˈlak .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Anm ri , xanaˈ lawiˈ ri xcwin chi jbˈanic . Xtzˈajaˈ perjum laj imbˈ , pero perjum ri xtzˈaj laj imbˈ pi rechak mukbˈi we xan .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi lak juntir luwar wich ulew lamas tibˈijsajwiˈ tzilaj jtaquil chwij , tibˈijsajiˈ nen xan anm ri chwe y jilonli jcuxtaj tibˈanc , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Xpe jun rechak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo ri jbˈij Judas Iscariote , xelbˈic , xeˈ jchomorsaj riqˈuilak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios chi tijjachaˈ Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈak .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Cuando xtatak chi Judas tijjachaˈ Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈak , rechak subˈlaj xquiˈcottak . Xsujtak pwak re , ajrucˈreˈ Judas xoc chi jtoquic nen mo tran chi jjachic Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈak .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Li man nabˈe kˈij re mak kˈij re man nimakˈij ri titijsaj cuxlanwa ri taˈ chˈamkˈor laˈ cuando tijcamsaj jun ra carner pire tijtijtak re sinar re Pascua , xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Lamas chawaj tibˈe kabˈaneˈ jwaˈx asinar re Pascua ? xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xtakbˈi quibˈ re yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xij rechak : Jattak Jerusalén . Tibˈe acˈuleˈtak jun winak cˈamalbˈi jun kˈibˈ jaˈ jwiˈl , takejtakbˈic .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Y lamas tiocwiˈ tabˈijtak re man rajw ja : Tijbˈij Kajtijonl : ¿ Lamas wiˈw incwart lamas tantijwiˈ insinar re Pascua pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chwij ? ticheˈ , atcheˈtak re .

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Y re tijcˈut jun nimlaj cwart chawchak laj jcabˈ wik re ja ri jamalchak y bˈanalchak jwaˈxc . Bˈantak jwaˈx kasinar re Pascua claˈ , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Y yak quibˈ ajtijol ribˈak chirij xeˈtak , xtawtak Jerusalén . Xeˈ jteˈtak juntir chapcaˈ xijbˈi Kakaj Jesús rechak y xantak jwaˈx sinar re Pascua .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Cuando xoc akˈabˈ , xtaw Kakaj Jesús pach yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Cuando cubˈulchak Kakaj Jesús chiˈ mex chi wicˈ pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xij : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi wiˈ jun chawechak ri tijin chi wicˈ wiqˈuil , injachow pi camic , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Rechak xpe subˈlaj bˈis laj ranmak chi jtaic jilonli y xoctak chi jtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús chi jujunalak : ¿ Maˈ iniˈn taˈn ? xcheˈtak re .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Riˈ jun chawechak ri atak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ri tijmuˈ jcuxlanwa wiqˈuil li lak .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil jilon tibˈan re chapcaˈ tzˈibˈal chirij li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios , pero riˈ mas cˈur jwich man ri tijachow re pi camic . Riˈ mas tzi pire re mitneˈ xqˈuisiˈyc , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xcˈam jun cuxlanwa , xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios y xqˈuer . Xyeˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xij rechak : Tij awechak , riˈ ri intioˈjl , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xcˈam jun nejbˈ , xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios y xyeˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij y juntir xtijtak rechak .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Man ri wiˈ li nejbˈ riˈ inquiqˈuel ri quiek laˈ xaan man aacˈ chomorsaˈn y tina tzˈutuwna chi jtojic jmacak subˈlaj cristian .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi in taˈ tantij vin re uva aacˈlak asta ajriˈ chiquiˈ tantij aacˈ vin aacˈlak lamas titakonwiˈ Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Cuando xantaj jbˈixaj jun bˈix jwiˈlak pire jnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Dios , xeˈtak wich witz ri jbˈij Olivos .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij chic rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Lakˈabˈ wica atak juntir tatil aybˈak jwiˈl taˈ chiquiˈ ticubˈar achˈolak chwij . Jwiˈl tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri : Tancamsaj man ajyukˈ y juntir mak carner tijtil ribˈak , ticheˈ .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Pero cuando ticˈastasaj inwch laj incamnakl , innabˈerbˈi chawchak ojbˈetak Galilea , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Xpe Pedro , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Onque juntir tijtil ribˈak , pero in taˈ imbˈec , xcheˈ .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re Pedro : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawe chi lakˈabˈ wica jorok abˈijiˈ oxmul chi taˈ tachˈobˈ inwch cuando tiokˈ jcaˈmul man puy , xcheˈ re .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Pedro xcoj jchokˈbˈ chi jbˈij re Kakaj Jesús , xij : Onque incamsaj chawij , pero in taˈ tambˈij chi taˈ tanchˈobˈ awch , xcheˈ . Y juntir ribˈilak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo jilon xijtak .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Kakaj Jesús pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xeˈtak li jun luwar ri jbˈij Getsemaní . Kakaj Jesús xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Cubˈrentak neri , inna bˈena chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús xcˈambˈi Pedro , Santiago y Juan chirij , xpe jun cˈax laj ranm jwiˈl bˈis .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Y xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Wiˈ jun nimlaj bˈis laj wanm , twicˈaj in riˈ incamsanc . Canentak neri , pero yoˈrentak wiqˈuil , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xjutumbˈi junquitz , xxucar asta xtaw chiˈ jwich lak ulew , xoc chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Xtzˈonaj re Kakaj Dios wi tijnaˈ miti titaw chiwch man or re jcamic .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Y xij : At Inkaj , juntir atcwiniˈ chi jbˈanic . Inacoleˈ laj jkˈabˈ juntir cˈax , pero maˈ riˈ taˈ tabˈan lawiˈ chwaj in , riˈ bˈan lawiˈ chawaj at , xcheˈ re Kakaj Dios .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xkˈajch lamas xcantak yak uxibˈ ajtijol ribˈak chirij y cuando xtaw riqˈuilak , rechak tijintak chi waraj , xij re Simón Pedro : Simón atwariˈn , taˈ xacuy xatyoˈr jun or wiqˈuil .

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Yoˈrentak y chˈaˈwentak riqˈui Kakaj Dios pire maˈ tayeˈ aybˈak attakchiˈjtak chi macunc . Asantilak rajiˈ atyoˈrtak , pero riˈ atioˈjlak taˈ raj , xcheˈ re .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Xeˈ chic Kakaj Jesús jcaˈmul chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Xcaˈmulaj jbˈij ri xij nabˈe bˈwelt .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Cuando xkˈaj chicch lamas wiˈtak yak uxibˈ ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xeˈ jteˈtak tijintak chi waraj jwiˈl subˈlaj cˈax waraj rechak . Rechak taˈ chiquiˈ tijtaˈtak nen tijbˈijtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xeˈ chic laj roxmul chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Cuando xkˈaj chicch lamas wiˈtak yak uxibˈ yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xij rechak : Ajwichiˈ attijintak chi waraj y ajwichiˈ attijintak chi uxlanc . Xtawiˈ chiwch tijachsaj Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil laj jkˈabˈak mak ajmacbˈ .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: ¡ Bˈiitentak ! ¡ Joˈtak ! Xpetiˈ man ri injachow pi camic , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Aj tijiniˈ Kakaj Jesús chi yoloj riqˈuilak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij cuando xtaw Judas ri jun rechak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij pach subˈlaj qˈui cristian cˈamalbˈi espad y cheˈ jwiˈlak ri takaltakbˈi jwiˈlak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios pach yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Judas ri tijachow re Kakaj Jesús pi camic xijiˈ rechak nen tran chi jcˈutic Kakaj Jesús chiwchak , xij rechak jilonri : Nen ri tantzˈubˈaj jkˈotzˈ , riˈ li Jesús , chaptak . Cˈamtakbˈic , tzi jchapic tabˈantak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Cuando xtawtak , xpe Judas xjutun chijcˈulel Kakaj Jesús y xij re : Kajtijonl , xcheˈ re . Y xtzˈubˈaj jkˈotzˈ .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xpetak mak cristian ri xamtak chirij Judas xchaptakbˈi Kakaj Jesús .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Xpe jun rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xresajch respad y xcˈurbˈi jun jxicn man jmocom man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xtzˈonaj rechak mak cristian li : ¿ Nen chac xacˈamtakch espad y cheˈ chi inchapic ? ¿ In incˈu jun alkˈom tawiltak ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Nojel kˈij xintijoj cristian li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y taˈ xinachaptak . Pero juntir ri tijin tibˈan pirechiˈ titaw chiwch ri tijbˈij li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Y juntir yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xelmajtak , xcan jyeˈtak Kakaj Jesús ricˈan .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Wiˈ jun cˈojol winak xambˈer chirij Kakaj Jesús ri bˈatzˈal jun chi itzˈik chirij jwiˈl . Xpetak mak cristian , roj xchaptak man cˈojol winak laˈ ritzˈik ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: pero re xelmajbˈi pi chˈanalc , xcan elok man ritzˈik laj jkˈabˈak .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xcˈamtakbˈi Kakaj Jesús riqˈui man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios y claˈ xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak juntir mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach juntir yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel pach juntir yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Pedro xtakejiˈbˈi Kakaj Jesús , pero chinajchak bˈesal asta xtaw chuchja re richoch man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Pedro xcubˈar chi kˈakˈ chi jmikˈic ribˈ chijxoˈlak mak ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach juntir mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel tijin tijtoctak jono jmac Kakaj Jesús pire tijnaˈ ticamsaj , pero taˈ tijtaˈtak ,

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: jwiˈl subˈlaj cristian xcojtak tzij chirij Kakaj Jesús chi wiˈ jmac . Pero taˈ tzˈet jwiˈl taˈ nicˈ jwich jyoljak ri tijbˈijtak .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Xpe jujun rechak mak ajcojoltak tzij , xijtak jun molbˈi tzij chirij Kakaj Jesús jilonri :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: Oj xkataˈ cuando xij man winak ri jilonri : In tina inyojna nimi richoch Kakaj Dios ri cristianke bˈanowinak y li uxibˈ kˈij tambˈan jun chic ri maˈ cristian taˈke tibˈanow re , xcheˈ , xcheˈtak .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Jilonli xijtak mak ajmololtak tzij chirij Kakaj Jesús , pero taˈ nicˈ jwich jyoljak ri tijbˈijtak .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Xpe man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xwaˈr chijxoˈlak mak cristian xtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Nen chac taˈ tacˈululaj mak cristian li , ri ticojowtak tzij chawij ? ¿ Nen chac taˈ nen tabˈij chirij amac ri tijin tijbˈijtak chawij ? xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús .

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús taˈ xchˈaˈwc . Man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios xtzˈonaj chic re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Atniˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri bˈil jwiˈl chi tina jtaknach wich ulew ? xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Iniˈn . Atak tina awiltakna jwich Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tibˈe cubˈarch laj jpaach Kakaj Dios ri wiˈ jcwinel y tipe chic li sutzˈ lecj nen or , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios xrechˈbˈi ritzˈik chirij jwiˈl retzal y xij : Taˈ chiquiˈ tichocon mas ajcojoltak tzij chirij kawiˈl .

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Atak xataˈtakaˈ chi man winak ri , tijin tijcoj ribˈ pi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios . ¿ Nen tabˈijtak atak chirij ? xcheˈ . Juntir cristian xijtak chi pi jmaquiˈ ticamsajc .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ jujun xoctak chi jchubˈaj jcaybˈal . Xchˈuktak bˈakˈ jwich , xsecˈtak chi kˈabˈ y xijtak re : Bˈijnecaˈ chike , ¿ nen xatsecˈowc ? xcheˈtak re . Y mak ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios xsecˈtak chi kˈabˈ .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Pedro wiˈ chuchja cuando xtaw jun anm ri rajicˈ man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Xril chi tijin tijmikˈ ribˈ Pedro chi kˈakˈ chuchja . Cow xril y xij re : At , atiˈ jpach Jesús ri aj Nazaret , xcheˈ re .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Pero Pedro xij : Taˈ tanchˈobˈ jwich . Taˈ wetam nen quiek chirij tabˈij jilonli , xcheˈ re man ajicˈ . Ajrucˈreˈ Pedro xelbˈi claˈ , xeˈ chiˈ oquebˈ re chuchja .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Y man ajicˈ li xril chi ajwichke wiˈ Pedro claˈ , xij rechak cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ : Man winak ri , riˈ jun rechak mak jpach Jesús , xcheˈ .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Pedro xij chic chi taˈ tijchˈobˈ jwich Kakaj Jesús . Ajriˈke jun rat jbˈij jwiˈl Pedro jilonli xpetak nicˈj cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ , xijtak re Pedro : Tzˈetel tzˈet , at , atiˈ jun chijxoˈlak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Jesús y atiˈ aj Galilea , xcheˈtak re Pedro .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Pedro xij chic chi tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ ri tijbˈij y wi mitaˈ tzˈet tijbˈij , tibˈaniˈ kˈatbˈitzij chirij jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , xij : Taˈ tanchˈobˈ jwich man winak li ri tabˈijtak chwe , xcheˈ .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Cuando xijmaj jilonli jwiˈl Pedro , xokˈ jcaˈmul man puy , ajrucˈreˈ xcuxtaj jwiˈl Pedro ri xijsaj re jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús : Lakˈabˈ wica cuando ajquiˈ chi okˈ jcaˈmul man puy , at jorok abˈijiˈ oxmul chi taˈ tachˈobˈ inwch , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús re Pedro . Jwiˈliˈli tikˈutut ranm , xelbˈi claˈ , xeˈ jcamsaj ribˈ chi okˈej .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Cuando xsakarsanc , mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak pach yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel pach yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y juntir mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel xchomorsajtak nen trantak re Kakaj Jesús , xximtakbˈic y xeˈ jacheˈtak laj jkˈabˈ Pilato .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Xpe Pilato , xtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Atniˈ jreyak yak rijajl Israel ? xcheˈ re . Kakaj Jesús xij re : Iniˈn , jilon chapcaˈ ri xabˈij , xcheˈ re Pilato .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios subˈlaj tzij xcojtak chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Pilato xtzˈonaj chic jcaˈmul re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Nen chac taˈ tacˈululaj jyoljak mak cristian li chirij amac ri tijbˈijtak ? xcheˈ re .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús taˈ xcˈululaj ni jun yoloj y Pilato subˈlaj xsaach jchˈol jwiˈl taˈ nen xij Kakaj Jesús .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Pilato ri jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij nakˈtaliˈ nojel junabˈ re man nimakˈij tijtak jun prex lawiˈ rajak cristian titaksajc .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Wiˈ jun winak li cars ri jbˈij Barrabás . Re wiˈ li cars pach mak jpach ri xantak camic cuando xchˈoˈjintak riqˈui man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Xtawtak subˈlaj cristian riqˈui Pilato xijtak re chi tresaj jun re mak prexbˈ chapcaˈ tran nojel junabˈ .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Pilato xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Chawajakniˈ tantakbˈi man jreyak yak rijajl Israel ? xcheˈ rechak .

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Jilonli xij rechak jwiˈl re retamiˈ chi mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios xjachtak Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈ jwiˈlke tijtiˈtijtak .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios xtakchiˈjtak subˈlaj cristian pire tijbˈijtak re Pilato chi titaksajbˈi Barrabás .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Pilato xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nencˈu tambˈan re , ri tabˈijtak chi riˈ man jreyak yak rijajl Israel ? xcheˈ .

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Rechak cow xchˈejejtak , xijtak : ¡ Camsaj wich curs ! xcheˈtak .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Pilato xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nencˈu kes cˈax bˈanal jwiˈl ? xcheˈ . Pero rechak cow xchˈejejtak chic , xijtak : ¡ Camsaj wich curs ! xcheˈtak .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Pilato riˈ raj tzi tiilsaj jwiˈlak cristian , xtak resajbˈi Barrabás li cars y xtak jseqˈuic Kakaj Jesús . Ajrucˈreˈ xjachbˈi pire tibˈe jcamsajtak wich curs .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Mak soldad xcˈamtakbˈi Kakaj Jesús li nimlaj richoch man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij y xmulbˈaˈtak juntir mak soldad ri wiˈtak claˈ .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Xximtak jun nimlaj quiek itzˈik chirij Kakaj Jesús . Xpachˈujtak jun coron laˈ qˈuix y xcojtak laj jbˈa .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Xoctak chi chˈejejem chi ritzˈbˈej jwich y xijtak re : ¡ Nim akˈij , at jreyak yak rijajl Israel ! xcheˈtak re .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Xoctak chi jchubˈaj jwich y xsecˈtak laj jbˈa laˈ jun cheˈ . Xxucartak chiwch chi jcojic jkˈij , pero taˈ tzˈet rechak .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Xantaj ritzˈbˈej jwich Kakaj Jesús jwiˈlak , xresajtak chic man nimlaj quiek itzˈik chirij y xcojtak chic ritzˈik chirij . Ajrucˈreˈ xcˈamtakbˈi pire tibˈe jcamsajtak wich curs .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Cuando bˈesaltak lak bˈe , xcˈultak jun winak ri jbˈij Simón aj Cirene ri jkaj Alejandro pach Rufo , bˈenam re li tilmit Jerusalén , xchaptak y xijtak re chi trikajbˈi jcurs Kakaj Jesús .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Xcˈamtakbˈi Kakaj Jesús li jun luwar ri jbˈij Gólgota . Ri jcholajl tielwiˈ man yoloj Gólgota , jbˈakel jbˈa camnak .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Xyeˈtak vin re chi tijem yujul pach mirra , pero Kakaj Jesús taˈ raj xtij .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xtzˈoctak Kakaj Jesús wich curs y xantak suert chirij ritzˈik chi rilic nen chi itzˈik lal tijchˈectak chi jujunalak .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtzˈocsaj wich curs laj bˈelejebˈ ( 9 ) or re akˈabˈ .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Y wich curs xcojsaj jun kelen tzˈibˈal jwich ri lamas tijbˈij nen chac xcamsajtak wich curs , tijbˈij jilonri : RIˈ RI JREYAK YAK RIJAJL ISRAEL , ticheˈ .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Y xtzˈocsaj quibˈ alkˈom wich curs pi jpach Kakaj Jesús , jun laj jpaach y jun chic laj jmax .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Jilon xansaj re Kakaj Jesús chapcaˈ tijbˈij li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios jilonri : Xansajiˈ re chapcaˈ tibˈansaj rechak mak etzltak cristian , ticheˈ .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Mak cristian ri tikˈaxtak chijcˈulel Kakaj Jesús tritzˈbˈejtak jwich , tijsutaj jbˈaak chi jbˈij re : ¡ At ri tabˈij chi tayoj nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y li uxibˈ kˈij tabˈan chic jun !

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: ¡ Col aybˈ awicˈan y kejench wich curs ! xcheˈtak re .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Jilonri ritzˈbˈej jwich Kakaj Jesús xantak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios , xijtak chiribˈil ribˈak : Xcwiniˈ chi jcolic cristian , pero re taˈ ticwin chi jcolic ribˈ ricˈan .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Wi riˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew y wi riˈ jreyak yak rijajl Israel , kejokch wich curs pire tikil y ojcojontak chiwch , xcheˈtak . Y jilon mak quibˈ ri xtzˈocsajtak wich curs pi jpach Kakaj Jesús xritzˈbˈejtakaˈ jwich Kakaj Jesús .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Raj tiqˈuil kˈij re cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) xoc ukuˈm juntir wich ulew asta laj jrox or re bˈesal kˈij .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Raj laj jrox or re bˈesal kˈij cow xchˈejej Kakaj Jesús , xij : ¡ Eloi ! ¡ Eloi ! ¿ Lama sabactani ? xcheˈ .

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Ri jcholajl tielwiˈ tijbˈij : ¡ At Inkaj Dios ! ¡ At Inkaj Dios ! ¿ Nen chac xincan ayeˈ wicˈan ? ticheˈ . Y jujun rechak mak ri wiˈtak claˈ , cuando xtatak nen xij Kakaj Jesús , xijtak : Tatak impuch nen tijbˈij , tijin tijsiqˈuij Elías ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios , xcheˈtak .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Laj or xpe jun rechak mak ri wiˈtak claˈ , xeˈ jol chi jtoquic jun esponj y xmuˈbˈi li vinagre . Ximbˈi chi jtzam jun cheˈ y xyeˈ laj jchiˈ Kakaj Jesús pire tijtij y xij : Waˈxna claˈ y kileˈna wi tipe Elías chi jcolic , xcheˈ .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús cow xchˈejejc y xcamc .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Cuando xcam Kakaj Jesús , xrechˈmaj laj nicˈj man tosbˈi jpam nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , quibˈ xelwiˈ , xrechˈmajch pi ajsic asta iquim .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Cuando man jbˈabˈalak mak soldad xril nen mo jcamic Kakaj Jesús , xij : ¡ Kes tzˈetel tzˈet winak ri Jcˈajoliˈ Kakaj Dios ! xcheˈ .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Y wiˈ nicˈj anm tijin tinaˈtuntakch chinaj . Chijxoˈlak mak anm li wiˈtakaˈ María Magdalena , María ri jchuch Santiago ri kˈunixel y ri jchuch José y wiˈ Salomé chijxoˈlak .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Mak anm li xpachijtakaˈ Kakaj Jesús y xtˈowaˈtakaˈ cuando re xwaˈx Galilea y wiˈ chiquiˈ nicˈj anm claˈ ri jpach Kakaj Jesús xtawtak Jerusalén .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Cuando oquem tran akˈabˈ y jwiˈl tawem tran or pire ticholmaj kˈij re uxlan pi rechak yak rijajl Israel ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: xpe José aj Arimatea jun ri mas nim jkˈij chijxoˈlak mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel . Y re nojeliˈ ranm tijin chi rulbˈej titakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian . Xcowirsaj ranm , xeˈ laj or riqˈui Pilato chi jtzˈonaj jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús re .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Pilato xsaach jchˈol chi jtaic chi xcamiˈ Kakaj Jesús . Xsiqˈuij man jbˈabˈalak mak soldad y xtzˈonaj re wi tzˈet camnakchak Kakaj Jesús .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Cuando man jbˈabˈalak mak soldad xij chi kes tzˈet xcamiˈn , ajrucˈreˈ Pilato xyeˈ luwar re José chi jkesaj jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús pire tibˈe jmukeˈ .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Xpe José , xkesaj jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús , xbˈatzˈbˈi laˈ jun itzˈik ri xlokˈ ri jbˈij lino y xcˈambˈic . Xeˈ jmukeˈ li jun nimlaj jul ri cˈotol li abˈaj . Ajrucˈreˈ xcan jtzˈapij jchiˈ man jul laˈ jun abˈaj .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: María Magdalena pach María ri jchuch José xrilaˈtakaˈ lamas xcan yeˈsaj jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Cuando xkˈax man kˈij re uxlan , María Magdalena , María ri jchuch Santiago y Salomé xlokˈtak perjum pire tijcojtak chirij jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Subˈlaj akˈabˈ li nabˈe kˈij re xuman , xeˈtak chiˈ jul lamas xyeˈsajwiˈ jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús . Xelch kˈij xtawtak claˈ .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Tijin tijbˈijtak chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Nen chiquiˈ tisolcopin man abˈaj chiˈ jul chikawch ? xcheˈtak .

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Cuando xnaˈtuntak chiˈ jul , xriltak chi man abˈaj ri cojol pire chˈukbˈi chiˈ man jul taˈ chiquiˈ laj jluwr , solcopilchakbˈic .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Cuando xoctak li jul lamas xyeˈsajwiˈ jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús , xriltak jwich jun cˈojol winak cubˈul li paach re li jul cojol jun saklaj itzˈik chirij ri nim rakan . Rechak subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak chi rilic .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Man cˈojol winak xij rechak mak anm : Mi tzaak achˈolak . Atak riˈ tatoctak Kakaj Jesús aj Nazaret ri xcamsaj wich curs , pero xcˈastasajiˈbˈi jwich laj jcamnakl . Re taˈ chiquiˈ neri . Iltak lamas xyeˈsaj jcamnakl , taˈ chiquiˈn .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Jattak , bˈijtatak rechak Pedro pach yak nicˈj ajtijol ribˈak chirij jilonri : Re tinabˈeriˈbˈi chawchak atbˈetak Galilea , claˈ tibˈe awileˈtak jwich jilon chapcaˈ ri bˈil chawechak jwiˈl , atcheˈtak rechak , xcheˈ man cˈojol winak rechak .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ yak anm li , laj or xeltakbˈi li jul lamas xyeˈsajwiˈ jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús . Tichak querquentak jwiˈl jtzakic jchˈolak . Taˈ chiquiˈ ni jun quiek re xijtakwiˈ nen xriltak .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Cuando jorok cˈastasajiˈ jwich Kakaj Jesús laj jcamnakl , akˈabˈ li nabˈe kˈij re xuman , nabˈe xilsaj jwich jwiˈl María Magdalena ri xesaj wukubˈ ( 7 ) etzl laj ranm jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Y re xecˈ , xeˈ jbˈij rechak yak ri xpachintak re Kakaj Jesús . Rechak jor tibˈisontak y tiokˈtak chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Pero cuando xtatak chi yoˈliˈ Kakaj Jesús y xilsajiˈ jwich jwiˈl María Magdalena , rechak taˈ xcojtak wi tzˈetiˈn .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xilsaj chic jwich jwiˈlak yak quibˈ ajtijol ribˈak chirij cuando bˈesaltak li bˈe ri tibˈe lak tra luwar , pero jalan chiquiˈ rilic jwich xantak .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Rechak xeˈ jbˈijtak chic re yak nicˈj jpachak chic , pero taˈ xcojtak .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Pi qˈuisbˈire xilsaj chic jwich Kakaj Jesús jwiˈlak yak junlajuj ( 11 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij cuando cubˈultak chi wicˈ chiˈ mex . Kakaj Jesús xyaj yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij jwiˈl taˈ cubˈul jchˈol chirij y pur abˈaj ranmak , taˈ tijcojtak jyoljak yak ri xiliwtak chi xcˈastasajiˈ jwich laj jcamnakl .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Jattak riqˈuilak juntir cristian wich ulew y bˈijtak tzilaj jtaquil rechak chwij .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Nen ticojow ri tabˈijtak y tibˈansaj jaˈtiox re , ticolmajiˈ laj jkˈabˈ jmac . Pero nen taˈ ticojow ri tabˈijtak , jiˈ tibˈe li man luwar re tijbˈi cˈax .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Yak cristian ri ticojowtak ri tabˈijtak , tina inyeˈna jcwinelak chi laj imbˈj tresajtak mak etzl ri wiˈ laj ranmak cristian y tina chˈaˈwtakna li jaljojtak tzijbˈal ri taˈ etemal .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Wi tijchaptak cumatz , taˈ titiˈsajtak . Wi tijtijtak jun kelen ri ticamsan , taˈ tran cˈax rechak . Y wi tijyeˈ jkˈabˈak laj jbˈaak cristian ri yajtak , titzibˈtakaˈn , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Cuando xantaj jbˈij jilonli jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xcˈamsajbˈi lecj . Xeˈ cubˈar laj jpaach Kakaj Dios .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xeˈtak chi jbˈij tzilaj jtaquil chirij Kakaj Jesucristo rechak juntir cristian lak juntir tilmit . Riˈ Kakaj Jesús titˈoˈw rechak chi jbˈanic cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios pire cˈutbˈire chi kes tzˈetiˈ ri tijin tijbˈijtak .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Qˈuiyiˈ cristian xtzˈibˈantak nen kes jcholajl juntir ri xyuk raneˈ Kakaj Jesús chikaxoˈl .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: Jilon chapcaˈ ri xijsaj chike jwiˈlak yak ri xiliwtak jwich Kakaj Jesús ri nen mo xcholmajch y xqˈuisbˈen juntir ri xan Kakaj Jesús , jwiˈl xyeˈsaj rekleˈnak chi jbˈij juntir li .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Y jilon in , chi usiliˈ xinta jcholajl ri juntir nen mo xcholmajch juntir ri xan Kakaj Jesús y lajori riˈ li tantzˈibˈajbˈi jcholajl chawe li wuj , kaj Teófilo ,

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: pire tawetemaj chi kes tzˈetiˈ ri tzilaj jtaquil chirij Kakaj Jesucristo ri xattijojwiˈ .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Cuando Nabˈe Herodes wiˈ pire rey re Judea , xwaˈx jun ajcˈamal jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios ri jbˈij Zacarías . Y man kˈat re yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios ri lamas wiˈ Zacarías , riˈ man kˈat re Abías . Y Elisabet ri rixokl Zacarías , rijajliˈ Aarón .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Zacarías pach Elisabet pi jcholajliˈ juntir ri trantak y xcojaˈtakaˈ juntir Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl y xanaˈtakaˈ lawiˈ raj re xantak .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Rechak taˈ ni jono ralcˈwalak waˈsal , jwiˈl Elisabet taˈ tialcˈwalanc y chi quibˈ ribˈilak riˈjtaklaj cristiantakchak .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Cuando xtaw jun kˈij xtaˈ jxumanak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios ri man jkˈat Abías pire tichacuntak li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , Zacarías wiˈ chijxoˈlak .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios nakˈtaltakaˈ tijchaˈtak nen rechak tioc li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl . Riˈ Zacarías xchaˈtak pire tioc li man luwar ri nim jkˈij re li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios chi jcˈatic pom .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Cuando xtaw or re ticˈatsaj pom , yak rijajl Israel tijin tichˈaˈwtak riqˈui Kakaj Dios chiwch nimi richoch Kakaj Dios .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Zacarías wiˈ chi cˈataj pom wich altar re cˈatbˈi pom li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , etke xwabˈaˈ ribˈ jun ranjl Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl chiwch li paach re man altar re cˈatbˈi pom ,

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Zacarías cuando xril jwich anjl subˈlaj xsaach jchˈol y xtzaak jchˈol chi rilic .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Xpe anjl , xij re : Zacarías , mi tzaak achˈol . Kakaj Dios xtaˈ nen xatzˈonaj re cuando xatchˈaˈw riqˈuil . Elisabet awixokl tiwaˈxiˈ jun ra ricˈlal winak y tacoj jbˈij pi Juan .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: At subˈlaj atquiˈcot laj awanm y subˈlaj cristian tiquiˈcottak cuando tiqˈuisiˈy ral acˈajol .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Y man ral acˈajol li chiwch Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl , nimiˈ jkˈij . Taˈ tijtij vin y taˈ tijtij kelen ri tikˈabˈarsanc . Y tinojsajiˈ ranm laˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios cuando ajquiˈ chi qˈuisiˈyc .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Y tran chi subˈlaj rijajl Israel tikˈajtak chic laj jkˈabˈ Rajawlak ri jDiosak .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Y riˈ Juan tiyuk nabˈe wich ulew chi jbˈij jtaquil chirij Kakaj Jesucristo ri Kajawl . Y Juan tiwaˈxiˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios laj ranm y tiwaˈxiˈ jcwinel chapcaˈ re Elías ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios pire tran chi tiwaˈx utzil chijxoˈlak yak chuchkajw pach yak ralcˈwalak . Y tran chi ticojontak chiwch Kakaj Dios yak ri taˈ ticojontak pire tiniqˈuibˈ jwichak yak ri sucˈul ranmak chiwch Kakaj Dios . Jilonli wiˈ subˈlaj cristian ticˈuluwtak re Kakaj Jesús ri Kajawl cuando tiyuk wich ulew , xcheˈ anjl re Zacarías .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Zacarías xtzˈonaj re anjl : ¿ Nen mo twetemaj wi tzˈetiˈ ri xabˈij chwe ? In inchak riˈjlaj winak y wixokl riˈjlaj anmchak , xcheˈ re .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Y anjl li xij re Zacarías : In iniˈ Gabriel . Tijin tambˈan lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tambˈan , riˈ re xintakowch chi yoloj aacˈl pire tiyuk imbˈij tzilaj jtaquil li chawe .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Pero lajori jwiˈl taˈ tacoj inyolj ri ximbˈij chawe , taˈ tijnaˈ atyolow asta titaw chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawe , xcheˈ anjl re Zacarías .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Y juntir cristian ri wiˈtak chiwch nimi richoch Kakaj Dios tijintak chi rulbˈej nen or tielch Zacarías y subˈlaj sachal jchˈolak tijin tijtzˈonaj chiribˈil ribˈak nen chac taˈ relicch .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Cuando xelch Zacarías , taˈ chiquiˈ tijnaˈ tiyolow riqˈuilak . Rechak xyeˈtak cwent chi wiˈ jono kelen xril li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios chapcaˈ li ichicˈ . Zacarías xichak jkˈabˈ tran chiwchak taˈ chiquiˈ tijnaˈ tiyolow riqˈuilak .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Cuando xtaw kˈij xqˈuis jchac Zacarías li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios xkˈaj laj richoch .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Y laˈ mak kˈij li xcan yaj anm Elisabet ri rixokl Zacarías . Elisabet jobˈ icˈ xwaˈx la ja , taˈ chiquiˈ lamas xelwiˈ .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Elisabet xij laj ranm : Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl xiliw cˈur inwch , jwiˈliˈli jilon imbˈanic ri pire taˈ chiquiˈ inyokˈsaj jwiˈlak mak cristian , xcheˈ laj ranm .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Cuando Elisabet bˈesalchak wakakibˈ ( 6 ) icˈ jcanic yaj anm , Kakaj Dios xtak chicch anjl Gabriel li tilmit Nazaret re Galilea

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: chi jsolaj jun anm ri ajquiˈ chˈobˈol winak jwiˈl ri jbˈij María ri tzˈonal jwiˈl José ri rijajl David .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Cuando xtaw anjl lamas wiˈ María , xij re : Tanyeˈ rutzil awch María . Wiˈ jun nimlaj utzil pi awe . Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl wiˈ aacˈl , xcheˈ re .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: María xsaach jchˈol chi jtaic nen xijsaj re . Xoc chi jchomorsaj nen tielwiˈ ri jcˈamic rutzil jwich ri xansaj jwiˈl anjl .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Xpe anjl , xij chic re María : Mi tzaak achˈol , xataˈ utzil riqˈui Kakaj Dios .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Lajori atcan yaj anm y tiqˈuisiˈy jun ral awicˈlal winak , tacoj jbˈij pi Jesús .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Re tina nimirsajna jkˈij , tibˈijsajiˈ chirij chi Jcˈajoliˈ Kakaj Dios lecj y Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl tijyaˈ takon laj jkˈabˈ chapcaˈ takon ri xwaˈx laj jkˈabˈ David ri jmam .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Y riˈ re titakon chibˈak yak rijajl Israel y taˈ jqˈuisic jwich jtakonc , xcheˈ re María .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: María xtzˈonaj re : ¿ Nen mo tiwaˈx wicˈlal cuando ajquiˈ chˈobˈol winak inwiˈl ? xcheˈ re .

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Xpe anjl , xij chic re : Kakaj Dios tijtakch Lokˈlaj Jsantil chabˈ y jcwinel Kakaj Dios lecj jilon jpetic chabˈ chapcaˈ jmujal sutzˈ . Jwiˈliˈli ral awicˈlal ri tiqˈuisiˈy tibˈijsajiˈ chirij chi tosoliˈ pire Kakaj Dios y Jcˈajoliˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Jilon Elisabet ri awechˈelxic , riˈjlaj anmchak , re tina waˈxna jun ricˈlal winak y wiˈchak wakakibˈ ( 6 ) icˈ jcanic yaj anm onque tibˈijsaj chirij chi taˈ tiwaˈx ralcˈwal ,

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: jwiˈl Kakaj Dios taˈ ni jono kelen maˈ ticwin chi jbˈanic , xcheˈ anjl re María .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: María xij re anjl : Iniˈ rajchac Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl raneˈ chimbˈ chapcaˈ ri xabˈij , xcheˈ re anjl . Cuando María xijmaj jwiˈl jilonli , anjl xkˈajbˈic .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Laˈ mak kˈij li María laj or xeˈ li jun tilmit re Judea ri wiˈ lak qˈuicheˈlaj .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Cuando xtaw María laj richoch Zacarías xcˈam rutzil jwich Elisabet .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Cuando xta Elisabet nen mo jcˈamic rutzil jwich xansaj jwiˈl María , etke xsilibˈ ra neˈ laj jsantil y xnojsaj ranm Elisabet laˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Elisabet subˈlaj cow xchˈaˈwc , xij re María : Kakaj Dios xyaˈ jkˈabˈ chabˈ chiwchak juntir anm . Y xyaˈ jkˈabˈ chibˈ ral awicˈlal ri tiqˈuisiˈyc .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: ¿ Nencˈu incholajl in , inyuk solaj jwiˈl jchuch Wajawl ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Cuando xinta xacˈam rutzil inwch man ral inneˈ xsilibˈ laj jsantil jwiˈl jquiˈcotem .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Tzi awe jwiˈl xacojaˈ chi titawiˈ chiwch ri xijsaj chawe jwiˈl Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl , xcheˈ Elisabet re María .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Xpe María , xij : Nojel wanm tannimirsaj jcojic jkˈij Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: y subˈlaj tiquiˈcot insantil chirij Kakaj Dios ri ajcolol we ,

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: jwiˈl xrilaˈ cˈur jwich rajchac ri taˈ cojol jkˈij . Lajori juntir cristian tina jbˈijtakna chi tzi re , tina cheˈtakna chwij .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Kakaj Dios ri wiˈ subˈlaj jcwinel , subˈlaj kelen kus bˈanal chwe jwiˈl y subˈlaj nim jkˈij jbˈij .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Kakaj Dios taˈ ni jun bˈwelt miti tril cˈur jwichak juntir cristian ri nojel ranmak ticojontak chiwch .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Laˈ jcwinel Kakaj Dios xresaj jnoˈjak yak ri tijchomorsajtak laj ranmak chi nimakiˈ jkˈijak .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Y laˈ jcwinel xresaj rekleˈnak mak jbˈabˈaltak kˈatbˈitzij , xnimirsaj jkˈijak yak ri taˈ tijcoj jkˈijak .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Kakaj Dios xyeˈw tzitaklaj kelen rechak yak ri wiˈ wiˈjal rechak y xij rechak mak bˈiom chi tibˈetak y taˈ nen xyeˈbˈi rechak .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Kakaj Dios xtˈowaˈ yak rijajl Israel ri xanowtak lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios trantak . Xcuxtajiˈ jwiˈl chi rilic cˈur jwichak

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: chapcaˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl re Abraham pach juntir rijajl , xcheˈ María re Elisabet .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: María raj xwaˈxiˈ uxibˈ icˈ riqˈui Elisabet , ajrucˈreˈ xkˈaj chicch laj richoch .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Cuando xtaw kˈij xyeˈ Dios re Elisabet , xqˈuisiˈy jun ra ricˈlal winak .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Cuando xtatak yak jcˈulja pach yak rechˈelxic nen mo rilic cˈur jwich Elisabet xansaj jwiˈl Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl , subˈlaj xquiˈcottak riqˈui Elisabet .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Cuando xtzˈakat waxakibˈ ( 8 ) kˈij jqˈuisiˈy ra neˈ , xcojtak retal jtioˈjl y roj xcojtak jbˈij pi Zacarías chapcaˈ jbˈij jkaj .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Pero jchuch ra neˈ taˈ xyeˈ luwar xcojsaj jbˈij pi jilonli , xij : Maˈ jiˈtaˈlonli jbˈij tikacojwiˈ , tikacoj jbˈij pi Juan , xcheˈ .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Rechak xijtak re Elisabet : Pero taˈ ni jono rechak yak awechˈelxic Juan jbˈij , xcheˈtak .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Xantak retal re Zacarías laˈ jkˈabˈak chi jtzˈonaj re nen jbˈij ra neˈ tijcoj .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Zacarías xtzˈonaj jun kelen pire tijtzˈibˈaj chiwch nen jbˈij ra neˈ tijcojwiˈ y xtzˈibˈaj chi Juan jbˈij ra neˈ tijcoj . Y yak cristian xsaach jchˈolak chi jtaic nen jbˈij ra neˈ ticojsajwiˈ .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Laj or xel jyolj Zacarías y xoc chi jbˈixaj jnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Dios .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Y juntir yak jcˈulja subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak chi rilic juntir ri xaanc . Y juntir luwar ri wiˈ lak qˈuicheˈlaj re Judea xtatak jtaquil ri xaanc .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Juntir ri xtatak jtaquil tijtzˈonajtak chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Nen chiquiˈ tran ra neˈ li cuando tiwinakirc ? xcheˈtak . Jilonli tijbˈijtak chirij ra neˈ jwiˈl naˈliˈ chi Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl ri wiˈ jcwinel xanow juntir li .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Zacarías ri jkaj ra neˈ , xnojsaj ranm laˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios , xkˈasaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios , xij :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: ¡ Nimirsajok jkˈij Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl ri jDiosak yak rijajl Israel , jwiˈl xpetiˈ chi jcolic yak jwinak laj jkˈabˈ jmacak !

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Kakaj Dios xtakch jun ajcolol ke ri wiˈ subˈlaj jcwinel ri rijajl David , ri rajchac Kakaj Dios .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Ri ajcolol ke li , bˈilchakch jwiˈlak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios ojrtaktzij ri tosoltak re Kakaj Dios chi riˈ re tipe wich ulew chi kacolic .

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Bˈiliˈch ojrtaktzij jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi ojna jcolna laj jkˈabˈak yak ri ojcontrintak . Y ojna jcolna laj jkˈabˈak yak ri oj tijin ojjxuttak .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Y bˈiliˈch jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi trilaˈ cˈur jwichak kamam katitˈ ojrtaktzij . Y Kakaj Dios taˈ tisaach re ri jchomorsaˈn ri bˈanal jwiˈl .

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Riˈ ri xij Kakaj Dios re kamam Abraham ojrtaktzij , chi kes tzˈet tina ranna .

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: Xij chi ojna jcolna laj jkˈabˈak yak ri ojcontrintak pire maˈ titzaak kachˈol chi jbˈanic nen raj Kakaj Dios tikabˈantak

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: y pire tran sucˈul kanm chiwch nojel kˈij laj kacˈaslemal .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Y at incˈajol , tina bˈijsajna chawij chi atiˈ ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios lecj , jwiˈl at atnabˈer chiwch Kajawl chi jsucˈulbˈisaj jbˈe .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Y at tibˈe abˈij jtaquil rechak yak jwinak chi ticolmajtakaˈ laj jkˈabˈ jmacak jwiˈl ticuysajiˈ jmacak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Kakaj Dios jwiˈl subˈlaj tril cˈur kawch , tina jtaknach jun ajcolol ke laj jkˈabˈ kamac chapcaˈ ajriˈ relicch kˈij

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: pire tijcˈut jbˈeak yak ri wiˈtak li ukuˈmal jwiˈl jmacak . Re tijcˈut chikawch nen rajwax tikabˈantak pire tiwaˈx utzil laj kanm y chikaxoˈl , xcheˈ Zacarías .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Ral acˈl li tijin tiqˈuiy y tijin tretemaj mas jbˈanic lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tran . Y xeˈ waˈxok li jun luwar lamas taˈ cristian asta xtaw kˈij xoc chi jbˈanic lawiˈ ri xtaksaj jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi jbˈanic chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Laˈ mak kˈij li , Augusto César ri jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij re Roma , xtak jbˈij lak juntir tilmit ri titakon chibˈ chi rajwaxiˈ tiesaj jtzˈibˈalak juntir cristian .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Y riˈ nabˈe bˈwelt li xesaj jtzˈibˈalak cristian laˈ mak junabˈ cuando Cirenio wiˈ pire jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij re Siria .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Jilonli juntir cristian xeˈ jyeˈ jtzˈibˈalak laj jtilmitak .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Y jwiˈliˈli José ri rijajl David xelbˈi Nazaret ri jun tilmit re Galilea , xeˈ Belén ri jun tilmit re Judea ri jtilmit David

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: chi jyeˈic jtzˈibˈalak pach María ri quiek riqˈuil tina cˈuliˈyna y María yaj anmchak .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Y wiˈtak Belén cuando xtaw kˈij tijyeˈ Dios re María .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Y claˈ xqˈuisiˈy nabˈe ricˈlal winak . Xpe María , xpis ra neˈ li itzˈik y xtzˈebˈaˈ li jun canow re yeˈbˈi jloˈ awaj jwiˈl taˈ xtaˈtak jposadak li man bˈambˈi posad .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Wiˈ nicˈj ajyukˈ tikˈasintak akˈabˈ wich takˈj chi nakaj re tilmit Belén chi jchajaj jcarnerak .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Etke xwabˈaˈ ribˈ jun ranjl Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl chiwchak y xrepaj ribˈ jkˈakˈal jnimal jkˈij Kakaj Dios chirijak y subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Xpe anjl , xij rechak : Mi tzaak achˈolak , in ximpet pirechiˈ tiyuk imbˈij tzilaj jtaquil chawechak chi xyukiˈ jun nimlaj quiˈcotemal pire juntir cristian wich ulew .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Lajori xqˈuisiˈyiˈ jun ajcolol awechak ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew y riˈ Kajawl . Jiˈ xqˈuisiˈy Belén laj jtilmit David .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Cojtak retal nen mo jtaˈic man ra neˈ tabˈantak , naˈliˈ pisil li itzˈik y tzˈebˈal jwiˈl jchuch li jun canow re yeˈbˈi jloˈ awaj , xcheˈ anjl rechak yak ajyukˈ .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Cuando tijin anjl chi yoloj riqˈuilak yak ajyukˈ , etke xyuktak chic nicˈj anjl riqˈui anjl ri tijin tiyolow riqˈuilak yak ajyukˈ , jpeticak lecj , xbˈixajtak jnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Dios y laj jbˈixak xijtak :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: ¡ Nim jkˈij Kakaj Dios ri wiˈ chikabˈ lecj ! ¡ Tiyeˈsajiˈ jun nimlaj utzil laj ranmak juntir cristian wich ulew ri tzi tiilsajtak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios ! xcheˈtak yak anjl .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Cuando xkˈajtakbˈi yak anjl lecj , xpetak yak ajyukˈ xoctak chi jbˈij chiribˈil ribˈak : Joˈtak Belén , joˈ kileˈtak nen xijsaj chike . Kakaj Diosiˈ ri Kajawl xtakowch jbˈij chike , xcheˈtak .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ yak ajyukˈ li laj or xeˈtak y xeˈ jteˈtak María pach José y ra neˈ tzˈebˈal li jun canow re yeˈbˈi jloˈ awaj .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Cuando yak ajyukˈ xriltak ra neˈ , xoctak chi jyolic nen xijsaj rechak jwiˈl anjl chirij ra neˈ .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Y juntir yak ri xtatak ri tijbˈijtak yak ajyukˈ , subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak chi jtaic .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: María xwaˈxke laj ranm juntir ri xijsaj rechak y tike tijin tichomorsan chirij .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Y yak ajyukˈ cuando xkˈajtak tichak tijin tijbˈixajtak y tijin tijnimirsajtak jkˈij Kakaj Dios chi jcˈomowaj re juntir ri xyuk jteˈtak y xyuk rileˈtak , jwiˈl jilon xyuk jteˈtak chapcaˈ ri xijsaj rechak jwiˈl anjl .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Cuando xtzˈakat waxakibˈ ( 8 ) kˈij jqˈuisiˈy ra neˈ xcojsaj retal jtioˈjl y xcojsaj jbˈij pi Jesús chapcaˈ jbˈij ri xijsaj re María jwiˈl anjl Gabriel cuando ajquiˈ chi ran yaj anm .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Cuando xtzˈakat mak kˈij pire tran chˈajchˈoj jwich María chapcaˈ tijbˈij Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl xeˈtak li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios pach José pire tibˈe jacheˈtak Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: Jilon xantak chapcaˈ tzˈibˈal li wuj re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri : Juntir mak tra nabˈetak acˈl ri tiqˈuisiˈytak , ri winaktak , titosajtakaˈ pire Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl , ticheˈ .

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Xeˈtak chi jsujic mak tra caˈn re Kakaj Dios chapcaˈ tijbˈij Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl . Tijcˈamtakbˈi quibˈ tra ixmucur o quibˈ tra kˈun ut pire tijsujtak re Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Laˈ mak junabˈ li wiˈ jun riˈjlaj winak li tilmit Jerusalén , Simeón jbˈij . Simeón sucˈuliˈ ranm chiwch Kakaj Dios . Re tranaˈ juntir lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tran y tijin chi rulbˈej ajcolol rechak yak rijajl Israel . Simeón wiˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios laj ranm .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
