text2: Nicˈj chic xkejtak li tzilaj ulew y xqˈuiytakaˈn . Jujun íjaj xyaˈtakaˈ jujun cient ( 100 ) jwichak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak . Y cuando xijmaj jilonli jwiˈl , ajrucˈreˈ cow xchˈaˈw chic , xij : ¡ Nen titonc , jteˈ jcholajl ri tambˈij ! xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak cristian .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: Xpe yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xtzˈonajtak re Kakaj Jesús nen jcholajl tielwiˈ man esbˈi noˈj ri xij .

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Atak , Kakaj Dios xyaˈ retemaj chawechak jcholajl jtakon ri taˈ etemal , pero rechak taˈ xyeˈ luwar rechak tretemajtak . Pero pire mak nicˈj cristian chic ri taˈ tijcojtak Jyolj Kakaj Dios rajwaxna tambˈij esbˈitak noˈj rechak , jwiˈl rechak onque tinaˈtuntakaˈn , pero taˈ tijmajtak jcholajl nen tijin triltak . Tijtaˈtakaˈ nen tibˈijsaj rechak , pero taˈ tijtatak jcholajl nen tijin tijtatak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic : Jilonri jcholajl ri tielwiˈ man esbˈi noˈj ri ximbˈij . Ri jcholajl mak íjaj , riˈ Jyolj Kakaj Dios .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Ri bˈe lamas xkejtakwiˈ mak íjaj , riˈtakaˈ yak cristian ri tijtatak Jyolj Kakaj Dios , pero tipe man jbˈabˈal etzl tresaj chic laj ranmak pire maˈ tijyeˈ luwar rechak tijcojtak pire maˈ ticolmajtak laj jkˈabˈ jmacak .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: Man luwar lak abˈaj lamas xkejtakwiˈ mak íjaj , riˈtakaˈ yak cristian ri subˈlaj tiquiˈcottak chi jtaic Jyolj Kakaj Dios y tijcˈulaˈtakaˈn , pero taˈ tibˈe raˈ laj ranmak jwiˈl quibˈ uxibˈ kˈijke tijcojtak y cuando titakchiˈjtak jwiˈl man jbˈabˈal etzl chi macunc , tican jyeˈtak jcojic Jyolj Kakaj Dios .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Man luwar lak qˈuix ri lamas xkejwiˈ mak íjaj , riˈtakaˈ yak cristian ri tijcojtak Jyolj Kakaj Dios quibˈ uxibˈ kˈij , pero chi usil tisaach laj ranmak , riˈ tibˈe ranmak chirij kelen rechak pach jpwaakak y trantak lawiˈ rajak rechak trantak . Riˈ li tikˈatow jwich Jyolj Kakaj Dios pire taˈ tiwichin laj ranmak .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: Y man kuslaj ulew lamas xkejtakwiˈ mak íjaj , riˈtakaˈ yak cristian ri nojel ranmak tijcojtak Jyolj Kakaj Dios y tijtatak jcholajl y ticubˈar jchˈolak chi jbˈanic ri tijbˈij Jyolj Kakaj Dios . Jilonli nicˈ riqˈuil tiwichintakaˈn , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak jtakoˈn .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús xij chic : Taˈ ni jono cristian tijtzij jun candil pire tijyeˈ ralaj jono kelen o tijyeˈ ralaj chˈat . Jun cristian tijtzij jun candil pirechiˈ tijcocbˈaˈ lecj pire tijsakabˈsaj jbˈeak mak ri tioctak la ja .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Taˈ ni jono kelen ri tibˈansaj chi mukukil miti tina elna chi sakil .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: Atak , cojtak retal nen tijin tatatak jwiˈl nen wiˈ mas riqˈuil , tiyeˈsaj chiquiˈ mas re y nen taˈ re , asta ri tijchomorsaj chi wiˈ riqˈuil , timajsajiˈ re , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: Jchuch pach yak jkˈun Kakaj Jesús xtawtak lamas wiˈ Kakaj Jesús , pero taˈ tijnaˈ tioctak riqˈuil jwiˈl subˈlaj cristian xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak la ja chi jtaic jyolj .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Xpe jun rechak yak ri wiˈtak claˈ , xij re : Achuch pach yak akˈun wiˈtak chuchja y rajak atjchˈabˈejtak , xcheˈ re .

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Juntir cristian ri tijtatak Jyolj Kakaj Dios y trantak lawiˈ tijbˈij , riˈtakaˈ li inchuch pach inkˈun , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Jun kˈij Kakaj Jesús pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xtawtak chiˈ nimlaj alagun , Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Joˈtak chˈakap re nimlaj alagun , xcheˈ rechak . Jilonli xjawtak li barc y xeˈtak .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Cuando bˈesaltak bˈa jaˈ , Kakaj Jesús xeˈ jwarj . Y etke xpe jun quiekˈekˈ tew bˈa jaˈ , xoc chi ritzˈbˈej mak retumb re man nimlaj alagun y xoc jaˈ li man barc . Jwiˈliˈli tichak tijin tikej man barc ralaj jaˈ .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xeˈtak lamas tiwarwiˈ Kakaj Jesús y xbˈittak , xijtak re : ¡ Kajtijonl ! ¡ Kajtijonl ! ¡ Ojjikˈiˈ jwiˈl tijin tikej man barc ralaj jaˈ ! xcheˈtak re . Ajrucˈreˈ xbˈiit Kakaj Jesús , xkˈel man quiekˈekˈ tew y mak retumb re man nimlaj alagun , ajrucˈreˈ xkˈax quiekˈekˈ tew y xmay juntir .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xpe Kakaj Jesús , xtzˈonaj rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : ¿ Nen chac taˈ cubˈul achˈolak chwij ? xcheˈ rechak . Yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak y xsaach jchˈolak , xoctak chi jtzˈonaj chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Nen chiquiˈ jbˈanic winak ri , ri tijkˈel quiekˈekˈ tew pach mak retumb re nimlaj alagun y ticojontakaˈ chiwch ? xcheˈtak .

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xeltakbˈi Galilea , xkˈaxtakbˈi chˈakap re nimlaj alagun y xtawtak li man luwar ri jbˈij Gadara .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Ajriˈke xelch Kakaj Jesús li barc , laj or xpe jun winak aj Gadara riqˈuil . Man winak li qˈuilaj junabˈchak wiˈ etzl laj ranm , taˈ tijcoj ritzˈik jwiˈl chˈuˈjuric , taˈ tiwaˈx laj richoch y jiˈ jekel li camposant .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Man winak li , cuando xril jwich Kakaj Jesús xxucaj ribˈ chiwch , cow xchˈejej man etzl ri wiˈ laj ranm , xtzˈonaj re : ¿ Nen chawaj chwe Kaj Jesús , at Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios lecj ? ¡ Bˈan tokˈobˈ chwe , min achˈuˈjursaj ! xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: Man etzl li xij jilonli jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús xij re chi tielbˈi laj ranm man winak li . Re qˈuilaj bˈwelt tichˈuˈjursaj jwiˈl man etzl y qˈuilaj bˈwelt tiximsaj rakan y jkˈabˈ laˈ caden y tzi jchajaj trantak , riˈ rajak taˈ lamas tibˈeˈw . Pero jwiˈl jchokˈbˈ man etzl ri chˈuˈjursawinak re ticwiniˈ chi jkˈatzic mak caden y ticˈamsajbˈi lak luwar lamas taˈ cristian jwiˈl man etzl .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj re man etzl : ¿ Nen abˈj ? xcheˈ re . Y man etzl xij : Qˈui imbˈj , xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús . Man etzl xij jilonli re Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl subˈlaj qˈui ocsaltak laj ranm .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Y mak etzl li xtzˈonajtak tokˈobˈ re Kakaj Jesús chi taˈ taksajtakbˈi li xelebˈxan .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Y wiˈ subˈlaj aak tijin jyukˈicak wich witz , mak etzl xtzˈonajtak subˈlaj tokˈobˈ re Kakaj Jesús chi tiyeˈsaj luwar rechak tioctak laj jtioˈjlak mak aak li . Y Kakaj Jesús xyaˈ luwar rechak .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Mak etzl xeltak laj ranm man winak y xeˈ octak laj jtioˈjlak mak aak . Juntir mak aak xmajtak jol wich witz y xkejtakbˈi pi xulan asta xeˈ tzaaktak li nimlaj alagun , claˈ xjikˈtak .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Mak ajyukˈultak aak xelmajtak , xeˈtak li tilmit y lak luwar nakaj chi jyolic juntir ri xaanc .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Y mak cristian xeˈtak chi rilic ri xaanc . Cuando xtawtak lamas wiˈ Kakaj Jesús , xriltak man winak ri xesaj mak etzl laj ranm , cubˈulchak chiwch Kakaj Jesús . Cojolchak ritzˈik jwiˈl y taˈ chiquiˈ chˈuˈj . Rechak subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak chi rilic .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Mak cristian ri xiliwtak nen xan Kakaj Jesús re man winak ri xwaˈx mak etzl laj ranm , xyoltak rechak cristian ri xtawtak chi rilic .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Y ajrucˈreˈ juntir cristian re man luwar ri jbˈij Gadara , xtzˈonajtak tokˈobˈ re Kakaj Jesús chi tielbˈi claˈ jwiˈl subˈlaj jtzakic jchˈolak . Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xjaw chicbˈi li barc y xecˈ .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Xpe man winak ri xesaj mak etzl laj ranm , xtzˈonaj subˈlaj tokˈobˈ re Kakaj Jesús chi tibˈe chirij , pero Kakaj Jesús xij :

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: Kˈajen laj awichoch y yolta rechak cristian juntir ri nen xansaj chawe jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ re . Man winak li xecˈ y xyol rechak cristian li tilmit juntir ri nen xan Kakaj Jesús re .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús xkˈaj chic chˈakap re nimlaj alagun , juntir yak cristian claˈ subˈlaj tiquiˈcottak chi jcˈulic jwiˈl juntir cristian tijintak chi rulbˈejc .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Y xtaw jun winak riqˈuil ri jbˈij Jairo . Re riˈ jbˈabˈal man kˈat ri tijmulbˈaˈ ribˈak li sinagog . Re xxucbˈaˈ ribˈ chiwch Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj tokˈobˈ re chi tibˈe laj richoch ,

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: jwiˈl wiˈ jun jrabˈin yaj y xike jun jrabˈin wiˈ , raj wiˈ cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) junbˈ , camic tran . Kakaj Jesús cuando bˈesaltak li bˈe , bˈenam re chi rilic jrabˈin Jairo , subˈlaj tipitzˈsaj jwiˈl subˈlaj cristian ri bˈesaltak chirijak .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Y chijxoˈlak cristian bˈesaliˈ jun anm yaj ri wiˈchak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) junabˈ chi ticar cocˈxoˈlke tikej man chˈojnic chirij , pero ni jonok xcwin chi jcunajc .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Man anm li xjutun chirij Kakaj Jesús y xchap raquitz chakˈchiˈ ritzˈik Kakaj Jesús y laj or xtanar man chˈojnic chirij .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nen xinchapowc ? xcheˈ rechak . Juntir cristian taˈ tijbˈijtak nen xchapow re . Xpe Pedro , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Kajtijonl , yak cristianke atpitzˈowc y atjtucˈtak , xcheˈ Pedro re .

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic : In xwicˈajiˈ chi xintzibˈsajiˈ jun cristian laˈ incwinel , xcheˈ .

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Man anm li cuando xta chi xricˈajiˈ Kakaj Jesús , tichak querquen jwiˈl jtzakic jchˈol , xxucbˈaˈ ribˈ chiwch Kakaj Jesús y chiwchak juntir cristian xij nen chac xchap ritzˈik Kakaj Jesús y xij re chi xike cuando xchap ritzˈik , laj or xtanar man chˈojnic chirij .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : At inrabˈin , xattzibˈiˈ jwiˈl xcubˈar achˈol chwij , jat pi utzil , xcheˈ re .

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Aj tijiniˈ Kakaj Jesús chi yoloj riqˈui man anm li cuando xtaw chic jun takoˈn riqˈui Jairo y xij re : Xcamiˈ arabˈin . Taˈ chiquiˈ nen tichacuj talatzˈabˈsaj jwich sicˈ ajtijonl , xcheˈ re .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Pero cuando xta Kakaj Jesús jilonli , xij re Jairo : Mi tzaak achˈol , xike cubˈaˈ achˈol chwij , arabˈin titzibˈiˈn , xcheˈ re .

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Cuando xtawtak Kakaj Jesús la ja riqˈui Jairo , taˈ xyeˈ luwar xoctak jalan cristian riqˈuilak la ja , xike Pedro xcˈambˈi chirij pach Santiago , Juan y jkaj jchuch man ra anm .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Juntir cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ subˈlaj tijcamsaj ribˈak chi okˈej jwiˈl bˈis chirij ra anm . Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Mat okˈtak chirij ra anm , re taˈ camnak , warajke tran , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Rechak xtzeˈjtak jwich Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl xrilaˈtakaˈ chi xcamiˈ ra anm .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xchap chi jkˈabˈ ra anm y cow xchˈabˈejc , xij re : ¡ Noy bˈiiten ! xcheˈ re .

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Man ra anm xkˈajch jsantil y laj or xbˈiitc . Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij chi tijyeˈtak jwa ra anm .

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak jkaj jchuch chi rilic . Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xtzˈonaj tokˈobˈ rechak chi mi jyoltak nen xan re ra anm .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xmulbˈaˈ yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) jtakoˈn y xyeˈ cwinel rechak chi resaj juntir mak etzl ri wiˈ laj ranmak cristian y chi jtzibˈsaj cristian ri yajtak .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Xtaksajtakbˈi chi jbˈij Jyolj Kakaj Dios rechak cristian pire tretemajtak nen mo oquem laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈak y chi jtzibˈsaj cristian ri yajtak .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: Y xij rechak : Taˈ nen tacˈamtakbˈi pire laj abˈeak , taˈ tacˈamtakbˈi carot , ni chim , ni wa , ni pwak , ni awitzˈikak re jalbˈi awijak .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Cuando attawtak li jono ja li jun tilmit , waˈxentak claˈ ajriˈ ateltakbˈi claˈ cuando ateltakbˈi li man tilmit .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Y wi yak cristian li jono tilmit taˈ rajak atjcˈultak , elantakbˈi claˈ , can totojtak man pok laˈ awakanak pire cˈutbˈire chiwchak chi taˈ tzi xantak jwiˈl taˈ xatjcˈultak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ rechak xeltakbˈic , xeˈtak lak juntir mak tra luwar re mak tilmit , xeˈ jbˈijtak tzilaj jtaquil chirij Kakaj Jesucristo rechak juntir cristian y xcunajtak cristian ri yajtak .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Man rey Herodes Antipas xta jtaquil juntir ri tran Kakaj Jesús y taˈ retam nen chi cristian lal . Wiˈ jujun tibˈintak chi riˈ Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xcˈastasaj jwich laj jcamnakl xoˈlak camnakibˈ .

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: Y wiˈ jujun tibˈintak chi riˈ Elías ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri xyuk chic wich ulew y wiˈ chiquiˈ jujun tibˈintak chi riˈ jono rechak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri xcamtak ojrtaktzij ri xcˈastasaj jwich laj jcamnakl .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Herodes Antipas xij : Pero in xintakow resaj jbˈa Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox . ¿ Nen chiquiˈ chi cristian lal man jun li ri subˈlaj jtaquil tijin tanta chirij ri tijin tran ? xcheˈ . Y jwiˈliˈli Herodes Antipas rajti ranm tril jwich Kakaj Jesús .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Cuando xkˈajtakch yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) jtakoˈn Kakaj Jesús , xyoltak re Kakaj Jesús nen xantak . Y xcˈamsajtakbˈi pi ricˈanak jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús li tilmit Betsaida .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Pero cuando cristian xtatak chi xiˈtakaˈ li man tilmit li , xambˈertakbˈi chirijak y xcˈulsajtakaˈ pi quiˈcotemal jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús y xyeˈsaj jtaquil Jyolj Kakaj Dios rechak pire tretemajtak nen mo oquem laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈak y xtzibˈsaj yak ri yajtak .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Cuando xeˈ kˈij xpetak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) jtakoˈn Kakaj Jesús , xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Qˈuis ayolj riqˈuilak cristian y bˈij rechak chi tibˈe jtoqueˈ jposadak , tibˈe jlokˈeˈ jwaak li mak tilmit y li mak ja ri wiˈ chi nakaj , jwiˈl neri taˈ kelen ticˈayaj , xcheˈtak re .

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Yeˈtak jwaak atak , xcheˈ rechak . Rechak xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Pero taˈ nen wiˈ kiqˈuil , xike jobˈ chi cuxlanwa pach quibˈ chi car . ¿ Toncˈu bˈe kalokˈeˈna subˈlaj cuxlanwa pire juntir cristian ri ? xcheˈtak re .

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui cristian wiˈtak claˈ , wiˈtakaˈ raj jobˈ mil ( 5 , 000 ) chi winak . Kakaj Jesús xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Bˈijtak rechak cristian chi ticubˈartak y tijcˈam ribˈak pitak caˈwinak lajuj ( 50 ) ribˈilak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Y jilon xantak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij pire xcubˈartak juntir cristian .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xcˈam mak jobˈ cuxlanwa laj jkˈabˈ pach mak quibˈ car , xnaˈtun lecj y xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios . Ajrucˈreˈ xqˈuer mak cuxlanwa y xyeˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij pire tijjachtak chiwchak juntir cristian .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Juntir cristian xwiˈntak asta xnojtak . Y cuando xcolajtak , xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xnojsajtakna cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) chicach chi qˈuertak cuxlanwa pach car ri taˈ xqˈuisc .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Li jun kˈij tijin Kakaj Jesús chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios y xike yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij wiˈtak riqˈuil , xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nencˈu in ri tijbˈijtak cristian ? xcheˈ rechak .

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Rechak xijtak re : Wiˈ jujun tijbˈijtak chi atiˈ Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , jujun chic tijbˈijtak chi atiˈ Elías y jujun chic tijbˈijtak chi atiˈ jun rechak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios ojrtaktzij ri xcˈastasaj jwich laj jcamnakl , xcheˈtak re .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Y xtzˈonaj rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Rucˈ atak , ¿ nencˈu in tabˈij atak ? xcheˈ rechak . Pedro xij re Kakaj Jesús : Atiˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , xcheˈ re .

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij chi mi jyoltak rechak cristian ri xtatak .

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Y xij rechak : Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tina bˈansajna cˈax re , tina xutsajna jwiˈlak yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel y jwiˈlak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios y jwiˈlak yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios . Tina camsajna , pero tina cˈastasajna jwich laj jcamnakl laj jrox kˈij , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak juntir cristian : Wi wiˈ jonok raj tioc pi ajtijol ribˈ chwij , rajwaxiˈ jkˈeleˈ ribˈ chi jbˈanic lawi ri raj re tran . Rajwaxiˈ tina jtijna cˈax laj jcˈaslemal y tixambˈer chwij .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Nen jono cristian taˈ raj tijyeˈ ribˈ pi camic jwiˈlke tran lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tran , tisaachiˈ jwich , pero nen tijyeˈ ribˈ pi camic inwiˈl in , ticolmajiˈn .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Taˈ nen tichacuj jwiˈl jun cristian trechbˈej juntir kelen re wich ulew wi pi reke tisaach jwich .

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Wi wiˈ jono cristian tiqˈuixibˈ inwiˈl y tiqˈuixibˈ jwiˈl inyolj , jilon Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , tiqˈuixibˈiˈ jwiˈl cuando tipe chic subˈlaj nim jkˈij y nicˈ jnimal jkˈij pach Jkaj pach jnimal jkˈij yak anjl ri tosol pire re .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi wiˈ jujun rechak cristian ri wiˈtak neri , taˈ ticamtak asta tina riltakna jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Raj waxakibˈ ( 8 ) kˈij jbˈij jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús jilonli , xcˈambˈi Pedro , Juan y Santiago bˈa jun witz chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Cuando tijin tichˈaˈw Kakaj Jesús riqˈui Kakaj Dios xjalmaj rilic y ritzˈik xan sakbˈot y tikopoponc .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Etke xriltak quibˈ winak tijintak chi yoloj riqˈui Kakaj Jesús , riˈtakaˈ Moisés pach Elías .

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Subˈlaj tikopopon ritzˈikak y tijin tijyoltak nen mo jkˈajic Kakaj Jesús lecj ri tawem tran chiwch , ri tina bˈanna re li tilmit Jerusalén .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Pedro pach yak jpach subˈlaj cˈax waraj rechak , pero taˈ xwartak , jwiˈliˈli xriltak chi subˈlaj tikopopon rijak Kakaj Jesús pach yak quibˈ winak ri wiˈtak riqˈuil .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Cuando elamchak trantakbˈi yak winak riqˈui Kakaj Jesús , xpe Pedro , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Kajtijonl , jor tzi wojtak neri , tikabˈan uxibˈ chinam , jun pi awe at , jun pi re Moisés y jun pi re Elías , xcheˈ re . Pero Pedro taˈ retam wi tzi o taˈ tzi tijin tijbˈij .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Aj tijiniˈ Pedro chi jbˈij jilonli , cuando xpe jun sutzˈ , xchˈuk rijak . Subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo cuando xchˈuksaj rijak jwiˈl sutzˈ .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Riˈchak xtatak xaanch jun chˈaˈwem li sutzˈ , xij : Riˈ ri incˈajol , ri chaˈl inwiˈl , tatak jyolj , xcheˈ .

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Cuando xtatak jilonli , xriltak Kakaj Jesús ricˈanchak . Rechak xwaˈxke laj ranmak , taˈ ni jono quiek re xyoltak nen xriltak .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Laj jcabˈ kˈij cuando xkejtakch bˈa witz , subˈlaj qˈui cristian xpetak chi jcˈulic Kakaj Jesús .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Y wiˈ jun winak chijxoˈlak mak cristian subˈlaj cow xchˈaˈwc , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Ajtijonl , bˈan tokˈobˈ chwe , il incˈajol , xike jun incˈajol li wiˈ .

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: Xoc jun etzl laj ranm . Etke tichˈejej , tijyeˈ quiekˈekˈ re , tiputzuw laj jchiˈ y taˈ tican yeˈsaj jwiˈl man etzl .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Xintzˈonajiˈ tokˈobˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chawij chi tresajtak man etzl , pero taˈ xcwintak chi resajc , xcheˈ man winak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : ¡ Atak cristian ri taˈ cubˈul achˈolak chirij Kakaj Dios y xike tabˈantak etzltak noˈj ! ¿ Jurubˈcˈu kˈij rajwax inwaˈxna aacˈlak pire ticubˈar achˈolak chwij ? ¿ Jurubˈcˈu kˈij rajwax atna incuytakna jwiˈl taˈ ticubˈar achˈolak chwij ? xcheˈ rechak . Y xij re man winak : Cˈamch acˈajol neri , xcheˈ re .

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Pero cuando tawem tran man cˈojol winak riqˈui Kakaj Jesús xtˈojsaj lak ulew jwiˈl man etzl y xyeˈ jun quiekˈekˈ re . Pero Kakaj Jesús xkˈel man etzl , xtzibˈsaj man cˈojol winak y xjach re jkaj .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Juntir cristian xsaach jchˈolak chi rilic jcwinel Kakaj Dios . Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij :

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: Tatak jcholajl ri tambˈij : Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tina jachsajna laj jkˈabˈak mak cristian , xcheˈ rechak .

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Pero yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij taˈ xtatak jcholajl nen tielwiˈ , jwiˈl ajquiˈ chi yeˈsaj luwar rechak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi retemaj jcholajl . Y titzaak jchˈolak chi jtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús nen jcholajl tielwiˈ ri xijsaj rechak .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xoctak chi jyolic chiribˈil ribˈak nen rechak mas nim jkˈij .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Kakaj Jesús retamiˈ nen tijin tijchomorsaj laj ranmak , jwiˈliˈli xcˈam jun ral acˈl y xwabˈaˈ riqˈuil y xij rechak :

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: Nen tijcˈul laj imbˈj , jun ri taˈ tijcoj jkˈij chapcaˈ man ral acˈl ri , iniˈ injcˈul . Nen incˈuluw in , riˈ tijcˈul ri xintakowch . Jwiˈliˈli nen ri taˈ cojol jkˈij , riˈ re mas nim jkˈij , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: Xpe Juan , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Kajtijonl , xkilaˈ jun winak tijin tresaj mak etzl laj ranm cristian laj abˈj . Oj xkakˈelaˈn , jwiˈl maˈ kapach taˈn , xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Ma kˈeltak jwiˈl nen taˈ atcontrintak , riˈ jun aacˈlak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Cuando tawem tran mak kˈij re ticˈamsajbˈi Kakaj Jesús lecj , xcoj jcowil ranm , xeˈ Jerusalén .

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: Cuando bˈesaltak lak bˈe xtakbˈi yak jtakoˈn li jun luwar re Samaria pire tibˈe jtoqueˈtak lamas tiwaˈxtakwiˈ .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: Pero yak cristian aj Samaria taˈ rajak xcˈultak jwiˈl retamakiˈ chi bˈenamiˈ re Jerusalén .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Yak quibˈ ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , Santiago pach Juan cuando xriltak chi jilonli xansaj rechak , xtzˈonajtak re Kakaj Jesús : Kajawl , ¿ chawajniˈ tikatzˈonaj re Kakaj Dios lecj chi tijtakch kˈakˈ chapcaˈ xan Elías pire ticˈatsaj juntir mak cristian ri ? xcheˈtak re .

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xsolcopij ribˈ chi rilicak , xkˈelonc y xij rechak : Atak taˈ awetamak nen chi santil titakon chabˈak .

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil taˈ xpe chi jsachic jwichak cristian , re chi jcolicakiˈ xpetc , xcheˈ rechak . Y xantajtakbˈi pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xeˈtak li jun jalan luwar chic .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Cuando bˈesaltak lak bˈe , xpe jun winak , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Chwaj imbˈe chawij lamas atbˈeˈw , xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Mak utiw wiˈ jjulak y mak tzˈiquin wiˈ jsocak , pero Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil taˈ lamas tijtzˈebˈaˈwiˈ jbˈa , xcheˈ re .

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Y xij chic re jun chic : Joˈ chwij , xcheˈ re . Pero man winak xij re : Wajawl , yeˈ luwar chwe tibˈe immukeˈna inkaj nabˈe , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Can yeˈtak mak camnak jmukeˈna jcamnakak , pero at bˈijta Jyolj Kakaj Dios rechak cristian pire tretemajtak nen mo tioctak laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈak , xcheˈ re .

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Xpe chic jun , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Kajawl , in chwaj imbˈe chawij , pero yeˈ luwar chwe tibˈe inchˈabˈejtakna yak wechˈelxic laj wichoch nabˈe , xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Nen jonok tioc li chac chirij wacx chapalchak man arad jwiˈl y tinaˈtun chic chirij , taˈ tzi . Y jilon jun cristian ri raj tran lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios y tijquibˈaj ranm , taˈ tzi pire tioc lamas titakonwiˈ Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian , xcheˈ re .

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Cuando xantaj li , Kakaj Jesús ri Kajawl xchaˈ oxcˈal cabˈlajuj ( 72 ) yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij pire tijtakbˈi pi cacabˈ ribˈilak bˈak tilmit y lak luwar lamas tina bˈena .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Subˈlaj nim man ticoˈn toquem raj jwich , pero quibˈ uxibˈke mak mocom . Atak tzˈonajtak tokˈobˈ re Rajw ticoˈn chi tijtakch mocom chi jtoquic jwichak mak ticoˈn .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Jattak , atintaktakbˈi lak jaljojtak luwar , tambˈan chawechak chapcaˈ jtakic carner chijxoˈlak mak utiw .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Taˈ tacˈamtakbˈi achimak , ni cˈolbˈi apwaakak , ni axajbˈak y mat waˈrtak chi yoloj lak bˈe pire maˈ atbˈaymajtak .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: Cuando atoctak li jono ja , nabˈe tacˈamtak rutzil jwichak cristian y tabˈijtak rechak : Atak juntir ri watak la ja neri , waˈxok utzil laj awanmak , atcheˈtak rechak .

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Wi wiˈ jono cristian claˈ ticˈular pire tijcˈul utzil laj ranm , ri utzil ri tzˈonal awiˈlak ticaniˈ riqˈuil , pero wi taˈ ni jono cristian claˈ ticˈular pire tijcˈul utzil laj ranm , tikˈaj chiquiˈch aacˈlak .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Waˈxentak la ja claˈ , tijtak wa pach jaˈ ri tiyeˈsaj chawechak , jwiˈl jun mocom pi jcholajliˈ titojsaj . Mat woˈcottak chakˈja .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: Cuando attawtak li tilmit lamas atcˈulsajtak pi utzil tijtak lawiˈ ri tiyeˈsaj chawechak chi tijem .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Tzibˈsajtak yak cristian ri yajtak ri wiˈtak claˈ y bˈij rechak : Raquitzchak raj tijchˈol takon Kakaj Dios chabˈak , atcheˈtak rechak .

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: Pero wi attawtak li jono tilmit y taˈ atcˈulsajtak pi utzil , elantakbˈi li bˈe re man tilmit li y bˈijtak rechak :

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Mak jpokal atilmitak ri xnacˈarbˈi laˈ kakan , ticaniˈ katotoj pire cˈutbˈire chawchak chi taˈ tzi xabˈantak xojaxuttak . Pero cojtak retal chi raquitzchak raj tijchˈol takon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian , atcheˈtak rechak .

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: In tambˈij chawechak cuando titaw kˈij tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian wich ulew , mak cristian li masna cˈax kˈatbˈitzij tibˈan chibˈak chiwch xan chibˈak mak cristian aj Sodoma , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : ¡ Cˈur awchak atak aj Corazín ! ¡ Cˈur awchak atak aj Betsaida ! Jwiˈl witi jiˈ xansaj mak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios riqˈuilak yak cristian aj Tiro pach Sidón ri xansaj aacˈlak , ojrteneˈreˈ xqˈuex jnoˈjak y xcojaˈtakteneˈreˈ kˈektaklaj itzˈik roj xtilaˈtakteneˈreˈ chaaj laj jbˈaak pire cˈutbˈire chi tibˈisontakaˈ jwiˈl jmacak .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: Pero cuando tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian wich ulew , atak masna cˈax kˈatbˈitzij tibˈan chabˈak chiwchak mak cristian aj Tiro y aj Sidón .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Y atak aj Capernaúm , riˈ chachˈolak chi atcˈamsajtakaˈbˈi riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj , pero jiˈcˈuneˈ atcˈamsajtakbˈi li man luwar ri lamas ticˈolsaj jsantilak camnakibˈ .

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: Nen tijta ayoljak , iniˈ injtatak y nen atxutuwtak , iniˈ injxuttak y nen inxutuw in , riˈ tijxut ri intakowinakch wich ulew , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: Yak oxcˈal cabˈlajuj ( 72 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo cuando xkˈajtakch , subˈlaj tiquiˈcottak , xijtak : Kajawl , asta mak etzl xcojontakaˈ chikawch laj abˈj , xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Tzˈetiˈn , in xwilaˈ man jbˈabˈal etzl xtzaakch lecj .

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: In xinyaˈ kˈatbˈitzij laj akˈbˈak pire wi tayakˈtak mak cumatz pach mak sinaˈj taˈ nen trantak chawechak y xinyaˈ kˈatbˈitzij laj akˈbˈak pire atchˈecontak chibˈ jcwinel man jbˈabˈal etzl y taˈ tibˈansaj cˈax chawechak .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Pero mat quiˈcottak jwiˈl ticojon mak etzl chawchak . Riˈ quiˈcotentak jwiˈl tzˈibˈalchak abˈjak li wuj riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj , xcheˈ rechak .

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Laˈ man or li subˈlaj nojsal ranm Kakaj Jesús chi quiˈcotemal jwiˈl Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios , xij : Tannimirsaj akˈij at Inkaj , ri Rajawl caj pach ulew jwiˈl at taˈ xayeˈ luwar rechak yak ri wiˈ jnoˈjak chi tretemajtak jcholajl nen xabˈij . Pero xayaˈ luwar xretemajtak yak cristian ri jilon jnoˈjak chapcaˈ mak tral acˈl . Jiloniˈ Kaj , jwiˈl jilon chawaj , xcheˈ .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re cristian : Inkaj xjachaˈ juntir laj inkˈbˈ . Taˈ ni jonok retam nen tran Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , xike Kakaj Dios y taˈ ni jonok retam nen tran Kakaj Dios , xike Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios pach yak cristian ri lawiˈ raj Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios tijyeˈ retemaj rechak , xcheˈ .

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Y xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Tzi rechak yak cristian ri triltak lawiˈ ri tijin tawil atak .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Tambˈij chawechak chi wiˈ subˈlaj ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios pach mak rey rajak roj xrileˈtak ri tijin tawiltak lajori , pero taˈ xriltak . Rajak roj xtatak lawiˈ ri tijin tatatak lajori , pero taˈ xtatak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Li jun kˈij , jun rechak yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios xeˈ riqˈui Kakaj Jesús . Riˈ raj tijta nen tibˈijsaj re pire tijcojtak tzij chirij , xtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús : Ajtijonl , ¿ nen rajwax tambˈan pire tantaˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic ? xcheˈ re .

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj re man winak li : ¿ Nencˈu tzˈibˈal li wuj re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios ? ¿ Nencˈu jcholajl tiel chawch at ? xcheˈ re .

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Man winak li xij chic re Kakaj Jesús : Lokˈaj Akaj Dios ri Awajawl riqˈui nojel awanm y xike chomorsaj chirij Kakaj Dios y bˈan riqˈui nojel awanm lawiˈ raj tabˈan y lokˈaj awijl atzˈakt chapcaˈ jlokˈaj aybˈ at tabˈan , xcheˈ .

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Tzˈetiˈ xabˈij . Wi tabˈan juntir li , tataˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic , xcheˈ re .

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Man ajtijol cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios xan chapcaˈ taˈ retam jcholajl , xtzˈonaj re : ¿ Nencˈu wijl intzˈakt ? xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Wiˈ jun winak xelbˈi Jerusalén bˈenam re Jericó , xelch nicˈj alkˈom chirij , xkˈattak jbˈe , xresajtak juntir ritzˈik , xsecˈtak y xsoctak . Cuando xriltak camicchak re sicˈ winak , ajrucˈreˈ xcan jyeˈtak .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Y laˈ man bˈe li bˈesal jun ajcˈamal jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , pero cuando xril chi tobˈol sicˈ winak li bˈe , xcot jbˈe , naj xkˈaxwiˈ re , xecˈ .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Y bˈesal chic jun rijajl Leví . Re xril chi tobˈol sicˈ winak li bˈe , xcot jbˈe , naj xkˈaxwiˈ , xecˈ .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: Y ajrucˈreˈ bˈesal chic jun winak aj Samaria laˈ man bˈe li , cuando xtaw chijcˈulel sicˈ winak tobˈol li bˈe , subˈlaj xril cˈur jwich .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Xjutun chijcˈulel chi rilic nen cˈax re y xoc chi jcunaj mak soqueˈl laˈ aceit olivo , laˈ vin y xpis jwich mak soqueˈl y xyeˈbˈi chirij jcwaˈy y xcˈambˈi li jun bˈambˈi posad y xwaˈx jun akˈabˈ chi jchajajc .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Cuando xsakarsan laj jcabˈ kˈij , xecˈ , xcan jyeˈ quibˈ denario re man rajw posad y xij re : Bˈan tokˈobˈ , tacunaj sicˈ winak ri y tachajaj y wi wiˈ mas pwak tasach chirij , mat oc il re . In tiyukiˈ intojeˈ chawe cuando inkˈaj chicch , xcheˈ re .

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj re man ajtijol cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios : ¿ Nencˈu rechak mak uxibˈ chi cristian li ri rijl jtzˈakt sicˈ winak ri xansaj cˈax re jwiˈl mak alkˈom ? xcheˈ re .

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Man ajtijol cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios xij re Kakaj Jesús : Riˈ man jun ri xiliw cˈur jwich , xcheˈ re . Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Jat y bˈan at chapcaˈ xan man winak li , xcheˈ re man ajtijol cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xeˈ chic pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij y xtaw li jun tilmit . Li man tilmit li xcˈulsaj la ja jwiˈl jun anm ri jbˈij Marta .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Y Marta wiˈ chiquiˈ jun jkˈun jbˈij María . María xcubˈar riqˈui Kakaj Jesús chi jtaic nen tijbˈij .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Pero Marta taˈ xan jilonli jwiˈl subˈlaj latzˈ jwich chi jbˈanic ropis . Marta xeˈ riqˈui Kakaj Jesús y xtzˈonaj re : Kajawl , ¿ kuskecˈu tawil xincan yeˈsaj wicˈan chi jbˈanic wopis jwiˈl inkˈun ? Bˈijcoˈ re chi injtˈoˈw , xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús xij re Marta : Marta , Marta , subˈlaj atoc il chirij awopis ,

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: pero junke chi kelen mas rajwax tibˈansajc , riˈ xan María lawiˈ mas rajwax tibˈansajc y taˈ nen tiesaj re , xcheˈ re Marta .

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Jun kˈij Kakaj Jesús xoc chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios li jun luwar . Cuando xmay chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios xpe jun rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xij re : Kajawl , cojatijoj chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios chapcaˈ Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xtijojiˈ yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xcheˈ re .

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Cuando atchˈaˈwtak riqˈui Kakaj Dios bˈijtak jilonri : At , Kakaj Dios , wat lecj chi jnimirsajti jcojic jkˈij abˈj . Petok attakon chibˈak juntir cristian . Y lawiˈ chawaj tabˈan wich ulew , bˈan jilon chapcaˈ tabˈan lecj .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Yeˈ kaw nojel kˈij .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Cuy kamac riqˈui mak etzltak noˈj ri tikabˈan chawch chapcaˈ oj tikacuyaˈ jmacak yak cristian ri tibˈanowtak cˈax chike . Ma yeˈ luwar re man jbˈabˈal etzl ojtakchiˈj chi jbˈanic etzltak noˈj . Cojacoleˈ laj jkˈabˈ man jbˈabˈal etzl , atcheˈtak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Y xij chic rechak : Wi wiˈ jono chawechak wiˈ jono richcˈulchiˈ y titaw laj richoch nicˈaj akˈabˈ , tijbˈij re : Bˈan tokˈobˈ chwe injaleˈ uxibˈ incuxlanwa chawe

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: jwiˈlke wiˈ jun wichcˈulchiˈ ajriˈ xyuk , jpetic chinaj . Xtaw wiqˈuil la ja lajori y taˈ nen tanyeˈ re , ticheˈ re .

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: Y man ri wiˈ la ja taˈ tibˈiit chi rilic , xike tijbˈijch re : Ma wesaj kawarj xiˈ akˈabˈ y tzˈapiliˈ man ja . Y in pach yak walcˈwal tzˈeˈlcojchak , taˈ tijnaˈ imbˈiit chi jyeˈic jono kelen chawe , ticheˈ re .

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: In tambˈij chawechak mineˈ tibˈiit chi jyeˈic re onque richcˈulchiˈyiˈn , tina jtana chi taˈ tijmay jtzˈonaj re , tiqˈuistaj ranm chi jtaic . Ajrucˈreˈ tibˈiit chi jyeˈic juntir nen rajwax re .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli in tambˈij chawechak : Tzˈonajtak re Kakaj Dios nen chawajak y re tijyaˈ chawechak . Toctak , tataˈtakaˈn . Chˈaˈwentak chiˈ pwert y titebˈajiˈ ja chawchak .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Jwiˈl nen titzˈonin re Kakaj Dios nen raj , tiyeˈsajiˈ re y nen titocow , tijtaˈn y nen tichˈaˈw chiˈ pwert , titebˈajiˈ ja chiwch .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: Atak kaj , taˈ ni jun chawechak , cuando tijtzˈonaj car acˈajol , taˈ tayeˈ cumatz re chi tijem .

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Taˈ tayeˈ sinaˈj chi tijem re acˈajol cuando tijtzˈonaj sakmolbˈ chawe .

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Atak , onque taˈ tzi anoˈjak , awetamakiˈ tayeˈtak tzitaklaj kelen re awalcˈwalak chi tijem y riˈticˈu chic Kakaj Dios lecj maˈ tijyeˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil rechak nen titzˈonin re , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Jun kˈij Kakaj Jesús tijin chi resaj jun etzl laj ranm jun sicˈ winak ri xanow mem re y cuando xel man etzl laj ranm sicˈ mem , xoc chi yoloj y subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak cristian chi rilic .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Wiˈ jujun cristian xijtak chirij Kakaj Jesús : Man winak li tresajiˈ mak etzl ri wiˈtak laj ranmak cristian , pero laˈ jcwinel Beelzebú ri man jbˈabˈalak mak etzl , xcheˈtak .

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Nicˈj cristian chic riˈ rajak triltak wi kes tzˈet Kakaj Diosiˈ takowinakch re , xijtak re chi tran jono cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ri tipe lecj .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús retamiˈ nen tijin tijchomorsajtak , xij rechak : Juntir kˈatbˈitzij , wi tijtos ribˈak y tioctak chi chˈoˈj chiribˈil ribˈak , tisaachiˈ jwichak . Y yak echˈelxic li jun ja , wi tijjach ribˈak y tioctak chi chˈoˈj chiribˈil ribˈak taˈ naj tijcuytak jilonli .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Y jiˈcˈulonli tran man jbˈabˈal etzl wi tijtos ribˈ chiribˈil ribˈ , tisaachiˈ jwich jkˈatbˈitzij . Jilonli tambˈij jwiˈl atak tabˈijtak chi in laˈyiˈ jcwinel Beelzebú twesajbˈi mak etzl .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Wi laˈyiˈ jcwinel Beelzebú twesaj mak etzl laj ranmak cristian , ¿ nencˈu yeˈwinak jcwinelak yak ajtijol ribˈak chawijak pire tresajtak mak etzl laj ranmak cristian ? Riˈ rechak li tibˈintak chawechak chi atak sachalcatakaˈn .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Pero wi in twesaj mak etzl laj ranmak cristian laˈ jcwinel Kakaj Dios , riˈ li ticˈutuw chi jtakon Kakaj Dios chabˈak xyukiˈ aacˈlak .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: Cuando jun winak wiˈ jchokˈbˈ y wiˈ colbˈi ribˈ laj jkˈabˈ , tijchajajiˈ richoch y juntir kelen re ri cˈolan jwiˈl , taˈ nen tioc re .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Pero wi tipe jono chic ri wiˈ mas jcwinel chic chiwch re ticwiniˈ chirij man jun y tijmaj man colbˈi ribˈ ri cubˈul jchˈol chirij y tijjach kelen re chiwchak mak jpach .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: Nen taˈ tzi tril ri tambˈan , riˈ li incontrinc . Nen taˈ injtˈoˈ chi jmulbˈaj jwichak cristian , riˈ re tiuktambˈi rechak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Cuando jun etzl tiel laj ranm jun cristian , tibˈe lak chekej luwar , tijtoc lamas tiuxlanwiˈ , pero cuando taˈ tijtaˈ jono luwar lamas tiuxlanwiˈ , tijbˈij : Inkˈaj chic laj wichoch lamas xinelwiˈch , ticheˈ .

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Y cuando tikˈaj chic man etzl li , tiyuk jteˈ man cristian ri lamas xelbˈi chapcaˈ rilic jun ja , tzi jmesic jpam y tzi jbˈanic jwaˈxc .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Tipe man etzl li , tibˈe jcˈameˈch wukubˈ ( 7 ) jpach chic ri masna etzl jnoˈjak chiwch re y juntir ribˈilak tioctak laj ranm man cristian li . Y man cristian li tran chic mas etzl jnoˈj chiwch ojr , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Cuando tijin Kakaj Jesús chi jbˈij juntir li , xpe jun anm , ri wiˈ chijxoˈlak juntir cristian subˈlaj cow xchˈejejc , xij re : Tzi re anm ri xalcˈwalan awe y xatqˈuitzanc , xcheˈ .

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús xij re : Riˈ mas tzi rechak cristian ri tijtatak Jyolj Kakaj Dios y trantak nen tijbˈij , xcheˈ re man anm .

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Cuando tijin tijmulbˈaˈ ribˈak mas cristian chirij Kakaj Jesús , re xchol yoloj riqˈuilak , xij rechak : Yak cristian re mak junabˈ lajori maschak etzl jnoˈjak , rajak tijtzˈonajtak tibˈan jono cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios chiwchak , pero chiwchak mak cristian li taˈ chiquiˈ tibˈansaj jono cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios , xike ri xansaj chirij Jonás .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Jilon chapcaˈ Jonás re riˈ jun retal pi rechak mak cristian ojr ri wiˈtak Nínive y jilon Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil riˈ jun retal pi rechak juntir cristian ri wiˈtak lajori , xcheˈ rechak .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Y man anm ri xwaˈx pire reina re man luwar ri wiˈ li sur , re tipetiˈ cuando tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian ri wiˈtak lajori . Y tina yuk jtzˈonajna kˈatbˈitzij chibˈak juntir mak cristian li , jwiˈl subˈlaj najiˈ xpeˈw pire xyuk chi jtaic jnoˈj Salomón . Lajori neri chaxoˈlak wiˈ jun masna jnoˈj chiwch Salomón .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Yak cristian aj Nínive tina jbˈitna ribˈak pire tijtzˈonajtakna kˈatbˈitzij chibˈak mak cristian ri wiˈtak lajori , jwiˈl rechak xqˈuexaˈ jnoˈjak cuando xijsaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios rechak jwiˈl Jonás . Lajori neri chaxoˈlak wiˈ jun masna nim jkˈij chiwch Jonás , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Taˈ ni jono cristian tijtzij jun candil y tijyeˈ li jun luwar ri taˈ naˈlc o tijyeˈ ralaj jun cax . Jun cristian tijtzij jun candil jiˈ tijcocbˈaˈ lecj pire tijsakabˈsaj jbˈeak yak ri tioctak la ja .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Bˈakˈ awch riˈ jun candil pire atioˈjl , wi tzi bˈakˈ awch , juntir atioˈjl wiˈ chi sak . Pero wi taˈ tzi bˈakˈ awch , juntir atioˈjl wiˈ li ukuˈmal .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Tike acwentij aybˈ pire acandil re atioˈjl taˈ tran ukuˈm jwich .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Wi wiˈ jkˈakˈal acandil re juntir atioˈjl , taˈ ni junquitz canal li ukuˈmal , juntir atioˈjl wiˈ chi sakil , jilon chapcaˈ jun candil tijsakabˈsajiˈ la ja laˈ jkˈakˈal , xcheˈ rechak cristian .

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Cuando xmay yoloj Kakaj Jesús riqˈuilak , xpe jun rechak mak fariseo xij re chi tibˈe wiˈn riqˈuil laj richoch . Kakaj Jesús xoc laj richoch y xcubˈar chiˈ mex .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Man fariseo li xsaach jchˈol chi rilic Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl taˈ xchˈaj jkˈabˈ nabˈe pire tijtij jwa chapcaˈ jcˈutuˈnak rechak .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli xpe Kakaj Jesús ri Kajawl , xij rechak : Atak fariseo , pur atak mak vas y mak lak ri chˈajal rij , pero tzˈil jpam jwiˈl alkˈanc y mak etzltak raybˈl ri tabˈantak .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Atak , pur atak jip chi chˈabˈejem , ¿ taˈcˈu awetamak chi Kakaj Dios ri xanow atioˈjlak niqˈuiˈ jbˈanic xan pach awanmak ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: Atak , yeˈtak riqˈui nojel awanmak ri wiˈ aacˈlak rechak yak powr y jilonli juntir kelen sakiˈ pi awechak .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak fariseo ! Atak tayaˈtakaˈ jlájuj kelen awechak pire Kakaj Dios , tayaˈtakaˈ jlájuj mak woron ri jbˈij menta , arur y juntir jwich ichj , pero xcaniˈ ayeˈtak jbˈanic juntir lawiˈ ri pi jcholajl chiwch Kakaj Dios y taˈ talokˈajtak Kakaj Dios . Ri rajwax jbˈanic riˈ bˈantak juntir pi jcholajl chiwch Kakaj Dios . Riˈ li ri rajwax tabˈantak y mi can ayeˈtak jyeˈic jlájuj kelen awechak .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak fariseo ! Atak chawajak atcubˈartak laˈ mak tem ri lamas ticubˈartak yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak lak sinagog y chawajak ticˈamsaj rutzil awchak lak cˈaybˈl pi cˈutbˈire chi nimiˈ akˈijak .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak fariseo ! Pur atak mak mukbˈi camnak ri taˈ chiquiˈ naˈlc , tichak kˈax cristian chibˈ jwiˈl taˈ naˈlc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Xpe jun rechak yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Ajtijonl , cuando tabˈij jilonli , jilon oj , ojayokˈaˈn , xcheˈ re .

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : ¡ Cˈur awchak atak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios ! Atak tijin tayeˈtak nicˈj pixabˈ subˈlaj cˈax jbˈanic , pero atak taˈ attˈoˈontak chi jbˈanic ri nen tijbˈij , nicˈ riqˈuil tayeˈtak jun al laj ikaˈn chirij jun cristian ri mitaˈ nen ticuyuw ralal , pero atak ni laˈ jun bˈa akˈbˈak attˈoˈontak chi jcˈamicbˈic .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak ! Atak ri tabˈantak tzˈaak chibˈ ri lamas xmuksajtakwiˈ yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri xcamsajtak jwiˈl amamak .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Laˈke li tacˈuttak chi niqˈuiˈ awchak pach amamak . Rechak xcamsajtak y atak tabˈantak jwaˈx tzˈaak ri lamas xmuksajtak .

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: Jwiˈliˈli Kakaj Dios xchomorsaj , xij : Tantakbˈi yak ajkˈasaltak inyolj pach yak intakoˈn chijxoˈlak , rechak ticamsajiˈ jujun y jujun chic titakej jbˈanic cˈax rechak , xcheˈ .

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Riˈ mak cristian ri wiˈtak wich ulew lajori , titojowtak jcamicak juntir yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri xcamsajtak cuando xticarch jwich kˈijsak .

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: Xcholmajch rajlaj riqˈui jcamic Abel asta jcamic Zacarías ri xcamsaj laj xoˈlak man altar pach man luwar ri tosol re Kakaj Dios . Pero in tambˈij chawechak chi riˈ mak cristian ri wiˈtak wich ulew lajori titojowtak re juntir jcamicak .

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: ¡ Cˈur awchak atak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios ! Atak taˈ tayeˈtak luwar tiel jcholajl Jyolj Kakaj Dios chi sakil ri awetamak . Jilonli taˈ tayeˈtak luwar tioc cristian laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈak y ni atak atoctak laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chabˈak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: Cuando elam trambˈi Kakaj Jesús , yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios pach mak fariseo subˈlaj xpe retzalak chirij . Xoctak chi jcˈotic jchiˈ Kakaj Jesús chirij subˈlaj kelen ri xtzˈonajtak re ,

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: jwiˈl rechak riˈ rajak chirijke jyolj tikej laj jkˈabˈak pire tijcojtak tzij chirij .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: Cuando tijin Kakaj Jesús chi yoloj riqˈuilak yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios pach mak fariseo , subˈlaj qˈui cristian xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak asta tichak jtucˈ ribˈak . Kakaj Jesús nabˈe xoc chi jbˈij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Atak , cwentij aybˈak re man jchˈamkˈorak mak fariseo ri ajsolcopil jcaybˈalak . Tijin tambˈij jilonri chirijak mak solcopil yoloj ri trantak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Y xij chic : Taˈ ni jono kelen ri tibˈansaj chi mukukil miti tina elna chi sakil .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Juntir ri tayoltak chawibˈilke aybˈak tina elna chi sakil y juntir ri tabˈijtak pi jasjail tina chˈejejna jonok bˈak ja chi jbˈijc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Atak , wichcˈulchiˈ , in tambˈij chawechak chi mi tzaak achˈolak chiwchak mak cristian ri ticamsan atioˈjlak jwiˈl xike li ticwintak , taˈ chiquiˈ nen ticwintak chi jbˈanic .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: In tambˈij chawechak nen quiek chiwch rajwax titzaak achˈolak : Riˈ tzaak achˈolak chiwch jun ri wiˈ kˈatbˈitzij laj jkˈabˈ tresaj acˈaslemalak neri wich ulew y wiˈ kˈatbˈitzij laj jkˈabˈ atjtˈojtak chic li man luwar re tijbˈi cˈax . Riˈ li rajwax titzaak achˈolak chiwch .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: Jobˈ chi nuchˈ tzˈiquin ticˈayajiˈ chi quibˈ centaw , pero taˈ ni jono rechak sachal re Kakaj Dios

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: y jilon rusumal ábˈak ajlaliˈ jwiˈl . Jwiˈliˈli mi tzaak achˈolak , atak masna atlokˈajtak chiwchak subˈlaj qˈui tzˈiquin , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : In tambˈij chawechak chi nen jonok tibˈin chiwchak cristian chi tijchˈobˈaˈ inwch , jilon Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tijbˈijiˈ chiwchak ranjl Kakaj Dios chi tijchˈobˈaˈ jwich .

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: Pero nen jonok taˈ raj tijbˈij chiwchak cristian chi tijchˈobˈaˈ inwch , jilon in taˈ tambˈij chiwchak ranjl Kakaj Dios chi tanchˈobˈaˈ jwich .

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: Nen jonok tiyokˈon chirij Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil ticuysajiˈ jmac jwiˈl Kakaj Dios . Pero nen jonok tiyokˈon chirij Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios taˈ ni jun bˈwelt ticuysaj jmac jwiˈl Kakaj Dios .

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: Cuando atak atcˈamsajtakbˈi lak sinagog pire tibˈansaj kˈatbˈitzij chabˈak o cuando atcˈamsajtakbˈi chiwchak mak jbˈabˈaltak kˈatbˈitzij y chiwchak mak kˈatbˈitzij , mat octak il chi jchomorsaj nen tabˈantak chi jcolic aybˈak o nen tabˈijtak ,

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: jwiˈl tibˈijsajiˈ chawechak laj awanmak jwiˈl Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios nen tabˈijtak cuando atchˈaˈwtak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Xpe jun rechak yak winak , xij re Kakaj Jesús : Kajtijonl , bˈij re man wechˈelxic chi tijjach we , ri textament ri xcan jyeˈ inkaj , xcheˈ re .

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij re man winak li : At wichcˈulchiˈ , in taˈ cojolquin pire kˈatbˈitzij chabˈak , ni taˈ takalquin chi jjachic textament chawchak , xcheˈ re .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Y xij chic rechak cristian : Iltak jcholajl nen tabˈantak , tacwentij aybˈak , ma rayajtak tiwaˈx mas apwaakak o tiwaˈx mas kelen awechak ri reke wich ulew . Jwiˈl jun cristian ri wiˈ subˈlaj kelen re , maˈ riˈ taˈ li tiyeˈw jcˈaslemal , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij jun esbˈi noˈj rechak jilonri : Wiˈ jun winak subˈlaj bˈiom . Juntir jticoˈn ri xtic laj rulew subˈlaj kus xwichintak .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Man bˈiom li xoc chi jchomorsaj laj ranm , xij : ¿ Nen tambˈan lajori ? Taˈ lamas tancˈolwiˈ juntir jwich inticoˈn , xcheˈ .

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: Y xij : Wetamchak nen tambˈan , tanyoj mak incˈújaj ri wiˈ y tambˈan chic nicˈj mas nimak chic y claˈ tancˈolwiˈ juntir jwich inticoˈn y juntir kelen we .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Y tambˈij re wanm : Wiˈ subˈlaj kelen awe re atuxlan subˈlaj junabˈ , tij aw , tij awucˈaˈ , uxlanok y quiˈcoten , incheˈ re , xcheˈ .

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: Pero Kakaj Dios xij re man winak li : At , atke sons , lakˈabˈ wica atcamc y juntir kelen awe ri cˈolan awiˈl , ¿ nen quiek re ticanwiˈ ? xcheˈ re .

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: Y jilon jun cristian ri tijmulbˈaˈ jbˈiomil xike pire re ricˈan , taˈ nen tichacuj , jwiˈl chiwch Kakaj Dios powriˈn , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : In tambˈij chawechak chi mat octak il chirij nen tatijtak laj acˈaslemalak , ni mat octak il chirij awitzˈikak re tacojtak ,

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: jwiˈl acˈaslemalak masna nim jkˈij chiwch ri tatijtak y atioˈjlak masna nim jkˈij chiwch man itzˈik .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Riˈ iltak nen mo yoˈltak mak joj , rechak taˈ titiconantak y taˈ tiochˈontak , ni taˈ tijcˈoltak jwich jticoˈnak laj jcˈujaak , riˈ Kakaj Dios titzukuw rechak . Y atak masna nim akˈijak chiwchak mak tzˈiquin li .

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: Taˈ ni jun chawechak ticwin chi jyoˈrsaj ribˈ quibˈ uxibˈ or mas re jcˈaslemal ri yeˈl jwiˈl Kakaj Dios jwiˈlke tioc il chirij jcˈaslemal .

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Y wi mitaˈ atcwintak chi jbˈanic mak tra nuchˈ kelen li , ¿ nencˈu chac atoctak il chirijak mak nicˈj nimaktak kelen chic ?

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Iltak nen mo jqˈuiyic mak cutzˈiˈj re lak tzaˈl , rechak taˈ tichacuntak y taˈ tiquemowtak itzˈik . Pero in tambˈij chawechak chi Salomón subˈlaj kustaklaj itzˈik xcoj , pero taˈ ni jono ritzˈik xcoj jilon chapcaˈ mak kustaklaj cutzˈiˈj li .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Wi jilonli jwikic mak woron li tran Kakaj Dios ri lajori wiˈtak lak tzaˈl y chwekˈ ticˈatsajtak li jorn , kes tzˈetel tzˈet atjwikaˈtakaˈ atak ri taˈ mas cubˈul achˈolak chirij Kakaj Dios .

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli atak mat octak il chi jtoquic awak y awucˈaˈak .

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: Riˈ juntir mak kelen li tioctak il mak cristian chirij ri taˈ tijcojtak Jyolj Kakaj Dios , pero Kakaj Dios retamiˈ chi juntir mak kelen li tichoconiˈ awiˈlak .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Pi jqˈuexwach atoctak il chirij mak kelen li , riˈ oquentak il chi jtoquic Kakaj Dios pire titakon chabˈak y bˈantak lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tabˈantak y juntir mak kelen li tiyeˈsajiˈ chawechak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Mi tzaak achˈolak atak incarner , taˈ atak qˈui , pero Kakaj Dios nojeliˈ ranm tijyeˈ luwar chawechak pire atoctak laj jkˈabˈ pire titakon chabˈak .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Y cˈayajtak juntir kelen awechak ri wiˈ y sipajtak rijil rechak yak ri wiˈ rajwax rechak , riˈ coj achokˈbˈak chi jmolic jwich abˈiomilak ri taˈ tikˈax jwich y taˈ tisaach jwich . Mulbˈaˈ abˈiomilak riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri lamas taˈ alkˈom tioc , ni taˈ pocˈ tibˈanow cˈax re kelen .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Lamas wiˈ abˈiomilak , claˈ tiwaˈx awanmak , jwiˈl riˈ bˈesal awanmak chirij abˈiomilak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Atak , ulbˈentake y tzijke akˈakˈak

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: chapcaˈ trantak yak mocom ri tike tijin chi rulbˈej jpatronak nen or akˈabˈ tikˈajch li jun tzˈam pire cuando tichˈabˈejtak , laj or tibˈe jtebˈaˈtak pwert chiwch .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Tzi rechak yak mocom ri tibˈe taˈmajtak jwiˈl jpatronak , yoˈltak chi rulbˈej nen or tikˈajch . Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak , laj or tipe man jpatronak tijcubˈaˈtak chiˈ mex y tioc chi jyeˈic jwaak .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Tzi rechak yak mocom ri tiyuk taˈmajtak jwiˈl jpatronak tijintak chi ulbˈenc , wi tiyuk nicˈaj akˈabˈ o sakaremchak re cuando tiyuk .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: Pero tatak jcholajl , witi man rajw ja retam nen or titaw man alkˈom laj richoch , re tiyoˈriˈ chi jchajajc , taˈ tijyeˈ luwar tioc alkˈom laj richoch chi ralkˈaj kelen re .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Y jiˈcˈulon atak , ulbˈentake jwiˈl taˈ etemal nen or tipe chic Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Xpe Pedro , xtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús : Kajawl , mak esbˈi noˈj ri , ri attijin chi jbˈijc , ¿ pi keke oj o pi rechakiˈ juntir cristian ? xcheˈ re .
