text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: Xijbˈi rechak : Jattak li man tilmit ri wiˈbˈi chawchak . Cuando attawtak claˈ , tibˈe ateˈtak jun ra bˈur ximilc , ajquiˈ ni jono cristian quejawinak re , quirtak y cˈamtakch .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Y wi wiˈ nen titzˈonin chawechak : ¿ Nen chac taquirtak man ra bˈur ? wi ticheˈ chawechak , tabˈijtak re : Tike chocon jwiˈl Kajawl , atcheˈtak re , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xeˈtak . Juntir nen xijsaj rechak jilon xeˈ jteˈtak .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Cuando tijintak chi jquiric man ra bˈur , xtawtak mak rajw chi rilic y xijtak rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo : ¿ Nen chac taquirtak man ra bˈur ? xcheˈtak rechak .

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Rechak xijtak rechak mak rajw : Tike chocon jwiˈl Kajawl , xcheˈtak rechak .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Xcˈamtakch man ra bˈur riqˈui Kakaj Jesús , xyeˈtakbˈi ritzˈikak ri tijkˈuˈjtak chirij man ra bˈur , ajrucˈreˈ xjawsajtak Kakaj Jesús chirij .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Y cuando tijin jbˈic Kakaj Jesús xpetak mak cristian xlicˈ ritzˈikak ri tijkˈuˈjtak laj jbˈe Kakaj Jesús .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Cuando xmajtakch man wich xulan re man wich witz ri jbˈij Olivos , juntir yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xcholtak chˈejejem jwiˈl jquiˈcotemak y xnimirsajtak jkˈij Kakaj Dios jwiˈl juntir mak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ri ilan jwiˈlak ,

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: xijtak : ¡ Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl wiˈ jkˈabˈ chibˈ rey ri petzal laj jbˈij ! ¡ Waˈxok utzil lecj ! ¡ Nimirsajok jkˈij Kakaj Dios lecj ! xcheˈtak .

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Y chijxoˈlak mak cristian li , bˈesaltakaˈ nicˈj fariseo , rechak xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Kaj , kˈelcojoˈ yak ajtijol ribˈak chawij , xcheˈtak re .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak wi tijmaytak chˈejejem rechak , riˈ mak abˈaj tijcholtak chˈejejem , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtaw chijcˈulel Jerusalén . Cuando xrilbˈi jwich man tilmit li , xrokˈbˈej ribˈ chirijak mak cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: y xij : Atak , ri watak Jerusalén , witi tawetemajtak laˈ man kˈij ri , nen tiyeˈw utzil laj awanmak , pero lajori mukuliˈ chawchak , taˈ tijnaˈ tawetemajtak .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Tina tawna jun kˈij cuando acontrak trantak jun tusum abˈaj chirij juntir atilmitak y rechak tijsuttak awijak pire maˈ atelmajtak .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Y juntir awichochak tijyojtak y taˈ chiquiˈ ni jono abˈaj tican chibˈ jun chic y atjcamsajtak , jilonli tibˈansaj chawechak jwiˈl taˈ xawetemajtak cuando xatyuk solajtak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xoc li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y xoc chi ruktajbˈi juntir mak ajcˈaybˈ ri wiˈtak claˈ .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Xij rechak : Tzˈibˈaliˈ li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri : Wichoch rechiˈ lamas tibˈan chˈaˈwem wiqˈuil , xcheˈ Kakaj Dios , ticheˈ .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Pero atak cojol pi molbˈi ribˈak mak alkˈom awiˈlak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak . Kakaj Jesús nojel kˈij xtijojtak cristian re Jyolj Kakaj Dios li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios . Mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios y yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios pach mak cristian ri nim jkˈijak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel tijin tijtoctak nen mo trantak chi jcamsaj Kakaj Jesús .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Pero taˈ tijtaˈtak nen trantak chi jcamsaj , jwiˈl juntir cristian subˈlaj kus tijtatak nen tijbˈij Kakaj Jesús .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Li jun kˈij cuando tijin Kakaj Jesús chi jtijojcak cristian li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios xij tzilaj jtaquil rechak nen mo ticolmajtak laj jkˈabˈ jmacak . Y xtawtak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Xpetak rechak , xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Bˈij chike nen xattakow chi jbˈanic jilonri y nen xyeˈw kˈatbˈitzij laj akˈbˈ pire tabˈan jilonli , xcheˈtak re .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Jilon in chwaj tantzˈonaj jun kelen chawechak . Cˈululajtak inyolj :

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: ¿ Nen xtakow re Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox chi jbˈanic jaˈtiox ? ¿ Kakaj Diosniˈ xtakow re o cristianke ? xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Rechak xoctak chi jchomorsaj chiribˈil ribˈak , xijtak : Wi tikabˈij chi Kakaj Dios xtakow re Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , li tijbˈijiˈ chike : ¿ Nencˈu chac taˈ xacojtak jyolj ? ticheˈ .

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Y taˈ tijnaˈ tikabˈij chi cristianke takowinakch re . Wi tikabˈij jilonli , mak cristian ojjcamsajtakaˈ chi abˈaj , jwiˈl rechak tijcojaˈtakaˈ chi Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox ajkˈasal Jyoljiˈ Kakaj Dios , xcheˈtak chiribˈil ribˈak .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Y jwiˈliˈli xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Taˈ ketam nen takowinakch re , xcheˈtak .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Jilon in taˈ tambˈij chawechak nen xyeˈw kˈatbˈitzij laj inkˈbˈ chi jbˈanic jilonri , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij chic jun esbˈi noˈj rechak cristian jilonri : Wiˈ jun winak xtic uva laj rulew y xcan jyeˈ man rulew chi kejom rechak nicˈj ajchac y xeˈ chinaj li jun jalan tilmit chic .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Cuando xtaw kˈij tikˈanabˈ jwichak mak uva , xpe man rajw ulew xtakch jun jtakoˈn riqˈuilak chi jtzˈonaj rechak mak ajkejeltak ulew lawiˈ mak jwich uva ri tiyeˈsaj re pire kejbˈire man ulew . Pero mak ajkejeltak ulew xchaptak man takoˈn li , xsecˈtak y xkˈasajtakbˈi chi taˈ nen xyeˈtakbˈi re .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Xpe chic man rajw ulew , xtak chicch jun jtakoˈn chi jtzˈonaj lawiˈ mak jwich uva ri tiyeˈsaj re pire kejbˈire man ulew , pero mak kejewinaktak ulew xsecˈtak , xyokˈtak y xkˈasajtakbˈi chi taˈ nen xyeˈtakbˈi re .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Xpe chic man rajw ulew , xtak chicch jun jtakoˈn chic chi jtzˈonaj lawiˈ mak jwich uva ri tiyeˈsaj re pire kejbˈire man ulew . Xpetak chic mak ajkejeltak ulew , xsoctak y xresajtakbˈi lak ticoˈn .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Xpe man rajw ulew , xij : ¿ Nen jono tantakbˈic ? Lajori tantakbˈi lokˈlaj incˈajol chi jtzˈonaj lawiˈ mak jwich uva ri tiyeˈsaj chwe pire kejbˈire man wulew , pent tichak cojontak chiwch , xcheˈ .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Pero mak ajkejeltak ulew cuando xriltak xtaw jcˈajol man rajw ulew , xijtak chiribˈil ribˈak : Riˈ re tiechbˈen man ulew , lajori kacamsajtak pire tican man ulew ri pi ke oj , xcheˈtak .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Xresajtakbˈi lak ticoˈn re uva y xcamsajtak .

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Y , ¿ nencˈu tran man rajw mak uva rechak mak ajchac ? Re tiyuk jcamsaj mak ajkejeltak ulew y tijyeˈ chic rulew chi kejom re nicˈj ajchac chic , xcheˈ . Cuando xtatak mak cristian juntir ri xijsaj rechak , xijtak : ¡ Miti tijyeˈ luwar Kakaj Dios titaw chiwch ri xabˈij ! xcheˈtak .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús cow xril mak cristian y xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nen mo tielwiˈ ri tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri ? Man abˈaj ri xcan jxuteˈtak yak ajbˈanaltak ja , riˈ xoc pire man nabˈe abˈaj pire jcowil man ja , ticheˈ .

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Y nen titzaak chibˈ man abˈaj li , tikˈajmajiˈn . Y nen titzaak man abˈaj li chibˈ , tranaˈ pok , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios rajak roj xchapeˈtak Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl xtatak jcholajl chi chirijakiˈ rechak xijsaj man esbˈi noˈj li , pero xtzaak jchˈolak chiwchak mak cristian .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Rechak xtaktakbˈi nicˈj cristian riqˈui Kakaj Jesús ri xcoj ribˈak chapcaˈ wiˈ rajwax rechak , pero taˈ tzˈet , xike tijin tijtoctak nen mo tikej Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈak chirij jono jyolj ri mitaˈ tzi ri tijbˈij pire tijjachtak laj jkˈabˈ man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Y mak winak xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Ajtijonl , oj ketamiˈ chi tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ ri tabˈij y tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ ri tijin tatijoj cristian y taˈ jaljoj rilic cristian tabˈan .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: ¿ Tziniˈ tikatoj alcabar re César o taˈn ? xcheˈtak re .

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús retamiˈ mak etzltak jchomorsaˈnak , jwiˈliˈli xij rechak :

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Cˈuttaknecaˈ chinwch jun pwak . ¿ Nencˈu quiek jcaybˈal ri wiˈ chiwch ri y nen quiek jbˈij ri tzˈibˈal chiwch ri ? xcheˈ rechak . Rechak xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Rechiˈ César , xcheˈtak re .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Yeˈtak re César lawiˈ re César y yeˈtak re Kakaj Dios lawiˈ re Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Y mak winak li taˈ xtaˈtak jono jyolj Kakaj Jesús ri mitaˈ tzi ri xij chiwchak cristian pire tijchaptak . Juntir ribˈilak xsaach jchˈolak chi jtaic y taˈ chiquiˈ nen xijtak re .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Xpetak nicˈj saduceo , xeˈtak riqˈui Kakaj Jesús . Rechak taˈ tijcojtak chi tina cˈastasajna jwichak camnakibˈ , jwiˈliˈli xijtak re Kakaj Jesús :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Ajtijonl , Moisés xcan jtzˈibˈaj pi ke oj chi wi wiˈ jun winak cˈuliˈnak ticamc y taˈ ralcˈwalak xwaˈxc , rajwaxiˈ ticˈuliˈy chic jun jkˈun riqˈui man anm li , ri camnak richjil pire tiwaˈx ralcˈwal riqˈuil y ticojsaj pi ralcˈwal nabˈe winak .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Wiˈ jun bˈwelt wiˈ wukubˈ ( 7 ) chi winak ri jkˈun ratz ribˈak . Man nabˈeal xcˈuliˈyc , pero xcamc y taˈ ralcˈwal xwaˈxc .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Man jcabˈal xcˈuliˈy chic riqˈui man anm li ri camnak richjil y re xcamc , taˈ ralcˈwal xwaˈxc .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Y jilon xan man jroxal , xcˈuliˈy chic riqˈui man anm li y re xcamc . Jilonli xantak chi wukubˈ ( 7 ) ribˈilak xcˈuliˈytak riqˈui man anm li y chi wukubˈ ( 7 ) ribˈilak xcamtak y ni jono rechak xwaˈx ralcˈwal .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Pi qˈuisbˈire xcam man anm li .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Cuando ticˈastasaj jwichak camnakibˈ , ¿ nencˈu rechak mak winak trixokolaj man anm li , jwiˈl chi wukubˈ ( 7 ) xcˈuliˈytak riqˈuil ? xcheˈtak mak saduceo re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak mak saduceo : Neri wich ulew ticˈuliˈytakaˈ cristian .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Pero yak ri ticˈular pi rechak tibˈetak riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj y ticˈastasaj jwichak laj jcamnaklak xoˈlak camnakibˈ , rechak taˈ chiquiˈ ticˈuliˈytak .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Rechak taˈ chiquiˈ ticamtak jwiˈl jiˈchaklontak chapcaˈ yak anjl . Ralcˈwal takchak Kakaj Dios jwiˈl cˈastasalchak jwichak laj jcamnaklak .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Moisés xin chi yak camnakibˈ ticˈastasajiˈ jwichak laj jcamnaklak jwiˈl re cuando xchˈabˈejch jwiˈl Kakaj Dios li jun nimlaj mat loˈquiej ri tijin jcˈatic , xijsaj re chi Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl , riˈ ri jDios Abraham , Isaac y Jacob .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Kakaj Dios maˈ jDios taˈ yak camnakibˈ , jDiosakiˈ yak ri yoˈltak . Jwiˈliˈli juntir ri wiˈtak laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios onque ticamtak , pero chiwch Kakaj Dios , yoˈltakaˈn , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Xpetak nicˈj ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios , xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Ajtijonl , tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ ri xabˈij , xcheˈtak re .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Y taˈ chiquiˈ ni jonok xcˈotow jchiˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xtzˈonaj rechak cristian : ¿ Nen chac tibˈijsaj chi ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew rijajliˈ David ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Pero David xcan tzˈibˈanok li wuj re Salmos ri tijbˈij jilonri : Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl xijiˈ re Wajawl : Cubˈren laj impaach

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: asta tina injachna laj akˈbˈ juntir yak ri atcontrinc , xcheˈ re , ticheˈ .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: ¿ Nen mo jun ri , ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios tina jtaknach wich ulew , rijajliˈ David , cuando David xijiˈ Wajawl re ? xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Kakaj Jesús chiwchak juntir cristian ri tijin tijtatak jyolj xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij jilonri :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: Tacwentij aybˈak riqˈui yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios . Rechak riˈ mas tzi tricˈajtak tijcojtak nimak rakan ritzˈikak cuando tiwoˈcottak y tzi triltak ticˈamsaj rutzil jwichak lak cˈaybˈl pi cˈutbˈire chi nimiˈ jkˈijak . Rechak riˈ tijtoctak mak tem ri lamas ticubˈartak yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak lak sinagog . Y jilon trantak cuando tibˈetak li jono nimakˈij .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Tresajtak kelen rechak chirijak yak anm ri camnak richjilak y pire bˈambˈi jwichak chiwchak cristian subˈlaj naj trantak chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Jwiˈliˈli masna cˈax kˈatbˈitzij tibˈansaj chibˈak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Cuando wiˈ Kakaj Jesús li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios xril chi mak cristian bˈiom tican jyeˈtak pwak li mak cax re cˈulbˈi pwak ri tisipaj re Kakaj Dios .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Y xril chic jun sicˈ anm powr ri camnak richjil , xyeˈ li jun cax quibˈ tra pwak ri taˈ nimak jwich .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi sicˈ anm powr ri camnak richjil riˈ xyeˈw mas chiwchak juntir ri tijyeˈtak pwak li cax re cˈulbˈi pwak ri tisipaj re Kakaj Dios .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Juntir mak bˈiom li , riˈ tijyeˈtak ri mitaˈ tijqˈuistak chi sachem . Rucˈ sicˈ anm powr ri camnak richjil xyaˈ juntir ri wiˈ riqˈuil re tzukbˈi ribˈ , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Nicˈj ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo tijin tiyolowtak chirij nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , tijbˈijtak chi poc kus rilic juntir abˈaj ri cojol re y poc kus rilic juntir mak tra ritzˈabˈl ri sipal jwiˈlak cristian . Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Tina tawna jun kˈij chi juntir ri tijin tawiltak lajori , taˈ chiquiˈ ni jono abˈaj tican chibˈ jun chic . Juntir li tina yojmajna , xcheˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Xpe yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xoctak chi jtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús : Kajtijonl , ¿ nen or titaw chiwch ri xabˈij ? ¿ Nencˈu retal ri tiilsaj pire cˈutbˈire chikawch chi tawem tran ri xabˈij chike ? xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Tike acwentij aybˈak pire maˈ atsubˈsajtak , jwiˈl subˈlaj qˈui tina petakna y tijcoj ribˈak chapcaˈ in , tijbˈijtak : Iniˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew y tichak taw qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak , tina cheˈtakna . Pero atak ma cojowtak y ma takejtak .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Atak cuando tatatak jtaquil chi tijiniˈ nimaktak chˈoˈj li jono luwar , mi tzaak achˈolak jwiˈl jilonli tina bˈanna , pero maˈ riˈ taˈ li kˈij re qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak ,

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: jwiˈl jun nimlaj tilmit tina chˈoˈjinna riqˈui jun tilmit chic y jun rey tina chˈoˈjinna riqˈui jun rey chic .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Tina ranna nimaktak cabˈrakn , tina pena subˈlaj wiˈjal , tina pena subˈlaj yajel lak jaljojtak luwar y tina cˈutunna kelen subˈlaj tzakom chˈolal rilic lecj .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Pero cuando ajquiˈ chi bˈansaj juntir li , atak atna chapsajtakna y tina bˈansajna cˈax chawechak . Tina bˈansajna kˈatbˈitzij chawijak lak sinagog y atna cojsajtakna li cars y atna cˈamsajtaknabˈi chiwchak mak rey inwiˈlke in .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Jilonli tijnaˈ tabˈijtak chi tzˈetiˈ ri ilan y tal awiˈlak chwij .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Ma chomorsajtak nen tabˈijtak chi jcolic aybˈak ,

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: jwiˈl tanyaˈ anoˈjak pach ayoljak nen tabˈijtak y yak acontrak taˈ chiquiˈ tijtaˈtak nen mo trantak chi jkˈatic jwich ayoljak .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Pero atak , atna jachsajtakna li cˈax jwiˈlak akaj achuchak , akˈun awatzak , awechˈelxicak y awichcˈulchiˈak . Y wiˈ jujun chawechak tina jachsajtakna pi camic .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Juntir cristian ri taˈ ticojontak chiwch Kakaj Dios atna retzelbˈejtakna y atna jcontrijtakna inwiˈlke in ,

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: pero taˈ ni jono rusumal ábˈak tisaachc .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Wi mitaˈ taquibˈaj awanmak asta atcamtak , atcolmajtakaˈ laj jkˈabˈ amacak .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Cuando tawiltak chi sutulchak rij Jerusalén jwiˈlak soldad , cuxtaj awiˈlak chi tichak yojsaj man tilmit li .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Cuando tawiltak jilonli , yak cristian ri wiˈtak lak luwar re Judea rajwaxiˈ laj or tielmajtakbˈi bˈak witz y yak cristian ri wiˈtak Jerusalén rajwaxiˈ laj or tielmajtakbˈi claˈ y yak cristian ri esaltakbˈi li tilmit mi kˈajtak chic li tilmit ,

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: jwiˈl tina pena subˈlaj cˈax chibˈak cristian pire titaw chiwch ri tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: ¡ Cˈur jwichak yak yaj anm laˈ mak kˈij li pach yak ri wiˈ jneˈak tijtuˈtzajtak , jwiˈl rechak taˈ tijnaˈ tielmajtak laj or jwiˈl wiˈ jun nimlaj cˈax petzal chibˈak cristian wich ulew y chibˈak juntir cristian li man tilmit li !

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Wiˈ jujun ticamsajtak chi espad y nicˈj chic ticˈamsajtakbˈi li cars lak juntir tilmit . Y Jerusalén tiwaˈx laj jkˈabˈak yak ri maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel pire titakontak chibˈak asta tina tzˈakatna nen jnajtil ri yeˈl rechak chi jilon trantak li , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Ajrucˈreˈ tiilsaj retal lecj ri sachom chˈolal rilic chirij kˈij y chirij icˈ y chirij chˈumil . Juntir cristian wich ulew tisaach jchˈolak y subˈlaj titzaak jchˈolak cuando tijtatak subˈlaj tijumum mar pach mak retumb re bˈa mar .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Mak cristian timakˈuj ranmak jwiˈl tzakom chˈolal chi jchomorsaj nen tibˈan wich ulew , jwiˈl triltak chi juntir ri wiˈ lecj tiyucxij laj jluwrak .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ triltak Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tikejch lecj li sutzˈ subˈlaj tikopopon jkˈakˈal jnimal jkˈij y wiˈ subˈlaj jcwinel .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Cuando tijchol juntir mak retal li ri bˈil inwiˈl , cowirsaj awanmak , bˈit acaybˈalak lecj jwiˈl tawemchak tran man kˈij re atcolmajtak laj jkˈabˈ amacak , xcheˈ .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic jun esbˈi noˈj rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij jilonri : Atak , cojtak retal jun jcheˈl higo o nicˈj cheˈ chic .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Cuando tawiltak tiel chicch jxak acˈal , atak awetamakchak chi petemchak re riqˈuil sakˈj .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Y jiˈcˈulonli cuando tawiltak chi tichak tijin titaw chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawechak , etemajtak chi jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian nakajchakwiˈw .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi ajquiˈ chi camtak juntir cristian ri wiˈtak wich ulew re mak junabˈ ri cuando titaw chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawechak .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Caj pach ulew tisaachiˈ jwichak , pero tina tawna chiwch juntir ri ximbˈij chawechak .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: Tike acwentij aybˈak , mi bˈe awanmak chi jbˈanic lawiˈ ri chawajak tabˈantak y mi bˈe awanmak chi kˈabˈric y chirij kelen awechak laj acˈaslemalak , jwiˈl wi riˈ tibˈe awanmak chirij juntir li , taˈ awicˈabˈak cuando titaw man kˈij li

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: chapcaˈ jun chapbˈi caˈn pi awechak y jilon jpetic man kˈij li chibˈak juntir cristian wich ulew .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Chajintake y cocˈxoˈl chˈaˈwentak riqˈui Kakaj Dios pire atcolmajtak laj jkˈabˈ juntir cˈax ri tina pena ri ximbˈij chawechak y pire tijnaˈ attawtak chiwch Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Kakaj Jesús lakˈj tijtijoj cristian li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y lakˈabˈ jiˈ tibˈe waˈxok bˈa witz ri jbˈij Olivos .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Y juntir cristian subˈlaj akˈabˈ titawtak li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios pire tibˈe jteˈtak Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij rechak .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Tawem tran nimakˈij re titijsaj cuxlanwa ri taˈ chˈamkˈor laˈ y man nimakˈij li tibˈijsajiˈ Pascua re .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios tijintak chi jtoquic nen mo trantak chi jcamsaj Kakaj Jesús chi mukukil jwiˈl tike tzaak jchˈolak chiwchak cristian .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Xpe man jbˈabˈal etzl , xoc laj ranm Judas ri tibˈijsaj Iscariote re . Judas riˈ jun rechak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Xpe re , xeˈ rileˈ mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach mak jbˈabˈalak mak ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y xchomorsaj riqˈuilak nen mo tran chi jjachic Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈak .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Rechak subˈlaj xquiˈcottak , xijtak re Judas chi tijyaˈtakaˈ pwak re wi tijjach .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Judas subˈlaj tzi xta y xoc chi jtoquic noˈj nen mo tran chi jjachic Kakaj Jesús laj jkˈabˈak cuando taˈ cristian riqˈuil .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Xtaw kˈij re man nimakˈij ri titijsaj cuxlanwa ri taˈ chˈamkˈor laˈ y cuando ticamsaj ra cˈojol carner pire man nimakˈij Pascua .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak Pedro pach Juan : Jattak , bˈantatak jwaˈx kasinar re nimakˈij Pascua , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Rechak xtzˈonajtak re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Lamas chawaj tibˈe kabˈaneˈ jwaˈx ? xcheˈtak re .

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Cuando atoctak Jerusalén , tataˈtak jun winak cˈamalbˈi jun kˈibˈ jaˈ jwiˈl . Takejtakbˈi asta laˈ man ja lamas tiocwiˈ .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Bˈijtak re man rajw ja : Tijbˈij Kajtijonl : ¿ Lamas wiˈ man cwart lamas tantijwiˈ insinar re Pascua pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chwij ? ticheˈ , atcheˈtak re , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Y man rajw ja tijcˈut jun nimlaj cwart chawchak laj jcabˈ wik re man ja ri bˈanalchak jwaˈxc , claˈ tabˈantak jwaˈx kasinar , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Rechak xeˈtak . Y jilon jtaˈic , xeˈ raneˈtak chapcaˈ xijbˈi Kakaj Jesús rechak y xantak jwaˈx sinar re Pascua .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Cuando xtaw or re sinar , Kakaj Jesús pach yak jtakoˈn xcubˈartak chiˈ mex .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Subˈlaj rayal inwiˈl tantij sinar re Pascua aacˈlak nabˈe chiwch titaw or incamsajc .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Tambˈij chawechak chi taˈ chiquiˈ ni jun bˈwelt tambˈan chic sinar re Pascua aacˈlak , ajriˈ chiquiˈ cuando titaw chiwch ri jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xcˈam jun nejbˈ , xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios , xij : Cˈamtak ra nejbˈ ri y tij awechak ri wiˈ xilj , xcheˈ .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Tambˈij chawechak chi in taˈ chiquiˈ tantij vin re uva aacˈlak asta ajriˈ cuando tipe jtakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak cristian , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xcˈam jun cuxlanwa , xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios y xqˈuer . Xyeˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xij : Riˈ ri intioˈjl ri ticamsaj chi jtojic amacak . Bˈantak jilonri pi cuxtibˈiwe , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Y jilon xan re man nejbˈ , cuando xcolajtak re sinar , xcˈam man nejbˈ y xij : Man ri wiˈ li nejbˈ riˈ inquiqˈuel ri quiek laˈ xaan man aacˈ chomorsaˈn y tina tzˈutuwna chi jtojic jmacak subˈlaj cristian .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Man ri injachow pi camic lajori wiˈ wiqˈuil chiˈ mex .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil jilon tibˈan re chapcaˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios ojr , pero riˈ mas cˈur jwich man ri tijachow re pi camic , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xoctak chi jtzˈonaj chiribˈil ribˈak nen rechak tibˈanow jilonli .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xoctak chi jtzˈonaj chiribˈil ribˈak nen rechak mas nim jkˈij chijxoˈlak rechak .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Mak jreyak yak maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel tijchomorsajtak chi wiˈ mas takon laj jkˈabˈak chibˈak yak jwinakak y mak nimaktak jbˈabˈalak tibˈijsajiˈ chirijak chi tziyiˈ trantak .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Pero chaxoˈl atak , maˈ jiˈtaˈlonli , ri mas nim jkˈij chaxoˈlak , tina ranna chapcaˈ jun acˈl ri taˈ nim jkˈij y ri titakonc , tina ranna chapcaˈ jun takoˈn .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: ¿ Nencˈu mas nim jkˈij ? ¿ Roniˈ ri man titzuksaj bˈa mex o riˈ man ri titzukunc ? ¿ Maˈ rontaˈcˈu nim jkˈij ri titzuksaj bˈa mex ? Pero in win chaxoˈlak jilon imbˈanic chapcaˈ jun takoˈn .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: Atak xatwaˈxtakaˈ wiqˈuil chi jtijic cˈax ,

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: jwiˈliˈli in tanyaˈ takon laj akˈbˈak chapcaˈ tiyeˈsaj chwe in jwiˈl Inkaj .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Y atak , atwiˈntakaˈ y atucˈaˈjantakaˈ wiqˈuil bˈa mex lamas intakon chibˈak juntir cristian . Tanyeˈ kˈatbˈitzij laj akˈbˈak pire atcubˈartak chibˈak mak cubˈarbˈ chi jbˈanic kˈatbˈitzij chibˈak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) kˈat rijajl Israel , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re Simón Pedro : Simón , Simón , man jbˈabˈal etzl xatjtzˈonajtakaˈ pire atjtostak chwij , tran chawechak chapcaˈ jpuˈic mak bˈakˈ jwich trig .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Pero in subˈlaj tantzˈonaj tokˈobˈ re Kakaj Dios chawij pire maˈ taquibˈaj awanm chwij . Y cuando taqˈuex anoˈj y ticubˈar chic achˈol chwij , yeˈ jcowil ranmak yak apach ri xamtak chwij , xcheˈ re .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Simón Pedro xij re : Wajawl , chomorsaliˈ inwiˈl chi imbˈiˈ chawij wi atbˈe li cars y tanjachaˈ wibˈ pi camic pi apach wi atcamsajc , xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Pedro , in tambˈij chawe chi wica jorok abˈijiˈ oxmul chi taˈ tachˈobˈ inwch cuando tiokˈ man puy , xcheˈ re .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Cuando xatintaktakbˈic , ximbˈij chawechak chi taˈ tacˈamtakbˈi cˈolbˈi apwaakak y taˈ tacˈamtakbˈi achimak , ni taˈ axajbˈak tacˈamtakbˈic . ¿ Taˈcˈu xtzˈakat ri xyeˈsaj chawechak re juntir ri rajwax chawechak ? xcheˈ rechak . Y rechak xijtak : Xtzˈakatiˈn , xcheˈtak .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Y xij chic rechak : Pero lajori nen chawechak wiˈ jchim jcˈameˈbˈic y nen wiˈ cˈolbˈi jpwaak jcˈameˈbˈic y nen taˈ respad jcˈayaj ritzˈik ri tijkˈuˈj y jlokˈeˈ jono re .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: In tambˈij chawechak chi lajori titaw chiwch ri tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios chwij ri tijbˈij jilonri : Xcojsajiˈ laj rajlalak mak etzltak cristian , ticheˈ .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Y juntir ri tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios chwij titawiˈ chiwch , xcheˈ rechak . Y rechak xijtak re : Kajawl , neri wiˈ quibˈ espad , xcheˈtak re . Y re xij chic rechak : Tranaˈ li , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús xel chicbˈic , xeˈ bˈa witz ri jbˈij Olivos , jwiˈl nakˈtaliˈ jiˈkelon tran y yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xambˈertakbˈi chirij .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Cuando xtawtak li man luwar , xij re yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Chˈaˈwentak riqˈui Kakaj Dios pire maˈ atkejtak li mac , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Kakaj Jesús xelbˈi riqˈuilak xjutumbˈic , raj jilon najtil chapcaˈ jnajtil titaw jun abˈaj ri titˈojsaj y xxucar . Xoc chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xij :

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: Kaj , wi jilon chawaj , inacol laj jkˈabˈ juntir cˈax . Pero riˈ bˈan lawiˈ ri chawaj at y maˈ riˈ taˈ ri chwaj in , xcheˈ .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Tijin tijbˈij jilonli cuando etke xril xwabˈaˈ ribˈ jun anjl chiwch jpetic lecj , xyuk chi jyeˈic jcowil ranm .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Kakaj Jesús tichak tijin tricˈaj subˈlaj cˈax , jwiˈliˈli subˈlaj xcoj jchokˈbˈ chi chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios y jcˈatol ri tikej lak ulew jiˈchaklon rilic chapcaˈ tzˈut quicˈ .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Cuando xmay chˈaˈwem riqˈui Kakaj Dios xeˈ chic riqˈuilak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij y cuando xtaw riqˈuilak , rechak tijintak chi waraj jwiˈl makˈul ranmak jwiˈl bˈis .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nen chac atwartak ? ¡ Bˈiitentak ! Chˈaˈwentak riqˈui Kakaj Dios pire maˈ tayeˈ aybˈak attakchiˈjtak chi macunc , xcheˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Aj tijiniˈ Kakaj Jesús chi yoloj riqˈuilak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij cuando xtaw jun kˈat chi cristian . Man jun rechak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij ri jbˈij Judas , riˈ cˈamowinakbˈi jbˈeak , re xjutun chijcˈulel Kakaj Jesús chi jtzˈubˈaj jkˈotzˈ .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús xij re : At Judas , laˈke jun tzˈubˈaj kˈotzˈ tajach pi camic Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , xcheˈ re .

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Yak nicˈj ri wiˈtak riqˈuil cuando xretemajtak chi riˈ Kakaj Jesús tiyuk chapsajok , xtzˈonajtak re : Kajawl , ¿ tziniˈ tawil wi ojchˈoˈjin riqˈuilak chi espad ? xcheˈtak re .

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Xpe jun rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xcˈurbˈi jpaach jxicn man jmocom man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xresajbˈi jpaach jxicn chi espad .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij re : Xanaˈ li , ma bˈan chic cˈax re , xche . Ajrucˈreˈ xchap jxicn man mocom y xtzibˈsaj .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Y xij rechak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , mak jbˈabˈalak mak ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel ri xpetak chi jchapic : ¿ Nen chac xacˈamtakch espad y cheˈ chi inchapic ? ¿ In incˈu jun alkˈom tawiltak ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Nojel kˈij xintijoj cristian li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y taˈ xinachaptak . Pero lajori xtawiˈ chiwch tabˈantak lawiˈ chawajak tabˈantak jwiˈl riˈ li raj man jbˈabˈal etzl tabˈantak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Xchaptak Kakaj Jesús y xcˈamtakbˈi laj richoch man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Pedro xtakejiˈbˈi Kakaj Jesús , pero chinajchak bˈesalc .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Nicˈaj chuchja nuchuliˈ jun kˈakˈ y wiˈ cristian cubˈultak chiˈ kˈakˈ y Pedro xeˈ cubˈar riqˈuilak .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Xpe jun anm ajicˈ , xril chi cubˈul Pedro chiˈ kˈakˈ cow xril y xij : Man winak ri , jpachiˈ Jesús , xcheˈ .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Pero Pedro taˈ raj tijbˈij chi tzˈetiˈn , xij : At anm , in taˈ tanchˈobˈ jwich winak li , xcheˈ re .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Mirchak jbˈij jwiˈl Pedro jilonli cuando xpe chic jun , cow xril Pedro y xij re : At , atiˈ jun rechak mak jpach Jesús , xcheˈ re . Pero Pedro xij chic : ¡ No ! ¡ Tzˈetel tzˈet maˈ impach taˈn ! xcheˈ .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Raj jorok kˈaxiˈ jun or cuando xpe chic jun , xij re : Tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chi winak ri jpachiˈ Jesús jwiˈl jiˈ tipe Galilea , xcheˈ .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Pero Pedro xij chic : Taˈ wetam nen tijin tabˈij chwe , xcheˈ . Cuando tijin tijbˈij Pedro jilonli , xokˈ jun puy .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús ri Kajawl , xsolcopij ribˈ y cow xril Pedro . Ajrucˈreˈ xcuxtaj jwiˈl Pedro ri xijsaj re jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús ri Kajawl jilonri : Lakˈabˈ wica cuando ajquiˈ chi okˈ man puy , at jorok abˈijiˈ oxmul chi taˈ tachˈobˈ inwch , xcheˈ re .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Pedro xelbˈi claˈ , xeˈ jcamsaj ribˈ chi okˈej .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Mak winak ri wiˈtak chi jchajaj Kakaj Jesús xoctak chi ritzˈbˈej jwich y xsecˈtak .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Xchˈuktak bˈakˈ jwich , ajrucˈreˈ xsecˈtak y xijtak re : Bˈijnecaˈ chike , ¿ nen xatsecˈowc ? xcheˈtak re .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Y subˈlaj yoloj xijtak re chi jyokˈic .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Cuando xsakarsanc , xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel , mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios y yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y xcˈamsajbˈi Kakaj Jesús chiwchak mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel y claˈ xtzˈonajtak re :

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: Bˈij chike , wi atiˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús . Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Wi tambˈij chawechak chi iniˈn , taˈ tacojtak chi tzˈetiˈn .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Y wi wiˈ nen tantzˈonaj chawechak taˈ inacˈululajtak .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Pero Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tina bˈe cubˈarna laj jpaach Kakaj Dios lecj ri wiˈ jcwinel , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Xpetak juntir ribˈilak , xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Atniˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ? xcheˈtak . Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Iniˈn , jilon chapcaˈ ri xabˈijtak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Xpe rechak , xijtak : Taˈ chiquiˈ tichocon mas ajcojoltak tzij chirij kawiˈl jwiˈl oj xojtaw laj jchiˈ nen mo xij , xcheˈtak .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ juntir ribˈilak mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel xcˈamtakbˈi Kakaj Jesús riqˈui Pilato ri man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Claˈ xoctak chi jkˈabˈaj tzij chirij , xijtak : Xkataˈch man winak ri , tijin tijtakchiˈj kawinak , tijbˈij chi taˈ chiquiˈ tikatoj alcabar re César . Y tijbˈij chi riˈ re ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew y riˈ re jun rey , xcheˈtak re Pilato .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Pilato xtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Atniˈ jreyak yak rijajl Israel ? xcheˈ re . Kakaj Jesús xij : Iniˈn , jilon chapcaˈ ri xabˈij , xcheˈ .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Pilato xij rechak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios y rechak juntir cristian : Taˈ tantaˈ ni jono jmac winak ri , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Pero rechak xcoj jchokˈbˈak chi jbˈijc : Tijin tijtakchiˈj kawinak laˈ mak jcˈutuˈn , xcholch Galilea y lajori xkˈax lak juntir luwar re Judea jilon tijin tran neri Jerusalén , xcheˈtak re Pilato .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Cuando Pilato xta chi jilonli xijsaj re , xtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús wi tzˈet jiˈ tipe Galilea .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Cuando xta chi Kakaj Jesús jiˈ tipe lamas titakon Herodes Antipas , xtakbˈi riqˈuil . Laˈ mak kˈij li Herodes Antipas jiˈ wiˈ Jerusalén .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Herodes subˈlaj xquiˈcot cuando xril jwich Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl ojrchak chi ticar rajti ranm tril jwich jwiˈl tal jtaquil jwiˈl chirij juntir ri bˈanal jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús y re riˈ raj tril tran jun cˈutbˈi jcwinel chiwch .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli subˈlaj xcˈot jchiˈ Kakaj Jesús , pero re taˈ xcˈululaj ni jun yoloj .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Y wiˈtakaˈ claˈ mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios . Rechak xcoj jchokˈbˈak chi jkˈabˈaj tzij chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Herodes pach mak jsoldad subˈlaj xretzelbˈejtak jwich Kakaj Jesús y pire xritzˈbˈejtak jwich , xcojtak jun nimlaj itzˈik chirij Kakaj Jesús ri subˈlaj kus rilic . Ajrucˈreˈ Herodes xtak chicbˈi Kakaj Jesús riqˈui Pilato .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Pilato pach Herodes jcontriˈ ribˈak , pero laˈ kˈij li xcan pi richcˈulchiˈchak ribˈak .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Pilato xsiqˈuij juntir mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel y juntir cristian pire tijmulbˈaˈ ribˈak chiwch .

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: Xij rechak : Xacˈamaˈtakaˈ chiquiˈch winak ri wiqˈuil ri tabˈijtak chirij chi tijin tijchˈuˈjursaj awinakak . Pero in xincˈotaˈ jchiˈ chawchak y xawilaˈtakaˈ chi taˈ xintaˈ ni jono jmac laj jyolj ri quiek jwiˈl tacojtak tzij chirij .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Y jilon Herodes taˈ xtaˈ ni jono jmac , jwiˈliˈli xtak chicch wiqˈuil . Xawilaˈtakaˈ chi taˈ nen bˈanal jwiˈl ri quiek jwiˈl ticamsajc .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Lajori tancˈach jwich y tantakbˈic , xcheˈ Pilato rechak .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Pilato nakˈtaliˈ nojel junabˈ re man nimakˈij Pascua tijtak jun prex lawiˈ rajak cristian titaksajc .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Juntir cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ cow xchˈejejtak , xijtak re Pilato : ¡ Camsaj ! ¡ Riˈ takbˈi Barrabás ! xcheˈtak .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Y man Barrabás cojol li cars jwiˈl xtakchiˈj cristian li tilmit chi tijbˈit ribˈak chi chˈoˈj riqˈui man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij y jwiˈl bˈanal jun camic jwiˈl .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Pilato xchˈabˈej chic mak cristian y jwiˈl riˈ raj roj xtakbˈi Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj rechak chi wi tziyiˈ tijtakbˈic .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Pero mak cristian subˈlaj cow xchˈejejtak chic , xijtak : ¡ Camsaj wich curs ! ¡ Camsaj wich curs ! xcheˈtak .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Laj jroxmul , Pilato xtzˈonaj rechak mak cristian : ¿ Nencˈu kes cˈax bˈanal jwiˈl ? Taˈ ni jono jmac tantaˈ chirij ri quiek jwiˈl ticamsajc , lajori tancˈach jwich y tantakbˈic , xcheˈ .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Pero mak cristian xtakejtak chˈejejem chi jbˈij chi ticamsaj wich curs .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli Pilato xan lawiˈ ri rajak mak cristian tibˈansaj re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Y jilonli xtakbˈi Barrabás ri xtzˈonajtak chi titaksajbˈic , re wiˈ li cars jwiˈl tijin tijtakchiˈj cristian li tilmit chi tijbˈit ribˈak chi chˈoˈj riqˈui man jbˈabˈal kˈatbˈitzij y bˈanal jun camic jwiˈl . Ajrucˈreˈ xjachbˈi Kakaj Jesús pire tibˈansaj re chapcaˈ rajak tibˈansaj re .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Xpetak mak soldad , xcˈamtakbˈi Kakaj Jesús pire tibˈe jcamsajtak wich curs . Cuando bˈesaltak lak bˈe , xcˈultak jun winak ri jbˈij Simón aj Cirene bˈenam re li tilmit Jerusalén y xijtak re chi trikajbˈi jcurs Kakaj Jesús .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Subˈlaj cristian xambˈertakbˈi chirij Kakaj Jesús y wiˈ subˈlaj anm tichˈejejtak chi okˈej jwiˈl jcˈaxcˈol ranmak chirij .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xsolcopij ribˈ chi rilicak , xij rechak : Atak anm aj Jerusalén , mat okˈtak chwij in , riˈ okˈaj aybˈak y okˈentak chirij awicˈlalak ,

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: jwiˈl tina tawna jun kˈij tibˈijsaj jilonri : Tzi rechak yak anm ri taˈ tialcˈwalantak , tzi rechak yak anm ri taˈ tiwuxtak yaj anm y tzi rechak mak jtuˈak yak anm ri taˈ tuˈtzal jono acˈl jwiˈlak , ticheˈtak .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ tioctak chi jbˈij re nimaktak witz jilonri : Tzakentakch chikabˈ , ticheˈtak . Y tijbˈijtak re mak cocˈaktak witz jilonri : Cojamukeˈtak , ticheˈtak .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Jwiˈl wi jilonli tibˈansaj re man rax cheˈ y , ¿ nen chiquiˈ mo tibˈansaj re man chekej cheˈ ? xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Y cˈamal chicbˈi quibˈ etzltak cristian jwiˈlak pire tibˈe jcamsajtak wich curs pi jpach Kakaj Jesús .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Cuando xtawtak laˈ man luwar ri jbˈij Jbˈakel Jbˈa Camnak , xtzˈoctak Kakaj Jesús wich curs pach mak quibˈ etzltak cristian li , jun laj jpaach Kakaj Jesús y jun chic laj jmax .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xij re Kakaj Dios : Kaj , cuy jmacak jwiˈl taˈ retamak nen tijin trantak , xcheˈ . Y mak soldad xantak suert chirij ritzˈik chi rilic nen chi itzˈik lal tijchˈectak chi jujunalak .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Wiˈ subˈlaj cristian claˈ chi rilic y mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel xritzˈbˈejtak jwich Kakaj Jesús , xijtak : Xcwiniˈ chi jcolic cristian y wi kes tzˈet riˈ re ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew y ri chaˈl jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , jcoleˈ ribˈ ricˈan , xcheˈtak chirij .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Y jilon mak soldad xritzˈbˈejtakaˈ jwich , xjutuntak chijcˈulel y xsujtak vinagre re chi tijem

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: y xijtak re : Wi kes tzˈet at jreyak yak rijajl Israel , colnecaˈ aybˈ awicˈan , xcheˈtak re .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Y wich curs chibˈ Kakaj Jesús xcojsaj jun kelen tzˈibˈal jwich ri tijbˈij : RIˈ RI JREYAK YAK RIJAJL ISRAEL , ticheˈ .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Y jun rechak mak etzltak cristian ri cocoltak claˈ , xritzˈbˈej jwich Kakaj Jesús , xij : Wi atiˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , col aybˈ awicˈan y cojacoleˈ oj , xcheˈ re .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Pero man jun chic xyaj man jpach , xij re : Taˈcojoˈ tacoj jkˈij Kakaj Dios y nicˈke kacamsaj tibˈanc .

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Oj pi jcholajliˈ jilonri tibˈansaj chike jwiˈl tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ wiˈ kamac , riˈ tijin tikatoj lajori mak etzltak noˈj ri bˈanal kawiˈl . Pero winak ri taˈ jmac , xcheˈ .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xij re Kakaj Jesús : Wajawl , quincuxtaj awiˈl cuando attakon chibˈak cristian , xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawe chi lajori atbˈiˈ wiqˈuil li man kuslaj luwar lamas wiˈ Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ re .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Raj tiqˈuil kˈij re cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) xoc ukuˈm juntir wich ulew asta laj jrox or re bˈesal kˈij .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Xan ukuˈm jwich kˈij y xrechˈmaj laj nicˈj man itzˈik re tosbˈi jpam nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , quibˈ xelwiˈ .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Kakaj Jesús cow xchˈejejc , xij : ¡ Kaj , laj akˈbˈ tanjachwiˈ insantil ! xcheˈ . Cuando xijmaj jilonli jwiˈl , xcamc .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Cuando man jbˈabˈalak mak soldad re Roma xril juntir ri xaanc , xoc chi jnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Dios , xij : ¡ Kes tzˈetel tzˈet winak ri taˈ nen jmac ! xcheˈ .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Wiˈ subˈlaj cristian claˈ chi rilic . Cuando xkˈajtak laj richochak tichak jkˈosaj chijchˈolak laˈ jkˈabˈak jwiˈl jcˈaxcˈol ranmak chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Pero juntir yak richcˈulchiˈ Kakaj Jesús pach yak anm ri xpetak chirij cuando xelch Galilea , jiˈ xwaˈxtakch chinaj chi rilic juntir ri xaanc .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Wiˈ jun tzilaj winak ri jbˈij José y juntir ri tran pi jcholajliˈn . José riˈ jun chijxoˈlak mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: y re jiˈ tipe Arimatea ri jun tilmit re Judea . Re cubˈuliˈ jchˈol chi rulbˈej cuando titaw kˈij titakon Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian . Re taˈ tijcˈul jwich lawiˈ ri xchomorsaj yak jpach y lawiˈ ri xantak .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Xpe José , xeˈ riqˈui Pilato chi jtzˈonaj jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús pire tiyeˈsaj re .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: José xkesaj jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús wich curs , xbˈatzˈbˈi laˈ jun itzˈik ri jbˈij lino , xeˈ jmukeˈ li jun nimlaj jul ri cˈotol li abˈaj ri taˈ ni jun camnak mukul claˈ .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Y riˈ man bˈesal kˈij li tibˈansaj jwaˈx juntir kelen ri tichocon jwiˈlak laˈ kˈij re uxlan .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Mak anm ri xpetak chirij Kakaj Jesús cuando xelch Galilea , xeˈtak chirij José chi rilic man jul re mukbˈi camnak y chi rilic nen mo xan José chi jyeˈic jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús li jul .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Cuando xkˈajtak laj richochak xoctak chi jbˈanic jwaˈx siminlaj perjum pire tijcojtak chirij jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús . Ajrucˈreˈ rechak xuxlantak laˈ man kˈij re uxlan chapcaˈ tijbˈij Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Y kes xsakarsan li nabˈe kˈij re xuman , xeˈtak yak anm chiˈ jul lamas xyeˈsajwiˈ jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús y xcˈamtakbˈi mak perjum ri xantak jwaˈxc .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Cuando xtawtak chiˈ jul , xriltak man abˈaj ri xcan cojsaj pi chˈukbˈi chiˈ jul , solcopilchakbˈic .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Y rechak xoctakbˈi li jul lamas xyeˈsajwiˈ jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús y taˈ chiquiˈ xtaˈtak .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Rechak taˈ chiquiˈ tijtaˈtak nen trantak , etke xriltak waˈlchak quibˈ winak laj jxuctak subˈlaj tikopopon ritzˈikak .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Yak anm subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak , xxulbˈaˈ jcaybˈalak lak ulew . Xpetak yak quibˈ winak , xtzˈonajtak rechak : ¿ Nen chac tiyuk atoqueˈtak jun yoˈl xoˈlak camnakibˈ ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Re taˈ chiquiˈ neri , xcˈastasajiˈbˈi jwich laj jcamnakl . Cuxtaj awiˈlak nen xij chawechak cuando ajwiˈ Galilea .

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Xijiˈ chawechak chi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tina jachsajna laj jkˈabˈak mak ajmacbˈ y tina camsajna wich curs , pero tina cˈastasajna jwich laj jcamnakl laj jrox kˈij , xcheˈtak yak winak re yak anm .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xcuxtaj jwiˈlak nen bˈil rechak jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Xeltakbˈi lamas xyeˈsajwiˈ jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús , xeˈ jbˈijtak rechak yak junlajuj ( 11 ) chi jtakoˈn Kakaj Jesús y rechak yak nicˈj jpachak chic .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Yak ri xeˈ yeˈwtak jtaquil rechak yak takoˈn , riˈtakaˈ María Magdalena , Juana , María ri jchuch Santiago y yak nicˈj anm chic .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Pero yak takoˈn li taˈ xcojtak jyoljak yak anm , chijchˈol rechak jbˈanicke trantak .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Pero Pedro laj or xeˈ jol chi rilic . Cuando xtaw chiˈ jul , xtacar chi rilic li jul y xichak mak qˈuertak itzˈik ri jbˈij lino ri xbˈatzˈsajbˈi Kakaj Jesús laˈ , wiˈ claˈ . Ajrucˈreˈ xkˈaj chic la ja , jorchak sachal jchˈol jwiˈl taˈ chiquiˈ jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús claˈ .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Laˈ man kˈij li bˈesaltak quibˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , bˈenam rechak Emaús . Man tilmit li raj wiˈ uxibˈ lewa jnajtil re Jerusalén .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Y rechak cuando bˈesaltak li bˈe , tijintak chi jyolic chiribˈil ribˈak juntir ri xansaj re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Cuando bˈesaltak li bˈe , etke xjutun Kakaj Jesús riqˈuilak y xpachijbˈi ribˈak riqˈuil .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Pero wiˈ nen xkˈatow jwichak pire maˈ jchˈobˈtak jwich wi riˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nen tijin tayoltak petzalcatak li bˈe ? xcheˈ rechak . Rechak xwaˈrtak , subˈlaj bˈis jwichak .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Xpe jun rechak ri jbˈij Cleofas , xij : Xike at jun re mak ajsolinl ri wiˈtak Jerusalén laˈ mak kˈij li , ri taˈ awetam nen xansaj claˈ , xcheˈ .

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nencˈu xaan li tilmit ? xcheˈ rechak . Xpe rechak , xijtak re : Riˈ ri xansaj re Kakaj Jesús aj Nazaret ri jun ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri cojol jkˈij jwiˈl Kakaj Dios y jwiˈlak cristian , jwiˈl wiˈ jcwinel chi jbˈanic nen raj Kakaj Dios tran y chi yoloj .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak kˈatbˈitzij re katilmit xantak kˈatbˈitzij chirij pire xjachtak pi camic wich curs .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Oj cubˈuliˈ kachˈol chi riˈ re ticolow ke ri oj yak rijajl Israel laj jkˈabˈak yak kacontre , pero lajori xiˈ uxibˈ kˈij jcamic .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Y wiˈ nicˈj yak anm chikaxoˈl xsachtak kachˈol . Akˈabˈ xeˈtak chiˈ jul lamas xyeˈsajwiˈ jcamnakl Kakaj Jesús ,

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: pero taˈ chiquiˈ xeˈ jteˈtak jcamnakl claˈ . Xkˈajtak la ja , xyuk jbˈijtak chike chi xwabˈaˈ ribˈak nicˈj anjl chiwchak chi jbˈij rechak chi Kakaj Jesús yoˈliˈn .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Wiˈ nicˈj kapach xeˈtak chi rilic lamas xmuksajwiˈ . Xeˈ rileˈtak jilon chapcaˈ tijbˈijtak yak anm , pero taˈ xriltak jwich Kakaj Jesús , xcheˈtak re .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : ¡ Atak , pur atak tac ! Taˈ tatatak jcholajl juntir y taˈ tacojtak juntir ri bˈil jwiˈlak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios ojrtaktzij .

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: Rajwaxiˈ jun ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew tina jtijna cˈax nabˈe , ajrucˈreˈ tinimirsaj jkˈij jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xoc chi jbˈij jcholajl rechak juntir ri tijbˈij lak jwuj Moisés pach lak jwujak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios chirij re .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Cuando xtawtak li man tilmit lamas rajak titawtak , xpe Kakaj Jesús xan chapcaˈ tike kˈaxbˈic .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Pero rechak riˈ rajak tican Kakaj Jesús riqˈuilak , xpwersijtak , xijtak re : Canen kiqˈuil , jwiˈl xiˈ kˈij y oquem tran akˈabˈ , xcheˈtak re . Jwiˈliˈli Kakaj Jesús xoc la ja riqˈuilak pire tican riqˈuilak .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Y cuando cubˈulchak riqˈuilak chiˈ mex , xcˈam cuxlanwa , xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios , xqˈuer y xyeˈ rechak chi tijem .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Jilonli cuando xyeˈsaj luwar rechak xchˈobˈtak jwich chi riˈ Kakaj Jesús , pero etke xsaach chiwchak .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Xoctak chi jtzˈonaj chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Miti xkicˈajtakaˈ chi xyaˈ jcowil kanm lak bˈe cuando xoc chi jbˈij chike ri jcholajl ri tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios chirij re ? xcheˈtak .

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Cuando xriltak jilonli , laj or xkˈajtakch Jerusalén , xeˈ jteˈtak yak junlajuj ( 11 ) jtakoˈn Kakaj Jesús pach nicˈj jpachak chic cˈamem ribˈak .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Y yak ri wiˈtak la ja xijtak jilonri rechak yak quibˈ ri xtawtak : Tzˈetel tzˈet xcˈastasajiˈ jwich Kakaj Jesús ri Kajawl laj jcamnakl y xilsajiˈ jwich jwiˈl Simón , xcheˈtak rechak .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Xpetak yak quibˈ li , xoctak chi jbˈij rechak nen xantak li bˈe y xyoltak chi ajriˈ xchˈobˈtak jwich Kakaj Jesús cuando xqˈuer man cuxlanwa .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Aj tijintakaˈ chi jbˈij jilonli cuando xwabˈaˈ ribˈ Kakaj Jesús laj xoˈlak , xij rechak : Waˈxok utzil laj awanmak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Rechak subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak , chijchˈolak rechak jun ajtzakal chˈoliˈ xwabˈaˈ ribˈ chiwchak .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : ¿ Nen chac titzaak achˈolak ? ¿ Nen chac tachomorsajtak chi iniˈ jun ajtzakal chˈol ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Iltak inkˈbˈ pach wakan chi kes tzˈet iniˈn . Inna chapeˈtak , ticˈu awiltak chi jun ajtzakal chˈol taˈ jtioˈjl y taˈ jbˈakel chapcaˈ in , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Cuando xij jilonli , xcˈut jkˈabˈ pach rakan chiwchak .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Y rechak onque tiquiˈcottak y aj sachaliˈ jchˈolak , pero ajquiˈ chi xchomorsajtak wi riˈ Kakaj Jesús . Xpe Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Woniˈ kelen re tijel rij aacˈlak neri ? xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xpetak , xyeˈtak jun qˈuer bˈolom car re

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: y re xcˈul y xtij chiwchak .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Ri xansaj chwe , riˈ ri ximbˈij chawechak cuando ajwiniˈ aacˈlak . Ximbˈij chawechak chi tina tawna chiwch juntir ri tzˈibˈal lak jwuj Moisés , lak jwujak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios y lak Salmos , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xan chi tijtatak jcholajl ri tijbˈij ri tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Y xij rechak : Jilonri tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij chi ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , tina camsajna y laj jrox kˈij tina cˈastasajna jwich laj jcamnakl xoˈlak camnakibˈ .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Y laj jbˈij re rajwaxiˈ tina tijojna juntir cristian lak juntir tilmit chi rajwaxiˈ tijqˈuex jnoˈjak y tijcˈam jkˈabˈal jmacak chiwch Kakaj Dios pire ticuysaj jmacak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios . Ticholmajbˈi jtijoj cristian neri Jerusalén .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Atak xawilaˈtakaˈ chi tzˈetiˈ xaan juntir li .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: In tantakaˈch chabˈak ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios . Waˈxentak neri Jerusalén asta tina acˈultakna laj awanmak ri cwinel ri tipe lecj , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xcˈambˈi yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Betania . Y claˈ xbˈit chi quibˈ jkˈabˈ lecj chi jyeˈic utzil chibˈak .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Cuando tijin tijyeˈ utzil Kakaj Jesús chibˈak , xelbˈi chijxoˈlak , xcˈamsajbˈi lecj .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Rechak xnimirsajtak jkˈij Kakaj Jesús . Cuando xantaj li jwiˈlak , subˈlaj tiquiˈcottak xkˈajtak Jerusalén .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Nojel kˈij wiˈtak li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios chi jnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Dios .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Cuando xcholmajch jwich kˈijsak , wiˈchak jun ri jbˈij Yoloj y ri jbˈij Yoloj jiˈ wiˈ riqˈui Kakaj Dios y Diosiˈn .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Y ri jbˈij Yoloj wiˈchak riqˈui Kakaj Dios cuando xcholmajch jwich kˈijsak .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Jwiˈl re xansaj juntir ri wiˈtak wich ulew y lecj jwiˈl Kakaj Dios y taˈ ni jono kelen ri xansaj jwiˈl Kakaj Dios miti jwiˈl re .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Y jwiˈlke re titaˈmaj tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic y tzilaj cˈaslemal li riˈ chapcaˈ jun kˈakˈ ri tisakabˈsan re ranmak juntir cristian wich ulew .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Y man kˈakˈ li wiˈ jkˈakˈal li ukuˈmal y man ukuˈmal taˈ ticwin chi jchupic jkˈakˈal .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Kakaj Dios xtakch jun winak ri jbˈij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox
