text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: pire xyuk jbˈij rechak cristian chirij man kˈakˈ li , pire tijcojtak ri tijbˈij chirij .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Pero Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox maˈ riˈ taˈ re man kˈakˈ li , re takalkech pire xyuk resaj chi sakil chi tzˈetiˈ chirij man kˈakˈ li .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Ri kes tzˈetel kˈakˈ ri tisakabˈsan re ranmak juntir cristian yuˈem tran wich ulew .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Y ri jbˈij Yoloj xyukiˈ waˈxok xoˈlak cristian wich ulew y jwiˈl re xansaj juntir ri wiˈtak wich ulew y lecj jwiˈl Kakaj Dios ojr , pero mak cristian ri retake wich ulew taˈ xchˈobˈtak jwich .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Y cuando xyuk waˈxok xoˈlak yak jwinak wich ulew taˈ xcˈulsaj jwiˈlak yak jwinak .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Pero juntir ri xcˈuluwtak laj ranmak y xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij , xanaˈ rechak pire xwuxtak pi ralcˈwal Kakaj Dios .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Y rechak ralcˈwaltakaˈ Kakaj Dios jwiˈl ajriˈ xqˈuisiˈytak chic , pero taˈ xqˈuisiˈytak chapcaˈ jqˈuisiˈycak cristian , Kakaj Diosiˈ xalcˈwalan rechak .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Y ri jbˈij Yoloj xwux pi cristianil y xwaˈxiˈ chikaxoˈl , xkilaˈ jnimal jkˈij . Subˈlaj nim jkˈij jwiˈl xike re ri Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios y subˈlaj rutzil ranm chikij y riˈ kes tzˈetel tzij .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox ri xyolow chirij ri tipetc , xij : Riˈ ri quiek chirij xinyolow cuando ximbˈij : Wiˈ jun tipe chic chwij masna nim jkˈij chinwch in , jwiˈl wiˈchak ojrtaktzij cuando ajquiˈ chi inqˈuisiˈy in , xcheˈ .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Y subˈlaj rutzil ranm chikij , jwiˈliˈli subˈlaj qˈui jwich utzil xkacˈultak ,

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: jwiˈl Moisés xyeˈw retemaj Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios . Y rutzil ranm Kakaj Dios chikij y ri tzˈetel tzij Kakaj Jesucristo xyuk esan chi sakil .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Ni jonok iliwinak jwich Kakaj Dios . Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl xike re Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri Diosiˈn y juntake pach Kakaj Dios riˈ re xyuk esan chi sakil chikawch nen jbˈanic Kakaj Dios .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel ri wiˈtak Jerusalén xtaktak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios pach yak rijajl Leví riqˈui Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox chi jtzˈonaj re nen jbˈanic re .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xij ri kes tzˈetel tzˈet rechak : In maˈ in taˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , xcheˈ .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Y mak takoˈn li xtzˈonajtak chic re : ¿ Nencˈu atbˈan ? ¿ Atniˈ Elías ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ? xcheˈtak re . Y Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xij chic rechak : Maˈ in taˈn , xcheˈ . Y rechak xtzˈonajtak chic re : ¿ Atniˈ ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri bˈil jwiˈl chi tina jtaknach wich ulew ? xcheˈtak chic re . Y Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xij chic rechak : Maˈ in taˈn , xcheˈ .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Y xijtak chic re : Bˈij chike nen at , jwiˈl oj tina kacˈambˈi jtaquil rechak yak ri xojtakowch . ¿ Nencˈu tabˈij chike chawij at ? xcheˈtak re .

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xij rechak : Iniˈ jun ri cow tichˈejej li jun luwar lamas taˈ cristian ri tijbˈij jilonri : Tebˈaˈtak jbˈe Kakaj Jesús ri Kajawl sucˈul laj awanmak , ticheˈ , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Riˈ li xij Isaías ojr ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios . Mak ri takaltakch jwiˈlak mak fariseo riqˈui Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: xijtak chic re Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox : Wi maˈ at taˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew y wi maˈ at taˈ Elías y wi maˈ at taˈ ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri bˈil jwiˈl chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , ¿ nencˈu chac tabˈan jaˈtiox ? xcheˈtak re .

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Y Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xij chic rechak : In tambˈanaˈ jaˈtiox laˈ jaˈ , pero wiˈ jun chaxoˈlak ri taˈ tachˈobˈtak jwich

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: y riˈ re petzal chwij in . Y in taˈ ticˈular pi we tanquir jxajbˈ jwiˈl re masna nim jkˈij chinwch in .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Juntir li jiˈ xan laˈ man luwar ri jbˈij Betania ri wiˈ chˈakap re nimi jaˈ Jordán lamas tijin Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox chi jbˈanic jaˈtiox .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Laj jcabˈ kˈij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xril Kakaj Jesús tijin tijutun chijcˈulel , cow xchˈaˈwc , xij : ¡ Iltak impuch , riˈ ri Ra Jcarner Kakaj Dios ri titojow jmacak juntir cristian wich ulew !

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Riˈ re ri quiek chirij xinyolow cuando ximbˈij chi wiˈ jun chic petzal chwij in masna nim jkˈij chinwch in jwiˈl wiˈchak ojrtaktzij cuando ajquiˈ chi inqˈuisiˈy in .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: In taˈ wetam nen chi cristian lal li , pero in tijin tambˈan jaˈtiox laˈ jaˈ pire tretemajtak yak rijajl Israel nen jbˈanic .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Y in xwilaˈ xkejch Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios lecj chapcaˈ jun ra ut y xcan chibˈ .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Y in taˈ nen imbˈanic , pero ri xintakow chi jbˈanic jaˈtiox laˈ jaˈ xij chwe : Cuando tawil tikejch Lokˈlaj Insantil lecj y tican chibˈ , riˈ li ri tibˈanow jaˈtiox laˈ Lokˈlaj Insantil , xcheˈ chwe .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Y in xwilaˈ jwich , jwiˈliˈli in tambˈij chi re riˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Laj jcabˈ kˈij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox wiˈ chic claˈ pach quibˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Cuando xril xkˈaxbˈi Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : ¡ Iltak impuch , riˈ ri Ra Jcarner Kakaj Dios ! xcheˈ rechak .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Yak quibˈ ajtijol ribˈak chirij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox xtatak chi jilonli xij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox rechak , xambˈertakbˈi chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xnaˈtun chirij , riˈchak xril chi bˈesal yak quibˈ cristian li chirij xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Nen tatoctak ? xcheˈ rechak . Y rechak xijtak re : Rabí , ¿ lamas watwiˈ ? xcheˈtak re . ( Ri jcholajl tielwiˈ man yoloj rabí , ajtijonl . )

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Laj jcaj orchak re bˈesal kˈij , Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Tzajtak , iltatak , xcheˈ rechak . Y rechak xeˈtak chirij , xeˈ rileˈtak lamas wiˈw y claˈ riqˈuil xkesantakwiˈ kˈij .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Jun rechak yak quibˈ ri xtatak nen xij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox ri xeˈ chirij Kakaj Jesús , riˈ Andrés ri jkˈun Simón Pedro .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ nabˈe xeˈ chi jtoquic Simón ri ratz y xij re : Xkataˈ winak ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew ri tibˈijsaj Mesías re , xcheˈ Andrés re Simón . ( Ri jcholajl tielwiˈ man bˈij Mesías , Cristo . )

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Xpe Andrés xcˈambˈi Simón lamas wiˈ Kakaj Jesús . Xpe Kakaj Jesús , cuando xril jwich Simón , xij re : Atiˈ ri at Simón , jcˈajol Juan , lajori tioc abˈj pi Cefas , xcheˈ re . ( Ri jcholajl tielwiˈ man bˈij Cefas , Pedro . )

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Laj jcabˈ kˈij Kakaj Jesús xchomorsaj tibˈe Galilea , xcˈul Felipe , xij re : Joˈ chwij , xcheˈ re .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Felipe jiˈ tipe li tilmit Betsaida ri jtilmit Andrés pach Pedro .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Xpe Felipe , xeˈ jtoqueˈ Natanael y xij re : Xkataˈ winak ri quiek chirij ri xcan jtzˈibˈaj Moisés lak wuj re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios y ri quiek chirij xcan jtzˈibˈajtak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios . Riˈ Kakaj Jesús aj Nazaret ri jcˈajol José , xcheˈ Felipe re Natanael .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Xpe Natanael , xij : Taˈ ni jono winak aj Nazaret tibˈanow utzil , xcheˈ re Felipe . Xpe Felipe , xij re : Tzaj yuk awileˈ , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Kakaj Jesús cuando xril petzal Natanael , xij : Neri petzal jun tzˈetel rijajl Israel re taˈ tisubˈunc , xcheˈ .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Xpe Natanael , xtzˈonaj re : ¿ Nen mo xawetemaj nen imbˈanic in ? xcheˈ re . Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : In xwilaˈ awch , wat ralaj man jcheˈl higo cuando ajquiˈ chi atsiqˈuij jwiˈl Felipe , xcheˈ re .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Natanael xij chic re : ¡ Kajtijonl , atiˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios y atiˈ jreyak yak rijajl Israel ! xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : At xacojaˈn , jwiˈlke ximbˈij chawe chi xwilaˈ awch cuando wat ralaj man jcheˈl higo . Tina awilna mas ri subˈlaj sachom chˈolal rilic chiwch li , xcheˈ re .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi atak tina awiltakna caj titer y tawiltak yak ranjl Kakaj Dios tiakˈantakbˈi lecj y tikejtakch pire tiwaˈxtak riqˈui Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Laj jrox kˈij xansaj jun nimakˈij re cˈulniquil Caná re Galilea y jchuch Kakaj Jesús wiˈ claˈ .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xijsaj rechak chi tibˈetak li man nimakˈij li .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Y cuando xqˈuis man vin xpe jchuch Kakaj Jesús , xij re : Xqˈuisiˈ jvinak , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : At chuch , ma bˈij chwe nen tambˈan . Ajquiˈ titaw kˈij inoc chi jbˈanic ri takalquinch chi jbˈanic , xcheˈ re .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Pero jchuch xij rechak yak ri tijintak chi jjachic vin : Bˈantak juntir ri nen tijbˈij chawechak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Y claˈ wiˈ wakakibˈ ( 6 ) nimaktak kˈibˈ bˈanal laˈ abˈaj , re cˈolbˈi jaˈ pire chˈajbˈi jkˈabˈak yak rijajl Israel , jwiˈl jilon jcˈutuˈnak , riˈ rajak tzi tiilsajtak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios . Mak kˈibˈ li raj tijkˈiyaˈ oxcˈal joˈlajuj ( 75 ) litro asta jun cient joˈlajuj ( 115 ) litro .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak yak ajjachaltak vin : Nojsajtak mak kˈibˈ li chi jaˈ , xcheˈ rechak . Ajrucˈreˈ rechak xnojsajtak mak kˈibˈ chi jaˈ asta ticˈalcˈatzinc .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij chic rechak : Lajori esajtakbˈi junquitz , yeˈtatak re man ajcˈamal bˈe re man nimakˈij , xcheˈ rechak . Rechak xantak chapcaˈ xijsaj rechak .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Xpe man ajcˈamal bˈe re man nimakˈij , xricˈaj man jaˈ ri xwux pi vin , pero taˈ retam lamas xpeˈw , xike mak ajjachaltak vin retamak lamas xpeˈw , jwiˈl riˈ rechak xesantak li kˈibˈ . Jwiˈliˈli man ajcˈamal bˈe re man nimakˈij xsiqˈuij man cˈojol winak ri ticˈuliˈyc , xij re :

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: Juntir cristian cuando trantak nimakˈij re cˈulniquil riˈ nabˈe tijyeˈtak man vin chi tijem ri pakal rijil . Cuando yak ri siqˈuiltak re man nimakˈij jorok jtijaˈtakaˈ subˈlaj vin , ajrucˈreˈ pi qˈuisbˈire tijyeˈtak man vin chi tijem ri taˈ pakal rijil . Pero at xacˈolaˈ man vin ri pakal rijil pire tayeˈ chi tijem pi qˈuisbˈire man nimakˈij , xcheˈ man ajcˈamal bˈe re man nimakˈij re man cˈojol winak ri ticˈuliˈyc .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Ri xan Kakaj Jesús Caná re Galilea riˈ li nabˈe cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios xan pire xcˈut chi subˈlaj nimiˈ jkˈij , jwiˈliˈli yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Cuando xantaj li , Kakaj Jesús xeˈ Capernaúm pach jchuch , yak jkˈun y yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xwaˈxtak quibˈ uxibˈ kˈij claˈ .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Tawem tran jnimakˈjak yak rijajl Israel ri jbˈij Pascua , Kakaj Jesús xeˈ Jerusalén .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Y li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios xeˈ jteˈ mak ajcˈayaltak wacx , mak ajcˈayaltak carner , mak ajcˈayaltak ut y xeˈ jteˈ mak cristian ri cubˈultak chiˈ jmexak lamas tijqˈuextakwiˈ jpwaakak cristian .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús , cuando xril chi jilonli , xan jun chicot laˈ cˈam y laˈ man chicot li xruktaj juntir mak ajcˈaybˈ li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios pach mak jwacxak y jcarnerak . Y xtilbˈi jpwaakak mak ajqˈuexeltak pwak y xsolcopij mak jmexak chiwchak lak ulew .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Y xij rechak mak ajcˈayaltak ut : ¡ Esajtakbˈi mak acˈyak neri ! ¡ Ma cojtak richoch Inkaj pi cˈaybˈl ! xcheˈ rechak .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xcuxtaj jwiˈlak ri tzˈibˈal li wuj re Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri : Jwiˈl tanchajaj awichoch tina sachsajna inwch , ticheˈ .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Xpe mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel , xtzˈonajtak re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Nencˈu jono cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ri tacˈut chikawch chi jcˈutic chi wiˈ kˈatbˈitzij laj akˈbˈ chi jbˈanic juntir li ? xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Yojtak nimi richoch Kakaj Dios ri y in li uxibˈ kˈij tambˈan chic jwaˈxc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel xijtak re : Chiwch caˈwinak wakakibˈ ( 46 ) junabˈ xantajwiˈ nimi richoch Kakaj Dios ri y , ¿ atcˈu cwiniˈ at chi jbˈanic jwaˈx li uxibˈ kˈij ? xcheˈtak re .

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús maˈ chirij taˈ nimi richoch Kakaj Dios xij cuando xij jilonli , chirijiˈ jtioˈjl re .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli cuando xcˈastasaj jwich Kakaj Jesús laj jcamnakl xoˈlak camnakibˈ , yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xcuxtaj jwiˈlak ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús , ajrucˈreˈ xcojtak nen tijbˈij li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios y xcojtak jyolj Kakaj Jesús ri xij rechak .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Cuando wiˈ Kakaj Jesús Jerusalén li man nimakˈij Pascua , subˈlaj qˈui cristian xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij jwiˈl re subˈlaj cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios xan chiwchak .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús taˈ xcubˈar jchˈol chirijak , jwiˈl re retamiˈ nen jchomorsaˈnak cristian laj ranmak .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Re taˈ rajwax tibˈijsaj re nen jbˈanic ranmak cristian jwiˈl re retamiˈ nen jchomorsaˈnak juntir cristian ri wiˈ laj ranmak .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Wiˈ jun rechak mak fariseo ri jbˈij Nicodemo riˈ jun winak subˈlaj nim jkˈij chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Re xeˈ chi jsolaj Kakaj Jesús lakˈabˈ y xij re : Kajtijonl , ketamiˈ chi Kakaj Diosiˈ xattakowch chi katijoj jwiˈl taˈ ni jonok ticwin chi jbˈanic cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios chapcaˈ tabˈan at wi mitaˈ Kakaj Dios riqˈuil , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re Nicodemo : Tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawe chi nen jun cristian ri mitaˈ tiqˈuisiˈy chic jcaˈmul taˈ tijnaˈ tioc laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈ , xcheˈ re .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Nicodemo xtzˈonaj chic re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Nen mo tijnaˈ tiqˈuisiˈy chic jun cristian jcaˈmul cuando riˈjlaj cristianchak ? Taˈ tijnaˈ tikˈaj chic laj jsantil jchuch pire tiqˈuisiˈy chic jcaˈmul , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawe chi nen taˈ tijcˈam jaˈtiox y taˈ tijcˈul Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios laj ranm chapcaˈ tiqˈuisiˈy chic jcaˈmul , taˈ tioc laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios pire titakon chibˈ .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Nen tiqˈuisiˈy riqˈui jkaj jchuch , cristianke . Pero nen tijcˈul Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios laj ranm chapcaˈ tiqˈuisiˈy chic jcaˈmul , riˈchak Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios tiwaˈx laj ranm .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Mi sach achˈol chi jtaic ri tijin tambˈij chawe chi rajwaxiˈ juntir tina qˈuisiˈytakna chic jcaˈmul .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Tew tijubˈubˈiˈ juntir luwar , tataˈ tijumum , pero taˈ tawil lamas tipeˈw ni taˈ tawil lamas tibˈeˈw y jiˈcˈulon juntir yak ri tiqˈuisiˈytak jwiˈl Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Nicodemo xij chic re Kakaj Jesús : Taˈ tijnaˈ tibˈan jilonli , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Pero at atiˈ jun ajtijonl ri nim akˈij chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel y taˈ tata jcholajl ri tijin tambˈij chawe .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawe chi oj riˈ tikabˈij ri ketam y tikabˈijiˈ chi tzˈetiˈ ri ilan kawiˈl , pero atak taˈ tacojtak lawiˈ ri tikabˈij chawechak .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Atak taˈ tacojtak ri tambˈij chawechak chirijke mak kelen re wich ulew , riˈticˈu chic tacojtak inyolj cuando tanyol chawechak chirij kelen ri wiˈ lecj .

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Taˈ ni jun cristian xjaw riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj , xike Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil ri xpe lecj .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Jilon chapcaˈ xan Moisés li chekej luwar cuando xcocbˈaˈ man richbˈal cumatz bˈa cheˈ , jilon tibˈansaj re Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tina camsajna wich curs .

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: Y juntir ri tijcubˈaˈ jchˈolak chirij tijtaˈtakaˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús re Nicodemo .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Kakaj Dios jwiˈl subˈlaj tijlokˈaj juntir cristian xtakch Kakaj Jesús wich ulew ri xike jun chi Jcˈajol wiˈ . Y juntir ri tijcubˈaˈ jchˈolak chirij taˈ tisaach jwichak , tijtaˈtakaˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Kakaj Dios taˈ xtakch Jcˈajol wich ulew pire tiyuk raneˈ jkˈatbˈitzij chibˈak cristian , re xtakch Jcˈajol wich ulew pirechiˈ tiyuk jcoleˈ cristian laj jkˈabˈ jmacak .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Nen jonok tijcubˈaˈ jchˈol chirij Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios taˈ tibˈan kˈatbˈitzij chibˈ , pero nen jonok taˈ tijcubˈaˈ jchˈol chirij ri xike jun chi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios li wiˈ , xansajiˈ kˈatbˈitzij chibˈ .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Riˈ ri quiek jwiˈl tran jkˈatbˈitzij Kakaj Dios chibˈak juntir cristian . Taˈ rajak jwich kˈakˈ ri xyuk wich ulew jwiˈl rechak riˈ mas xeˈ ranmak chirij man ukuˈmal jwiˈl riˈ tijin trantak mak etzltak noˈj .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Nen jono cristian ri tibˈanow mak etzltak noˈj tijxutaˈ man kˈakˈ li , jwiˈl taˈ raj tiel chi sakil mak etzltak noˈj ri tijin chi jbˈanic .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Pero nen jonok tibˈanow tzitaklaj noˈj tijtocaˈ man kˈakˈ li pire ticˈutun chi tijin tran lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tran , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús re Nicodemo .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Cuando xantaj li , Kakaj Jesús xeˈ Judea pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij y xwaˈxtakaˈ claˈ chi jbˈanic jaˈtiox .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Y jilon Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox tijiniˈ chi jbˈanic jaˈtiox rechak cristian Enón chijcˈulel Salim jwiˈl claˈ wiˈ subˈlaj jaˈ . Y juntir cristian ri xtawtak riqˈuil , re xanaˈ jaˈtiox rechak .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Riˈ li xansaj cuando ajquiˈ chi cojsaj Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox li cars .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Xpe jujun rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox riqˈui jun rijajl Israel , xoctak chi jyolic chirij nen mas tzi trantak pire tisakabˈtak chiwch Kakaj Dios .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Xpe rechak , xeˈ jbˈijtak re Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox : Kajtijonl , winak ri xwaˈx aacˈl chˈakap re nimi jaˈ Jordán ri xayol chike , lajori tijin tran jaˈtiox rechak cristian y juntir cristian titawtak riqˈuil , xcheˈtak re Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Xpe Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , xij rechak : Taˈ ni jonok tiwaˈx rekleˈn wi maˈ Kakaj Dios taˈ tiyeˈw re .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Pero atak xataˈtakaˈ ri ximbˈij chawechak chi in maˈ in taˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , in xintaksajchke nabˈe chiwch re .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Li jun nimakˈij re cˈulniquil , man cˈojol winak ri wiˈ man kˈapoj anm riqˈuil , riˈ re ticˈuliˈy riqˈui man anm y man richcˈulchiˈ man cˈojol winak ri ticˈuliˈy ri wiˈ claˈ chi rilic man nimakˈij , re subˈlaj tiquiˈcot chi jtaic jyolj man cˈojol winak . Y jilon in lajori subˈlaj inquiˈcotc .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Re rajwaxiˈ nojel kˈij tijin tiniman mas jkˈij y in tijin tikej inkˈij , xcheˈ Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox rechak .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Y Juan xij chic : Jun ri tipe lecj riˈ re titakon chibˈ juntir ri wiˈtak wich ulew y juntir ri wiˈtak lecj . Nen jono ri reke wich ulew xike retam mak kelen re wich ulew y xike li tijyol . Pero jun ri tipe lecj , riˈ re titakon chibˈak juntir .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Re riˈ tijyol juntir ri ilan y tal jwiˈl , pero taˈ ni jonok ticojow re nen tijbˈij .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Pero wi wiˈ jonok ticojow jyolj , riˈ li ticˈutuw chi tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ ri tijbˈij Kakaj Dios .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Jun ri takalch jwiˈl Kakaj Dios wich ulew , Jyoljiˈ Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij , jwiˈl nojsaliˈ ranm laˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios jwiˈl Kakaj Dios .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Kakaj Dios subˈlaj tijlokˈaj Jcˈajol y xyaˈ juntir ri wiˈ wich ulew y juntir ri wiˈ lecj laj jkˈabˈ .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Nen ticubˈar jchˈol chirij Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios tijtaˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic . Pero nen taˈ ticubˈar jchˈol chirij Jcˈajol , taˈ tijtaˈ tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic . Subˈlaj cˈaxiˈ kˈatbˈitzij tibˈansaj chibˈ jwiˈl Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Mak fariseo xtatak jtaquil chi Kakaj Jesús ri Kajawl wiˈ mas cristian xoctak pi ajtijol ribˈak chirij chiwch Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox y wiˈ mas xan jaˈtiox rechak .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: Pero tzˈetel tzˈet maˈ riˈ taˈ Kakaj Jesús tijin tibˈanow jaˈtiox rechak , riˈtakaˈ yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús xta jtaquil chi jilonli xijsaj chirij , xelbˈi Judea , xkˈaj chic Galilea .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Y rajwaxna tikˈax Samaria .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Jilonli xtaw Sicar ri jun tilmit re Samaria , ri tican chijcˈulel man ulew ri xyeˈ Jacob re José ri jcˈajol .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Y claˈ wiˈ man cˈotobˈ ri tibˈijsaj jcˈotbˈ Jacob re . Kakaj Jesús subˈlaj cosol chi bˈe xcubˈar chijcˈulel man cˈotobˈ li chi uxlan , junquitz raj titicˈar kˈij re cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Y yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xeˈtak li tilmit chi jlokˈic kelen rechak re tijtijtak . Y xtaw jun anm aj Samaria chi jcˈamic jaˈ li man cˈotobˈ li . Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij re : Yeˈ junquitz ínjaˈ , xcheˈ re .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Xpe man anm li , xtzˈonaj re : ¿ Nen chac tatzˈonaj jaˈ chwe ? At atiˈ rijajl Israel y in iniˈ aj Samaria , xcheˈ re . Re xij jilonli jwiˈl yak rijajl Israel taˈ tiniqˈuibˈ jwichak riqˈuilak mak aj Samaria .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re anm : Witi awetam nen tijsipaj Kakaj Dios y witi awetam nen ri titzˈonin jaˈ chawe , li tatzˈonajiˈ jaˈ re y re tijyaˈ jaˈ chawe ri tiyeˈw tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic , xcheˈ re .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Xpe man anm li , xij chic re Kakaj Jesús : Kaj , taˈ nen quiek laˈ tawesaj ájaˈ y man cˈotobˈ ri , najiˈ jkejebˈ . ¿ Lacˈumas tacˈam jaˈ ri tiyeˈw tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic pire tayeˈ chwe ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: ¿ Mascˈu nim akˈij at chiwch kamam Jacob ri xcan yeˈw man cˈotobˈ ri chike , ri lamas xresaj jjaˈ re pach ralcˈwal ri xtijtak y xyeˈ re rawjak ? xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re man anm li : Juntir ri titijowtak re man jaˈ ri , tina jyeˈna chic chekej chiˈ rechak ,

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: pero nen titijiw re jaˈ ri tanyeˈ in , taˈ chiquiˈ ni jun bˈwelt tijyeˈ chekej chiˈ re , jwiˈl man jaˈ ri tanyeˈ in chi tijem tinimaniˈ laj ranm jun cristian , tranaˈ chapcaˈ jun relexebˈ jaˈ chi jyeˈic jun tzilaj cˈaslemal re riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Man anm xij chic re Kakaj Jesús : Kaj , yeˈ man jaˈ li chwe pire maˈ tichekej chic ínchiˈ y taˈ chiquiˈ impe neri chi resaj jaˈ , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re man anm : Jat , sicˈtach awichjil y atkˈaj chicch , xcheˈ re .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Man anm li xij : In taˈ wichjil , xcheˈ re . Kakaj Jesús xij re : Tzˈetiˈ tabˈij chi taˈ awichjil ,

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: jwiˈl jobˈchak chi winak quiek riqˈuil xatcˈuliˈyc y man jun winak ri wiˈ aacˈl lajori maˈ awichjil taˈn . Tzˈetiˈ ri xabˈij chwe chi taˈ awichjil , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús re .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Cuando xta man anm chi jilonli xijsaj re , xij : Kaj , tanta in atiˈ jun ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Yak kamam katitˈ aj Samaria xnimirsajtakaˈ jkˈij Kakaj Dios laˈ man witz ri , pero atak yak rijajl Israel tabˈijtak chi xike li tilmit Jerusalén tijnaˈ tikanimirsajwiˈ jkˈij Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : At anm , coj ri tambˈij chawe , tina tawna jun kˈij chi taˈ chiquiˈ rajwax atpetak laˈ man witz ri y taˈ chiquiˈ rajwax atbˈetak Jerusalén chi jnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Dios .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Atak aj Samaria taˈ awetamak nen chi dios ri tanimirsajtak jkˈij , pero oj ri oj rijajl Israel ketamiˈ chi riˈ tzˈetel Dios tikanimirsaj jkˈij jwiˈlke jun rechak yak rijajl Israel ticolmajtak cristian laj jkˈabˈ jmacak .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Pero tina tawna jun kˈij y lajori xtawiˈ man kˈij li cuando juntir yak ri tzˈetel ajnimirsaltak jkˈij Kakaj Dios tijnimirsajtak jkˈij laˈ jsantilak y kes tzˈetel tzˈet tijnimirsajtakaˈ jkˈij , jwiˈl Kakaj Dios riˈ tijtoc yak ri tinimirsantak jkˈij laˈ jsantilak .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Jwiˈl Kakaj Dios santiliˈn , jwiˈliˈli yak ri tinimirsantak jkˈij rajwaxiˈ tijnimirsajtak jkˈij laˈ jsantilak chapcaˈ raj Kakaj Dios tinimirsaj jkˈij , xcheˈ re man anm .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Man anm xij re : In wetamiˈ chi tina pena jun ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew ri tibˈijsaj Cristo re . Cuando re tipetc , tiyukiˈ jbˈij jcholajl chike juntir li , xcheˈ .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Iniˈ ri tabˈij , ri intijin chi yoloj aacˈl , xcheˈ re .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Aj tijiniˈ Kakaj Jesús chi yoloj riqˈui man anm cuando xkˈajtakch yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , rechak subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak chi rilic chi Kakaj Jesús tijin tiyolow riqˈui jun anm . Pero ni jonok xtzˈonin re nen raj o nen chac tijin chi yoloj riqˈui man anm li .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Xpe man anm li , xcan jyeˈ jkˈibˈ claˈ , xeˈ li tilmit chi jbˈij rechak cristian y xij rechak jilonri :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: Joˈ kileˈtak jun winak ri xij chwe juntir nen ri bˈanal inwiˈl . Pent riˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Y subˈlaj cristian li tilmit xeˈtak chi rilic Kakaj Jesús .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Cuando bˈesal man anm chi jsiqˈuij cristian , xpetak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo subˈlaj xpwersijtak Kakaj Jesús chi tijtij jwa , xijtak re : Kajtijonl , tij aw , xcheˈtak re .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : In wiˈ inw re tantij , atak taˈ awetamak nen chi wa lal , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xoctak chi jtzˈonaj chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Woninti jonok xcˈamowch jwa ? xcheˈtak .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Pi jqˈuexwach inw riˈ tambˈan lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tambˈan ri in takowinakch y tina inqˈuisna jbˈanic ri xij chwe .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Atak wiˈ jun ayoljak ri tabˈijtak : Aj rajiˈ quejabˈ icˈ pire tikachol jmolic jwich man ticoˈn , atcheˈtak . Pero in tambˈij chawechak : Naˈtuntak , iltak juntir mak ticoˈn kˈanchak , tzichak pire timolsaj jwich .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Jun ajmolol jwich ticoˈn tijcˈulaˈ jtojbˈl y ri jwich ticoˈn ri tijmol pirechiˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic , jwiˈliˈli man ajticonl pach man ajmolol ticoˈn tiquiˈcottakaˈn .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Chapcaˈ tijbˈij tzij : Jalan titiconanc y jalan timolow jwich man ticoˈn , ticheˈ .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: In xatintaktakbˈi pire atbˈetak chi jmolic jwich man ticoˈn ri lamas taˈ xatchacuntak . Jalan xchacuntak re y atak xatmolowtak jwich man ticoˈn li , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui cristian re man tilmit li re Samaria xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl ri xeˈ jbˈij man anm rechak , cuando xij rechak : Re xij chwe juntir nen ri bˈanal inwiˈl , xcheˈ rechak .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Cuando xtawtak mak aj Samaria riqˈui Kakaj Jesús , subˈlaj pwers xantak re pire tican riqˈuilak . Kakaj Jesús xcan quibˈ kˈij riqˈuilak claˈ .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Y wiˈ chiquiˈ subˈlaj qˈui cristian ri xcojtak ri xij Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Mak cristian xijtak re man anm : Lajori xcubˈariˈ kachˈol chirij , maˈ xitaˈke jwiˈl ri xabˈij chike , jwiˈliˈ xkataˈ jyolj ri tijbˈij . Lajori xketemajiˈ chi riˈ re ri ajcolol rechak juntir cristian laj jkˈabˈ jmacak , xcheˈtak .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Cuando xkˈax mak quibˈ kˈij li , ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xelbˈi Samaria xeˈ Galilea .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Kakaj Jesús bˈiliˈ jwiˈl chi jun ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios taˈ ticojsaj jkˈij y taˈ ticˈulsaj pi utzil laj jtilmit .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Cuando xtaw Kakaj Jesús Galilea xcˈulsajiˈ pi utzil jwiˈlak yak cristian , jwiˈl rechak xpetakaˈ Jerusalén chi rilic nimakˈij Pascua y rechak xrilaˈtakaˈ juntir ri xan claˈ .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Kakaj Jesús , cuando xtaw Galilea , xeˈ sucˈul Caná re Galilea lamas xan chi xwux jaˈ pi vin . Claˈ wiˈ jun jbˈabˈalak mak jsoldad man rey subˈlaj yaj jun jcˈajol ri wiˈ Capernaúm .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Y man jbˈabˈal soldad li , cuando xta jtaquil chi Kakaj Jesús xtaw chiquiˈ Galilea jiˈ jpetic Judea , xeˈ rileˈ y xtzˈonaj tokˈobˈ re chi tibˈe riqˈuil laj richoch pire tibˈe jtzibˈsaj jcˈajol ri camic re .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Atak ajriˈ tacojtak asta tina awiltakna cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ re .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Man jbˈabˈal soldad xij chic re : Kaj , bˈan tokˈobˈ , nabˈe joˈ laj or wiqˈuil chiwch ticam incˈajol , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Jat laj awichoch , acˈajol yoˈliˈn , xcheˈ re . Man jbˈabˈal soldad li xeˈ laj richoch , xcojaˈ nen xijsaj re jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Cuando tawem tran laj richoch , xeltakch mak jmocom chi jcˈulic , xijtak re : ¡ Acˈajol yoˈliˈn ! xcheˈtak re .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Y re xtzˈonaj rechak nen chi or lal xcholmaj jtzibˈic . Rechak xijtak re : Li nabˈe or re bˈesal kˈij xel man kˈakˈ chirij , xcheˈtak re .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ jkaj man ral acˈl li xcuxtaj jwiˈl chi riˈ man or li , ri xijsaj re jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús chi jcˈajol yoˈliˈn . Re pach rixokl y juntir ralcˈwal xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Riˈ li jcabˈ cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ri xan Kakaj Jesús cuando xtaw Galilea jiˈ jpetic Judea .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Cuando xkˈax quibˈ uxibˈ kˈij jbˈantaj juntir li jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús , xeˈ Jerusalén jwiˈl jun nimakˈij ri trantak yak rijajl Israel .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Y li man tilmit li chijcˈulel man pwert re oquebˈ ri tibˈijsaj Jpwert Mak Carner re , wiˈ jun nimlaj cˈotobˈ bˈanal claˈ ri tibˈijsaj Betesda re li tzˈijbˈal hebreo . Y chakˈchiˈ man cˈotobˈ li sutul rij laˈ jobˈ chinam .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Y laj jmujalak mak chinam li wiˈ subˈlaj qˈui yaj tzˈeˈltak , wiˈ moytak , coˈxtak y siquirnak jtioˈjlak tijin trulbˈejtak tisilibˈ man jaˈ .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Jwiˈl wiˈ jujun bˈwelt tikejch jun ranjl Kakaj Dios chi jsilibˈsaj man jaˈ li y nen jono rechak yak cristian ri yajtak ri nabˈe tikej li man jaˈ cuando tisilibˈsaj jwiˈl anjl , titzibˈiˈ re nen chi yajel ri wiˈ re .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Y claˈ wiˈ jun winak yaj ri xanaˈ junwinak waxaklajuj ( 38 ) junabˈ jtaˈic jyaj jwiˈl .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús , cuando xril chi tzˈeˈl sicˈ winak claˈ xretemaj chi ojrchak yaj , xtzˈonaj re : ¿ Chawajniˈ attzibˈc ? xcheˈ re .

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Sicˈ winak yaj xij re Kakaj Jesús : Kaj , taˈ nen inkesan li jaˈ cuando tisilibˈsaj man jaˈ jwiˈl anjl . Nojel bˈwelt cuando chwaj inkej li jaˈ , jalan tikej nabˈe chinwch , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Bˈiiten , cˈambˈi achˈatum cheˈ y woˈcoten , xcheˈ re .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Y laj or xtzibˈ sicˈ winak , xcˈambˈi jchˈatum cheˈ y xwoˈcotc . Y jwiˈl man kˈij li kˈijiˈ re uxlan ,

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: xpe mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel , xijtak re sicˈ winak li : Lajori kˈijiˈ re uxlan , taˈ yeˈl luwar chawe tawikajbˈi achˈatum cheˈ , xcheˈtak re .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Sicˈ winak li xij rechak : Winak ri xintzibˈsanc , xij chwe : Cˈambˈi achˈatum cheˈ y woˈcoten , xcheˈ chwe , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Rechak xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Nen xin chawe chi tacˈambˈi achˈatum cheˈ y atwoˈcotc ? xcheˈtak re .

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Y sicˈ winak taˈ xcwin chi jcˈutic nen xtzibˈsan re , jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús xsach ribˈ xoˈlak subˈlaj qˈui cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Cuando xantaj juntir li , Kakaj Jesús xril chic jwich sicˈ winak bˈatzˈaak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y xij re : Ta jcholajl , lajori xattzibˈiˈn , mat macun chic pire maˈ tipe jun ayaj mas cˈax chic chiwch ri xataˈ , xcheˈ re .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Xpe sicˈ winak li , xeˈ jbˈij rechak mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel chi riˈ Kakaj Jesús ri xtzibˈsan re .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel takel rij Kakaj Jesús jwiˈlak pire trantak cˈax re asta tijcamsajtak jwiˈl xtzibˈsaj sicˈ winak laˈ kˈij re uxlan .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Inkaj nojel kˈij tijin tran utzil y jilon in , tambˈanaˈ utzil , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli xpe chic mas retzalak mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel chirij , rajak roj tijcamsajtak jwiˈl re xan lawiˈ ri taˈ yeˈl luwar tibˈan laˈ kˈij re uxlan y jwiˈl re riˈ raj tijniqˈuibˈsaj ribˈ riqˈui Kakaj Dios jwiˈl xij chi riˈ Kakaj Dios Jkaj .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios taˈ nen tran pi ricˈan , xike tran lawiˈ ri tril ri tran Jkaj . Juntir ri tran Jkaj , jilon tran Jcˈajol .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Kakaj Dios tijlokˈajiˈ Jcˈajol y juntir ri tran tijcˈutaˈ chiwch y tijcˈutaˈ mas nimaktak kelen chiwch ri subˈlaj sachom chˈolal rilic ri xawiltak lajori , ri tisachow mas achˈolak chi rilic .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Jilon chapcaˈ Kakaj Dios tijcˈastasaj jwichak camnakibˈ pire tijyeˈ chic jcˈaslemalak y jilon Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios tijyaˈ jcˈaslemal nen quiek re raj tijyeˈ jcˈaslemal .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Y Kakaj Dios taˈ tran jkˈatbˈitzij chibˈ jono cristian , xjachaˈ juntir jkˈatbˈitzij laj jkˈabˈ Jcˈajol y riˈ Jcˈajol tibˈanow kˈatbˈitzij chibˈak juntir cristian wich ulew ,

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: pire juntir cristian tijcojtak jkˈij Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios chapcaˈ trantak chi jcojic jkˈij Kakaj Dios . Nen taˈ tijcoj jkˈij Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios , taˈ tijcoj jkˈij Kakaj Dios ri xtakowch re .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak , nen tijta inyolj ri tambˈij y ticubˈar jchˈol chirij ri intakowinakch , tijtaˈ tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic . Y taˈ tibˈan kˈatbˈitzij chibˈ , nicˈ riqˈuil xcamiˈn y xcˈastasajiˈ jwich laj jcamnakl .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi tina tawna jun kˈij y lajori xtawiˈ kˈij cuando yak cristian ri nicˈ riqˈuil camnaktak tijtatak jyolj Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios . Y yak ri tijtatak jyolj Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios y trantak lawiˈ ri tijbˈij tiyoˈrtakaˈn .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Jilon chapcaˈ Kakaj Dios wiˈ jcwinel chi jyeˈic jcˈaslemal ricˈan , xyaˈ jcwinel Jcˈajol chi jyeˈic jcˈaslemal .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Y xyaˈ kˈatbˈitzij laj jkˈabˈ pire tran kˈatbˈitzij chibˈak juntir cristian jwiˈl riˈ Jcˈajol ri xwux pi cristianil .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Mi sach achˈolak chi jtaic juntir ri , jwiˈl tina tawna jun kˈij juntir camnakibˈ tina jtatakna jyolj Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios laj jluwrak lamas mukultak

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: y tina eltaknach lamas mukultak . Yak ri xantak tzitaklaj noˈj ticˈastasaj jwichak laj jcamnaklak pire tijtaˈtak tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic . Pero yak ri xantak etzltak noˈj ticˈastasaj jwichak laj jcamnaklak pire tibˈan kˈatbˈitzij chibˈak .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: In , taˈ tambˈan inkˈatbˈitzij pi wicˈan . In tambˈan inkˈatbˈitzij chibˈ jun cristian jilon chapcaˈ ri bˈil chwe jwiˈl Kakaj Dios y inkˈatbˈitzij ri tambˈan pi jcholajliˈn . Jwiˈl maˈ riˈ taˈ tambˈan lawiˈ ri chwaj in , riˈ tambˈan lawiˈ raj ri intakowinakch .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Y wi inke imbˈin chwij chi tzˈetiˈ ri tijin tambˈij , juntir ri tambˈij taˈ nen tichacuj .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Pero wiˈ jun tibˈin chwij in chi tzˈetiˈ ri tambˈij y in wetamiˈ chi lawiˈ ri tijbˈij re chwij , kes tzˈetel tzˈetiˈn .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Atak xataktak jtzˈonaj re Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox y juntir ri xij re kes tzˈetiˈn .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Pero pi we in taˈ rajwax jono cristian tibˈin chwij chi tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ ri tambˈij . In tambˈij jilonli pirechiˈ atcolmajtak laj jkˈabˈ amacak .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox jilon chapcaˈ jun kˈakˈ tijumin jkˈakˈal y tijsakabˈsaj juntir y atak xatquiˈcottakaˈ quibˈ uxibˈ kˈij jwiˈl jsakil ri xan .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Pero wiˈ chiquiˈ nen tibˈin chwij chi tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ ri tambˈij . Re masna tresaj chi sakil chiwch ri xij Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox , jwiˈl juntir ri tambˈan riˈ ri xij Kakaj Dios chwe chi tambˈan y riˈ li ticˈutuw chi riˈ Kakaj Dios ri intakowinakch .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Y riˈ Kakaj Dios ri intakowinakch tibˈin chwij chi tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ ri tambˈij y atak taˈ tal jyolj awiˈlak y taˈ ilan jwich awiˈlak .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Witi tioc Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios laj awanmak , ticubˈariˈ achˈolak chirij ri takalch jwiˈl Kakaj Dios .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Atak tziyiˈ jtoquic jcholajl li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios tabˈantak jwiˈl tabˈij laj awanmak chi claˈ tijbˈij nen tabˈantak chi jtaˈic jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic y riˈ wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios li tibˈin chwij chi tzˈetiˈ ri tambˈij .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Pero taˈ chawajak tatatak inyolj pire tataˈtak tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: In taˈ chwaj tinimirsaj inkˈij jwiˈlak yak cristian .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Y wetamiˈ anoˈjak y wetamiˈ chi taˈ talokˈajtak Kakaj Dios .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: In , Kakaj Dios intakowinakch y atak taˈ tacˈultak inyolj , pero wi wiˈ jun chic laj jnoˈjke re tipetc , riˈ li tacˈulaˈtakaˈ jyolj pi utzil .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Atak taˈ tacojtak ri tambˈij jwiˈl riˈ mas kus tawiltak tacoj akˈijak chawibˈil aybˈak y taˈ atoctak il chi jbˈanic utzil pire ticojsaj akˈijak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios ri xike re jun chi Dios .

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Ma bˈij laj awanmak chi in , incojow tzij chawijak chiwch Kakaj Dios . Ri ticojow tzij chawijak chiwch Kakaj Dios , riˈ Moisés ri cubˈul achˈolak chirij .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Atak , witi tacojtak ri xij Moisés , titicaˈ acojtakreˈ ri tambˈij in jwiˈl Moisés xtzˈibˈajiˈ li wuj chwij in .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Pero wi mitaˈ tacojtak ri xtzˈibˈaj Moisés , taˈ tacojtak ri tambˈij in chawechak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Cuando xantaj li , Kakaj Jesús xeˈ chˈakap re nimlaj alagun ri jbˈij Galilea y ri tibˈijsaj Tiberias re .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui cristian xambˈertak chirij jwiˈl xrilaˈtakaˈ mak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ri xan chi jtzibˈsaj cristian re jyajak .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xjaw wich jun witz pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij y xcubˈartak claˈ .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Tawem tran jnimakˈjak yak rijajl Israel ri jbˈij Pascua .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xril chi subˈlaj qˈui cristian xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak chirij , xtzˈonaj re Felipe : ¿ Lamas tikalokˈ cuxlanwa pire tijtijtak juntir yak cristian ri ? xcheˈ re .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Re xij jilonli riˈke raj tijta nen tijbˈij Felipe . Re retamiˈ nen tran chi jtzukicak .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Felipe xij re Kakaj Jesús : Pero ni taˈ tran quibˈ cient ( 200 ) denario pire tilokˈsaj cuxlanwa laˈ pire tijtijtak qˈuitjaˈ rechak chi jujunalak , xcheˈ re .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Xpe Andrés ri jkˈun Simón Pedro , jun rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xij re Kakaj Jesús :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: Neri wiˈ jun ral acˈl cˈamalch jobˈ cuxlanwa jwiˈl bˈanal laˈ cebada pach quibˈ car , pero taˈ tran pire juntir cristian ri , xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Bˈijtak rechak juntir cristian chi ticubˈartak , xcheˈ rechak . Y laˈ man luwar li wiˈ subˈlaj qˈuim y chibˈ mak qˈuim li xcubˈartak juntir cristian , raj wiˈtakaˈ jobˈ ( 5 , 000 ) mil xike winak .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xcˈam mak cuxlanwa li y xcˈomowaj re Kakaj Dios , ajrucˈreˈ xij chi tijachsaj chiwchak juntir cristian ri xcubˈartak y jilon xan re mak car . Y mak cristian xwiˈntak asta xnojtak .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Cuando xcolajtak , xpe Kakaj Jesús xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Moltak mak qˈuer cuxlanwa ri taˈ xqˈuis pire maˈ tican sachok , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Y rechak xcˈoltak juntir mak qˈuer cuxlanwa ri bˈanal laˈ cebada y xnojsajtakna cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) chicach ri taˈ xqˈuisc .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Juntir cristian cuando xriltak man cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ri xan Kakaj Jesús , xijtak : Tzˈetel tzˈet winak ri , riˈ ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tina pena wich ulew , xcheˈtak .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Kakaj Jesús retamiˈ nen jchomorsaˈnak chi rechak riˈ rajak tijchaptakbˈi pire tijcojtak pire re rey , jwiˈliˈli xelbˈi claˈ , xakˈan chic mas bˈa witz pi ricˈan .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Cuando xoc akˈabˈ yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xkejtakbˈi chiˈ nimlaj alagun .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Y xjawtakbˈi li jun barc pire tikˈaxtakbˈi chˈakap re nimlaj alagun pire titawtak Capernaúm . Ukuˈmchak y ajquiˈ chi taw Kakaj Jesús riqˈuilak .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Xpe jun quiekˈekˈ tew bˈa jaˈ y xoc chi ritzˈbˈej mak retumb re man nimlaj alagun .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Cuando xjutuntakbˈi raj jun lewa pach pajnicˈj bˈa nimlaj alagun riˈchak xriltak Kakaj Jesús tijin tibˈench bˈa nimlaj alagun y tijin tijutun chijcˈulel man barc , rechak subˈlaj xtzaak jchˈolak .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Iniˈn , mi tzaak achˈolak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ rechak subˈlaj xquiˈcottak xijtak re Kakaj Jesús chi tijaw riqˈuilak li barc . Y cuando xjaw Kakaj Jesús li barc , riˈchak xricˈajtak wiˈtakchak chiˈ nimlaj alagun laˈ man luwar lamas rajak titawtak .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Laj jcabˈ kˈij mak cristian ri xcantak chˈakap re man nimlaj alagun xretemajtak chi yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xiˈtakaˈ li jun barc ri wiˈ chiˈ nimlaj alagun y xike jun barc li ri wiˈ claˈ y Kakaj Jesús taˈ xeˈ chijxoˈlak .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Y wiˈ nicˈj barc chic ri tipetak Tiberias xtawtak chiˈ nimlaj alagun nakaj re lamas xtijtak mak cuxlanwa subˈlaj qˈui cristian cuando Kakaj Jesús jorok jcˈomowajiˈ re Kakaj Dios .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Mak cristian , cuando xriltak chi taˈ Kakaj Jesús claˈ pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xjawtakbˈi li mak barc li , xeˈtak Capernaúm chi jtoquic Kakaj Jesús .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Cuando mak cristian xtawtak chˈakap re man nimlaj alagun , xeˈ jteˈtak Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonajtak re : Ajtijonl , ¿ nen or xatyuk neri ? xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi atak tijin inatoctak jwiˈlke xatijtak mak cuxlanwa wiqˈuil asta xatnojtak . Y maˈ jwiˈl taˈ xawetemajtak jcholajl mak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ri ximbˈan .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Mat octak il chi chac pire jchˈequic awak ri tike saach jwich , riˈ oquentak il chi chac pire jchˈequic awak ri taˈ jsachic jwich ri tiyeˈw jun tzilaj cˈaslemal chawechak riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic . Y riˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tiyeˈw wa li chawechak , jwiˈl Kakaj Dios xcˈutaˈ chi riˈ re xtakowch re , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Jwiˈliˈli mak cristian xtzˈonajtak re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Nencˈu rajwax tikabˈan pire ojcwin chi jbˈanic lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tikabˈan ? xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Ri raj Kakaj Dios tabˈantak , riˈ cubˈaˈ achˈolak chirij jun ri takalch jwiˈl , xcheˈ rechak .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Rechak xtzˈonajtak chic re : ¿ Nen jono cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios tacˈut chikawch pire tikil y tikacoj ayolj ? ¿ Nen jono kelen atcwin chi jbˈanic ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Kamam katitˈ ojrtaktzij xtijaˈtakaˈ maná li chekej luwar chapcaˈ tzˈibˈal li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri : Re xyaˈ cuxlanwa re lecj rechak chi tijem , ticheˈ , xcheˈtak mak cristian re Kakaj Jesús .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak , maˈ riˈ taˈ Moisés xyeˈw cuxlanwa re lecj rechak chi tijem , riˈ Inkaj xyeˈw . Y lajori riˈ tiyeˈw tzˈetel cuxlanwa re lecj chi tijem chawechak .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Jwiˈl cuxlanwa ri tijyeˈ Kakaj Dios chi tijem , riˈ ri xkejch lecj y xyuk wich ulew y riˈ re tiyeˈw jun tzilaj cˈaslemal rechak cristian .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Mak cristian xijtak chic re : Kaj , yeˈ man cuxlanwa li chike nojel kˈij , xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Iniˈ man cuxlanwa ri tiyeˈw jun tzilaj cˈaslemal . Y nen incˈuluw laj ranm ni jun bˈwelt tijyeˈ chic wiˈjal re y nen tijcubˈaˈ jchˈol chwij ni jun bˈwelt tijyeˈ chekej chiˈ re .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Ximbˈijiˈ chawechak chi xawilaˈtakaˈ inwch , pero taˈ ticubˈar achˈolak chwij .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Juntir yak ri tijachsajtak laj inkˈbˈ jwiˈl Kakaj Dios tina petakna wiqˈuil y nen tipe wiqˈuil taˈ twesajbˈic .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Jwiˈl in jiˈ impe lecj , maˈ pire taˈ tambˈan lawiˈ chwaj in , riˈ tambˈan lawiˈ raj ri intakowinakch .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Riˈ ri raj tambˈan ri intakowinakch , re taˈ raj tisaach jwich ni jono rechak yak ri jachal laj inkˈbˈ jwiˈl . Riˈ raj tancˈastasaj jwichak laj jcamnaklak laˈ qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Y riˈ raj Inkaj chi juntir cristian ri tiiliwtak juntir ri tran Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios y ticubˈar jchˈolak chirij , tijtaˈtakaˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic y in tancˈastasaj jwichak laj jcamnaklak laˈ qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Xpe yak rijajl Israel , xoctak chi yokˈon chirijil Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl xij : Iniˈ cuxlanwa ri xpe lecj , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Y yak rijajl Israel xijtak : Re jcˈajoliˈ José y oj tikachˈobˈaˈ jwich jkaj jchuch . ¿ Nen chac tijbˈij chi jiˈ xpe lecj ? xcheˈtak .

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Maytak yokˈon chwijil .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ni jonok ticwin tipe wiqˈuil wi maˈ riˈ taˈ Kakaj Dios ri intakowinakch tijachow laj inkˈbˈ y in tancˈastasaj jwich laj jcamnakl laˈ qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios xcan jtzˈibˈajtakaˈ chi juntir cristian titijojtakaˈ jwiˈl Kakaj Dios . Juntir yak ri titawtak re ri tijbˈij Kakaj Dios y tretemajtak nen tijbˈij , tipetakaˈ wiqˈuil .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Taˈ ni jonok iliwinak jwich Kakaj Dios , xike ri xpe lecj riqˈui Kakaj Dios ri iliwinak jwich Kakaj Dios .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak nen ticubˈar jchˈol chwij tijtaˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: In iniˈ cuxlanwa ri tiyeˈw jun tzilaj cˈaslemal .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Yak amam atitˈak ojrtaktzij xtijaˈtakaˈ maná ri xyeˈsaj rechak li chekej luwar , pero xcamtakaˈn .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Pero ri tijin tambˈij in chawechak riˈ cuxlanwa ri xpe lecj , nen titijiw re , taˈchiquiˈ ticamc .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Y in iniˈ cuxlanwa ri yoˈl ri xpe lecj , nen titijiw re man cuxlanwa li , taˈ chiquiˈ ticamc . Y man cuxlanwa li , riˈ intioˈjl ri tanyeˈ pi camic pire tijtaˈtak jun tzilaj cˈaslemal juntir cristian wich ulew , xcheˈ .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Yak rijajl Israel xpe retzalak , xoctak chi jtzˈonaj chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Nen mo ticwin man winak ri , tijyeˈ jtioˈjl chike chi tijem ? xcheˈtak .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak wi mitaˈ tatijtak jtioˈjl y jquiqˈuel Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , taˈ tataˈtak jun tzilaj cˈaslemal .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Y nen tijtij intioˈjl y inquiqˈuel tijtaˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic y in tancˈastasajiˈ jwich laj jcamnakl laˈ qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Jwiˈl intioˈjl riˈ tzˈetel wa y inquiqˈuel riˈ tzˈetel ucˈaˈ .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Nen titijiw re intioˈjl y inquiqˈuel tiwaˈxiˈ wiqˈuil y inwaˈxiˈ riqˈuil .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Kakaj Dios ri intakowinakch yoˈliˈn y jwiˈl re yoˈlquin in y jiˈcˈulon nen ri titijow re intioˈjl y inquiqˈuel tiyoˈriˈ inwiˈlke in .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Tijin inyolow chirij man cuxlanwa ri xpe lecj . Amam atitˈak ojrtaktzij xtijaˈtakaˈ maná , pero xcamtakaˈn . Pero nen titijiw re man cuxlanwa ri , taˈchiquiˈ ticamc , xcheˈ .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Jilonli xij Kakaj Jesús chi jtijoj cristian li sinagog cuando wiˈ Capernaúm .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui ribˈilak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo xtatak ri xij Kakaj Jesús rechak , xijtak : Juntir ri tijbˈij subˈlaj cˈax jtaic jcholajl . Taˈ nen ticwin chi jbˈanic juntir li , xcheˈtak .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús retamiˈ chi rechak taˈ tzi xtatak ri xij rechak , xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Cˈaxcˈu xatatak ri ximbˈij chawechak ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: ¿ Nen tabˈantak wi tawiltak Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tikˈaj lamas wiˈ nabˈe ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Riˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios ri tiyeˈw cˈaslemal y jun cristian taˈ ticwin chi jyeˈic cˈaslemal li . Mak yoloj ri ximbˈij chawechak , riˈ ri xij Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios y riˈ ri tiyeˈw cˈaslemal .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Pero wiˈ jujun chaxoˈlak taˈ tijcojtak ri tambˈij , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij . Kakaj Jesús retamchakch ojrtaktzij nen jono mak ri taˈ ticojowtak ri tijbˈij y retamchak nen tijachow re pi camic .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Jwiˈliˈli in ximbˈij chawechak chi taˈ ni jonok tipe wiqˈuil wi maˈ Kakaj Dios taˈ tijachow laj inkˈbˈ , xcheˈ rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Jwiˈl xij Kakaj Jesús jilonli , subˈlaj qˈui yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xcan jyeˈtak , taˈ chiquiˈ xambˈertak chirij .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xtzˈonaj rechak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) ajtijol ribˈak chirij : ¿ Miti jilon atak chawajakiˈ atbˈetak ? xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Xpe Simón Pedro , xij re : Wajawl , ¿ nenticˈu quiek riqˈuil ojbˈec ? Xike aacˈl at wiˈ yoloj ri tiyeˈw jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Oj tikacojaˈ ayolj y ketamiˈ chi at jiˈ xatpe riqˈui Kakaj Dios y tosolcatiˈ pire Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ re Kakaj Jesús .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Iniˈ xinchaˈw awechak chi atak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) , pero wiˈ jun chawechak etzliˈn , xcheˈ .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Re tijin tiyolow chirij Judas Iscariote ri jcˈajol Simón Iscariote ri tijachow pi camic , Judas riˈ jun rechak yak cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) jtakoˈn Kakaj Jesús .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Cuando xantaj li , Kakaj Jesús xwoˈcot lak luwar re Galilea , taˈ raj tibˈe Judea jwiˈl mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel rajak tijcamsajtak .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Jwiˈl tawem tran man nimakˈij ri jbˈij Tabernáculo jun jnimakˈjak yak rijajl Israel ,

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: xpe yak jkˈun Kakaj Jesús , xijtak re : Mat waˈx neri , rajwaxiˈ atbˈe Judea pire triltak yak ajtijol ribˈak chawij juntir ri tabˈan .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Ni jun cristian ri raj tichˈobˈsaj jwich tran kelen chi mukukil . At , wi tabˈan mak kelen jilonli , bˈan chiwchak juntir cristian , xcheˈtak re .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Jilonli xijsaj re Kakaj Jesús jwiˈlak yak jkˈun jwiˈl taˈ tijcojtak ri tijin tran .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak : Ajquiˈ chi taw kˈij pi we in , pero pi awe atak juntirke kˈij tzi .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Mak cristian ri retake wich ulew , taˈ atjxuttak . Pero in injxutaˈtakaˈ jwiˈl in twesajiˈ chi sakil juntir mak etzltak noˈj ri tijintak chi jbˈanic .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Jat atak li nimakˈij . In taˈ imbˈec jwiˈl ajquiˈ chi taw kˈij pi we in , xcheˈ rechak .
