text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Cuando Kakaj Jesús xijmaj jilonli jwiˈl rechak yak jkˈun , xcan Galilea .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús cuando jorok bˈiˈ yak jkˈun li nimakˈij , ajrucˈreˈ xeˈ chic re , chi mukukilke xeˈ rileˈ nimakˈij .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel xtocaˈtakaˈ Kakaj Jesús xoˈlak cristian li nimakˈij , xijtak : ¿ Lachiquiˈmas wiˈ man winak ? xcheˈtak .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Y xoˈlak cristian wiˈ nicˈj tijintak chi yoloj chiribˈil ribˈak chirijil Kakaj Jesús . Wiˈ jujun tijbˈijtak : Jun tzilaj winakiˈn , ticheˈtak . Y jujun chic tijbˈijtak : Maˈ jun tzilaj winak taˈn , tike tijin tijsubˈ cristian , ticheˈtak .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Pero chiribˈilke ribˈak tiyolowtak chirij Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl titzaak jchˈolak chiwchak mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Cuando xnicˈajir man nimakˈij , ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xjawbˈi li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y xoc chi jtijojcak cristian .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel subˈlaj xsaach jchˈolak chi jtaic , xijtak : ¿ Lachiquiˈmas xretemaj subˈlaj jnoˈj y lachiquiˈmas xtijojwiˈ ribˈ ? xcheˈtak .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Ri tijon tambˈan maˈ we taˈ in , rechiˈ Kakaj Dios ri intakowinakch , xcheˈ rechak .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Wi wiˈ jonok raj tran lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tran , tijchˈobˈaˈ wi jiˈ petzal riqˈui Kakaj Dios ri tijon tambˈan o laj imbˈke tipeˈw ri tambˈij .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Jun ri laj jbˈake tipeˈw ri tijbˈij , riˈke raj ticojsaj jkˈij jwiˈlak cristian , pero nen jonok tran jun kelen pire ticojsaj jkˈij ri xtakowch re , re tijbˈijiˈ tzˈetel tzij y taˈ tijbˈij joˈslaj tzij .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Moisés xcan jyeˈ mak pixabˈ li chawechak , pero ni jono chawechak ticojow mak pixabˈ li . ¿ Nen chac chawajak inacamsajtak ? xcheˈ rechak .

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Mak cristian xijtak re : At wiˈ etzl laj awanm , taˈ ni jun tijchomorsaj acamsaj , xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Jwiˈlke jun chi cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ximbˈan laˈ kˈij re uxlan atak juntir subˈlaj xsaach achˈolak chi rilic .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Moisés xatjtaktak chi jcojic retal atioˈjlak . Pero maˈ riˈ taˈ re xcholow jbˈanic jilonli , riˈtakaˈ yak amamak xcholowtak jcojic retal jtioˈjlak y atak laˈ kˈij re uxlan tacojaˈtakaˈ retal jtioˈjlak yak acˈajolak .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Wi atak maˈ jwiˈl taˈ tikˈax mas awechak chiwch Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios cuando tacojtak retal jtioˈjl yak acˈajolak lak kˈij re uxlan , ¿ nen chac xpe awetzalak chwij in jwiˈl xintzibˈsaj jun cristian laˈ kˈij re uxlan ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Atak ma bˈijtak chi jun cristian taˈ tzi tran jwiˈlke ri tawiltak , rajwaxiˈ tachomorsajtak nen tabˈijtak pire maˈ tabˈijtak jun yoloj ri maˈ pi jcholajl taˈn , xcheˈ .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xpetak nicˈj cristian aj Jerusalén xoctak chi jtzˈonaj chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Maˈ ron taˈ winak li tijin jtoquic pire ticamsaj ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Wiˈ quili tijin tiyolow riqˈuilak cristian y taˈ nen tibˈijsaj re . ¿ Xcojaˈtakcˈu mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel chi riˈ re ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Oj ketamiˈ lamas tipeˈw man winak li . Pero cuando tipet ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , taˈ ni jonok tieteman re lamas tipeˈw , xcheˈtak .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Kakaj Jesús tijin chi jtijoj cristian li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios cuando xta chi jilonli tijin tibˈijsaj chirij , subˈlaj cow xchˈaˈwc , xij : Atak tachˈobˈaˈtakaˈ inwch y awetamakiˈ lamas impeˈw , pero in maˈ laj innoˈj taˈke ximpetc . In takalquinkech jwiˈl jun ri kes tijnaˈ ticubˈar jchˈol jun cristian chirij y atak taˈ awetamak nen tran .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: In wetamiˈ nen tran jwiˈl riqˈuiliˈ re petzalquinwiˈ y riˈ re xintakowch , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli rajak roj xchapeˈtak Kakaj Jesús , pero ni jonok xchapow re jwiˈl ajquiˈ chi taw kˈij tichapsaj .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui cristian ri xcojowtak Jyolj , xijtak : Cuando tipe ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , ¿ toncˈu ranaˈ mas nimaktak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios chiwch ri tran winak ri ? xcheˈtak .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Mak fariseo xtatak ri tijbˈijtak mak cristian chirij Kakaj Jesús . Xpe rechak pach mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xtaktak nicˈj ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios chi jchapic Kakaj Jesús .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Xpe Kakaj Jesús , xij : In quibˈ uxibˈ kˈijke inwaˈx aacˈlak y inkˈaj chic riqˈui ri xintakowch .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Atak inatocaˈtakaˈ chiquiˈn , pero taˈ chiquiˈ inataˈtak jwiˈl taˈ atcwintak chi bˈenam lamas imbˈe waˈxwiˈ in , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xpe mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel , xoctak chi jtzˈonaj chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Lamas chiquiˈ tibˈeˈw man winak ri , tijbˈij chi oj taˈ ojcwin chi jtaˈic ? ¿ Toncˈuti bˈiˈ riqˈuilak yak rijajl Israel ri tilem ribˈak chijxoˈlak yak maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel pire tibˈe jtijojtak yak maˈ rijajl Israel ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: ¿ Nen chiquiˈ jcholajl tielwiˈ ri xij chike chi atak inatocaˈtakaˈ chiquiˈn , pero taˈ chiquiˈ inataˈtak jwiˈl taˈ atcwintak chi bˈenam lamas imbˈe waˈxwiˈ in ? xcheˈ , xcheˈtak .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Li man qˈuisbˈi kˈij re man nimakˈij , riˈ man kˈij li ri mas nim jkˈij , xpe Kakaj Jesús xwaˈr , subˈlaj cow xchˈaˈwc , xij : Nen wiˈ chekej chiˈ re , petok wiqˈuil jtijeˈ rucˈaˈ .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Nen ticojon chinwch chapcaˈ ri tijbˈij li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios , tina elexna jaˈ ri yoˈl laj ranm , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Y ri jcholajl ri xij Kakaj Jesús rechak chirijiˈ Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios ri tijcˈultak laj ranmak yak cristian ri ticubˈar jchˈolak chirij , pero ajquiˈ chi yeˈsaj Lokˈlaj Jsantil Kakaj Dios rechak jwiˈl ajquiˈ chi kˈajbˈi Kakaj Jesús lecj .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Jujun rechak yak cristian , cuando xtatak chi jilonli xijsaj rechak , xijtak : Tzˈetel tzˈet winak ri , riˈ ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tina pena , xcheˈtak .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Y nicˈj chic xijtak : Riˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , xcheˈtak . Pero nicˈj chic xijtak : Ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew maˈ jiˈtaˈ tipe Galilea , xcheˈtak .

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios tijbˈij chi jun ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew rijajliˈ David y jiˈ tipe Belén ri jtilmit David , xcheˈtak .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli mak cristian nak xtos ribˈak jwiˈl taˈ xniqˈuibˈ jwich jyoljak chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Y wiˈ jujun rechak rajak roj xchaptak Kakaj Jesús , pero taˈ ni jonok xchapow re .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Mak ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios xkˈajtak chic riqˈuilak mak fariseo pach mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios . Xpe rechak xtzˈonajtak rechak mak ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios : ¿ Nen chac taˈ xacˈamtakch ? xcheˈtak rechak .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Mak ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios xijtak : Taˈ ni jono cristian tiyolow chapcaˈ man winak li , xcheˈtak .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Mak fariseo xtzˈonajtak chic rechak : ¿ Miti xayaˈ aybˈak chi subˈem re man winak li ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: ¿ Woncˈu jono rechak mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel o mak fariseo xcojowtak jyolj ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Mak cristian ri taˈ retamak nen tijbˈij Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios , tibˈaniˈ kˈatbˈitzij chibˈak , xcheˈtak rechak mak ajchajaltak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Nicodemo , jun rechak mak fariseo ri xeˈ solinok re Kakaj Jesús , xij rechak mak nicˈj fariseo chic :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: Kapixbˈ tijbˈij chi taˈ tijnaˈ tibˈansaj kˈatbˈitzij chibˈ jono cristian wi mitaˈ titasaj nabˈe nen bˈanal jwiˈl , xcheˈ Nicodemo rechak mak jpach .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Xpe mak jpach , xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Atcˈu aj Galilea ? Toc impuch li wuj re Lokˈlaj Jyolj Kakaj Dios , ticˈu awil chi taˈ ni jono ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios tipe Galilea , xcheˈtak re .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ juntir xeˈtak laj richochak chi jujunalak .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús xeˈ bˈa witz ri jbˈij Olivos .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Y cuando xsakarsan laj jcabˈ kˈij , xkˈaj chic li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios , subˈlaj qˈui cristian xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak chirij chi jtaic jyolj y re xcubˈarc y xoc chi jtijojcak .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Xpe yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios pach mak fariseo , xcˈamtakch jun anm riqˈui Kakaj Jesús . Man anm li xeˈ jteˈtak tijin tiechbˈej jwiˈl jun jalan winak chic ri maˈ jcˈulajl taˈn . Xwabˈaˈtak man anm li chiwchak juntir cristian ri wiˈtak claˈ .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Y xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Ajtijonl , man anm ri xkataˈch tijin tiechbˈej jwiˈl jun jalan winak chic ri maˈ jcˈulajl taˈn .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios tijbˈij chi ticamsaj chi abˈaj mak anm ri jilon trantak li . Y at , ¿ nen tabˈij chirij ? xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Rechak xijtak jilonli re Kakaj Jesús riˈke rajak tijtatak wi taˈ tzi tijbˈij chirij man anm li pire tijcojtak tzij chirij . Ajrucˈreˈ xpe Kakaj Jesús , xtacarc , xoc chi tzˈibˈan lak ulew laˈ jbˈa jkˈabˈ .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Jwiˈl rechak taˈ tijmaytak jtzˈonaj re Kakaj Jesús , xpe re xwaˈrc y xij rechak : Nen jono chawechak ri taˈ jmac , jtˈojeˈ man nabˈe abˈaj chirij man anm ri , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Xtacar chic xoc chic chi tzˈibˈan lak ulew .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Cuando xtatak yak ajtijoltak cristian re Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios pach mak fariseo chi jilonli xijsaj rechak jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús , xeˈtak chi jujunalak . Riˈ nabˈe xeˈtak mak riˈjabˈ , ajrucˈreˈ xeˈtak juntir mak jpachak . Xichak Kakaj Jesús xcan claˈ pach man anm li .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xwaˈr chic y xtzˈonaj re man anm : At chuch , ¿ lamas wiˈtakwiˈ mak ri xcojowtak tzij chawij ? ¿ Contaˈ jonok xanow jkˈatbˈitzij chawij ? xcheˈ re .

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Y man anm xij re : Taˈ ni jonok , Kaj , xcheˈ re . Kakaj Jesús xij re : Jilon in taˈ tambˈan kˈatbˈitzij chawij . Jat y mat macun chic , xcheˈ re .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak cristian : Iniˈ jun kˈakˈ pi rechak juntir cristian wich ulew . Nen titaken jbˈanic lawiˈ ri tijbˈij incˈutuˈn , tiwaˈxiˈ chi sak ri tiyeˈw cˈaslemal y taˈ chiquiˈ tibˈen li ukuˈmal , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Xpetak mak fariseo , xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Atke , atbˈin chawij chi tzˈetiˈ ri tijin tabˈij . Jwiˈliˈli ri tijin tabˈij taˈ jcholajl , xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Tzˈetiˈ chwijke in tijin tambˈij , pero ri tijin tambˈij kes tzˈetel tzˈetiˈn , jwiˈl in wetamiˈ lamas ximpeˈw y wetamiˈ lamas imbˈeˈw . Pero atak taˈ awetamak lamas ximpeˈw , ni taˈ awetamak lamas imbˈeˈw , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Atak tabˈantak kˈatbˈitzij chirijak cristian laˈke mak noˈj ri reke wich ulew , pero in taˈ tambˈan kˈatbˈitzij chirij ni jono cristian .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Y wi tambˈan kˈatbˈitzij chirij cristian , inkˈatbˈitzij ri tambˈan pi jcholajliˈn , jwiˈl in taˈ tambˈan kˈatbˈitzij chirij cristian pi wicˈan , impachiˈ Inkaj ri xintakowch .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Lak wuj re apixbˈak tzˈibˈaliˈ chi wi wiˈ quibˈ tibˈintak nicˈ chirij ri ilan o tal jwiˈlak riˈ li ticojsajc .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Tzˈetiˈn , iniˈ jun tijin tambˈij chi tzˈetiˈ ri tambˈij . Y Kakaj Dios ri xintakowch riˈ jun tibˈin chwij chi tzˈetiˈ ri tambˈij , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Rechak xtzˈonajtak chic re : ¿ Lamas wiˈ akaj ? xcheˈtak re . Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Atak taˈ awetamak nen tambˈan in y taˈ awetamak nen tran Inkaj . Witi awetamak nen tambˈan in , awetamakiˈ nen tran Inkaj , xcheˈ rechak .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij juntir li cuando tijin chi jtijojcak cristian li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios laˈ man luwar lamas tiyeˈsajwiˈ pwak ri tisipaj re Kakaj Dios . Pero ni jonok xchapow re Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl ajquiˈ chi taw kˈij tichapsaj .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : In imbˈiˈn y atak inatocaˈtakaˈn , pero ajwatakaˈ laj jkˈabˈ amacak atcamtak . Atak taˈ atcwintak chi bˈenam lamas imbˈe in , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Xpe mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel , xijtak : Re tijbˈij chi taˈ ojcwin chi bˈenam lamas tibˈeˈw , ¿ toncˈu bˈi jcamsaj ribˈ ? xcheˈtak .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Atak atakaˈ aj neri wich ulew , pero in jiˈ impe lecj . Atak atake re wich ulew , pero in maˈ in taˈ re wich ulew .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli ximbˈij chawechak chi atak ajwatakaˈ laj jkˈabˈ amacak atcamtak . Wi taˈ tacojtak ri tambˈij chwij in , ajwatakaˈ laj jkˈabˈ amacak atcamtak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Rechak xtzˈonajtak re Kakaj Jesús : ¿ Nencˈu abˈanic atbˈan ? xcheˈtak re . Y re xij chic rechak : Ojrchak xinticarch chi jbˈij chawechak nen imbˈanic in .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Wiˈ mas chwaj tambˈij chawechak chirijak mak noˈj ri taˈ tzi ri tijin tabˈantak . Ri intakowinakch tzˈetel tzˈetiˈ tijbˈij y ri tambˈij in rechak juntir cristian riˈ ri tal inwiˈl ri tijbˈij ri intakowinakch , xcheˈ rechak .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Pero rechak taˈ xmajtak chirij chi riˈ Kakaj Dios ri tijin tijbˈij rechak .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli xij chic rechak : Cuando tacamsajtak wich curs Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil , ajrucˈreˈ tawetemajtak nen imbˈanic in . In taˈ tambˈan jun kelen pi wicˈan , in xike tambˈij ri bˈil chwe jwiˈl Kakaj Dios .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Kakaj Dios ri intakowinakch wiˈ wiqˈuil , taˈ canalquin wicˈan jwiˈl , jwiˈl riˈ tambˈan lawiˈ ri tzi tril re , xcheˈ rechak .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Cuando xij Kakaj Jesús jilonli , subˈlaj qˈui cristian xcojowtak Jyolj .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak yak rijajl Israel ri xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij : Atak wi kes tzˈet tatakejtak jbˈanic ri ximbˈij chawechak , tzˈetel tzˈet atakaˈ ajtijol aybˈak chwij

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: y tawetemajtakaˈ tzˈetel tzij ri quiek jwiˈl attakmajtakbˈic , xcheˈ rechak .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Rechak xijtak re Kakaj Jesús : Oj ojiˈ rijajl Abraham , ni jun bˈwelt xwaˈx kajw . ¿ Nen chac tabˈij at chi ojtakmajbˈic ? xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak , juntir cristian ri timacuntak , wiˈtakaˈ laj jkˈabˈ jmacak chapcaˈ jun cristian wiˈ rajw .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Jun cristian ri wiˈ rajw taˈ tiwaˈx pi ralcˈwal ja , pero jun jcˈajol man patron tiwaˈxiˈ jwiˈl ralcˈwal jaiˈn .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Wi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios atesantak laj jkˈabˈ amacak , kes tzˈetel tzˈet ateltakaˈ laj jkˈabˈ amacak .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Wetamiˈ chi atak atakaˈ rijajl Abraham , pero chawajak inacamsajtak jwiˈl taˈ tacˈultak inyolj .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: In cuando inyolow , riˈ tambˈij ri cˈutul chinwch jwiˈl Inkaj y atak riˈ tabˈantak ri bˈil chawechak jwiˈl akajak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Rechak xijtak chic re Kakaj Jesús : ¡ Riˈ kamam Abraham ! xcheˈtak re . Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Witi kes tzˈet atak rijajl Abraham , titicaˈ abˈantakreˈ chapcaˈ xan re .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: In riˈ ximbˈij chawechak ri tzˈetel tzij ri xij Kakaj Dios chwe y ajwichiˈ chawajak inacamsajtak . ¡ Abraham ni jun bˈwelt xan jilonli !

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Atak jilon tabˈantak chapcaˈ tran akajak , xcheˈ rechak . Rechak xijtak chic re Kakaj Jesús : Oj maˈ oj taˈ mak cristian ri taˈ naˈl nen jkajak , junke kakaj wiˈ , xike Kakaj Dios , xcheˈtak .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Witi kes tzˈet riˈ Kakaj Dios akajak , inticaˈ alokˈajtakreˈ jwiˈl in jiˈ ximpe riqˈui Kakaj Dios y lajori win neri . In taˈ ximpet laj innoˈjke , Kakaj Diosiˈ xintakowch .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Atak taˈ tatatak jcholajl ri tambˈij chawechak jwiˈl taˈ chawajak tatatak inyolj .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Akajak riˈ man jbˈabˈal etzl y riˈ chawajak tabˈantak lawiˈ raj re tabˈantak . Man jbˈabˈal etzl ajcamsanliˈ cuando xcholmajch jwich kˈijsak . Ni jun bˈwelt tijbˈij tzˈetel tzij jwiˈl taˈ tzˈetel tzij laj jchiˈ . Cuando tijbˈij jun yoloj ri mitaˈ tzˈet jilon jbˈij tran chapcaˈ tzˈetel tzij , jwiˈl re ajbˈil joˈslaj tzijiˈn y riˈ re jkajak mak ajbˈil joˈslaj tzij .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Jwiˈl tzˈetel tzijiˈ tambˈij chawechak , atak taˈ tacojtak .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: ¿ Nen jono chawechak ticwin chi jbˈij chi in wiˈ immac ? Y wi tzˈetel tzijiˈ ri tambˈij , ¿ nen chac taˈ tacojtak inyolj ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Nen wiˈ laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios tijcojaˈ Jyolj Kakaj Dios . Atak jwiˈl taˈ watak laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Dios taˈ chawajak tatatak Jyolj Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Yak rijajl Israel xijtak chic re Kakaj Jesús : Tzˈetiˈ ri tikabˈij chawij chi at atiˈ aj Samaria y wiˈ jun etzl laj awanm , xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : In taˈ ni jono etzl laj wanm . In riˈ tancoj jkˈij Inkaj y atak taˈ tacojtak inkˈij .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: In taˈ chwaj ticojsaj inkˈij , pero wiˈ jun ri raj ticojsaj inkˈij y re tranaˈ jkˈatbˈitzij chirijak mak ri taˈ tijcojtak inkˈij .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi nen jonok ticojow inyolj , taˈ ticamc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Yak rijajl Israel xijtak chic re Kakaj Jesús : Lajori ketamchak chi tzˈetiˈ wiˈ jun etzl laj awanm . Abraham pach yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios xcamtakaˈn y at tabˈij chi nen ticojow ayolj , taˈ ticamc .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: ¿ Mascˈu nim akˈij at chiwch kamam Abraham ? Re xcamiˈn y yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios xcamtakaˈn . ¿ Nencˈu acholajl at ? xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Witi tannimirsaj inkˈij in wicˈan taˈ nen tichacuj . Ri tinimirsan inkˈij riˈ Inkaj ri tabˈij atak chi riˈ aDiosak .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Pero atak taˈ awetamak nen tran , in wetamiˈ nen tran y wi tambˈij chi taˈ wetam nen tran , iniˈ ajbˈil joˈslaj tzij chapcaˈ atak . Pero kes tzˈetel tzˈet wetamiˈ nen tran y riˈ tambˈan nen tijbˈij .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Abraham ri amamak subˈlaj xquiˈcot cuando xta chi tina rilna titaw inkˈij . Cuando xril xtaw inkˈij subˈlaj xquiˈcotc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Xpe yak rijajl Israel , xijtak chic re : Ajquiˈneˈ caˈwinak lajuj ( 50 ) ajunbˈ y at tabˈij chi xawilaˈ jwich Abraham , xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi winchak cuando ajquiˈ chi qˈuisiˈy Abraham , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Xpe rechak , xeˈ jcˈameˈtak abˈaj pire roj xcojtak re Kakaj Jesús . Pero re xmuk ribˈ xoˈlak cristian xelbˈi li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Kˈaxem tran Kakaj Jesús li bˈe cuando xril jun sicˈ winak ri moychak cuando xqˈuisiˈyc .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Xpe yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo , xtzˈonajtak re : Kajtijonl , ¿ nen chac moychak winak ri cuando xqˈuisiˈyc ? ¿ Jwiˈlniˈ xmacunc o jwiˈliˈ jmac jkaj jchuch ? xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Maˈ jwiˈl taˈ xmacunc , ni maˈ jwiˈl taˈ xmacun jkaj jchuch . Pirechiˈ tiilsaj chirij re ri ticwin Kakaj Dios chi jbˈanic .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Cuando aj lakˈjiˈn , rajwaxiˈ tikabˈantak neri wich ulew lawiˈ raj ri intakowinakch , jwiˈl cuando tioc akˈabˈ taˈ chiquiˈ ni jonok ticwinc .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Lajori in jwiˈl ajwiniˈ neri wich ulew , iniˈ jun kˈakˈ pi rechak juntir cristian wich ulew , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Cuando xijmaj jilonli jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús xchubˈan lak ulew , xan jun raquitz xokˈol laˈ raˈl jchubˈ , ajrucˈreˈ xtzˈaj laˈ bˈakˈ jwich sicˈ moy .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Y xij re : Jat chˈajta acaybˈal li man cˈotobˈ ri jbˈij Siloé , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús re . ( Ri jcholajl tielwiˈ man bˈij Siloé , takalbˈic . ) Sicˈ moy xeˈ jchˈajeˈ jcaybˈal y cuando xkˈajch , tichak naˈtunc .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Xpetak mak jcˈulja pach mak cristian ri iliwinaktak re tijtzˈonaj limoxn , xijtak : ¿ Maˈ ron taˈ winak ri ticubˈar chi jtzˈonaj limoxn ? xcheˈtak .

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Wiˈ jujun rechak xijtak : Riˈn , xcheˈtak . Y wiˈ jujun chic xijtak : Maˈ riˈ taˈn , xike jilon rilic chapcaˈ sicˈ moy , xcheˈtak . Pero sicˈ winak li xij : Tzˈetiˈn , iniˈn , xcheˈ .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Xpetak mak cristian , xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Nen mo li atchak naˈtunc ? xcheˈtak re .

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Re xij rechak : Riˈ winak ri Jesús jbˈij xintzibˈsanc . Xan jun raquitz xokˈol y xtzˈaj laˈ bˈakˈ inwch y xij chwe : Jat laˈ man cˈotobˈ ri jbˈij Siloé pire tibˈe achˈajeˈ acaybˈal claˈ , xcheˈ chwe . Y in ximbˈec y cuando xchˈajmaj incaybˈal , inchak naˈtunc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Xpetak mak cristian , xtzˈonajtak re sicˈ winak li : ¿ Lamas wiˈ man winak li ? xcheˈtak re . Y re xij : Taˈ wetam lamas wiˈw , xcheˈ rechak .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Rechak xcˈamtakbˈi riqˈuilak mak fariseo sicˈ winak ri xtzibˈsaj bˈakˈ jwich .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Laˈ man kˈij li , cuando Kakaj Jesús xan xokˈol y xtzibˈsaj bˈakˈ jwich sicˈ moy , kˈijiˈ re uxlan .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli xpe mak fariseo xtzˈonajtak re nen xan pire xnaˈtunc . Re xij rechak : Xtzˈaj xokˈol laˈ bˈakˈ inwch y in xinchˈaj , jilonli inchak naˈtunc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Jujun rechak mak fariseo xijtak : Man winak ri xanow jilonli maˈ riqˈui taˈ Kakaj Dios tipeˈw , naˈliˈ taˈ tijcoj jkˈij man kˈij re uxlan , xcheˈtak . Pero nicˈj chic xijtak : ¿ Nencˈu chac ticwin chi jbˈanic cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios li wi ajmaquiˈn ? xcheˈtak . Jilonli taˈ xniqˈuibˈ jchomorsaˈnak chiribˈil ribˈak mak fariseo .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Xtzˈonajtak chic re sicˈ winak ri xtzibˈsaj bˈakˈ jwich : Y rucˈ at , ¿ nen tabˈij chirij man winak li ri xtzibˈsan bˈakˈ awch ? xcheˈtak re . Y re xij rechak : Tambˈij in ajkˈasal Jyoljiˈ Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ rechak .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Pero mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel taˈ tijcojtak chi sicˈ winak li moyiˈ ojr y lajori tichak naˈtunc , jwiˈliˈli xtaktakna jsiqˈuij jkaj jchuch sicˈ winak li

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: y xijtak rechak : ¿ Roniˈ awalcˈwalak ri , ri tabˈijtak chi moychak cuando xqˈuisiˈyc ? ¿ Nen chac tichak naˈtunc ? xcheˈtak rechak .

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Y jkaj jchuch xijtak : Ketamiˈ chi riˈ ri kalcˈwal y moychak cuando xqˈuisiˈyc .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Pero oj taˈ ketam nen chac tichak naˈtunc . Y taˈ ketam nen xtzibˈsan re bˈakˈ jwich . Tzˈonajtak re , re wiˈchak junbˈ , tichak cwin chi jbˈij chawechak nen xtzibˈsan re , xcheˈtak rechak .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Jkaj jchuch xijtak jilonli jwiˈl jtzakic jchˈolak chiwchak mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel , jwiˈl mak bˈabˈal li chomorsalchak jwiˈlak chi tresajtakbˈi li sinagog nen jono cristian tibˈin chi Kakaj Jesús riˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli jkaj jchuch xijtak : Tzˈonajtak re , re wiˈchak junbˈ , xcheˈtak .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Xpetak mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel , xtaktak chic jsiqˈuij sicˈ winak ri moy ojr y xijtak re : Bˈij tzˈetel tzij chike chiwch Kakaj Dios , oj ketamiˈ chi man winak li ajmaquiˈn , xcheˈtak re .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Sicˈ winak xij chic rechak : In taˈ wetam wi ajmaquiˈn o taˈn . In xike wetam chi iniˈ moy , pero lajori inchak naˈtunc , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Y rechak xtzˈonajtak chic re : ¿ Nen xan chawe ? ¿ Nen xan chi jtzibˈsaj bˈakˈ awch ? xcheˈtak chic re .

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Re xij chic rechak : Ximbˈijiˈ chawechak y atak taˈ tacojtak . ¿ Nen chac chawajak tambˈij chic jun bˈwelt chawechak ? ¿ Chawajakcˈu atoctak pire ajtijol aybˈak chirij ? xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Xpetak rechak , xoctak chi jpetzaj retzal sicˈ winak , xijtak re : At , atiˈ ajtijol aybˈ chirij man winak li , pero oj ojiˈ ajtijol kibˈ chirij Moisés .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Oj ketamiˈ chi riˈ Kakaj Dios xchˈabˈen re Moisés , pero man winak li taˈ ketam lamas tipeˈw , xcheˈtak re sicˈ winak .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Sicˈ winak xij chic rechak : Subˈlaj tisaach inchˈol awiˈlak , taˈ awetamak lamas tipeˈw , pero xtzibˈsajiˈ bˈakˈ inwch .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Ketamiˈ chi Kakaj Dios taˈ tijta jyoljak yak ajmacbˈ , xike tijta jyoljak yak ri tinimirsantak jkˈij y yak ri tibˈanowtak lawiˈ raj re trantak .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Ni jun bˈwelt tal jtaquil kawiˈl chi wiˈ nen xtzibˈsan bˈakˈ jwich jun moy ri moychak cuando xqˈuisiˈyc .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Winak li miti jiˈ petzal riqˈui Kakaj Dios , taˈ roj ticwin chi jbˈanic ni jono cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios , xcheˈ rechak .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Y rechak xijtak chic re : At , atchak jun ajmac cuando xatqˈuisiˈyc y , ¿ riˈcˈu chawaj ojatijoj ? xcheˈtak re sicˈ winak . Y xresajtakbˈi li sinagog .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xretemaj chi xesajiˈch sicˈ winak li sinagog . Cuando xtaˈ chic ribˈak pach sicˈ winak xtzˈonaj re : ¿ Ton cubˈariˈ achˈol chirij Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil ? xcheˈ re sicˈ winak .

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Y sicˈ winak xij re : Kaj , bˈij chwe nen chi cristian lal pire ticubˈar inchˈol chirij , xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Xawilaˈ jwich , iniˈ ri , ri quiek riqˈuil attijin chi yoloj , xcheˈ re .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Xpe sicˈ winak , laj or xxucar chiwch Kakaj Jesús y xij re : Wajawl , ticubˈariˈ inchˈol chawij , xcheˈ re .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re sicˈ winak li : In ximpe wich ulew pirechiˈ tiyuk wileˈ nen jbˈanicak cristian , tziniˈ jbˈanicak o taˈn pire tambˈan chi yak moy tinaˈtuntak y yak ri tinaˈtuntak tiwuxtak pi moy , xcheˈ .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Xpe jujun rechak mak fariseo ri wiˈtak riqˈuil , cuando xtatak chi jilonli xij Kakaj Jesús , xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Ojcˈu moy oj ? xcheˈtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Witi atak moy ticuysajiˈ amacak ri tabˈantak , pero jwiˈl atak tabˈijtakaˈ chi maˈ atak taˈ moy , taˈ ticuysaj amacak ri tabˈantak , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak nen taˈ tioc laˈ man pwert re jcorralak mak carner y jalan lad tioc , alkˈomiˈn y etzl cristianiˈn .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Pero nen tioc laˈ man pwert re jcorralak mak carner , riˈ man ajyukˈ .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Man ajchajal re chiˈ corral tijtebˈaˈ man pwert re man corral chiwch man ajyukˈ y man ajyukˈ tijchˈabˈej mak jcarner laˈ jbˈijak y mak carner tijchˈobˈaˈtakaˈ laj jkul chi riˈ tichˈaˈwc y tresajbˈi mak carner laj jcorralak .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Y cuando tiesmajbˈi juntir mak carner jwiˈl li corral , ajrucˈreˈ tinabˈerbˈi chiwchak tibˈetak y mak carner tixambˈertakaˈ chirij , jwiˈl tijchˈobˈaˈtakaˈ laj jkul chi riˈ tichˈaˈwc .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Rechak maˈ kus taˈke rechak tixambˈertak chirij jono wi mitaˈ tijchˈobˈtak jwich , tike elmajtak chiwch jwiˈl taˈ tijchˈobˈtak jwich y taˈ tijchˈobˈtak laj jkul chi riˈ tichˈaˈwc , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij man esbˈi noˈj ri rechak , pero rechak taˈ xtatak jcholajl nen raj Kakaj Jesús xij rechak .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak chi iniˈ man pwert re man corral lamas tioctak mak carner .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Juntir mak ri xyuktak nabˈe chinwch in , alkˈomtakaˈn y etzltak cristiantakaˈn , pero mak carner taˈ xtatak jyoljak .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: In , iniˈ man pwert re man corral y nen tioc li corral inwiˈl in , ticolmajiˈn . Tijnaˈ tioc y tiel laˈ man pwert re man corral y tijtaˈ richaj .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Man alkˈom tipet pireke tiyuk ralkˈaj mak carner y tiyuk jcamsajtak y tiyuk jsacheˈ jwichak . Pero in ximpet pirechiˈ tanyeˈ cˈaslemal y pire tanyeˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal rechak .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: In , iniˈ jun tzilaj ajyukˈ . Jun tzilaj ajyukˈ tijyaˈ ribˈ pi camic chi jcolic jcarner .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Jun mocom ri tijin chi chac jwiˈlke jtojbˈl cuando tril tipe man utiw tican jyeˈ mak carner y tielmajbˈi jwiˈl maˈ riˈ taˈ re tzˈetel ajyukˈ y maˈ riˈ taˈ re rajw mak carner . Tioc man utiw li corral riqˈuilak mak carner chi jchapicak y truktajtakbˈic .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Man mocom li tielmajiˈbˈi jwiˈl mocomke , xike tichacun jwiˈl jtojbˈl y re taˈ tioc il chirijak mak carner .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: In , iniˈ jun tzilaj ajyukˈ , tanchˈobˈaˈ jwichak incarner y mak incarner tijchˈobˈaˈtakaˈ inwch y tanyaˈ wibˈ pi camic chi jcolic mak incarner .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: Jilon chapcaˈ Kakaj Dios tijchˈobˈaˈ inwch in y in tanchˈobˈaˈ jwich re .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Y wiˈ chiquiˈ nicˈj incarner chic ri taˈtakaˈ neri li corral , pero tina incˈamtaknach . Rechak tina jtatakna inyolj y tina jcˈamna ribˈak li jun kˈat y junke ajyukˈ pi rechak .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Kakaj Dios injlokˈajiˈ jwiˈl tanyaˈ wibˈ pi camic , pero ticˈastasajiˈ inwch laj incamnakl .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Taˈ ni jonok tiesan incˈaslemal , laj wanmiˈ tipeˈw , tanjach wibˈ pi camic . In wiˈ laj inkˈbˈ tanjach wibˈ pi camic y wiˈ laj inkˈbˈ tancˈul chic incˈaslemal . Riˈ li ri takalquin jwiˈl Inkaj chi jbˈanic , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Yak rijajl Israel cuando xtatak chi jilonli xijsaj rechak jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús , xjalmaj chic jchomorsaˈnak chiribˈil ribˈak .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui rechak xijtak : ¿ Nen chac tacojtak ri tijbˈij ? Re etzliˈ wiˈ laj ranm y chˈuˈjiˈn , xcheˈtak .

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Y mak nicˈj chic xijtak : Mak yoloj ri tijin chi jbˈij maˈ jyolj taˈ jun cristian ri wiˈ etzl laj ranm . ¿ Toncˈu cwiniˈ jun etzl chi jtzibˈsaj bˈakˈ jwich jun moy ? xcheˈtak .

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Laˈ mak riqˈuil jabˈ tijin trantak jun nimakˈij Jerusalén pire jcˈulic jkˈij jurubˈ junabˈ jbˈantaj jwaˈx nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y xjachsaj re Kakaj Dios .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Kakaj Jesús tijin tiwoˈcot bˈatzˈaak re nimi richoch Kakaj Dios ri jbˈij Salomón .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Xpe yak rijajl Israel , xsuttak rij Kakaj Jesús y xtzˈonajtak re : ¿ Nen or tawesaj chi sakil chikawch wi atiˈ ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew ? ¡ Bˈij chike lajori ! xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Ximbˈijiˈn y taˈ tacojtak inyolj . Laˈ juntir ri bˈanal inwiˈl ri takalquin chi jbˈanic jwiˈl Inkaj chi tambˈan , riˈ li ticˈutuw chi iniˈn .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Pero atak taˈ tacojtak inyolj jwiˈl maˈ atak taˈ incarner .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Mak incarner tijtaˈtakaˈ inyolj y in tanchˈobˈaˈ jwichak . Rechak tixambˈertakaˈ chwij .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: In tanyaˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal rechak riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic . Rechak ni jun bˈwelt tisaach jwichak y taˈ ni jonok tiesantak laj inkˈbˈ .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Y Inkaj ri xjachow laj inkˈbˈ juntir li , masna nim jkˈij chiwch juntir cristian ri wiˈ wich ulew y ni jonok ticwin chi resajcak yak ri wiˈtak laj jkˈabˈ .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: In pach Kakaj Dios ojke jun , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Xpetak yak rijajl Israel , xmoltak abˈaj pire roj xcojtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Subˈlaj utzil bˈanal chawchak inwiˈl , jwiˈl riˈ li ri takalquinch jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi jbˈanic . ¿ Nencˈu quiek chirij chawajak tacojtak abˈaj chwe ? xcheˈ rechak .

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Yak rijajl Israel xijtak chic re : Maˈ jwiˈl taˈ ni jono utzil ri bˈanal awiˈl tikacoj abˈaj chawe , jwiˈl tacoj aybˈ pi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios y atke cristian y tabˈij chi atiˈ Dios , xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Tzˈibˈaliˈ li wuj re apixbˈak ri tijbˈij jilonri : Atak atakaˈ dios , ticheˈ .

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Y wi Kakaj Dios xij chi diostakaˈ yak cristian ri xcojowtak Jyolj , taˈ tijnaˈ tikabˈij chi taˈ tzˈet ri tijbˈij Kakaj Dios .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Y wi Kakaj Diosiˈ xinchaˈw y xinjtakch wich ulew , ¿ nencˈu chac tabˈij atak chi tijin tancoj wibˈ pi Dios jwiˈl ximbˈij chi iniˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Wi in taˈ tambˈan chapcaˈ tran Inkaj , taˈ tacojtak inyolj .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Pero wi tambˈan mak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios chawchak y wi taˈ chawajak tacojtak inyolj , xike cojtak mak cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios ri tambˈan pire tawetemajtak y tatatak jcholajl chi Kakaj Dios wiˈ laj wanm y in winiˈ laj ranm , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Rechak rajak roj xchapeˈtak Kakaj Jesús , pero re taˈ xyeˈ ribˈ chi chapem .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ Kakaj Jesús xkˈaj chicbˈi chˈakap re nimi jaˈ Jordán , xwaˈx laˈ man luwar lamas xwaˈxwiˈ Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox chi jbˈanic jaˈtiox .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui cristian xtawtak chi rilic y xijtak : Juan Ajbˈanal Jaˈtiox taˈ xan cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios , pero juntir ri xij chirij winak ri , tzˈetiˈn , xcheˈtak .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Laˈ man luwar li subˈlaj qˈui cristian xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Wiˈ jun winak subˈlaj yaj ri jbˈij Lázaro aj Betania ri jtilmitak María pach Marta yak ranabˈ .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: María ranabˈ Lázaro ri yaj , riˈ María li ri xtzˈajow perjum rij rakan Kakaj Jesús ri Kajawl y xchekersaj chic laˈ rusumal jbˈa .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Xpetak yak ranabˈ Lázaro , xtaktak jbˈij re Kakaj Jesús jilonri : Kajawl , Lázaro ri lokˈlaj awichcˈulchiˈ yajiˈn , xcheˈtak re .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Kakaj Jesús , cuando xta chi jilonli xijsaj re , xij : Man yajel li taˈ tijcamsaj Lázaro , pirechiˈ tijcˈut jnimal jkˈij Kakaj Dios y pirechiˈ tinimirsaj jkˈij Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Kakaj Jesús subˈlaj tijlokˈaj Marta , María y Lázaro .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Pero cuando xta chi yajiˈ Lázaro taˈ xeˈ laj or chi rilic , xwaˈxna chic quibˈ kˈij claˈ .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xij rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Joˈtak chic Judea , xcheˈ rechak .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij xijtak re : Kajtijonl , pero ajquiˈ ojr yak rijajl Israel ri wiˈtak Judea rajak roj xatjcamsajtak chi abˈaj y lajori , ¿ chawajcˈu atbˈe chic claˈ ? xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Y Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : ¿ Taˈcˈu awetamak chi cabˈlajuj ( 12 ) or wiˈ re lakˈj ? Wi jun cristian tiwoˈcot lakˈj taˈ tijtop rakan jwiˈl trilaˈ jbˈe laˈ jsakil ri tisakabˈsan wich ulew .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Pero nen jono cristian tiwoˈcot lakˈabˈ tijtopaˈ rakan jwiˈl taˈ naˈl jbˈe , xcheˈ .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Y xij chic rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij : Kichcˈulchiˈ Lázaro xwariˈn , pero in tibˈe incˈastasaj jwich , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Xpe yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij , xijtak re : Kajawl , pero wi xwariˈn , riˈ cˈutbˈire chi titzibˈiˈn , xcheˈtak re .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús tijin tijbˈij chi Lázaro xcamiˈn y yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij riˈ chijchˈol rechak warajke tijin tran Lázaro .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli Kakaj Jesús xij jcholajl rechak jilonri : Lázaro xcamiˈn

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: y subˈlaj inquiˈcot jwiˈl taˈ xinwaˈx claˈ laˈ mak kˈij li , jwiˈl jilonli tziyiˈ pi awechak pire ticubˈar achˈolak chwij . Lajori joˈ kileˈtak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Xpe Tomás ri xcojsaj jbˈij pi Dídimo , xij rechak yak nicˈj ajtijol ribˈak chic chirij Kakaj Jesús : Joˈtak chirij pire ojbˈe camtak nicˈ riqˈuil , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Cuando xtaw Kakaj Jesús Betania xta jtaquil chi xanaˈ quejabˈ kˈij jmukmaj Lázaro .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Betania raj nicˈaj lewa jnajtil jxoˈl riqˈui Jerusalén .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui yak rijajl Israel ri wiˈtak Judea ri jwinakak Marta pach María xtawtak chi jsolajcak pire tibˈe jyeˈtak jcowil ranmak , jwiˈl subˈlaj tibˈisontak chirij jxibˈalak ri xcamc .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Marta , cuando xta chi bˈesaliˈ Kakaj Jesús , laj or xelch chi jcˈulic , pero María xcan la ja .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Marta xij re Kakaj Jesús : Wajawl , witi wat neri kiqˈuil taˈ roj xcam inxibˈal .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Pero in wetamiˈ chi aj tijnaˈ tijyeˈ Kakaj Dios chawe lajori juntir nen tatzˈonaj re , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Axibˈal ticˈastasajiˈ jwich laj jcamnakl , xcheˈ re .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Marta xij chic re : Tzˈetiˈn , in wetamiˈ chi ticˈastasajiˈ jwich laj jcamnakl cuando ticˈastasaj jwichak camnakibˈ laˈ qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : Iniˈ incˈastasan jwichak camnakibˈ y in inyeˈw cˈaslemal . Nen ticubˈar jchˈol chwij onque ticamc , ticˈastasajiˈ jwich laj jcamnakl .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Y juntir yak cristian ri aj yoˈltak , wi ticubˈar jchˈolak chwij taˈ chiquiˈ ticamtak . ¿ Ton acojaˈ at chi tzˈetiˈn ? xcheˈ re Marta .

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Marta xij chic re Kakaj Jesús : Tzˈetiˈn , Wajawl . In tancojaˈ chi atiˈ Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri bˈil jwiˈl chi tina jtaknach wich ulew , xcheˈ re .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Cuando xijmaj jilonli jwiˈl Marta xeˈ laj richoch chi jsiqˈuij María , xeˈ jbˈij re pi ricˈan jilonri : Ajtijonl wiˈchak jili y riˈ raj atbˈe riqˈuil , xcheˈ re .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: María xike xta chi jilonli xijsaj re , laj or xwaˈrc y xeˈ chi rilic Kakaj Jesús .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Kakaj Jesús ajquiˈ chi oc li tilmit , ajwiˈ lamas xeˈ cˈulsaj jwiˈl Marta .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Yak rijajl Israel ri jwinakak María ri wiˈtak claˈ la ja chi jyeˈic jcowil ranm , cuando xriltak chi xwaˈr María y xelbˈi jol , rechak xeˈtak chirij . Riˈ chijchˈol rechak jiˈ tibˈe chi okˈej chiˈ jul lamas xmuksajwiˈ jxibˈal .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: María , cuando xtaw lamas wiˈ Kakaj Jesús , xxucar chiwch y xij re : Wajawl , witi wat neri kiqˈuil taˈ roj xcam inxibˈal , xcheˈ re .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Kakaj Jesús , cuando xril chi subˈlaj tiokˈtak María pach yak rijajl Israel ri jwinakak ri bˈesaltak chirij , subˈlaj xcˈaxcˈobˈ ranm chi rilicak y subˈlaj xbˈisonc .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Xtzˈonaj rechak : ¿ Lamas xamuktakwiˈ ? xcheˈ rechak . Rechak xijtak chic re Kakaj Jesús : Kajawl , joˈ ilta , xcheˈtak re .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xrokˈbˈej ribˈ .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Yak rijajl Israel ri jwinakak María ri wiˈtak claˈ xijtak : Iltak impuch naˈliˈ chi subˈlaj raj jwich , xcheˈtak .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Pero nicˈj rechak xijtak : Riˈ re xtzibˈsan bˈakˈ jwich sicˈ moy , ¿ taˈcˈu roj xcwin nen xan re Lázaro pire maˈ xcamc ? xcheˈtak .

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xcˈaxcˈobˈ chic laj ranm , xeˈ chiˈ jul lamas mukulwiˈ Lázaro y man jul li chˈukuliˈ jchiˈ laˈ jun abˈaj .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij : Esajtak man abˈaj , xcheˈ . Xpe Marta ranabˈ Lázaro ri xcamc , xij : Wajawl , li chuchak jwiˈl xanaˈ quejabˈ kˈij jmukic , xcheˈ re .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Pero Kakaj Jesús xij chic re : ¿ Taˈcˈu ximbˈij chawe wi tacoj inyolj tawilaˈ jnimal jkˈij Kakaj Dios ? xcheˈ re .

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Ajrucˈreˈ xresajtak man abˈaj chi jchiˈ man jul y Kakaj Jesús xnaˈtun lecj y xij : Kaj , tancˈomowaj chawe jwiˈl xataˈ inyolj .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: In wetamiˈ chi tataˈ inyolj , pero in tambˈij jilonri pire tijcojtak yak cristian ri wiˈtak neri chi atiˈ attakowinakch we , xcheˈ .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Y cuando xijmaj jilonli jwiˈl subˈlaj cow xchˈejejc , xij : ¡ Lázaro elanch claˈ ! xcheˈ .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Y laj or xelch Lázaro li jul ri xcamna , aj pisiliˈ jkˈabˈ pach rakan laˈ itzˈik y jcaybˈal aj pisiliˈ laˈ jun sutˈ , Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Quirtak mak itzˈik ri pisil chirij y yeˈtak luwar re tibˈec , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui yak rijajl Israel ri wiˈtak claˈ chi jsolaj María , cuando xriltak nen xan Kakaj Jesús , xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Pero nicˈj rechak xeˈtak riqˈuilak mak fariseo y xeˈ jbˈijtak rechak nen xan Kakaj Jesús .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Y xpetak mak fariseo pach mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak pach mak comontak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel , xijtak : ¿ Nen tikabˈantak ? Man winak li tijin tran subˈlaj cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Wi tican kayeˈ pi jilonli subˈlaj qˈui cristian ticojowtak jyolj y tipetak mak jbˈabˈaltak kˈatbˈitzij re Roma tiyuk jyujeˈtak nimi richoch Kakaj Dios y tijsachtak jwich katilmit , xcheˈtak .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Jun rechak ri jbˈij Caifás , ri wiˈ pire nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios laˈ man junabˈ li , xij rechak : Atak taˈ nen awetamak .

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Taˈcojoˈ tachomorsajtak chi riˈ mas tzi pi ke oj ticamsaj jun chi cristian chiwch tisachsaj jwich katilmit , xcheˈ rechak .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Caifás cuando xij jilonli , maˈ laj noˈj taˈke re xpeˈw . Jwiˈl re riˈ man nimlaj jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios laˈ man junabˈ li , jwiˈliˈli Kakaj Dios xyeˈ luwar re xij chi Kakaj Jesús tina camna pi jqˈuexwach yak rijajl Israel .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Y maˈ xitaˈke pi rechak , chi jiˈ pi rechak yak maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel ri tilem ribˈak bˈak juntir tilmit pire tran jun rechak juntir yak ralcˈwal Kakaj Dios .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Laˈ man kˈij li xcholtak jchomorsaj mak jbˈabˈalak yak rijajl Israel chi tijcamsajtak Kakaj Jesús .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli Kakaj Jesús taˈ chiquiˈ mas xwaˈx chijxoˈlak yak rijajl Israel . Re xeˈ li jun tilmit ri jbˈij Efraín ri wiˈ chijcˈulel man chekej luwar , claˈ xwaˈx pach yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Taˈ chiquiˈ naj raj titaw kˈij re jnimakˈjak yak rijajl Israel ri jbˈij Pascua . Y subˈlaj qˈui cristian re juntir tilmit tijin jtawicak Jerusalén pire tibˈe raneˈtak lawiˈ rajwax pire tijchˈajchˈobˈej jwichak nabˈe chiwch Kakaj Dios , ajrucˈreˈ tiwaˈxtak li nimakˈij .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Rechak tijin tijtoctak Kakaj Jesús y cuando xmulbˈaˈ ribˈak li nimi richoch Kakaj Dios tijbˈijtak chiribˈil ribˈak : ¿ Nen tabˈij atak , ton petiˈ li nimakˈij o taˈn ? xcheˈtak .

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Mak fariseo pach mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios bˈilchak rechak cristian jwiˈlak chi wi wiˈ jonok tretemaj lamas wiˈ Kakaj Jesús tibˈe jyeˈ jtaquil rechak pire tibˈe chapsajok .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Wakakibˈ ( 6 ) kˈij raj titaw kˈij re jnimakˈjak yak rijajl Israel ri jbˈij Pascua . Kakaj Jesús xtaw Betania lamas wiˈ Lázaro ri xcˈastasaj jwich laj jcamnakl xoˈlak camnakibˈ .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Claˈ xyeˈtak jun jsinar Kakaj Jesús pire jnimirsaj jkˈij . Marta xoc chi jyeˈic jwaak y Lázaro riˈ jun rechak yak ri cubˈul chi wicˈ chiˈ mex riqˈui Kakaj Jesús .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Xpe María , xcˈamch jun ra nejbˈ nojsal chi perjum ri jbˈij nardo y subˈlaj pakal rijil , xtzˈaj rij rakan Kakaj Jesús y xsuˈ laˈ rusumal jbˈa y juntir jpam man ja xnoj chi ruxbˈl man perjum .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Xpe jun rechak yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo ri jbˈij Judas Iscariote , ri jcˈajol Simón , ri tijachow re Kakaj Jesús pi camic , xij :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: ¿ Nen chac maˈ xcˈayaj man perjum ri ? Man perjum ri rijiliˈ uxibˈ cient ( 300 ) chi denario . Riˈ mas tzi xcˈayajteneˈ man perjum pire titˈoˈsaj yak powr laˈ man pwak , xcheˈ .

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Pero Judas xij jilonli maˈ jwiˈl taˈ tril cˈur jwichak yak powr , jwiˈl re alkˈomiˈn . Riˈ re ajcˈolol pwak y tralkˈajiˈ qˈuitjaˈ re laˈ man pwak ri tijcˈol .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij re : Can yeˈ anm li pi utzil , man perjum li cˈolaniˈch jwiˈl pire ticojsaj chwij cuando immuksaj .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Yak powr tiwaˈxtakaˈ chaxoˈlak nojel kˈij , pero in taˈ naj inwaˈx chaxoˈlak , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui yak rijajl Israel xtatak jtaquil chi wiˈ Kakaj Jesús Betania , jwiˈliˈli xeˈtak chi rilic , pero maˈ xitaˈke Kakaj Jesús xeˈ rileˈtak , riˈ xeˈ rileˈtak Lázaro ri xcˈastasaj jwich jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús laj jcamnakl xoˈlak camnakibˈ .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Xpetak mak jbˈabˈalak yak ajcˈamaltak jbˈeak cristian riqˈui Kakaj Dios , xchomorsajtak chi tijcamsajtak Lázaro jwiˈl ,

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: jwiˈlke re subˈlaj qˈui yak rijajl Israel tijin tijtos ribˈak chirijak pire ticubˈar jchˈolak chirij Kakaj Jesús .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Subˈlaj qˈui cristian xeˈtak Jerusalén pire tibˈe jkˈasajtak nimakˈij Pascua claˈ . Laj jcabˈ kˈij cuando xtatak jtaquil chi tawem tran Kakaj Jesús li tilmit claˈ ,

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: subˈlaj qˈui cristian xtoctak jxaktak palm y xeltakch chi jcˈulic Kakaj Jesús . Subˈlaj cow xchˈejejtak , xijtak : ¡ Nim jkˈij Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl ! ¡ Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl wiˈ jkˈabˈ chibˈ ri petzal laj jbˈij ! ¡ Tzi re ri jreyak yak rijajl Israel ! xcheˈtak .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Kakaj Jesús xtaˈ jun ra bˈur li bˈe y xquejajch chapcaˈ tzˈibˈal li wuj re Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: Mi tzaak achˈolak atak aj Sión , iltak areyak petzalc , quejal jun ra bˈur jwiˈl , ticheˈ .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Yak ajtijol ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesucristo taˈ xmajtak jcholajl laj or ri xan Kakaj Jesús , pero cuando xnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Jesús , ajrucˈreˈ xcuxtaj jwiˈlak chi juntir li tzˈibˈaliˈ jwiˈlak yak ajkˈasaltak Jyolj Kakaj Dios ojr chi jilonli tina bˈanna re .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Yak cristian ri wiˈtak riqˈui Kakaj Jesús cuando xsiqˈuij Lázaro chiˈ jul lamas xmuksajwiˈ pire xcˈastasaj jwich laj jcamnakl xoˈlak camnakibˈ , xyoltak re cristian ri ilan jwiˈlak .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Jwiˈliˈli xeltakch subˈlaj qˈui cristian chi jcˈulic Kakaj Jesús jwiˈl xretemajtakaˈ chi Kakaj Jesús xanaˈ jun cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Xpetak mak fariseo , xijtak chiribˈil ribˈak chirij Kakaj Jesús : Tawilaˈtakaˈ chi lajori taˈ chiquiˈ nen ojcwintak chi jbˈanic re . Iltak , juntir cristian tixambˈertakaˈ chirij , xcheˈtak .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Chijxoˈlak mak cristian ri xtawtak Jerusalén re man nimakˈij Pascua chi jnimirsaj jkˈij Kakaj Dios wiˈtakaˈ jujun yak maˈ rijajl taˈ Israel .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Xpe rechak , xjutuntak chijcˈulel Felipe ri aj Betsaida ri jun tilmit re Galilea xtzˈonajtak tokˈobˈ re Felipe : Kaj , chikaj tikil jwich Kakaj Jesús , xcheˈtak re .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Xpe Felipe , xeˈ jbˈij re Andrés y xpetak chi quibˈ ribˈilak xeˈ jbˈijtak re Kakaj Jesús .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Xtawiˈ or pire tinimirsaj jkˈij Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Kes tzˈetel tzˈet tambˈij chawechak , wi jun bˈakˈ jwich trig taˈ tikej ralaj ulew y taˈ tiel racˈal , tican pi junke bˈakˈ jwich , pero wi tiel racˈal tijyaˈ subˈlaj jwich .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Nen jono cristian taˈ raj tijyeˈ ribˈ pi camic jwiˈlke tran lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tran , tisaachiˈ jwich . Pero nen jono cristian tijyeˈ ribˈ pi camic jwiˈlke jbˈanic lawiˈ raj Kakaj Dios tran , tijtaˈ jun tzilaj cˈaslemal riqˈui Kakaj Dios lecj ri taˈ jqˈuisic .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Nen jonok raj tran lawiˈ ri chwaj in tran , xambˈerok chwij y lamas inwaˈxwiˈ in , claˈ tiwaˈx re . Y nen tibˈanow lawiˈ ri chwaj in , tinimirsajiˈ jkˈij jwiˈl Inkaj , xcheˈ rechak .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic : Lajori wiˈ subˈlaj cˈax laj wanm . ¿ Nencˈu tambˈij ? ¿ Toncˈu imbˈij : Kaj , inacoleˈ laj jkˈabˈ mak cˈax ri tantij laˈ mak kˈij ri ? incheˈ . Taˈ tambˈij jilonli , jwiˈl riˈ li quiek jwiˈl petzalquin , xcheˈ .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Ajrucˈre xij : Kaj , nimirsaj jkˈij abˈj , xcheˈ . Riˈchak xtasaj xaanch jun chˈaˈwem lecj , xijch : Xinnimirsajiˈ jkˈij imbˈj y tannimirsaj chiquiˈn , xcheˈch .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Mak cristian ri wiˈtak riqˈui Kakaj Jesús , xtaˈtakaˈn . Nicˈj xijtak chi quiekuljawiˈn y nicˈj chic xijtak chi jun anjliˈ xchˈabˈench re .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij rechak : Maˈ pire taˈ utzil pi we in xansajch chˈaˈwem , pirechiˈ utzil pi awechak .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Riˈ kˈij ri tibˈan kˈatbˈitzij chirij cristian wich ulew y lajori tiesajbˈi man ri wiˈ takon laj jkˈabˈ chibˈak juntir cristian wich ulew .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Y cuando imbˈitsaj lecj , juntir yak ri tijtatak jcholajl ri xansaj chwe tancˈamaˈtakaˈbˈi wiqˈuil , xcheˈ .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Jilonli jbˈij xan Kakaj Jesús nen chi camic lal tioc re .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Mak cristian xijtak re : Taliˈ kawiˈl tijbˈij laj Jpixbˈ Kakaj Dios chi ri bˈil jwiˈl Kakaj Dios chi tina jtaknach wich ulew taˈ jsachic jwich . Y , ¿ nencˈu chac tabˈij at chi Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil tibˈitsajiˈ lecj ? ¿ Nencˈu li ri Jcˈajol Kakaj Dios ri xwux pi cristianil ? xcheˈtak .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Kakaj Jesús xij chic rechak : Ajwiˈna man kˈakˈ chaxoˈlak , pero taˈ chiquiˈ naj tiwaˈx chaxoˈlak . Woˈcotentak laj jsakil jkˈakˈal pire maˈ etke atcantak lak ukuˈm , jwiˈl nen tiwoˈcot li ukuˈmal taˈ retam lamas tibˈeˈw .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Cubˈaˈ achˈolak chirij man kˈakˈ li ri ajwiˈ chaxoˈlak pire atwuxtak pi ralcˈwal man kˈakˈ li , xcheˈ Kakaj Jesús rechak . Cuando xijmaj jilonli jwiˈl Kakaj Jesús xeˈ jmukeˈ ribˈ chiwchak .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Kakaj Jesús xanaˈ subˈlaj cˈutbˈi jcwinel Kakaj Dios chiwchak yak rijajl Israel , pero rechak taˈ xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij ,

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: jwiˈl rajwaxiˈ tina taw chiwch ri xcan jtzˈibˈaj Isaías ojr ri ajkˈasal Jyolj Kakaj Dios ri tijbˈij jilonri : Kajawl , taˈ ni jun cojowinak re ri yeˈl jtaquil kawiˈl . ¿ Nen quiek chiwch xcˈutsajwiˈ chi Kakaj Dios ri Kajawl wiˈ jcwinel ? ticheˈ .

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Jilonli rechak taˈ xcwintak xcubˈar jchˈolak chirij Kakaj Jesús y Isaías xij chic :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Kakaj Dios xanow moy rechak y xanow abˈaj re ranmak pire maˈ tinaˈtuntak laˈ bˈakˈ jwichak y pire maˈ tijchomorsajtak laj ranmak pire taˈ tijqˈuex jnoˈjak y taˈ tikˈajtak wiqˈuil pire tantzibˈsajtak , xcheˈ .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Isaías xij jilonli jwiˈl xrilaˈ chapcaˈ li jun ichicˈ chi nimiˈ jkˈij Kakaj Jesús y riˈ li ri xcan jbˈij chirij .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Pero wiˈ subˈlaj qˈui yak rijajl Israel y jujun rechak yak ri wiˈ rekleˈnak chijxoˈlak xjach ribˈak laj jkˈabˈ Kakaj Jesús . Pero taˈ rajak tijcˈuttak chi sakil jwiˈl titzaak jchˈolak chiwchak mak fariseo pire maˈ tiesajtakbˈi li sinagog ,

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: jwiˈl rechak riˈ mas rajak tzi tiilsajtak jwiˈlak cristian chiwch tzi tiilsajtak jwiˈl Kakaj Dios .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Kakaj Jesús subˈlaj cow xchˈaˈwc , xij : Nen ticubˈar jchˈol chwij , maˈ xitaˈke chwij in ticubˈar jchˈol , ticubˈariˈ jchˈol chirij ri intakowinakch .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Y nen tiiliw inwch , trilaˈ jwich ri intakowinakch .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Jwiˈl in iniˈ jun kˈakˈ , in ximpe wich ulew pire nen ticubˈar jchˈol chwij taˈ tican li ukuˈmal .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Pero nen tijta inyolj y taˈ tran lawiˈ ri tambˈij , maˈ in taˈ imbˈanow kˈatbˈitzij chirij , jwiˈl in taˈ ximpet pire tiyuk imbˈaneˈ kˈatbˈitzij chirijak juntir cristian , in ximpet pirechiˈ tiyuk incoleˈtak laj jkˈabˈ jmacak .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Nen inxutuwc y taˈ raj tijcoj inyolj , wiˈ nen tibˈanow kˈatbˈitzij chirij , riˈ inyolj ri ximbˈij re tibˈanow kˈatbˈitzij chirij laˈ qˈuisbˈitak kˈij re jwich kˈijsak .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
